story:
What Does $1 get you these days? Maybe a newspaper, a candy bar, or  a cup of coffee. Not a lot. Now Register a "Supporter account" on NOODLEAPP with only $1. 

 

Short Summary

The main purpose of social network is to keep up with what’s going on with our friends’ lives, so you’d think it would be pretty obvious that scrolling through your news feed will show you a list of what your friends are posting in the order that they’re posted. When it comes to what you see in your feed (i.e., what is being posted by your friends and people/Pages you follow).You will end up missing posts you would be very interested in or you keep seeing the same posts at the top of your feed after you’ve already read them. They’re also not in the order they were posted, so you’ll see one post from three days ago, followed by another from 10 minutes ago, followed by one from yesterday, etc. which don't make for a very natural experience.

Have you noticed that you are only seeing updates in news feed from the same people lately?

have you also noticed that when you post something like status,messages,photos,images,links and video  the same group of people are commenting and everyone else seems to be ignoring you?

You will also often find that unless you make a paid promotion, a few in your audience will actually see your social media status update. This is due to their algorithms that determine what people see in their news feeds. An average  6% of your audience will see what you post on other social networks. In comparison to this an average email open rate of 22% and you can see the difference. In Other words, if you have 2000 facebook fans or friends & 2000 twitter followers on twitter - this is what you will get.

120 facebook fans will see your status updates and40 twitter followers will see your tweet.

So, how many job opportunities, offers, important updates, retails sales, events have you heard about before they  already happened?

Then how to reach your all audience instantly?

When a real time messaging service turns into full time social network that can efficient to broadcast your voice and your thoughts to large number of people. When we use a real time protocol to build a social network we may overcame above problems.This made me to introduce a new social networking app called N.O.O.D.L.E(NETWORK OF ORGANIZED DATA WITH LIVE ENTRY).

INTRODUCTION :

NOODLE app is a freeware and cloud based instant social networking service. The application provides a platform to express, connect and share media with other users instantly. You can Broadcast your thoughts, seek information, get help, find and discuss with experts of any background and much more...All in a JIFFY! NOODLE allows registered users to create broadcasting channels, personal pages to keep in touch with your favorites whether it be siblings,music artists or that movie trailer that you've been waiting for!.

How to use NOODLEAPP :

NOODLEAPP is user friendly simple social network, all You Need a mobile number to register with network. Bellow shown video will explain about live actions of Noodleapp and how to use NoodleApp.

 

 

Features of NoodleApp:

Social Rooms : Unlike other social networks which post content in news-feed format, our app uses social rooms as it primary system.

Followers : Follower is someone who subscribed channel, group and user page to receive updates.

Reaction Buttons : Like, dislike,comment, share buttons enables users to easily interact with status updates, photos, videos, links shared by followers

Push Notifications : Real time room notifications tells user that something has been added to his already subscribed room.

Channels :  Channels can be created for broadcasting status to unlimited number of subscribers. All our network registered users can create and join channels. You can create two types of channels 1) public channel 2) private channel
While a public channel is an open for all platform,private channels enable you to share content exclusively with your invitees. Ofcourse, users can leave a channel anytime they like.

End to end encryption : industry standard encryption technology. 

Cloud-based storage :  All the data within network will be saved in a cloud-servers and can be accessed on any other device. Users can share video, images and other files without size limit .

Single page : Users can showcase any item,place orders,access customer service and also ask for community help using the single page option. This allows the user to create a squeaky clean one frame page.

 

5 Questions  that make you think noodle is so special than others:

1)Are you tired of repetitive social media posts which wasting your time?

2)Why should a social network dictates what you must see and what we must not see?

3)Are you still invisible to large portion of your friend list on your social network ?

4) Are you tired of spammy accounts without any verifications?

5) Why should you accept  requests from Friends -of- Friends  or strangers you barely know?

What makes NOODLEAPP So Special :

Uses of  NOODLE APP :

Entertainment : Get your favourite meme's, updates about movies, reviews, funny pictures, funny videos and more!

Local Business : Reach your local business to customers easily. You can create Bank, bar, book store, local event, food, grocery, hotel, movie theater and  art gallery channels to send updates to your followers
Company Organisation or institution : Send and receive company updates, consulting service, institution updates.

Cause or community : Spread the word about your social cause.

Brand or Product :  Know about brand or product and  review of any product.
 

Public figure : Receive quick updates from public figure.

Community Help : Discuss and seek information from experts of all communities.

Buy and sell :  Get the best deals from people.

Live traffic updates : Never get stuck in traffic jam, warn others and receive live traffic updates of your area.
Also you can create a channel or group from following categories.

What We Need & What You Get

It's important to know what is the background of the application. Noodleapp uses ejabberd XMPP protocol application server written in Erlang programming language. It's ideal for accomodating huge communication systems,but, noodleapp is unique social network which need most customization. Due to its uniqueness NOODLEAPP network requires significant customization in XMMP protocol,YAWS SERVER and a few rest API's.

In trading its prowess for accomodating huge communication system with ease for extensive customization,developers need about 200 Hours to optimize the app's capacity for fault-tolerance,ad scalable and crash-proof. 

Right now, we are paying out of pocket to have the beta version developed for both iOS and Android. Once 100% of the beta features are implemented, we will be distributing the app as a limited market release to make sure this is an app people will use and love. As we work toward developing and building the app for a worldwide release, we will be needing funding to pay for our local developer's team, marketing, maintaining servers and maintain our backend operations.

Perks 

Want some clarifications? Hit us at  hello@noodle.ac Now. We'd love to hear from you.

OUR SUCCESS HEAVILY DEPENDS ON YOUR CONTRIBUTION, NOODLEAPP FOR THE WIN...

story:
The Quick Big Picture...

"A great accomplishment shouldn't be the end of the road, just the starting point for the next leap forward." ~ Harvey Mackay

Your Time Has Come... Final Day!

This is your last day. I have even done the unthinkable — I have upgraded the $50 Perk to the Full TQ Gold System if you donate TODAY. All  $50+ donations today will be automatically upgraded to the $600 TQ System. See below for details.

If you have always wanted to proclaim that you were behind something really big — at the very start of an Apple, eBay, Amazon, Twitter, Linked In and the like — this is your chance.

In a couple of years, we will all look back on today and say that this was the start of something BIG... something important... something that quietly changed people from the inside out.

We fully intend to build The World's Smartest App and want to do it with your help.

The benefit to you?

We will list you as a founding developer for all history!

Kind of like when Steve J. and Steve W. signed the inside of the original Apple II computer I purchased in 1977! Yes, I was there at the very beginning of Apple and am proud of what my companies have contributed to their growth and development over the years.

Now, I want you to be part of the INCEPTION of the REVOLUTION in Transparent Learning on a global scale.

Remember, it's not bragging if you actually did it!

Give just $20 bucks and you are on the list and even get a wonderful PERK. Forever and a day, you will be able to say, "I was in on it at the start!"

Imagine had you been visionary enough to do it with Twitter, Facebook, Google, Snap, Amazon, eBay...

 

Now for the big PERK! For just one day -- TODAY ONLY -- I will give anyone who donates just $50 the complete Power of TQ Gold System... the same $600, 18 CD, 14 Book collection of the most powerful personal development tools ever assembled. Give it to a friend, a grad, a dad, coworker... or enjoy Gold Membership for yourself. This will NEVER be offered to you again, so step up and proudly get in the game!

 

Simply click the $50 Perk and we will AUTOMATICALLY include the full TQ Gold System shown below as our 1-day upgrade gift for your support.

You get eternal BRAGGING RIGHTS to what will become the most powerful human neural net for higher achievement PLUS a 90% give away of TQ's most popular package.

This crowd-funding site is over on February 18th, so donate now, and become part of history!

 

Additional Background Information...

One of the greatest fears we all have is that the world is crumbling around us and that our very survival is at stake.  This fear is deeply personal.

What we need most now is HOPE and VISION.

We know that unless things change for the better, life may well be worse for our next generation. Can you really afford to permit the status quo to rule?

Not if you are concerned with your own family's well-being, let alone the children of the world.

The consensus of world leaders is that a better educated, better trained and higher skilled population is both the short and long-term solution to the problems we see in our everyday lives. In a world of chaos and conflict, we all need to perform up to our full capabilities. When we do, we all WIN.

"Mediocrity is the root of the malaise we are in. Excellence is the antidote." ~ E. R. Haas, CEO

Permit mediocrity to take root in your own life, you live a less fulfilling life. But when you reject mediocrity and make excellence your prevailing aspiration, you not only win personally — the world at large becomes a better, safer place.

What CAN you do now?

You can support The World Excellence Project™!  A contribution of $5-$20-$100 will help us do something incredibly powerful, new and different: Make EXCELLENCE the global aspiration thereby releasing the full potential of every person on the planet... starting first with YOU!

"How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world." - Anne Frank

In today's world, we face a huge barrier: Access...

In today’s world, only a tiny percent of the population have access to any real training or mentoring. Only a lucky few have the benefit of a coach to instruct them to reach higher and achieve more. This means people are going through life burned-out... stressed-out... and running on empty most of the time. They needlessly struggle financially and emotionally:

  • Single working moms — many holding down two jobs — have no money or time to be trained.
  • Employees with significant potential have no mentor to guide their climb up the ladder — especially if they hope to shatter the glass ceiling.
  • Hard working small businesses around the world have limited access to role models who would teach them how to be more productive and make better use of their time.

Until now. 

Let's take advantage of the billions of Smartphones people already carry in the palm of their hands —  install The Time Prism:® The Smartest App On Earth — and let's change this dysfunctional, broken, screwed up world we call home. Really break free of tired, status quo thinking and do something different: Teach the world to do GOOD by doing BETTER so we can all achieve MORE out of life.

The Time Prism will snatch back time that is ordinarily wasted and
turn it into a productive learning experience for billions of people who need it the most but can afford it the least.

With your help, we will make personal success training — real life skill-building — as prevalent and fun as music streaming... and as freely available as Twitter, Snapchat, or Facebook.

How Does It Work? 3 Simple Steps...

1. SET it...

2. FORGET it...

3. CHECK in when it chimes!

This is a Transparent Learning™ Engine that trains you in success-critical skills... making you incrementally smarter all day long. Better, you LEARN without even KNOWING you are learning!

Because you receive a constant flow of positive new ideas — from the over 10,000 unique, 10-second training sequences — The Time Prism shapes your thoughts and influences your choices and actions in real time. You achieve more by doing better each day.

  • You get more DONE...
  • You produce better RESULTS...
  • You become more SUCCESSFUL.

What Will You Learn? In a Nutshell...

  1. How to get far more done in far less time. Imagine the ideas from the major "get organized and get things done" style books all neatly condensed and distilled for immediate action — helping you make smarter decisions during your next phone call, meeting or sales presentation.
  2. How to remain focused on the important and not get sucked into the urgent. Imagine the key ideas from 50 books on prioritized actions that are all values-based... ideas that will get you to stop and think before you blunder your way to confusion and conflict. Result: more of the RIGHT things done each day.
  3. How to set achievable goals... make plans to support them... and develop powerful leadership teams to leverage your time and talents. Imagine the best ideas, from true leadership experts, on the power of delegation, synergy and effective team-building. You naturally become an Authentic Leader, not just someone who is faking it until they can make it.
  4. How to live out of passion and purpose, optimistically pursuing a life that matters. Imagine simple truths all reduced to key ideas you can act on in the moment to achieve a life of satisfaction, significance, and meaning. If you truly lived a life of meaning, wouldn't that make you and your extended family happy?
  5. How to eliminate, fear, doubt, indecision, preoccupation, distractions and big negatives from your personal and professional performance. Imagine 5,000 different 10 second training moments that keep you on track — all in the palm of your hands — coaxing, coaching and training you to take bold action to rise above the fray and WIN!

You would have to read 3-4 entire books each day to get a similar idea flow on personal and professional success... and it still wouldn't be condensed for instant use. You would have to wade through pages and pages of "stuff" to grab those few actionable gems of wisdom we all need in our life!

This is not yet another motivational quote app — it is real training within a 10-second construct focused on knowledge, repetition, and recall. You learn a new idea, apply it instantly and achieve greater results... now, not later.

  • You feel just a bit LUCKIER...
  • You feel more in CONTROL of your day...
  • You become more HOPEFUL...
  • You feel EMPOWERED...
  • You feel relaxed... more POSITIVE...
  • You feel a greater sense of CONTROL & wellbeing...
  • You feel like things are finally coming together... you're getting AHEAD...
  • You feel SMARTER and more capable of handling things as they come up.

Teach Them to Fish...

The World’s Excellence Project is exactly like the age old “teach them to fish” proverb — but using today’s amazing technology to instantaneously deliver a simple to use, high-tech, high-touch solution across the planet — elevating each person’s power to make this world a better place for all of us.

"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." ~ Old Chinese Proverb

Since we want to freely give The Time Prism App to every person with a Smart Phone, we must raise additional money to hire a team of experts to develop it. So, we need your help.

Help us provide real training at ZERO cost for a billion people.

The Promise of Transparent Learning™ Fulfilled!

Please Donate Now...

We do not want to monetize this App with advertising and desire to keep it a pure learning machine to encourage people to do good for the entire world. Your participation will affect every person in a positive, wonderful new way. Systematically imprint the world with success-critical ideas for higher achievement and we raise the world up to an entirely new future.

Mission...

To develop and deploy the Smartest App on Earth — The Time Prism®. The Time Prism is a PRAGMATIC — albeit a high-tech — way to change the world from the inside out, one person at a time, 10 seconds at a time.

Simply put, the Time Prism is a Transparent Learning™ Engine designed to make excellence the prevailing aspiration around the globe.

What is Transparent Learning™?

It is learning without even knowing you are learning — learning that penetrates both your conscious and subconscious mind… to SHAPE your thoughts… and prompt you to take smarter actions… in REAL TIME!

We expect to turn the world’s 2.5 Billion Smartphones, Pads, Watches, etc. into a human neural net that helps people realize their full potential with our Transparent Learning Engine.

Where others are investing Billions of dollars on artificial intelligence to get machines to think, The Time Prism is an Idea Machine designed to get people to THINK.

"Successfully executed, we will make personal development as entertaining, fun and prevalent as music streaming… and give it away FREE to anyone who wants to make a positive difference in the world." ~ E. R. Haas, CEO Think TQ, Inc.

Vision:

Our VISION is to heal this fractured world by releasing each person’s full potential… to transform the world by creating a network of people’s brains — not machines — working at maximum efficiency, effectiveness and producing exceptional results over time.

A billion more people working at their full POTENTIAL is what this broken world needs at this juncture. And we fully expect to help them turn their God-given gifts and talents into the essential skills necessary to become the difference in the world we all know is possible.

How?

By putting thousands upon thousands of our 10-second training sequences in the palm of your hand — in real time — making The Time Prism the fastest and easiest way to learn, remember and master timeless ideas for personal growth and success.

Imagine a cool new App that implants truly SMART ideas directly into your brain… all with one PURPOSE: To shape your thoughts, choices, and actions.

Simple... Automatic... Drop-dead Gorgeous...

Better, imagine that it is incredibly SIMPLE on the outside — works automatically and is drop-dead GORGEOUS — but is built on timeless training PRINCIPLES combined with true wisdom. Simplicity + the best ideas from the best brains = Transparent Learning™ that has the power to TRANSFORM the world.

We BELIEVE that only through a constant flow of new ideas will people achieve their goals, and solve this world’s very real problems… especially the 7 Mega Trends we list below.

“When a single person makes a smarter choice and takes a little smarter action, their life improves immediately. If only a fraction of the 2.5 billion users of smartphones improve their choices and takes more positive actions, the world will be transformed.” ~ Kent C. Madson, Vice Chairman

Being performance experts, our DUTY is to make it easy to learn, remember and master the success-critical skills for higher achievement… invisibly, transparently and effectively.

Our GOAL is to deploy an App so powerful that you learn without you even knowing you are learning. The Time Prism is designed to shape thoughts by putting positive new ideas in front of you all day long — ideas that will counteract the constant flood of negatives, and propel each user to higher achievement.

Our PASSION is to see every person on Earth — not just the fortunate few — use their God-given gifts, talents, and skills to the maximum extent possible.

Specifically…

This means helping the single mother of 3 find her path to financial stability and security… giving a mid-level manager the self-confidence to step-up in the next meeting, making himself heard against the background noise… providing hope to a man or woman facing a major career transition where the outcome is truly an “unknown”… imbuing the new college graduate with an illuminating path forward.

Our DESIRE is nothing short of helping ordinary people produce extraordinary results in every area of their lives: personal, relationships, professionally and in business.

WHY?

Because self-betterment is a universal human value.

Every person on this planet has a dream of some kind… a desire for self-growth… a yearning for self-improvement… a longing to make a positive difference in the world.  Deep down, we all want to learn and grow, take good care of our families, and improve the lives of all those around us.

Without question, everyone wants to live a life of joy and happiness… to feel secure and safe… to be free from want… and to pursue all their hopes and dreams.

This is not just the American way… it is the way of all the people of the world. It is our universal hope to see our families grow and prosper.

Sadly, that’s not the case today…

We know that you too have a feeling that there’s something’s very wrong, and want to help make it right. People around the globe are falling farther behind and labor to just make ends meet and feed their families.

We struggle with the toxic, hazardous, vitriolic world we live in… and grapple with hard environmental choices and relentless economic challenges.

When you don’t think it can get any worse, it does. Our world is at war… polarized by long-standing ideological divisions… a tremendous gap between the richest and poorest… where the fight to find water, shelter and peace is a life or death struggle for so many.

We have lost faith in our governments to provide a solution and can’t rely on our leaders to right this ship. Instead, it is up to each of us to become the change the world so desperately needs.

The Good News…

Change is possible. People of the world working smarter — more passionately, efficiently, and effectively — succeed in life, making the world a better place for all of us.

Creativity and innovation flourish, the human condition improves and we have more people in the world who are committed — with their hearts, heads, and hands — to the service of mankind. Helping people to have their best day ever, a great deal more frequently is the challenge, but the end result is a better world — plain and simple.

While intuitively obvious, until now there has been no measurable, sequential, systematic PROCESS for teaching the masses the skills needed for faster advancement and higher achievement. We will use the TQ Mass Customization Technology to help people identify, isolate and confront the issues holding them back from enduring success — and over time, eliminate those issues through the flow of POSITIVE NEW IDEAS that displace the NEGATIVITY BIAS written into our DNA. (This is a VERY BIG deal.)

The following summary from Dr. Rick Hanson, author of Hardwiring Happiness, provides a historical perspective on the importance of Negativity Bias to our survival over time…

“Our brain is not optimized for happiness or success. Instead, it is wired for SURVIVAL. To keep our ancestors alive, Mother Nature evolved a brain that routinely tricked them into making three mistakes:

Overestimating threats, underestimating opportunities, and underestimating resources (for dealing with threats and fulfilling opportunities).

This is a great way to pass on gene copies, but a lousy way to promote quality of life.” ~ Dr. Rick Hanson

So, in a very real sense, this initiative will do 3 important things:

Provide tens of thousands of cutting-edge ideas to give your brain key hooks to overcome the “Threat-Determination Deficit”… immediately giving you more and better ideas with which to assess risks.

By displacing negative thoughts with positive ideas, you will be better able to see the value hiding behind any “inherent” risks you face in day-to-day life. More and better ideas directly affect your self-efficacy, which ultimately causes you to take smarter actions when presented with opposing alternatives.

Better ideas drive better choices and motivate and inspire you to get the facts… the real numbers… the realistic estimate of what you will need to move forward — rather than perpetually remaining in a “getting ready to get ready” mindset.

According to Dr. Hanson’s research, Negativity Bias can be overcome by what he calls “simply taking in the good” — three to five POSITIVES for every NEGATIVE thought or impulse. Shape a person’s thinking toward a Positive Bias, and producing greater results take care of themselves.

The Time Prism App will do this simply, systematically and beautifully. Move a person towards more positive results and away from the heartbreak of failed expectations, hopes, and dreams… EVERYTHING changes for the better.

The Time Prism: 5,000 Years of Wisdom in the Palm of Your Hand…

The world’s libraries contain thousands of great ideas that can help you grow and prosper… to achieve more and get ahead faster. Unfortunately, these fabulous ideas are all locked away, up on the shelf, out of sight, out of mind. Until now.

Which is why we created the world’s first Time Prism… and why it’s critical for us to give it away to the world — to combine SMART technology with the SMARTEST APP in the world — delivered at ZERO cost for all.

The Time Prism takes these success-critical ideas off the shelf and infuses them directly into your brain.

RESULT: A smarter, more successful new you emerges every day. The exciting part — you learn without even knowing you are learning!

The Time Prism is a revolutionary new tool designed to take the BEST ideas —from the BEST minds on Earth — off the shelf and insert them directly into your brain. It represents the fastest and easiest way to learn, remember and master the success-critical skills for higher achievement.

Five thousand years of incredible ideas are locked inside billions
of books — out of sight, out of mind — until now. We put the best of the best
right in the palm of your hand—at the exact right time—so you not only make your day work a great deal better but you alter the fabric of your future… automatically.

Our team has extracted, condensed and activated the best ideas on exceptional personal performance  — and now we want to deliver them right into the palm of your hand… in a cool new way.

The Time Prism, living inside your SMART-PHONE, iPad, or Tablet computer not only makes you smarter, it ultimately makes the world a safer place.

About our Perks...

Because TQ is a highly successful operating company we are happy to give you our wonderful products in exchange for your generosity.  You will love them!

$20 Commitment: Learn and Burn Digital (SRP $50)...

$ 50 Commitment: Success On Purpose Digital (SRP $150)...

$99 Commitment: The Full TQ Gold System Digital ($600)...

About Team TQ…

This initiative has been driven by E. R. Haas, Chairman… Kent C. Madson, Vice Chairman… Tim Mackie, Director… and Jan Haas, Executive Vice President of ThinkTQ, Inc.

We all have the personal grit, resolve, and experience to actually deliver on the promise. If you would like to take a peek at my resume, you will find it here... and a short intro here...

ThinkTQ is the world’s leading publisher of virtual training products exclusively focused on personal and professional excellence. We have a hundred different products designed to measurably, systematically and sequentially train people to a higher level of achievement and success—personally and in business.

In the end, our gift to the world is 5,000 years of wisdom in the palm of your hand -—thousands of the best idea, from the best brains on Earth — condensed, distilled and activated for immediate use… each designed to shape thoughts and create more positive actions.

We have mastered the dispersion of great ideas, presented individually, building on the most fundamental truth that repetition is the mother of learning.

We, together with all our invaluable donors, believe the Excellence Project™ will cause an immediate improvement in millions of lives and a subsequent wave of positive results worldwide.

“I can do things you cannot, you can do things I cannot; together we can do great things.”  ~ Mother Teresa

Summary:

Teach the world to work smarter each day — to make excellence the prevailing aspiration — and we inspire the opportunity for personal growth in people the least capable of getting the training they need to succeed. The world becomes a better place for us all.

The Time Prism will power Transparent Learning™ — making the exchange of great ideas as prevalent as music streaming and more effective than expensive personal training. Entire populations will learn without even knowing they are learning.

When all the people in the world work just a bit smarter… with just a bit more heart… with just a little more passion… we all win.

We solve the serious problems facing this generation and prepare the next generation for a more prosperous future. With your help, we can make this happen now!
story_txt:
The Quick Big Picture..."A great accomplishment shouldn't be the end of the road, just the starting point for the next leap forward." ~ Harvey MackayYour Time Has Come... Final Day!This is your last day. I have even done the unthinkable — I have upgraded the $50 Perk to the Full TQ Gold System if you donate TODAY. All  $50+ donations today will be automatically upgraded to the $600 TQ System. See below for details.If you have always wanted to proclaim that you were behind something really big — at the very start of an Apple, eBay, Amazon, Twitter, Linked In and the like — this is your chance.In a couple of years, we will all look back on today and say that this was the start of something BIG... something important... something that quietly changed people from the inside out.We fully intend to build The World's Smartest App and want to do it with your help.The benefit to you?We will list you as a founding developer for all history!Kind of like when Steve J. and Steve W. signed the inside of the original Apple II computer I purchased in 1977! Yes, I was there at the very beginning of Apple and am proud of what my companies have contributed to their growth and development over the years.Now, I want you to be part of the INCEPTION of the REVOLUTION in Transparent Learning on a global scale.Remember, it's not bragging if you actually did it!Give just $20 bucks and you are on the list and even get a wonderful PERK. Forever and a day, you will be able to say, "I was in on it at the start!"Imagine had you been visionary enough to do it with Twitter, Facebook, Google, Snap, Amazon, eBay... Now for the big PERK! For just one day -- TODAY ONLY -- I will give anyone who donates just $50 the complete Power of TQ Gold System... the same $600, 18 CD, 14 Book collection of the most powerful personal development tools ever assembled. Give it to a friend, a grad, a dad, coworker... or enjoy Gold Membership for yourself. This will NEVER be offered to you again, so step up and proudly get in the game! Simply click the $50 Perk and we will AUTOMATICALLY include the full TQ Gold System shown below as our 1-day upgrade gift for your support.You get eternal BRAGGING RIGHTS to what will become the most powerful human neural net for higher achievement PLUS a 90% give away of TQ's most popular package.This crowd-funding site is over on February 18th, so donate now, and become part of history! Additional Background Information...One of the greatest fears we all have is that the world is crumbling around us and that our very survival is at stake.  This fear is deeply personal.What we need most now is HOPE and VISION.We know that unless things change for the better, life may well be worse for our next generation. Can you really afford to permit the status quo to rule?Not if you are concerned with your own family's well-being, let alone the children of the world.The consensus of world leaders is that a better educated, better trained and higher skilled population is both the short and long-term solution to the problems we see in our everyday lives. In a world of chaos and conflict, we all need to perform up to our full capabilities. When we do, we all WIN."Mediocrity is the root of the malaise we are in. Excellence is the antidote." ~ E. R. Haas, CEOPermit mediocrity to take root in your own life, you live a less fulfilling life. But when you reject mediocrity and make excellence your prevailing aspiration, you not only win personally — the world at large becomes a better, safer place.What CAN you do now?You can support The World Excellence Project™!  A contribution of $5-$20-$100 will help us do something incredibly powerful, new and different: Make EXCELLENCE the global aspiration thereby releasing the full potential of every person on the planet... starting first with YOU!"How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world." - Anne FrankIn today's world, we face a huge barrier: Access...In today’s world, only a tiny percent of the population have access to any real training or mentoring. Only a lucky few have the benefit of a coach to instruct them to reach higher and achieve more. This means people are going through life burned-out... stressed-out... and running on empty most of the time. They needlessly struggle financially and emotionally:
Single working moms — many holding down two jobs — have no money or time to be trained.
Employees with significant potential have no mentor to guide their climb up the ladder — especially if they hope to shatter the glass ceiling.
Hard working small businesses around the world have limited access to role models who would teach them how to be more productive and make better use of their time.
Until now. Let's take advantage of the billions of Smartphones people already carry in the palm of their hands —  install The Time Prism:® The Smartest App On Earth — and let's change this dysfunctional, broken, screwed up world we call home. Really break free of tired, status quo thinking and do something different: Teach the world to do GOOD by doing BETTER so we can all achieve MORE out of life.The Time Prism will snatch back time that is ordinarily wasted andturn it into a productive learning experience for billions of people who need it the most but can afford it the least.With your help, we will make personal success training — real life skill-building — as prevalent and fun as music streaming... and as freely available as Twitter, Snapchat, or Facebook.How Does It Work? 3 Simple Steps...1. SET it...2. FORGET it...3. CHECK in when it chimes!This is a Transparent Learning™ Engine that trains you in success-critical skills... making you incrementally smarter all day long. Better, you LEARN without even KNOWING you are learning!Because you receive a constant flow of positive new ideas — from the over 10,000 unique, 10-second training sequences — The Time Prism shapes your thoughts and influences your choices and actions in real time. You achieve more by doing better each day.
You get more DONE...
You produce better RESULTS...
You become more SUCCESSFUL.
What Will You Learn? In a Nutshell...

How to get far more done in far less time. Imagine the ideas from the major "get organized and get things done" style books all neatly condensed and distilled for immediate action — helping you make smarter decisions during your next phone call, meeting or sales presentation.

How to remain focused on the important and not get sucked into the urgent. Imagine the key ideas from 50 books on prioritized actions that are all values-based... ideas that will get you to stop and think before you blunder your way to confusion and conflict. Result: more of the RIGHT things done each day.

How to set achievable goals... make plans to support them... and develop powerful leadership teams to leverage your time and talents. Imagine the best ideas, from true leadership experts, on the power of delegation, synergy and effective team-building. You naturally become an Authentic Leader, not just someone who is faking it until they can make it.

How to live out of passion and purpose, optimistically pursuing a life that matters. Imagine simple truths all reduced to key ideas you can act on in the moment to achieve a life of satisfaction, significance, and meaning. If you truly lived a life of meaning, wouldn't that make you and your extended family happy?

How to eliminate, fear, doubt, indecision, preoccupation, distractions and big negatives from your personal and professional performance. Imagine 5,000 different 10 second training moments that keep you on track — all in the palm of your hands — coaxing, coaching and training you to take bold action to rise above the fray and WIN!
You would have to read 3-4 entire books each day to get a similar idea flow on personal and professional success... and it still wouldn't be condensed for instant use. You would have to wade through pages and pages of "stuff" to grab those few actionable gems of wisdom we all need in our life!This is not yet another motivational quote app — it is real training within a 10-second construct focused on knowledge, repetition, and recall. You learn a new idea, apply it instantly and achieve greater results... now, not later.
You feel just a bit LUCKIER...
You feel more in CONTROL of your day...
You become more HOPEFUL...
You feel EMPOWERED...
You feel relaxed... more POSITIVE...
You feel a greater sense of CONTROL & wellbeing...
You feel like things are finally coming together... you're getting AHEAD...
You feel SMARTER and more capable of handling things as they come up.
Teach Them to Fish...The World’s Excellence Project is exactly like the age old “teach them to fish” proverb — but using today’s amazing technology to instantaneously deliver a simple to use, high-tech, high-touch solution across the planet — elevating each person’s power to make this world a better place for all of us."Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." ~ Old Chinese ProverbSince we want to freely give The Time Prism App to every person with a Smart Phone, we must raise additional money to hire a team of experts to develop it. So, we need your help.Help us provide real training at ZERO cost for a billion people.The Promise of Transparent Learning™ Fulfilled!Please Donate Now...We do not want to monetize this App with advertising and desire to keep it a pure learning machine to encourage people to do good for the entire world. Your participation will affect every person in a positive, wonderful new way. Systematically imprint the world with success-critical ideas for higher achievement and we raise the world up to an entirely new future.Mission...To develop and deploy the Smartest App on Earth — The Time Prism®. The Time Prism is a PRAGMATIC — albeit a high-tech — way to change the world from the inside out, one person at a time, 10 seconds at a time.Simply put, the Time Prism is a Transparent Learning™ Engine designed to make excellence the prevailing aspiration around the globe.What is Transparent Learning™?It is learning without even knowing you are learning — learning that penetrates both your conscious and subconscious mind… to SHAPE your thoughts… and prompt you to take smarter actions… in REAL TIME!We expect to turn the world’s 2.5 Billion Smartphones, Pads, Watches, etc. into a human neural net that helps people realize their full potential with our Transparent Learning Engine.Where others are investing Billions of dollars on artificial intelligence to get machines to think, The Time Prism is an Idea Machine designed to get people to THINK."Successfully executed, we will make personal development as entertaining, fun and prevalent as music streaming… and give it away FREE to anyone who wants to make a positive difference in the world." ~ E. R. Haas, CEO Think TQ, Inc.Vision:Our VISION is to heal this fractured world by releasing each person’s full potential… to transform the world by creating a network of people’s brains — not machines — working at maximum efficiency, effectiveness and producing exceptional results over time.A billion more people working at their full POTENTIAL is what this broken world needs at this juncture. And we fully expect to help them turn their God-given gifts and talents into the essential skills necessary to become the difference in the world we all know is possible.How?By putting thousands upon thousands of our 10-second training sequences in the palm of your hand — in real time — making The Time Prism the fastest and easiest way to learn, remember and master timeless ideas for personal growth and success.Imagine a cool new App that implants truly SMART ideas directly into your brain… all with one PURPOSE: To shape your thoughts, choices, and actions.Simple... Automatic... Drop-dead Gorgeous...Better, imagine that it is incredibly SIMPLE on the outside — works automatically and is drop-dead GORGEOUS — but is built on timeless training PRINCIPLES combined with true wisdom. Simplicity + the best ideas from the best brains = Transparent Learning™ that has the power to TRANSFORM the world.We BELIEVE that only through a constant flow of new ideas will people achieve their goals, and solve this world’s very real problems… especially the 7 Mega Trends we list below.“When a single person makes a smarter choice and takes a little smarter action, their life improves immediately. If only a fraction of the 2.5 billion users of smartphones improve their choices and takes more positive actions, the world will be transformed.” ~ Kent C. Madson, Vice ChairmanBeing performance experts, our DUTY is to make it easy to learn, remember and master the success-critical skills for higher achievement… invisibly, transparently and effectively.Our GOAL is to deploy an App so powerful that you learn without you even knowing you are learning. The Time Prism is designed to shape thoughts by putting positive new ideas in front of you all day long — ideas that will counteract the constant flood of negatives, and propel each user to higher achievement.Our PASSION is to see every person on Earth — not just the fortunate few — use their God-given gifts, talents, and skills to the maximum extent possible.Specifically…This means helping the single mother of 3 find her path to financial stability and security… giving a mid-level manager the self-confidence to step-up in the next meeting, making himself heard against the background noise… providing hope to a man or woman facing a major career transition where the outcome is truly an “unknown”… imbuing the new college graduate with an illuminating path forward.Our DESIRE is nothing short of helping ordinary people produce extraordinary results in every area of their lives: personal, relationships, professionally and in business.WHY?Because self-betterment is a universal human value.Every person on this planet has a dream of some kind… a desire for self-growth… a yearning for self-improvement… a longing to make a positive difference in the world.  Deep down, we all want to learn and grow, take good care of our families, and improve the lives of all those around us.Without question, everyone wants to live a life of joy and happiness… to feel secure and safe… to be free from want… and to pursue all their hopes and dreams.This is not just the American way… it is the way of all the people of the world. It is our universal hope to see our families grow and prosper.Sadly, that’s not the case today…We know that you too have a feeling that there’s something’s very wrong, and want to help make it right. People around the globe are falling farther behind and labor to just make ends meet and feed their families.We struggle with the toxic, hazardous, vitriolic world we live in… and grapple with hard environmental choices and relentless economic challenges.When you don’t think it can get any worse, it does. Our world is at war… polarized by long-standing ideological divisions… a tremendous gap between the richest and poorest… where the fight to find water, shelter and peace is a life or death struggle for so many.We have lost faith in our governments to provide a solution and can’t rely on our leaders to right this ship. Instead, it is up to each of us to become the change the world so desperately needs.The Good News…Change is possible. People of the world working smarter — more passionately, efficiently, and effectively — succeed in life, making the world a better place for all of us.Creativity and innovation flourish, the human condition improves and we have more people in the world who are committed — with their hearts, heads, and hands — to the service of mankind. Helping people to have their best day ever, a great deal more frequently is the challenge, but the end result is a better world — plain and simple.While intuitively obvious, until now there has been no measurable, sequential, systematic PROCESS for teaching the masses the skills needed for faster advancement and higher achievement. We will use the TQ Mass Customization Technology to help people identify, isolate and confront the issues holding them back from enduring success — and over time, eliminate those issues through the flow of POSITIVE NEW IDEAS that displace the NEGATIVITY BIAS written into our DNA. (This is a VERY BIG deal.)The following summary from Dr. Rick Hanson, author of Hardwiring Happiness, provides a historical perspective on the importance of Negativity Bias to our survival over time…“Our brain is not optimized for happiness or success. Instead, it is wired for SURVIVAL. To keep our ancestors alive, Mother Nature evolved a brain that routinely tricked them into making three mistakes:Overestimating threats, underestimating opportunities, and underestimating resources (for dealing with threats and fulfilling opportunities).This is a great way to pass on gene copies, but a lousy way to promote quality of life.” ~ Dr. Rick HansonSo, in a very real sense, this initiative will do 3 important things:Provide tens of thousands of cutting-edge ideas to give your brain key hooks to overcome the “Threat-Determination Deficit”… immediately giving you more and better ideas with which to assess risks.By displacing negative thoughts with positive ideas, you will be better able to see the value hiding behind any “inherent” risks you face in day-to-day life. More and better ideas directly affect your self-efficacy, which ultimately causes you to take smarter actions when presented with opposing alternatives.Better ideas drive better choices and motivate and inspire you to get the facts… the real numbers… the realistic estimate of what you will need to move forward — rather than perpetually remaining in a “getting ready to get ready” mindset.According to Dr. Hanson’s research, Negativity Bias can be overcome by what he calls “simply taking in the good” — three to five POSITIVES for every NEGATIVE thought or impulse. Shape a person’s thinking toward a Positive Bias, and producing greater results take care of themselves.The Time Prism App will do this simply, systematically and beautifully. Move a person towards more positive results and away from the heartbreak of failed expectations, hopes, and dreams… EVERYTHING changes for the better.The Time Prism: 5,000 Years of Wisdom in the Palm of Your Hand…The world’s libraries contain thousands of great ideas that can help you grow and prosper… to achieve more and get ahead faster. Unfortunately, these fabulous ideas are all locked away, up on the shelf, out of sight, out of mind. Until now.Which is why we created the world’s first Time Prism… and why it’s critical for us to give it away to the world — to combine SMART technology with the SMARTEST APP in the world — delivered at ZERO cost for all.The Time Prism takes these success-critical ideas off the shelf and infuses them directly into your brain.RESULT: A smarter, more successful new you emerges every day. The exciting part — you learn without even knowing you are learning!The Time Prism is a revolutionary new tool designed to take the BEST ideas —from the BEST minds on Earth — off the shelf and insert them directly into your brain. It represents the fastest and easiest way to learn, remember and master the success-critical skills for higher achievement.Five thousand years of incredible ideas are locked inside billionsof books — out of sight, out of mind — until now. We put the best of the bestright in the palm of your hand—at the exact right time—so you not only make your day work a great deal better but you alter the fabric of your future… automatically.Our team has extracted, condensed and activated the best ideas on exceptional personal performance  — and now we want to deliver them right into the palm of your hand… in a cool new way.The Time Prism, living inside your SMART-PHONE, iPad, or Tablet computer not only makes you smarter, it ultimately makes the world a safer place.About our Perks...Because TQ is a highly successful operating company we are happy to give you our wonderful products in exchange for your generosity.  You will love them!$20 Commitment: Learn and Burn Digital (SRP $50)...$ 50 Commitment: Success On Purpose Digital (SRP $150)...$99 Commitment: The Full TQ Gold System Digital ($600)...About Team TQ…This initiative has been driven by E. R. Haas, Chairman… Kent C. Madson, Vice Chairman… Tim Mackie, Director… and Jan Haas, Executive Vice President of ThinkTQ, Inc.We all have the personal grit, resolve, and experience to actually deliver on the promise. If you would like to take a peek at my resume, you will find it here... and a short intro here...ThinkTQ is the world’s leading publisher of virtual training products exclusively focused on personal and professional excellence. We have a hundred different products designed to measurably, systematically and sequentially train people to a higher level of achievement and success—personally and in business.In the end, our gift to the world is 5,000 years of wisdom in the palm of your hand -—thousands of the best idea, from the best brains on Earth — condensed, distilled and activated for immediate use… each designed to shape thoughts and create more positive actions.We have mastered the dispersion of great ideas, presented individually, building on the most fundamental truth that repetition is the mother of learning.We, together with all our invaluable donors, believe the Excellence Project™ will cause an immediate improvement in millions of lives and a subsequent wave of positive results worldwide.“I can do things you cannot, you can do things I cannot; together we can do great things.”  ~ Mother TeresaSummary:Teach the world to work smarter each day — to make excellence the prevailing aspiration — and we inspire the opportunity for personal growth in people the least capable of getting the training they need to succeed. The world becomes a better place for us all.The Time Prism will power Transparent Learning™ — making the exchange of great ideas as prevalent as music streaming and more effective than expensive personal training. Entire populations will learn without even knowing they are learning.When all the people in the world work just a bit smarter… with just a bit more heart… with just a little more passion… we all win.We solve the serious problems facing this generation and prepare the next generation for a more prosperous future. With your help, we can make this happen now!

story:
Short Summary

  • Loukas and Eugene are two geeky entrepreneurs with Master's Degrees who have created a way to make passwords secure again over the internet. 
  • Making the internet secure again is a labor of love for us. With your support we will transform our work from a proven idea into a security solution that everyone can use.
  • We are building a cloud version for personal public use that you can access to secure what you do online.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $75,000 to transform our current version into a cloud version that everyone can access. 
  • We would like to provide the service to your small business or personal website.
  • If we do not reach the entire amount needed, we will continue working and eating macaroni and cheese until done and purchase as much cloud services as possible to bring our security solution to the public.

 

The Impact

  • The public's privacy is being violated nearly everyday. Passwords are routinely stolen and then account information sold to bad actors. We want to stop this!
  • We want people to be able to trust internet sites again.
  • No more hustle with all the passwords you need to remember. One will be more than enough to keep you safe.

 

Risks & Challenges

People are apprehensive about security systems. They feel like they ask too much. So, we have created a solution that does not require people to do anything or be anyone other than themselves while doing what they already do. To keep people safe, we do not transmit or store passwords or permanent characteristics. We use only transitory, partial, and  passphrase specific information that cannot be used in any other context keeping your privacy safe. 

 

FAQ

Q: How is this different from a keystroke logger?

A: We do not store any typed characters. We use a subset of your typing rhythm and style.

 

Q:  If someone types my password at the same speed as me, will they get in?

A: KeyDyn uses typing speed along with your rhythm and style. In a population of 10,000 people your personal combination of speed, rhythm and style is generally unique.

 

Q:  What happens as my typing changes?

A: KeyDyn expects your typing to evolve over time and accurately tracks and anticipates your changes. In rare cases when identification is problematic, we automatically identify the issue and provide seamless secondary email authentication.

 

Q: What happens if my hand is injured?

A: KeyDyn will adjust to dramatic changes in behavior, such as caused by injury, major illness, or innovative form factor changes. Radical changes may temporarily trigger self-managed secondary-authentication requests, which will stop once the new and dramatically different behavior is confirmed to be your behavior.

 

Q:  How quickly does KeyDyn learn my typing style?

A: Recently we advanced how quickly a user is recognized. Previously between 9 and 16 typing samples were required. Now, we start after 3 samples.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute and still want to help, you can like us on Facebook at Biometric Creations, share our website www.biometriccreations.com and video, and tell your friends and colleagues about us. You can use the Indiegogo share tools too!

story:
The OpenPlacer team members are mechanical and electronic engineers who focused on novel technologies and passionate about turning cutting edge ideas into real applications.

 

The Open Placer team completes its job with joy, because we enjoy getting involved in all kind of innovations.  In this manner we follow up and coming technologies and share our knowledge with young specialists.

Reaching appropriate equipment quickly for an affordable price became more and more important in today's world where knowledge about novel technologies are easily accessible. Most of the companies try to offer several functions in their products, however they miss the purchasing power of its target market. Herein, the Open Placer team, with the spirit of today's technology era, care about offering products that can be purchased by our audience with a modest budget in parallel with high service quality and novel technical perspectives.

 

 

The Open Placer has several properties that steps it forward against its alternatives, which are;

  • Runs with open sourced OpenPNP software
  • Modular design with ease of replacing electronic components and feeders
  • Robust design with high mechanical accuracy; 0.05 mm (2 mils)
  • High working area / footprint ratio
  • 800 chips per hour (Ideal for prototyping)
  • Integrated vacuum pump (No external pump need)
  • Bottom and top camera support
  • Automatic Nozzle Change
  • Nozzle Capacity: 4
  • Selectable Trash Area and Park Location
  • 100 -240 V AC operating voltage
  • 30 - 50 W power consumption

The Open Placer is available in two sizes. Mini and Standard

The Open Placer Mini will be sent as an assembled kit. You just need to plug the cables and push a tubing.

It contains,

The robust XY table with all required components to move smoothly
The pick and place head with the nozzle, Z and A axis motors, head cam and required sub components
The controller card
The vacuum pump
Switch Mode Power Supply (SMPS)
Power Cable
3 USBA - USBB cables
2 nozzles (1.0 mm inner diameter(ID) / 1.2 mm outer diameter(OD) and 1.0 mm ID / 2.8 mm OD)
1 Main Feeder (10 x 8 mm pitch)
Bottom Camera
Automatic Nozzle Change Apparatus

There is space for a second main feeder but it is not included in the kit. Optional feeders are also not included in the kit.

Technical Properties of Open Placer Mini:

  • Working Area: 295 mm x 195 mm
  • Footprint: 340 mm x 440 mm
  • Maximum Board Dimension: 100 mm x 150 mm
  • Maximum Component Height: 6 mm
  • 1 Main Feeder 1 Optional Feeder Capability
  • USB 2.0 Connection

The Open Placer Standard has larger size that enables more space to place components and assemble larger PCBs. It will also be sent as an assembled kit. You just need to plug the cables and push a tubing.

It contains,

The robust XY table with all required components to move smoothly.
The pick and place head with the nozzle, Z and A axis motors, head cam and required sub components
The controller card
The vacuum pump
Switch Mode Power Supply (SMPS)
Power Cable
3 USBA - USBB cables
2 nozzles (1.0 mm inner diameter(ID) / 1.2 mm outer diameter(OD) and 1.0 mm ID / 2.8 mm OD)
1 Main Feeder (10 x 8 mm pitch)
Bottom Camera
Automatic Nozzle Change Apparatus

There is space for a second main feeder but it is not included in the kit. Optional feeders are also not included in the kit.

    Technical Properties of Open Placer Standard:

    • Working Area: 400 mm x 250 mm
    • Footprint: 510 mm x 360 mm
    • Maximum Board Dimension: 100 mm x 200 mm
    • Maximum Component Height: 6 mm
    • 2 Main Feeder 1 Optional Feeder Capability
    • USB 2.0 Connection

    The replacement parts of the Open Placer are as follows;

    • Nozzle (4 different tip sizes)
      • 0.6 mm Inner Diameter / 0.8 mm Outer Diameter
      • 1.0 mm Inner Diameter / 1.2 mm Outer Diameter
      • 1.0 mm Inner Diameter / 2.8 mm Outer Diameter
      • 1.0 mm Inner Diameter / 5.2 mm Outer Diameter
    • Main Feeders
      • For Open Placer Mini
        • 10 x 8 mm
      • For Open Placer Standard
        • 10 x 8 mm
    • Optional Feeders
      • For Open Placer Mini
        • 2 x 12mm + 1 x 16mm + 4 x tray slot + 4 x loose part
        • 2 x 12mm + 1 x 16mm + 1 x 24mm
        • 7 x 8mm
        • 2 x 8mm + 2 x 12mm + 1 x 16mm
      • For Open Placer Standard
        • 2 x 12mm + 1 x 16mm + 5 x tray slot + 6 x loose part
        • 2 x 12mm + 1 x 16mm + 1 x 24mm
        • 7 x 8mm
        • 2 x 8mm + 2 x 12mm + 1 x 16mm
    • Automatic Nozzle Change Apparatus
    • Pick and Place (Complete Assembly)
    • Head Camera Including Led and Positioning
    • Bottom Camera Including Positioning
    • A Axis Motor
    • Main Controller

    Robustness of Open Placer

    Easy assembly of the nozzle, also automatic nozzle change apparatus comes with the Open Placer Mini and Open Placer Standard

     

    The products will be shipped from our warehouse/technical support location in Dallas,TX for US and Canada orders. Orders from Europe, Asia and other countries will be shipped from Istanbul, Turkey.

    The products are fully under support of Bilim ve Teknoloji Inc. The replacement parts will be available in Dallas, TX for support in US and Canada and in Turkey for support in European, Asian and other countries.

     

     

    Mechanical accuracy of the nozzle

     
     
    Open Placer 402 Test ;
     
     
     
    Open Placer 201 Test ;
     
     
     
    Test Results ;
     
     
     

    The Open Placer Team

    Dr. Furkan Dundar
    A 35 year old mechanical engineer, graduated from Istanbul Technical University in 2004.
    Masters and PhD degree in Material Science and Engineering from Gebze Institute of Technology.
    Principal partner in Bilim ve Teknoloji Inc. founded in 2012. "Bilvetek" is used as our brand and the website for this company is www.bilvetek.com.
    Bilvetek was founded to prepare fuel cell test stations but also manufactures other small equipment for various sectors.
    Studied in University of Connecticut and Virginia Commonwealth University as a visiting researcher about 2-2.5 years.
    Employed at European Commission Institute for Energy and Transport for a year in 2012.
    Has an academic background, published some journals mostly about fuel cell systems.
    Moderate record in Google Scholar.

    Kerim Kalelioglu

    A 36 year old electronic engineer
    Working on CNC and laser systems for about 20 years
    Built several CNC milling machines, lathes, laser cutting tables and laser sources
    Previous manufatured products and old customers are available at kalecnc.com

    Harun Gokberk Gonenc

    A 25 year old architect, graduated from Ecole National Superieur d'Architecture de Versailles
    Previously designed industrial products

    Nazim Gediz Aydindogmus
    A 23 year old control and automation technician,
    Works on embedded systems and programming

    Ali Toy
    Representive of Open Placer in US
    Located in Plano, TX.
    Currently runs mobile technical service provider.
    Replacement parts will be available for sale after the Indiegogo campaign in US.
story_txt:
The OpenPlacer team members are mechanical and electronic engineers who focused on novel technologies and passionate about turning cutting edge ideas into real applications.

 
The Open Placer team completes its job with joy, because we enjoy getting involved in all kind of innovations.  In this manner we follow up and coming technologies and share our knowledge with young specialists.
Reaching appropriate equipment quickly for an affordable price became more and more important in today's world where knowledge about novel technologies are easily accessible. Most of the companies try to offer several functions in their products, however they miss the purchasing power of its target market. Herein, the Open Placer team, with the spirit of today's technology era, care about offering products that can be purchased by our audience with a modest budget in parallel with high service quality and novel technical perspectives.
 

 
The Open Placer has several properties that steps it forward against its alternatives, which are;

Runs with open sourced OpenPNP software
Modular design with ease of replacing electronic components and feeders
Robust design with high mechanical accuracy; 0.05 mm (2 mils)
High working area / footprint ratio
800 chips per hour (Ideal for prototyping)
Integrated vacuum pump (No external pump need)
Bottom and top camera support
Automatic Nozzle Change
Nozzle Capacity: 4
Selectable Trash Area and Park Location
100 -240 V AC operating voltage
30 - 50 W power consumption

The Open Placer is available in two sizes. Mini and Standard
The Open Placer Mini will be sent as an assembled kit. You just need to plug the cables and push a tubing.
It contains,
The robust XY table with all required components to move smoothlyThe pick and place head with the nozzle, Z and A axis motors, head cam and required sub componentsThe controller cardThe vacuum pumpSwitch Mode Power Supply (SMPS)Power Cable3 USBA - USBB cables2 nozzles (1.0 mm inner diameter(ID) / 1.2 mm outer diameter(OD) and 1.0 mm ID / 2.8 mm OD)1 Main Feeder (10 x 8 mm pitch)Bottom CameraAutomatic Nozzle Change Apparatus
There is space for a second main feeder but it is not included in the kit. Optional feeders are also not included in the kit.
Technical Properties of Open Placer Mini:

Working Area: 295 mm x 195 mm
Footprint: 340 mm x 440 mm
Maximum Board Dimension: 100 mm x 150 mm
Maximum Component Height: 6 mm
1 Main Feeder 1 Optional Feeder Capability
USB 2.0 Connection

The Open Placer Standard has larger size that enables more space to place components and assemble larger PCBs. It will also be sent as an assembled kit. You just need to plug the cables and push a tubing.
It contains,
The robust XY table with all required components to move smoothly.The pick and place head with the nozzle, Z and A axis motors, head cam and required sub componentsThe controller cardThe vacuum pumpSwitch Mode Power Supply (SMPS)Power Cable3 USBA - USBB cables2 nozzles (1.0 mm inner diameter(ID) / 1.2 mm outer diameter(OD) and 1.0 mm ID / 2.8 mm OD)1 Main Feeder (10 x 8 mm pitch)Bottom CameraAutomatic Nozzle Change Apparatus
There is space for a second main feeder but it is not included in the kit. Optional feeders are also not included in the kit.

Technical Properties of Open Placer Standard:

Working Area: 400 mm x 250 mm
Footprint: 510 mm x 360 mm
Maximum Board Dimension: 100 mm x 200 mm
Maximum Component Height: 6 mm
2 Main Feeder 1 Optional Feeder Capability
USB 2.0 Connection

The replacement parts of the Open Placer are as follows;

Nozzle (4 different tip sizes)
0.6 mm Inner Diameter / 0.8 mm Outer Diameter
1.0 mm Inner Diameter / 1.2 mm Outer Diameter
1.0 mm Inner Diameter / 2.8 mm Outer Diameter
1.0 mm Inner Diameter / 5.2 mm Outer Diameter

story:
Bullet Planner is a personal organization method and scaffold for your optimized life. You'll keep track of your priorities and tasks and build in ways to stay motivated.

"My Bullet Planners are really some of my most valuable possessions. The BP is amazing to rewind time and capture your life, and make the most of living in the present” 

I'm Lili, the creator of Bullet Planner. I am have spent years studying productivity methods and  perfecting the ideal organization method— this hybrid planner supports you being your best organized, self-motivated, in tune self. How? 

 

What BP isn’t:

This book doesn’t tell you what to do or restrict you. Layouts can be interpreted and used differently year-to-year and person-to-person. Each week has flex page space, making the Bullet Planner one of the most flexible planners around. 

 

What BP is:

The Bullet Planner is a minimalist system to manage your tasks and time, follow through on your goals, and track personalized data points. By doing so, you will experience the ability to hack your habits and find persevering clarity. 

 

1] The minimalist layouts support you, you make the BP your own. The minimalist layouts look great as is— and provides the ideal space for art-overflow. (The time saved from drawing out grids can be applied to making the most of your energy.)

2] Habit tracking allows you to understand which of your life areas are flourishing and which need more work. I've found a lot of benefit to looking at visual representations of all areas of your life at once. (blog post: How to track meaningful habits) 

Generally, the reason why we fail to grow in particular areas of our lives is due to subconscious limiting beliefs and a fixed mindset. Logging key points of interest over time is a great self transparency method and can expose interesting insights about yourself. 

3] There is considerable power in commiting things to ink and paper. The best way to promote the things we value most is to remove everything that distracts us from it. The planner medium is analog and simply a scaffold. If you struggle to get done what you intend to, or loose track of tasks or long term goals, try the BP method. 

2021 is going to be your year. Choose to write it in ink, fill a volume with your life, and feel the satisfaction of crossing lists out, as you take on all your life's opportunities and challenges.

A Look Inside

  • 150-page A5 book (generously sized yet unsurprisingly portable)
  • 8 linen hardcover colors (I kept the cover blank so BP effortlessly blends into your life)
  • Collection list layouts for activities, prompts, recommendations of your year
  • Task and habit tracking layouts keep you fresh month-to-month
  • Vertical weekly grids are perfect for listing daily details and pasting overhead items.
  • Insightful quotes and mantras based on ancient wisdom
  • Blank Flex pages-- for when you need your day in detail, to web-flow or mind-map, document a road-trip, or whatever else you want to do!
  • Ribbon page marker and elastic closure

 

The BP Community online:

You have automatically unlocked the community curated Pinterest page — 
The Bullet Planner Community — join in for free templates, to share, and be inspired by each other!

 

Pre Order Now

New Years are glorified for beginnings, but in the sense of your Bullet Planner at least, you will literally be starting the new year on a blank page. In 2020 we learned to abridge a great many of plans and adapt to the ride. As we've gotten better a hang for the chaos, now is the perfect time for a fresh start and be your best organized, self-motivated, in tune self.

Pre-orders will be taken for the duration of this campaign and delivered in time for the holiday season. Give your family and friends the gift of effortless organization, goal ideation, and reflection!

I hope Bullet Planner becomes the best assistant to your ideas. As a thank you to yourself for taking the step and starting BP, I am offering $3 off your first purchase. Get one to give and one to keep with a two journal companion special for $55! 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! I really appreciate the love and intention :)

  • Pass me along to help! Bullet Planner is especially awesome as a school-planner, for managing work and life, and to just tidy up your ideas.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools! It means a lot thank you so much for your support!
  • Check out the community Pinterest board "Bullet Planner Community"

story:
Short Summary

 

CGScan is a software for procedurally generated 3D assets that are based on scanned data and architectural research. We are a small self funded team that is passionate about games, cinema and architecture. Our goal is to help creators and studios build faster and cheaper full 3D Environments for their projects.

 

 
  • Since January 2020 our team started collecting scanned and architectural data and think how we can combine those two and learn computers to procecurally generate assets that people build. We are now to a point where we need your help to build our software and tools and start teaching our AI how to create your assets.
  • By backing up CGScan you become part of our community and help us create the tools that will bring your projects to the next level. To help all creators and artists we've made a YouTube channel with educational content where you will be able to find all the latest news about CGScan: https://www.youtube.com/c/UpsideDownTutorials

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • We need 150 000 euro to help us grow our team and develop the CGScan software.
  • While we are developing the tools, we want to give you something in return. This is why once you've backed us, you will receive our assets packs as soon as they are ready. The assets packs will contain 3D Models, Textures and Materials and can be used in Blender, 3Ds Max, Maya, Cinema 4D, Unreal Engine, Unity or other 3D applications that use FBX or OBJ format.
  • If we don't reach our target we still are going to invest the collected money to bring you more scanned assets and packs, but our software development will be delayed.

 

The Impact

 

  • CGScan Software is an easy to use 3D Software that is backed by powerful algorither to generate fully custom 3D Assets. Creating procedurally generated assets is very time consuming and also requires a lot of knowledge in different areas. Our tools are simplifying the process by removing the coding and data collection so that you can focus on creating art.
  • We had a presentation last year on Autodesk Univerity about scanned data and how it can help studios create content. This year we are also invited to present our tools and progress on procedural assets.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

  • We are a small and very experienced team in game development, cinema and architecture. All of our team members have 6+ years in their industry and bring valuable knowledge to make sure that our products are up to the highest standards.
  • Development Stages:
    • Research and Development - DONE
    • Creating first modular elements and prove of concept - DONE
    • Building our scanned data library - In Progress
    • Base of CGScan software - In Progress
    • CGScan Software Alpha - Not Started (target date 09.11.2022)
    • CGScan Software Beta - Not Started (target date 03.02.2023)
    • CGScan Software Release - Not Started (target date 06.06.2023)

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Help us by sharing our campaign with your friends on social media.
  • Use Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for supporting us and welcome to the CGScan family!
