story:
What’s unique about goLibero? There is no marketplace quite like it!

Why is that you ask? goLibero is the only marketplace in the world where you can BOOK, BUY, SELL & TRADE almost any product or service on one platform.

Unlike other mainstream marketplaces, goLlibero provides NOT just simple listing space, but also cutting edge technology for almost every business need.

Imagine if you could list goods and services for sale, and manage bookings and invoicing, all in one application.

Consider how popular the goLibero platform will be when entrepreneurs, service providers, retailers, and most importantly CONSUMERS realise its potential.

We personally want you to do more than just get by so here are a few... 

FEATURES & TOOLS WE'VE BUILT FOR YOU ;)

goLibero is liberty

When we say liberty, we mean freedom from traditional e-commerce platforms, that limit you in your growth and expertise.

It means that our marketplace includes everything necessary for almost any type of business or consumer to connect, interact and trade. Our intention is to reach as many different types of consumers, entrepreneurs and businesses who would benefit from goLibero and its freedom as possible.


Aspiring entrepreneurs, small businesses, and even enterprises will find the essential tools on our platform needed for growth. Whether you are big or small, young or old, a self-starter, an entrepreneur, any kind of trader or service provider EVERYONE has a place on the goLibero marketplace.

We offer BUY NOW and BOOK NOW options for buyers and do not restrict our users to only classified ads

Seller profiles are straightforward and self-explanatory.  Customers can view your product or service and book or buy right away. 

You can start listing and advertising your goods and services as easy as 1-2-3

 

WHAT YOU CAN DO ON goLibero & WHY YOU SHOULD INVEST AND SUPPORT US.

You are a;

Regular user (Individual) who wants to advertise activities or services or display products. You prefer to deal directly with customers, no problem, for you goLibero is FREE and always will be!

Seller with physical products to list. You will always be able to take advantage of lower selling fees than other platforms or ZERO SELLING FEES if  you choose the right membership. Our membership prices start from £1 (or $1), cool right?. It's not all  about fees, you will benefit from goLibero’s essential tools for seller growth and business success.

Service provider, you will get our innovative reservation system where you can easily manage your bookings online as well as take payments in advance. You can use the booking system for both online and offline bookings allowing you to manage your entire schedule easily in one place. 
The system works perfectly for any type of business, whether that’s a building service, beauty salon or wellness clinic or an online business selling mentoring, teaching or coaching sessions. You can offer car rental, restaurant reservations,tables or holiday cottage bookings, literally any service, hire or rental you can think of!

Property owner or estate agent? If you are looking for new tenants for a rental property or selling a home, you can list a property just like using a classified advert. user.

Selling a car, a boat or any big household products? No problem. goLibero gives you the opportunity to advertise your goods and list them as pick up items only.

Last but not least, if you are a BUYER

SHOP with goLibero if you like to have all your sellers and service providers in one single marketplace.You will no longer need multiple accounts and applications. With goLibero you can have best shopping experience and find the best deals. 
Effortlessly book and buy goods and services in one trusted platform, and all this for a lower price than anywhere else. 

So if you are fed up with using multiple traditional marketplaces or are a seller or service provider looking for lower fees, better features and more customers where you just can’t find one niche skill or business,PLEDGE TODAY. Help us to launch our unique marketplace that really cares about every user.

PERKS

If you can't help us out financially thank you for reading and we hope you will be shopping at goLibero soon. Please support us by spreading the word! Use Indiegogo's share button to share our crowdfunding campaign with your followers, friends & family!

WHAT WE NEED

We’re not approaching you asking for you to back an idea or prototype. We’ve already built and brought to you the most advanced marketplace in the world. goLibero is fully functional and ready for launch. The money we raise in this campaign  is to further boost this startup and allow us to bring more new technologies to you. 

Our goal is to reach £120,000 in funding from our backers, but realistically a project on such a large scale requires an investment of between £500,000 and £1,000,000. So any help is appreciated!.

If we achieve or exceed our goal of £120,000, we will be able to deliver a complete ERP system for YOUR business and implement more new features that are currently in development, sooner than planned.

Backing goLibero is investing in technology that will give your business a competitive edge!
 

THE TIMELINE

WHO WE ARE

Anthony is our CEO and founder. His expertise lies in business development, operations, manufacturing, and the e-commerce industry. He has dealt with many different types of customers, fellow entrepreneurs, and businesses, and he soon realised that small businesses were usually not taken seriously or were being treated unfairly online. So Anthony decided to invent something new to make running a business online easier than ever before. goLibero, an alternative and better platform to mainstream online marketplaces.

With the help of his team Anthony has spent the last five years developing goLibero to help regular users, and large AND small businesses reach their customers and their goals.

Our team's common goal is  to build more than another marketplace. We are building technologies for businesses and a community where everyone is of equal importance.

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

What can I list or sell on goLibero?

As a seller or service provider on goLibero you can list pretty much anything under our four main categories: goods, services, vehicles or properties! Here are a few examples. GOODS: (new and used), clothes, furniture, books, toys, car parts, gym equipment…SERVICES: home maintenance, fitness classes, language tutoring, babysitting, cleaning services, cooking classes...VEHICLES: cars, vans, motorbikes, scooters, boats, lorries... PROPERTIES: apartments, houses, parking spaces, spare rooms..

How can I use goLibero's booking system?

With our innovative reservation system it's simple and stress-free to manage your online or offline bookings, in one place. Simply list the service(s) you want to provide to customers by giving a title, description and pictures using goLibero. Then, set the dates and times you will be available for this service and that's it DONE, you are ready to take bookings and payments online instantly.

How is goLibero different to other marketplaces?

Unlike other mainstream marketplaces, goLlibero provides not just simple listing space, but also cutting edge technology for almost every business need. IMAGINE if you could list goods and services for sale, and manage bookings and invoicing and so much more, all in one application. This is now a reality with goLibero!

How does the single checkout work?

The single checkout allows you to buy physical products and services from multiple sellers at the same time. eg. you could buy a washing machine from one seller and arrange an installation with a different service provider, schedule your appointment, and pay for both in one transaction. How AMAZING is that? goLibero will revolutionise online shopping and service booking. You no longer need to jump from one shopping site to another making multiple payments and entering your details over and over!

What happens when goLibero raises £120k?

goLibero is ready to launch, and will go live soon no matter how much is raised in this Indiegogo campaign. We’re raising funds for further development and new features and we’d love your help! We have many goals we would like to achieve, once we hit this £120k milestone we will be able to create updates on our website, hire more people to help us on this amazing journey, and finish the beta version of our Android and iOS app.

What if you exceed £120k, what will happen?

If we achieve or exceed our goal of £120,000, we will be able to deliver a complete ERP system for YOUR business. And we will implement, sooner than planned, even more exciting features that are currently in development.

When will the goLibero website & app launch?

We will launch in April 2020 in the UK, then roll out goLibero to Europe and the USA few months later.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept PayPal and all major credit and debit cards. But soon we will accept Apple Pay & Android Pay

How much do goLibero memberships cost RRP?

Aside from our FREE membership, which is lifetime free for all users, we have many different memberships costs from ($)£1 to ($)£500 per month. There’s a plan to suit every type of seller or service provider.

Why can't I access goLibero online?

Technically the goLibero website is fully functional and ready for launch, but at the moment we are working on web content and bringing new merchants on board. By supporting us you will be able to have early access and become a merchant, taking advantage of having your products or services listed and ready when we go live to reach the masses in April 2020. At the moment you can see just our under-construction and launch announcement page.

story:
The traditional scanner can be bulky, expensive, and only have a few functions. The scanning program can be hard to navigate and make it difficult to utilize in other ways.

Introducing RiviCamer - A smart portable scanner that provides a fast and crystal clear scanning experience. Perfect for telecommuting, remote education, or work from home.

RiviCamer allows you to scan a book while flipping through it, and can scan up to three pages in just one second! 

This means you can easily scan a 180-page book in one minute, and a 900-page book in five!

Equips a 1/2.3 inch CMOS sensor, and a 32-bit MIPS processor which ensures you a perfect scan quality while keeping the information legible. The high-performance components would help meet all of your scanning needs. 

The foldable camera lets you adjust the camera 150° vertically to find the perfect angle to scan your book/files flawlessly or have a video call at home.

Scanning closer

RiviCamer is a powerful scanner, and can also be used for business meetings as your perfect assistant. It has 4 built-in microphones, supports up to 16MP filming, and can provide 1080P high-resolution video calls.

Business meetings & Video calls

 

The four built-in microphones also called microphone array, which is one of the HD Audio standards and one of the advanced tools in improving speech quality.

 

The microphone array can reduce noise and reverberation. It is valuable for noisy and long-distance equipment, which makes Rivicamer work better than the other scanner in business meetings, teaching, training, etc.

One RiviCamer is 320mm tall and weighs only 1.2kg. And the USB-C eliminated the need for a special scanner charger or transformer. You can easily put it in your bag and take it anywhere with ease.

RiviCamer can not only scan regular paper documents, but can also scan items such as passports, ID cards, receipts, toys, stamps, and more!

You can even scan the jewelry through RiviCamer to share and preserve its original look or doing a jewelry auction display.

RiviCamer’s smart scanning mode can automatically separate and merge your scanned files. The smart features include:

  • Automatic Cropping
  • Offset Correction
  • AutomaticPaging
  • Fingerprint Removal
  • Simultaneous Scanning of Multiple Targets
  • Automatic Edge Filling

Make scanning better and more efficient than ever!

With OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology, RiviCamer can analyze, recognize and obtain text and layout information from a scanned image, then convert the captured JPG files into Word, Excel, or PDF formats for easy editing. 


English, Chinese, French, German, Japanese, Danish, Spanish, Korean, Greek, Irish, Italian, Albanian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Finnish, Dutch, Hungarian, Latvian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovenian, and Turkish, etc.

Supporting 90% of international common languages, this powerful digital language library allows you to keep any text in almost any language.

Through the RiviCamer app, you can automatically optimize the color of the scanned document image, adjust the hue and contrast, combine multiple images into a PDF, run smart denoising, and other professional image editing functions. Optimize your scanned images to the highest quality.


*The RiviCamer can support Windows 7 and Windows 10 now and the app is under development and is expected to be released in August.

 

The set of LED lights in RiviCamer can provide light when scanning a document and act as a desk lamp as well. These lights have four different lighting modes, which includes:

  • Front light mode
  • Bright light mode
  • Soft light mode
  • Reading mode

You can choose the light mode you need when you need it.

智The intelligent high-shot instrument supports real-time live video and video recording functions and can output MJPG format and YUV format, which are suitable for teaching, remote training, or live-stream.

Connectable to the electron microscope and present for teaching

Teaching

Remote training

Live-stream

Connect to app

Larger scanning area

OCR function

Foldable camera arm

Wireless display (Upgrade version)

Replaceable battery (Upgrade version)

 

 

 Our team is committed to researching portable and high-definition scanners, hoping to provide an efficient and convenient product. In the past few years, we constantly improved the product design and performance. After three product iterations and feedback collection, we finally able to present the third generation of RiviCamer to you!

story:
Consider this.

Organizations are successful when they offer what their users want.

So in a world that is as connected as ours, why are there still so many guesses at what their customers want?  If we've learned anything in recent years, it's that users want to be involved and that they want a say.

We're in the business of ideas, and nextcept offers the first ever perspective marketing platform.  The concept for perspective marketing comes from the idea that for any given situation their is an absolute best decision or best route forward.  Knowing this option will undoubtedly lead to success.  So our perspective marketing software offers a method for organizations to work with their audiences for one time decisions or ongoing discussion.

Here's an example

We believe local organizations will benefit greatly from nextcept, and our example focuses on a school teacher trying to plan a field trip.  How will the teacher decide where to go?  They probably have a few ideas, but questions come up such costs, locations, goals, and timing.

Nextcept allows this teacher to ask all that are involved.  First they will add a list of options(ideas) into a campaign.  A campaign is just a group of ideas that someone is trying to decide between.  Consider that you might run several campaigns on several different aspects of the same decision.  The example below is a more all encompassing campaign that allows the teacher to get a feel for location, costs, length, distance, etc.  



The teacher will then invite whomever they'd like to this field trip campaign (parents, guardians, other teachers and even the children themselves-if they have permission and are over 13).    The invite process is straight forward and we offer several invitation methods.



One interesting aspect of the invitation process is that we allow the campaign creator(the teacher) to apply a weight to the invites.  So for the situation above, the teacher could choose to apply a higher weight to parents, and a slightly lower one to the children  The difference in their weights will come into play during the calculation of each idea's rating.  

Our main focus is in finding the best decisions, and this includes being realistic and understanding that the parents opinions should probably carry a little more heft.

The invited users will be able to view the campaign, read through the ideas and begin rating each idea.  Rating an idea is straight forward and on a sliding scale of 1 - 10.  The invited users can also offer thoughts on each idea and those thoughts can be rated as well.  


As the invited users are rating these ideas, the teacher can monitor the campaign and see which idea is most supported.  Nextcept applies an idea rating based on several criteria such as the chosen rating of each invited user, their weights, etc.  Campaigns are also dynamic and allow the teacher to add new ideas as public opinions are formed and/or changed.

Other Beneficial Areas

Nextcept offers both sides of the decision making process.


And, anyone who joins nextcept can ask anyone else about their own ideas.  You'll also be able to see a complete list of all campaigns that you are invited to, so that you'll be able to stay involved with all your favorite organizations. 


Nextcept is also completely dynamic and will work on any device.

Why are we crowd funding?

We've spent the better part of a year developing nextcept as it exists today, but we've done so with very limited funding and in our spare time.  Our crowdfunding campaign will give us the funds to get that extra boost we need and get out the door.

Nextcept launched as a public beta about two weeks ago and is already providing benefits, but we recognize the need for even more.  The funds from our campaign will go towards development such as these:

  • List functionality(creating dynamic lists to quickly invite the same group of people to multiple campaigns.
  • Improved thoughts user-interface(we want to improve the fluidity of discussion between company and invited user).
  • Public vs private campaigns with public campaigns being free for additional users.
  • Search - search for campaigns and/or your favorite organizations.

Our list above is only the start.  We want nextcept to become the go-to platform for communication between user and organization.  Your contribution will come with access to nextcept and a discounted invite rate.  You'll also be invited to our own internal campaign and join us on our future development.

Stop for a moment and look around at the products you use.  Don't you have some ideas on what would make them better or how they could be developed more efficiently?

Thank you for your time, and feel free to reach out to us for more details, questions, issues, etc.

info@nextcept.com

twitter:@nextcept

facebook: www.facebook.com/nextceptllc

www.nextcept.com

story:
Anyone wanting to contribute using bitcoin can do so through SidekikApp.com at the contribute page. Since bitcoin eliminates much of the cost of sending funds, we are offering 10% off the contribution levels listed here as perks on Indiegogo.

           

What is Sidekik?

Sidekik is a mobile application under development which will perform two key actions simultaneously. One, Sidekik will activate your smartphone's audio and video recording devices and begin streaming the data to a secure facility. Two, Sidekik will initiate a video call and connect you with an attorney who will represent you in whatever situation you find yourself.

Why is Sidekik Important?

When you are in a critical situation, such as being pulled over by law enforcement, the balance of power is often against you. The fact is that most people don't know their rights or how to enforce them. In addition, without a record of your encounter with law enforcement, the question of what happened during the encounter devolves into your word against that of the officer, which normally results with courts and public opinion in favor of the officer, regardless of what actually occurred. Though many people have begun recording their interactions with law enforcement, the recording is stored on the recording device, which is sometimes confiscated.

Sidekik will solve both of these problems. With the activation of the Sidekik app, your smartphone's audio and video recorders will begin streaming to a secure server. If the officer has behaved outside of their bounds and doesn't want evidence of that misconduct available to you, there is simply nothing the officer can do. The audio and video has been stored and timestamped securely, and can be retrieved by you at your convenience.

Within seconds of activating the Sidekik app, you will be connected through a video call to an attorney licensed to practice law in your jurisdiction. Every attorney on the Sidekik network will be well versed regarding your rights during a police encounter and do everything in their power to defend your rights as they interact with the officer on your behalf.

Sidekik is important because it restores balance to a previously unequal interaction. Your rights are worth preserving; all it takes is the tap of a screen.

What we need and what you get

Our crowdfunding campaign has a goal of $130,000. Almost all of this funding will go toward the creation of the Sidekik app, attorney software, and website, which will communicate with each other to provide a seamless Sidekik product for you. There are already apps for streaming video and even apps for notifying your attorney that you need assistance. However, nothing has come close to combining audio/video streaming with video call technology as well as high-end security measures to keep your data protected. This combination of features is complex. We have partnered with one of the top software design firms in the United States, Zco Corporation, to create this leap forward in app sophistication. The first phase of app development has already been completed using the capital raised in SIdekik's previous Indiegogo campaign. The first phase included technical feasibility studies, technical planning, wireframing, graphics, and initial coding, among many other necessities before full-time coding (second phase) can begin.

The remainder of the funds will be used to set up an office with our own computer server, pay for essential legal services, and cover expenses while we work with Zco during Sidekik development.

With your help we will make Sidekik a reality and provide a powerful tool for people to protect their rights.

Perks

You will receive a number of uses of Sidekik for your contribution, with the number of uses varying depending on the size of the contribution. The months included in each perk will match the number of Sidekik uses. For example, if you contribute $10 you will receive a three month subscription with three uses of Sidekik, while a $100 contribution is good for a three year subscription with thirty-six uses of Sidekik. The subscription times can be split among different people. For example, The Judge is $100 and gets you a three year subscription to Sidekik, which you can separate into multiple subscriptions, such as three one year subscriptions. 

The Sidekik Team

Orion Martin, Founder

Orion spent three years in the U.S. Army. After his military involvement, Orion obtained his real estate license and worked as a loan officer in Silicon Valley. Research and personal experience prompted Orion to find a remedy to the burgeoning police state, which led to the formation of Sidekik.


Jesse Wallace, Chief Technology Officer



Jesse has worked several years in the field of IT, specializing in Video Conferencing support and engineering. Most recently, he’s been consulting for a private hospital chain in the Los Angeles area, but has also been employed as a contractor by both Facebook and Google. A strong belief that our public servants should be held accountable for their actions and a desire to build something that will revolutionize the way we interact with law enforcement has led Jesse to join Sidekik.

FAQ

Is it legal to film police?

Yes. There are slight differences from State to State, yet the fundamental right to film police in the public performance of their duties remains the same. This issue has been settled by numerous court rulings over the years, such as Glik v. Cunniffe, Smith v. Cummings, ACLU v. Alvarez, Carla Gericke v. Gregory C. Begin et al. and several others. Additionally the U.S. Department of Justice has issued strongly worded opinions in support of the right to record police officers while they are in the public performance of their duties.

As long as the police are in public and you are not interfering with their activities, you can record them. If the police in question are interacting with you, then you can also record them. Just as the police have the right to record their interactions with the public using dashcams and lapel cams, you have the right to record them.

Since we're not attorneys, here's the required disclaimer: The information on this profile page is for informational purposes only and not for the purpose of providing legal advice.

Can I use Sidekik for something other than a traffic stop?

Absolutely. Sidekik can be used for situations ranging from encounters with law enforcement to Child Protective Services, regardless of whether you're in your vehicle, your house, or standing on a sidewalk.

Can I use Sidekik anywhere in the United States?

Yes. The attorney network will be composed of licensed attorneys in every state, with enough attorneys that every use of the video call feature in every state will be answered promptly.

What if my smartphone's connection drops while I'm using Sidekik?

If your carrier, for example Verizon, has an interruption of service, then Sidekik will automatically connect with any other available carrier such as Sprint or AT&T. In the extremely rare instance in which there is no available service with any carrier, then the attorney video call will be unavailable. However, Sidekik will still activate your smartphone's audio/video recording and store to your smartphone's onboard memory, unless you have a bluetooth-enabled storage device in your vehicle or on your person, in which case the data will be stored on said device. The chances of there being no coverage from any mobile service provider is extremely low.

Does my subscription fee cover the cost of attorney representation through Sidekik?

Yes. There is no additional cost to you for receiving representation through the Sidekik attorney network. When you have need of legal representation, just activate Sidekik and let your attorney do the talking. There is no charge aside from your subscription fee.

Why would an attorney take my call without being paid?

Attorneys pay anywhere from $50 - $200 for a single client lead. A client lead is someone who has entered some basic information on a legal lead generation website and asked to be contacted. The quality of the leads varies greatly but is still an effective means by which an attorney can increase their client base. When viewed from this perspective, Sidekik is a lead generation goldmine for attorneys. The vast majority of calls an attorney takes through Sidekik will be people who actively need legal representation at the time of the call, making each call a lead of the highest quality for an attorney. When Sidekik is released, it will be one of the best means by which an attorney can build their client base and construct lawsuits. Charging for taking calls would alienate potential clients and be prohibitive, effectively negating the lead generation business model, which is why attorneys do not charge for the initial video call and representation.

Will the attorneys work for Sidekik? Is Sidekik a law firm?

The attorneys will not be employed by Sidekik and Sidekik is not a law firm, just as AAA is not a tow truck company. Sidekik will serve as the means by which individuals needing legal representation and attorneys needing clients can be connected, in real-time. 

Will Sidekik be able to help stop the encroaching police state?

Sidekik deals with the issue of the police state on two levels: individually and communally. Individually, using Sidekik can help prevent you from having your rights violated during encounters with agents of the State by providing the means by which an attorney can represent you and defend your rights during the encounter, while at the same time acting as a de-escalating force in the situation.

On a communal level, the combined use of Sidekik by the public will bring to bear the only tool which has proven to alter the behavior of the police; money. A good example is that of Maywood, California. In early June of 2010 the City of Maywood was informed by their insurance carrier that their coverage was being canceled. The cancellation notice cited several reasons, but primarily it was due to the high number of claims filed against the police department. From the insurer's point of view, continuing to cover the city and pay claims settlements was too risky. The city tried finding another insurer but due to the high number of claims, no insurance company would provide coverage. As Councilman Felipe Aguirre said, "Nobody will insure us, not as long as we have the police department." Since cities require insurance to legally operate, and no one would provide coverage given the number claims against the police, the entire 60 member department was disbanded on June 30th, 2010.

Sidekik will streamline the formation of lawsuits against police departments by ensuring that evidence of rights violations is preserved and by providing a steady flow of attorneys willing to file lawsuits based on that evidence. In short, when the use of Sidekik becomes widespread, police departments will have two choices: change the way they do business or go out of business.

How will you ensure that my activation of the Sidekik app results in an attorney answering every time?

Upon activation and request for legal representation, the Sidekik system will call a number of attorneys on the Sidekik network who are nearest to you in the legal jurisdiction from which you activate the app. Whichever attorney answers first will represent you. If no attorneys take the call within a couple seconds then the system will contact the next group of attorneys by distance within your State and so on. Somewhere in the State where you are located an attorney will take your video call in a matter of seconds.

What if I already have an attorney and want him/her to represent me when using Sidekik?

Each subscriber will have the option of listing as many particular attorneys as they want and in whichever order they want them to be contacted when the subscriber uses Sidekik.

How much will you charge for a subscription to Sidekik?

The cost is not set yet, however, based on our projections to date we predict a yearly subscription fee of $60, or $5/month.

How many uses of Sidekik will I get for my subscription?

A yearly subscription allows for 12 uses of Sidekik in that time period. Additional uses can be added with a slight increase in the subscription fee.

What if I just want to use the audio/video streaming aspect of Sidekik without attorney representation?

When you first tap the Sidekik icon on your smartphone you will be presented with two options: audio/video streaming only or audio/video streaming with legal representation. If you choose data streaming only and decide later that you want legal representation as well, there will be an icon on your screen you can tap which will initiate a video call to an attorney. If you are being legally represented and decide you only want data streaming, you can drop the video call and keep the audio/video stream uninterrupted.

               

What if I'm being represented by an attorney while using Sidekik but I think the attorney is doing an insufficient job?

If at any point during your legal representation you feel a different attorney is needed, you can tap an icon which will initiate another call that will connect you with a separate attorney. Your audio/video stream will be uninterrupted.

Will the Sidekik app be free to download?

Yes, the app will be free to download for both iPhone and Android.

Can I still use Sidekik if I download the app but don't pay for a subscription?

The free version of Sidekik will allow for streaming and secure storage of audio/video data. The subscription allows for connection with an attorney. We want people to be able to have access to an attorney whether they have a subscription or not, which will be accomplished by offering a pay-as-you-go option. The cost will be a higher than getting a subscription, but the app user will still have access to legal representation if they need it.

Where will Sidekik have it's office?

Sidekik is registered to do business in Nevada and has a business license in that State which is in good standing. The members of the Sidekik team are currently living in California while building the Indiegogo campaign. Once sufficient funds have been raised through Indiegogo the team will move to Reno, Nevada and establish an office and residency there.

Future Products and Services

Window clip/smartphone docking port

Once Sidekik has launched and gained enough traction, we will develop and release a particularly useful accessory for Sidekik; a docking port for your smartphone. The docking port will be attachable to a window or console of your vehicle and will both power your smartphone and allow you to be free from holding your smartphone throughout the use of Sidekik. Additionally the docking port will come with bluetooth-enabled cameras which can be placed throughout your vehicle which will automatically begin recording and streaming through the Sidekik app.

To get in contact with Sidekik, use either the Indiegogo or SidekikApp.com contact form and you will receive a response as soon as possible.

story:
BE - The Food Empowerment App

Formerly called Farm and Garden, the name BE was taken from Gandhi's "Be the change you wish to see in the world," and is about putting crucial information into the world's hands… for free.

What BE is:

Part 1: A free database of plants native to the temperate United States, along with herbs, medicinal plants, wild edibles, vegetables, and fruits

  • Explanation of best planting practices to allow each plant to flourish:
  • Moisture, sun, and climate requirements
  • Polyculture (pest reduction)
  • Companion planting
  •  Soil amending tips
  • Medicinal and edible benefits of each plant
  • Benefits to wildlife, including Butterfly Host Statistics

Part 2: A photo-based landscape design tool that, together with the database, will make it easy and inexpensive even a novice gardener to create beautiful, functional, and sustainable landscapes that are good for the planet, for wildlife, and for people. 

  • Just take a photo of your site and overlay the images of plants and other features from    our image database to quickly and easily envision how you can turn your yard from this:


Into this, in just minutes: 

**We’re thrilled to be partnering with Slow Food USA! We will be donating both the plant database and the design tool to the nearly 600 locations of their School Garden Program, assisting their efforts to bring food knowledge to the next generation.**

We also have exciting stretch goals (which you can check out below!), including the creation of a green jobs sharing network and the translation of the database so it can be used internationally.


Why BE matters:

The BE app is about empowerment.

It’s about finding solutions to some of today’s major, interconnected problems: the existence of food deserts, where nutritious food is either unavailable or unaffordable; a lack of resilience in the food system as a whole; a lack of knowledge about sustainable gardening and native plants; the high expense of traditional permaculture classes; and disappearing habitat, food sources, and larval hosts for bees, butterflies, and other wildlife.

More to the point - it’s about giving people the tools they need to create those solutions in their own homes and neighborhoods. It’s about empowering people to BE the change.

Permaculture (permanent agriculture) is a form of sustainable agriculture that is good for the planet (helps with rainwater retention, works within existing ecosystems), good for wildlife (provides sources of shelter, food, nesting, and larval hosting), and good for people (creates something beautiful that is also useful and, if done right, requires significantly less maintenance than traditional landscaping). However, learning about it can involve expensive certifications or books not found in all libraries, and as a result, there’s a sort of exclusivity to the movement.

By taking the best information available about permaculture and sustainable gardening and condensing it into a free database, and by offering a tool that makes visualizing landscape designs so easy and affordable, the app breaks down the barriers of both cost and information. This means ANYONE with a mobile device can become a permaculture expert and create their own resilient yard, school or community garden, or green space with confidence.


What We Need & What You Get

The app is being built as you read this. But we need help to make this FREE as a database, affordable as design, and to donate to Slow Food USA to help grow and sustain local, healthy food.

Funding Needs And Extension Goal Tiers:

  • $25,000 - To finish and make free the plant catalog for iOS/Android
  • $70,000 - To finish and be able to donate to Slow Food USA the complete design tool for temperate climate zones, including the subscription feature

**50 cents of every $1 above $70,000 raised goes to Slow Food USA's school gardens

  • $90,000 - 15 LANGUAGE TRANSLATION AND MARKETING: We can convert the free catalog into: French, Spanish, German, Italian, Russian, Hindi, Mandarin, Cantonese, Arabic, Japanese, Portuguese, Korean, Norwegian, Swedish, and Dutch
  • $165,000 - Separate JOBS feature
  • Super Extension:
  • $195,000 to expand the HOME EXTERIOR/INTERIOR features catalog to include interior design and other home design services
  • Infinity and Beyond: Phase 1 Liability Insurance To Protect Clients And Contractors; Further Assistance With Slow Food USA's School Gardens Program, and Expanding Jobs Feature Into Other US Cities And Abroad



App features:

Plant Catalog - FREE to all (Slow Food USA/International and YOU!)

Design feature - $10 (FREE to Slow Food school program + our donors $10+)

Subscription - $5/mo. Includes the following:

  • New Intentional Minimalist recipes using heirloom veggies and even wild edibles!
  • Herbal recipes and remedies
  • Videos and Instructionals, In-depth How-Tos like How To Build An Herb Spiral
  • MORE plants/images like Wild Leeks and "new" superfruit Buffaloberry
  • And more!

The BE app IS a permaculture/native plant/sustainable gardening book, but condensed. No theory, just facts. Want theory? We also have a store with books from none other than Chelsea Green Publishing. And with the simple photo design tool, contractors and homeowners alike can now put together beautiful designs without spending $2,000 on software.





    Jobs Feature (extension goal):

    Search, request and order green-industry jobs through verified contractors in your area OR become verified and GET jobs! Phase 1 will connect existing contractors. Phase 2 will enable anyone to enroll, get listed, and use our tools to BE a different in his or her community. 

    • Uniting information and design for the modern client

    • Listing of local contractors who specialize in green practices like: Permaculture, Sustainable Gardening, Green Roofs, Solar Panels, and Rain Barrels
    • Transparent service rates
    • Easy
    • Affordable
    • Cities Planned For Phase 1: New York, NY; Traverse City, MI; Baltimore, MD

    Who's Talking About This? 

    • Doug Tallamy - Professor/Researcher, Author, Speaker

    "We will not save what we do not know or recognize. A mobile app that facilitates recognition of native plants will be an important tool for both preserving and restoring the natural world."

    • Chelsea Bay Dennis - The Conscious Entrepreneur, Founder

    "I am a lover and supporter of local food and native plants, but certainly not very knowledgeable about making my own backyard a success. I'm so excited to check out this app to simplify the idea of gardening, make it accessible in my busy schedule and to feel empowered to create an abundant yard. Perennial Harvest is such a great pioneer for creating opportunities for growing food and getting your hands in the dirt."

    • Laura Bowne - GIS Developer, Maryland Dept. of Natural Resources

    "I think it would be a fantastic resource for the average homeowner, professional landscapers, and master gardeners.  Folks need this kind of catalog in the palm of their hand."

    • Brad Kik - Institute For Sustainable Living, Art, + Natural Design - Co-Founder

    "One of the stickiest sticking points in implementing permaculture is that too many of us never took a field botany course. There are tens of thousands of amazing plants out there but the knowledge of how to use them well just isn’t in our brains. A mobile design tool with a database of essential plants helps ease the transition from untutored enthusiast to serious practitioner."

    • Nicki Sandberg - Peace Corps 2009-2011, Honduras; GIS Professional

    "Permaculture is a rapidly growing trend being embraced in all types of communities as a way to improve food security and build sustainable local food systems. Finding the right location, plants, and plan for getting a project started can take significant resources and is often a barrier to success. In low resource areas, there is a special need for tools that are easy to understand and use. As a practitioner in planning and food systems, and a Returned Peace Corps Volunteer, I see many applications for this tool to enable community groups, nonprofits, and schools locally and abroad to jumpstart their permaculture projects. Using mobile technology, which is now widespread even in rural international locations, groups can quickly and easily plan projects and get stakeholder buy-in. Ultimately, projects that are more sustainable and better implemented will provide more lasting and meaningful improvements to food systems."



    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please Share! We have to leap these hurdles to get the app out there, to get it into the hands of the people on the ground, and to make it affordable. Email, post on Facebook, share on Twitter/Instagram with #PerennialHarvest. Anything helps!


    Thank Yous

    Aaron Pierson - Production/Video/Consult aaronpierson.com

    Jacob Carter - App design, IEK Solutions

    Christopher Green - Imaging, Calloway/Green

    Aiden Fishbein - Video graphics, Braeid.com

    Meghan McDermott - @epicuriousity on Instagram

    Tricia Phelps - @tastethelocaldifference on Instagram

    Mike Goulas - Co-founder, Mango Languages

    Matthew Welch - Co-author, Hybrid Organizations

    Jeff Barrett - Co-founder, Status Creative
story_txt:
BE - The Food Empowerment App
Formerly called Farm and Garden, the name BE was taken from Gandhi's "Be the change you wish to see in the world," and is about putting crucial information into the world's hands… for free. 

What BE is: 

Part 1: A free database of plants native to the temperate United States, along with herbs, medicinal plants, wild edibles, vegetables, and fruits
Explanation of best planting practices to allow each plant to flourish:
Moisture, sun, and climate requirements
Polyculture (pest reduction)
Companion planting
 Soil amending tips 
Medicinal and edible benefits of each plant
Benefits to wildlife, including Butterfly Host Statistics
Part 2: A photo-based landscape design tool that, together with the database, will make it easy and inexpensive even a novice gardener to create beautiful, functional, and sustainable landscapes that are good for the planet, for wildlife, and for people.  
Just take a photo of your site and overlay the images of plants and other features from    our image database to quickly and easily envision how you can turn your yard from this: 



Into this, in just minutes: 

**We’re thrilled to be partnering with Slow Food USA! We will be donating both the plant database and the design tool to the nearly 600 locations of their School Garden Program, assisting their efforts to bring food knowledge to the next generation.**We also have exciting stretch goals (which you can check out below!), including the creation of a green jobs sharing network and the translation of the database so it can be used internationally. 

Why BE matters: 

The BE app is about empowerment. 
It’s about finding solutions to some of today’s major, interconnected problems: the existence of food deserts, where nutritious food is either unavailable or unaffordable; a lack of resilience in the food system as a whole; a lack of knowledge about sustainable gardening and native plants; the high expense of traditional permaculture classes; and disappearing habitat, food sources, and larval hosts for bees, butterflies, and other wildlife. 
More to the point - it’s about giving people the tools they need to create those solutions in their own homes and neighborhoods. It’s about empowering people to BE the change.

Permaculture (permanent agriculture) is a form of sustainable agriculture that is good for the planet (helps with rainwater retention, works within existing ecosystems), good for wildlife (provides sources of shelter, food, nesting, and larval hosting), and good for people (creates something beautiful that is also useful and, if done right, requires significantly less maintenance than traditional landscaping). However, learning about it can involve expensive certifications or books not found in all libraries, and as a result, there’s a sort of exclusivity to the movement. By taking the best information available about permaculture and sustainable gardening and condensing it into a free database, and by offering a tool that makes visualizing landscape designs so easy and affordable, the app breaks down the barriers of both cost and information. This means ANYONE with a mobile device can become a permaculture expert and create their own resilient yard, school or community garden, or green space with confidence. 



What We Need & What You Get

The app is being built as you read this. But we need help to make this FREE as a database, affordable as design, and to donate to Slow Food USA to help grow and sustain local, healthy food.

Funding
Needs And Extension Goal Tiers:

$25,000 - To
     finish and make free the plant catalog for iOS/Android 
$70,000
     - To finish and be able to donate to Slow Food USA the complete design
     tool for temperate climate zones, including the subscription feature 

**50 cents of every $1 above $70,000 raised goes to Slow Food USA's school gardens


$90,000 -
     15 LANGUAGE TRANSLATION AND MARKETING: We can convert the free catalog
     into: French, Spanish, German, Italian, Russian, Hindi, Mandarin,
     Cantonese, Arabic, Japanese, Portuguese, Korean, Norwegian, Swedish, and
     Dutch
$165,000 - Separate JOBS feature
Super Extension:
$195,000
     to expand the HOME EXTERIOR/INTERIOR features catalog to include interior
     design and other home design services
Infinity and Beyond: Phase
     1 Liability Insurance To Protect Clients And Contractors; Further
     Assistance With Slow Food USA's School Gardens Program, and Expanding Jobs
     Feature Into Other US Cities And Abroad



App features: 
Plant Catalog - FREE to all (Slow Food USA/International and YOU!)
Design feature - $10 (FREE to Slow Food school program + our donors $10+)
Subscription - $5/mo. Includes the following: 

New Intentional Minimalist recipes using heirloom veggies and even wild edibles!
Herbal recipes and remedies

Videos and Instructionals, In-depth How-Tos like How To Build An Herb Spiral

MORE plants/images like Wild Leeks and "new" superfruit Buffaloberry

And more!


The BE app IS a permaculture/native plant/sustainable gardening book,
 but condensed. No theory, just facts. Want theory? We also have a store
 with books from none other than Chelsea Green Publishing.
 And with the simple photo design tool, contractors and homeowners alike can now put together
 beautiful designs without spending $2,000 on software. 





Jobs Feature (extension goal):
Search, request and order green-industry jobs through verified contractors in your area OR become verified and GET jobs! Phase 1 will connect existing contractors. Phase 2 will enable anyone to enroll, get listed, and use our tools to BE a different in his or her community. 
Uniting information and design for the modern client



Listing of local contractors who specialize in green practices like:
 Permaculture, Sustainable Gardening, Green Roofs, Solar Panels, and 
Rain Barrels
Transparent service rates
Easy
Affordable
Cities Planned For Phase 1: New York, NY; Traverse City, MI; Baltimore, MD


Who's Talking About This? 


Doug Tallamy - Professor/Researcher, Author, Speaker

"We will not save what we do not know or recognize. A mobile app that 
facilitates recognition of native plants will be an important tool for 
both preserving and restoring the natural world."
Chelsea Bay Dennis - The Conscious Entrepreneur, Founder
"I am a lover and supporter of local food and native plants, but 
certainly not very knowledgeable about making my own backyard a success. 
I'm so excited to check out this app to simplify the idea of gardening, 
make it accessible in my busy schedule and to feel empowered to create 
an abundant yard. Perennial Harvest is such a great pioneer for creating
 opportunities for growing food and getting your hands in the dirt."
Laura Bowne - GIS Developer, Maryland Dept. of Natural Resources

"I think it would 
be a fantastic resource for the average homeowner, professional 
landscapers, and master gardeners.  Folks need this kind of catalog in 
the palm of their hand."
Brad Kik - Institute For Sustainable Living, Art, + Natural Design - Co-Founder

them well just isn’t in our brains. A mobile design tool with a database

Using mobile technology, which is now widespread even in rural

 get stakeholder buy-in. Ultimately, projects that are more sustainable

story:
What is it?

Project Shard is a transparent display designed to be outfitted for your computer case side panel. This project allows you to view your beautiful computer and internals whilst allowing you to customize what you display on your side panel, may it be your favorite anime, artistic designs, Discord chat status or even live results such as computer temps or twitch notifications. 

Project Shard aims to hit the mass majority of today's cases outfitting them with customized displays to fit seamlessly with every side panel that works easily with your computer. Project Shard will run on SATA power and an HDMI input (included with product). Therefore, all internals such as power for the display and built in LEDs are all controlled via a simple box that fits easily inside a hard drive bay, hence the convenience of SATA power. Simply slide on your new panel display, connect it to the Shard power supply located and mounted in your hard drive bay, connect in two cables and you're up and running!

The display runs full RGB allowing you to display a wide range of colors throughout your screen despite what you have inside. High contrast built in LEDs allow your internals to be any color, but allowing deep and rich colors all throughout the display, even pitch black colors, block out light, or choose to see all the glory inside your  computer with many more colors. 

What does it work with?

Physically, the Project Shard side panel aims to work on only a SATA power connector and an HDMI cable which can easily pass through to your graphics card. 

Project Shard will also be taking a survey for the top 5 computer cases out there that desire such a bespoke product outfitted perfectly for their current computer case, eliminating the need to buy an entire case and change out computer parts.  

On the software side, Project Shard works simply like many displays, thus allowing you to easily add widgets and full videos, or animations and free adjustments such as putting laying kittens sitting on top of your graphics card or make it look like your computer is filling up with water! 

Short Story Summary

Probably unlike most campaigns this one started with nothing! No funding and no team to help bring this idea to light. Sure, the idea can be seen in fancy companies today that can easily do what I’ve done such as LG. But as a PC gamer myself I felt the need to strive into even more ways to customize what a computer is today. Why focus on just a few LEDs to make a computer case look fancy when I could focus on an image of many pixels displayed on my computer but still let me enjoy the internals of my beloved computer? 

While saving up and working alone to figure out how I can make this product come to life I have developed my first prototype, which still amazes me every time I look at it, see how elegant it is, and how it has come to be just what I imagined!

But, I didn’t want to stop there with my personal experience. I knew that this idea was important to me, and that my family and friends were amazed to see a floating image and what is behind it!  I wanted to give this opportunity to everyone. I wanted to be able to allow people to customize their computers to the max level possible with ease, simplicity, and way more affordability. Some companies out there have similar projects, but like all major companies they come with a hefty, unnecessary price tags that no gamer would pay for. Did I mention they don’t sell these separately, that they only have one case and that it all costs over $4,000? I thought it was about time i reached out to as many people as possible, their case and their budget. 

Overall, I’m just one person with a dream, and it’s a struggle.  I am determined to push this idea forward and work with others who see its potential for innovation as much as I do.   What I need is a lot – funding, inspiration, and help to keep working on making Project Shard a full product.

What We Need & What You Get

The price tag to start it off is a big one even for a product that I aim to be as affordable as possible. I want everyone to enjoy the creativity this product has to offer.

At the moment I’m still in the prototyping phase and can’t make any promises about what you might get in return. But what I can promise is my hard work and commitment to carry out this project with whatever funding I can get, and  my determination that it will fly! Then I can offer free side panels to my top/first supporters! Later on I will aim for pre-order discounts as well as early bird deals.

The Impact

One of the biggest things I want to fight is the price tag. Cutting out an un-necessary corporate price tag for something so small but so big. I want to give everyone the chance to experience the excitement I have and open this new window into your computer. It’s time to take a stand against high prices for such a simple thing and offer it to more than one group. 

Risks & Challenges

At the moment my prototype has taken a dip. If you take a look at the images in my campaign you may notice the top right has a crack. Rest assured, this was a simple malfunction to the important layer which allows color to pass through as it should. The issue is fixable and i hope to post an update on it soon!

Other Ways You Can Help

Being without money but a big heart and an need to wanna help I can understand that some of you are like that as well, especially being on this website and reading this long thing for some reason instead of having a nice burger or movie. I’d love it if you would help me get the word out, repost this on Facebook, share it with any tech geeks out there, and chat with any PC gaming enthusiasts about whether and how it can work!

story:
GeekPet

--

English:

Learn, share and get the best for your pet.


We want to help people that own a pet and don’t have the knowledge needed for the right care they need.


GeekPet will be a virtual platform that connects people who love their pets, for this to happen we will use a Q&A (questions and answers) platform so people can share their knowledge.

A web portal, developed by geeks for geeks that love animals, where we will provide all the necessary knowledge and products for you to take care and spoil your pet.


The idea was born from the experience of each member of the team, both Katia and Mauricio had problems that were complicated by the lack of knowledge and delay in finding the solution.


While Katia was trying to find information to take care of Odin (her paralyzed dog).


Mauricio needed a gift for a pet and he didn’t know where or what to buy.


We realized that there was lack of knowledge from people about taking good care of their pets and pet specialized sites.


To solve this problem:

We will create specialized content about pets, such as courses or virtual workshops and also we will create a community to share knowledge by solving doubts about their pets, we will provide information about discounts on products and services for the benefit of our community and we will offer innovative and original products for pets.


How we are gonna do this?

Creating a virtual platform that:

  • Helps to answer questions about your pet in collaboration with the community.
  • Offers courses and/or virtual workshops about taking care of your pet dictated by professionals.
  • Helps to find useful and original accessories for your pet.
  • In association with the best brands in the industry, offers discounts on products and services for the care of your pet.


Help us take forward this project.

Many pets are abandoned and/or abused by lack of knowledge of their owners, a project like GeekPet helps people to learn what they need to provide a better quality of life for their spoiled ones.


With your help we will achieve our dream and the dream of many people, that is to have their pets healthy and happy.

How can you help?

  • Through a donation though this platform (Indiegogo). All donors will be mentioned in our Social Networks.
  • Sharing this campaign on social networks.
  • If you're a vet and you want to collaborate with some of the courses to dictate, contact us.
  • If you are interested in knowing more about this project please contact us.

Join our community :)

Find this campaign on:
Our web site, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Instagram y SlideSahre.

--

Español:

Aprende, comparte y consigue lo major para tu mascota.


Queremos ayudar a las personas que tienen mascotas y que no poseen el conocimiento necesario para el cuidado de estas.



GeekPet será una plataforma virtual que conecte a las personas que quieren a sus mascotas mediante el intercambio de preguntas y respuestas utilizando esta plataforma para el intercambio de este conocimiento.

Un portal web hecho por geeks para geeks amantes de los animales donde brindaremos todo el conocimiento necesario y productos para que cuides y engrías a tu mascota.


La idea nace por la experiencia vivida de cada integrante del equipo, tanto Katia como Mauricio tuvieron problemas que se complicaron por falta de conocimiento y demora en encontrar la solución.


Mientras Katia trataba de buscar información para el cuidado de Odín (su perro paralítico).


Mauricio necesitaba el regalo para una mascota y no sabía dónde ni qué comprar.


Dándonos cuenta que existía una falta de conocimiento de las personas sobre el cuidado de sus mascotas y de sitios especializados para mascotas.


Para solucionar este problema:

Crearemos contenido especializado en mascotas como cursos o talleres virtuales y a la vez formaremos una comunidad que compartirá sus conocimiento resolviendo dudas con respecto a sus mascotas, brindaremos información de descuentos de productos y servicios para el beneficio de nuestra comunidad y ofreceremos productos innovadores y originales para mascotas.


Cómo haríamos esto?

Creando una plataforma virtual que:

  • Ayude a resolver dudas sobre tu mascota en colaboración de la comunidad.
  • Ofrezca cursos y/o talleres virtuales sobre el cuidado de tu mascota dictados por profesionales del área.
  • Ayude a encontrar accesorios útiles y originales para tu mascota.
  • En asociación de las mejores marcas del rubro, ofrezca descuentos en productos y servicios para el cuidado de tu mascota.


Ayúdanos a sacar adelante este proyecto.

Muchas mascotas son abandonadas y/o maltratadas por falta de conocimiento de sus dueños, un proyecto como GeekPet ayudará a las personas a informarse de lo que necesiten para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus engreídos del hogar.


Con tu ayuda lograremos nuestro sueño y el sueño de muchas personas que es tener a sus mascotas sanas y felices.

Cómo puedes ayudar?

  • Mediante una donación por esta plataforma (Indigogo). Todos los donantes serán mencionados en nuestras Redes Sociales.
  • Difundiendo esta campaña por Redes Sociales.
  • Si eres veterinario y quieres colaborar con alguno de los cursos a dictar, contáctanos.
  • Si te interesa saber más sobre este proyecto contáctanos.

Súmate a nuestra comunidad :)

Encuentra esta campaña en:
Nuestro sitio web, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Instagram y SlideSahre.

Queremos ayudar a las personas que tienen mascotas y que no poseen el conocimiento necesario para el cuidado de estas.
GeekPet será una plataforma virtual que conecte a las personas que quieren a sus mascotas mediante el intercambio de preguntas y respuestas utilizando esta plataforma para el intercambio de este conocimiento. 
Un portal web hecho por geeks para geeks amantes de los animales donde brindaremos todo el conocimiento necesario y productos para que cuides y engrías a tu mascota.
La idea nace por la experiencia vivida de cada integrante del equipo, tanto Katia como Mauricio tuvieron problemas que se complicaron por falta de conocimiento y demora en encontrar la solución. 
Mientras Katia trataba de buscar información para el cuidado de Odín  (su perro paralítico).
Mauricio necesitaba el regalo para una mascota y no sabía dónde ni qué comprar.
Dándonos cuenta que existía una falta de conocimiento de las personas sobre el cuidado de sus mascotas y de sitios especializados para mascotas.Para solucionar este problema:

Crearemos contenido especializado en mascotas como cursos o talleres virtuales y a la vez formaremos una comunidad que compartirá sus conocimiento resolviendo dudas con respecto a sus mascotas, brindaremos información de descuentos de productos y servicios para el beneficio de nuestra comunidad y ofreceremos productos innovadores y originales para mascotas.
Cómo haríamos esto?

Creando una plataforma virtual que:
Ayude a resolver dudas sobre tu mascota en colaboración de la comunidad.
Ofrezca cursos y/o talleres virtuales sobre el cuidado de tu mascota dictados por profesionales del área.
Ayude a encontrar accesorios útiles y originales para tu mascota.
En asociación de las mejores marcas del rubro, ofrezca descuentos en productos y servicios para el cuidado de tu mascota.

Ayúdanos a sacar adelante este proyecto.

Muchas mascotas son abandonadas y/o maltratadas por falta de conocimiento de sus dueños, un proyecto como GeekPet ayudará a las personas a informarse de lo que necesiten para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus engreídos del hogar. 
Con tu ayuda lograremos nuestro sueño y el sueño de muchas personas que es tener a sus mascotas sanas y felices.
Cómo puedes ayudar?

Mediante una donación por esta plataforma (Indigogo). Todos los donantes serán mencionados en nuestras Redes Sociales.
Difundiendo esta campaña por Redes Sociales.
Si eres veterinario y quieres colaborar con alguno de los cursos a dictar, contáctanos.
Si te interesa saber más sobre este proyecto contáctanos.

Súmate a nuestra comunidad :)
Encuentra esta campaña en:
Nuestro sitio web, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Instagram y SlideSahre.

story:
Write your melodies

in the simplest way

 

 

   The classical staff notation is not easy to learn for beginners.

   It’s not intuitive to write, so you should sing the melody over and over to notate, and sometimes you forget the idea while dictating.

   You can record your melodies, however, when you write down your music, it's easier to see and organize the whole structure of the piece.

   There are so many people, even musicians saying they don’t know how to notate their own music.

   Since I majored in music composition, I’ve always been thinking about this problem.

   If there were more people who could write down their music, we could listen to more creative works, therefore, the music industry, and the arts could be improved more.

   Then I realized that I had been writing my melodies with my own method when I was young and didn't know how to notate.

   Like this!

   These are 1. Beat, 2. Pitch name, 3. High and low

   With this method, I designed the new music notebook that everyone can write down their melodies easily without learning.

   Naturally, we can recognize the pitch: highness and lowness.

   In SHOULARM notebook, you also write high notes on the upper part, low notes on the lower part of the paper.

   We count beats in the flow of time.

   The left to right flow of the paper is the length of the beat.

   This is the same piece as the one above written on manuscript paper.

 

   These two are notated the same melodies.

 

   Now you know how to use SHOULARM.

   Write down your melodies playing only inside your head.

   Share your cool ideas with the world and spread the creative brilliant music!

 

   You can notate many parts

   (duet, trio, quartet, etc.) on the same page.

 

   These are notated the same music. (Ravel - String quartet in f major 2nd. movement)

 

   SHOULARM can be used in music education.

   It's easy to recognize the gab between notes and how melody flows, therefore, it's easy to explain harmonics and how transpositions work.

 

 3 ways to use SHOULARM

   

   1. You can see it as piano keys (white keys = bright blanks, black keys = dark blanks)

   

   2. If you wrote the tonic of the scale next to + (Major) , or - (minor), your melody would be in that scale.

   

   3. Creators can use it however they want!

 

   SHOULARM is for:

   People who have their own melodies in their minds, but don't know how to write it.

   Musicians who always forget their melodies while walking on the street​.

   Music Students who want to try different ways to notate for pioneering new approaches to music.

   Contemporary Artists who are always searching for new ways to create their works.

   Children who want to remember their melodies.

   Music beginners who want to understand the concept of melody and scale transposition.

   Anyone interested in music!

 

   100gpm papers allow you to write

   your melodies on the clean back pages.

 

SHOULARM is easy to write outside.

 

SHOULARM is easy to carry.

 

   2 cover designs

 

   With perks:

 

   1. Set of 6 postcards

 

   2. Set of 3 badges

 

   Each sets of items below

   have the same design.

 

   Come and visit here!

   Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/shoularm

   

   Please tell about SHOULARM to your artist, or soon to be musician friends!

   Thank you.

 

 

​

​

story:
Notice

No worries about the wiper specification of your vehicle, and the options of Perks as well.

We will customize each shipment based on your car model which is surveyed by individual message. 

*If you select the Silicon Refill Perk, you should choose whether it is for 28" length blade or not.   1. Please check your wiper blade sizes 2. If the size of your blade is 28", please choose a option [28"],  if the size of your blade is 26" or shorter (24", 22", 21"...), please choose the option [26" or less] (Between a 28" and shorters are not compatible each other since the width of a 28" silicon refill is 8 mm and the remaining 26" or shorter are 6 mm width.)

 

 KIMBLADE’s key feature is the direct blade that contacts the windshield glass. KIMBLADE uses a 4-bar linkage blade, made with silicone, that exceeds the performance of existing rubber blades through its powerful structure and high-quality materials. 

WHAT DO EXPERTS THINK ABOUT KIMLBADE?

There are many advantages of using silicone to make wiper blades. One, it ensures smooth movement and two, it makes sure that the wiper is in constant contact with the glass to apply the water-repellent coating. 

KIMBLADE wipers are made of silicone material that ensures smooth usability even in harsh sunlight and snow, as it is very stable against UV rays and ozone corrosion.

 The traditional rubber wiper is not resistant to harsh weather conditions such as strong sunlight, sub-zero weather, UV rays, and ozone, which causes cracks and increased corrosion over time.

KIMBLADE wiper blades are made of silicone and remain intact even when exposed to various conditions, allowing users to experience utmost convenience and safety. 

Water repellency is unique to KIMBLADE, as silicone oil and coating is applied with each wipe. Not only does this make driving safer in dangerous conditions, but now there is no need to purchase a separate water repellent for the windshield. This makes it extremely cost-effective and useful for all weather conditions. 

When the wiper blade is in motion, the water repellent film is automatically applied onto the windshield glass (permanent use).

KIMBLADE’s Silicone Wiper Technology

The silicone is a relatively soft material, so the other silicone blade in the market which has an inverted triangle structure is bent easily. And so, the downforce is not concentrated and as a result, friction is increased due to extensive contact with the surface of the windshield. 

KIMBLADE is supported by its 4-bar linkage structure to ensure the downforce is always concentrated on the edge of the wiper blade without breaking the lip to maximize clear visibility on the road.

 

 

 At the end of the campaign, please choose the right size of your blades (Driver Side & Passenger Side) by our survey.

Please refer to bellow our wiper blades specification database (this is standard selling in US market. If you live in other countries, it may be a different size or adapter type even the same year and model. Please check the correct sizes and wiper arm type before you finish the survey) tab button.

Windshield wipers have been on the market for decades, however, the blades have not changed ever since. There are many new versions of the wiper frames, but the blades that directly contact the windshield have had the same design, continuing to cause problems such as noise, weak water-repellency, and inefficient cleaning. KIMBLADE has developed the best, most effective blades and highlights them as the most important aspect of the wiper. KIMBLADE uses silicone, which is much more stable than general rubber. The blades were designed with a 4-bar linkage structure to eliminate the issues that normal wipers produce today. KIMBLADE will ensure a safe view while driving for everyone around the world.

story:
PLUME is a smart, multifunctional rocket launch vehicle and speaker system, designed to mimic a rocket launch in both appearance and entertainment.

Of all the sights ever witnessed by mankind, a rocket launch in operation is perhaps the most thrilling. Imaging the loud roaring sound coming from the engines, the massive bright light stuns in the air, the brilliant vapor clouds just beneath your feet… and even the voice commencing countdown of Space Shuttle.

With its alloy CNC and 3D printing modeling, precise sound performance stimulation, and vivid build-in spotlights, PLUME features a powerful rocket launch show within your control.

We managed to offer 3 rockets which are reminiscent of the space exploration history. The Saturn V, Space Shuttle, and Falcon 9 launched on the famous LC39A site in 1967-1973, 1981-2011 and 2010-present.

The exquisitely accurate 1/300, 1/200, 1/150 scale reproductions are based on many specialized documents and data. During the design development, our team was able to cooperate with many rocket scientist that helped to make sure the overall appearance, as well as the launch escape system of Saturn V, Solid Rocket Booster (SRB) of the space shuttle and landing legs of Falcon9, are as accurate and detailed as possible. 

With the Fast Assemble Stable Technology (F.A.S.T.),  PLUME allows you to easily switch to a new rocket in a snap. 

With the attached PLUME base, F.A.S.T. can make the rocket model display individually.

You can also change each core engine to achieve better details.

People dream to watch a rocket launch. Did we mention that PLUME’s all system voice records are from a re-mastering of the actual Apollo missions, even Jack King, the “voice of Apollo”? 

Check this out 

Kinda cool, right?   

Of course, we won’t reveal all system sound effects here cause everybody hates spoiler.

We want even kids can learn spaceflight technologies easily and fast.

By adopting the Augmented Reality (AR) technology, you’ll be able to assemble the 3 rockets like an expert through the interactive “Space Go” app. Understand each detail of the rocket structure by simply pointing your smartphone camera at PLUME.

Choose even your own rocket, Fill up the propellant tank, set up the orbit, and you’re all set to go… oh, don’t forget to check the engines of course.

“Space nuts” wouldn’t ever want to miss a single rocket launch event just like football fans wouldn’t want to miss a match. The “Space Go” app automatically syncs up and updates the upcoming launch events and reminds you on time. All you need to do is to choose your favorite ones and simply tap the alarm button. Voila! 

 
PLUME is much more than just a rocket launch vehicle. It’s a smart lighting system that allows you to enjoy endless possibilities of lighting color and brightness by selecting from 16 million colors.

 PLUME adapts to anywhere in your house in perfect lighting conditions.

Four auxiliary spotlights surround the base with a unique optical-path design that not only lights up the rocket but also showcases the flame of the rocket in the best way.

Get so bored with your alarms and frustrated to get up early again this morning? PLUME has the coolest wake-up call for you! How about some lightning from Jupiter?  

Check out my alarm this week:

Weekend - Well, I’d choose to sleep till noon!

Still feel so asleep? No worries! Because PLUME can offer a sophisticate lighting-up effect (stimulate light of the Sun) 8 minutes before your wake-up time. 

PLUME can also be your premium Bluetooth speaker comes with all-channel sound effects that give unobstructed range up to 30 square feet.

The “Dances to the music” feature is really cool that it automatically adapts to the beat of your playlist and adjust the color, brightness and light rhythm. So, whether you want to jazz up a party with friends or play video games in an ultra-rich sound, PLUME is always there to support. 

Record a voice message, select a light color, set the time, and it’s all done in the “Space Go” app. PLUME brings love and joy to your family life. 

Yes, all features of PLUME can be simply executed by just tapping anywhere on the bottom of the dock. Thanks to our engineers who worked tirelessly to optimize the software and hardware.

 Double tap – on and off  

Single tap – switch light mode  

Tap and hold – adjust brightness 

Space souvenirs should be fascinating objects that illuminate a child’s mind. And for some time after the 1960s, this was how things were. But today, when we step into a space souvenir shop options seem to be nothing more than toy models, badges, stationery, T-shirts and so on. Nothing seems to give children that awe and wonder anymore. Souvenirs are meant to be a meaningful and inspiring gadget that propel us into the future instead of being stereotypical images anchored to a bygone era. As an avid spaceflight enthusiast, Romax decided to do something innovative.
 
 
In September 2015, Romax made a model of Saturn V for his girlfriend as a gift, which was then displayed in her house. Ever since then, people have been very intrigued about that model rocket.

Romax then completed a Falcon 9 rocket lamp on a large scale to celebrate the first successful return landing of SpaceX, which eventually became the prototype of PLUME afterwards.

He then added the AR function to the rocket lamp which received lots of attention from kids who’re curious about space. He then realized that it must be the perfect way to make space more appealing. Which would lead the way for spaceflight to one day become an integral part of daily life.

That’s how the PLUME team got started.

We’ve done an incredible amount of work to re-create the tiniest detail from the original design.

Adopted the design of CNC and resin for refined details and to provide a subtle texture of enhanced grip.

We were so meticulous that it took 10 samples for us to finally come to an agreement on some key but minute differences.

To meet the requirements of mass production while preserving the soul of our design, we decided to use an enclosed flame design made of fiber material instead of the open external design used in our prototype. This grants the safety and stability of the lamp fiber and prevents kids from swallowing the fiber.

Various versions of software, hardware, processing, and structure have been done for providing the best user experience. During the whole process, we’ve applied 4 patents!

 

On July 20, 1969, American astronauts Neil Armstrong (1930-2012) and Buzz Aldrin (1930-)became the first humans ever to land on the moon.

On September 17, 2018, Japanese billionaire Yusaku Maezawa announced that he has chosen to go to the moon in 2023 — and bring six to eight artists along for the ride.
In recognition of the 50th anniversary of the first Moon landing, Gravitation Innovation chooses to ship your name and message to space. Back Plume and your name and the message will be sent to space. 

 

Gravitation Innovation Inc. is a creative brand company focusing on spaceflight, robotics, and consumer electronics. At Gravitation Innovation, we strive to get more people involved in spaceflight area by offering neat spaceflight-related products.

Product Design, Development, and Manufacturing

David (CEO&Product Manager) has a unique vision of product design. Pai (Designer) and John (Construction Engineer) complete detailed design. All of them are experienced designer and engineers. They are responsible for the design, development, and production of PLUME.

Community and Marketing

Melody (Marketing) handles PLUME’s community management. Yumes (Web) builds and maintains our website. Amelie (Marketing) handles the market’s research and outreach.

Software and Electronics

Lcey (Unity 3D Developer) works together with Yumes to develop our “SPACE GO”App. King (Electronic Engineer)  is responsible for electronics design, testing, and manufacturing.
