David (CEO&Product Manager) has a unique vision of product design. Pai (Designer) and John (Construction Engineer) complete detailed design. All of them are experienced designer and engineers. They are responsible for the design, development, and production of PLUME.
Community and Marketing
Melody (Marketing) handles PLUME’s community management. Yumes (Web) builds and maintains our website. Amelie (Marketing) handles the market’s research and outreach.
Software and Electronics
Lcey (Unity 3D Developer) works together with Yumes to develop our “SPACE GO”App. King (Electronic Engineer)  is responsible for electronics design, testing, and manufacturing.

story:
If you only had one tool to get people out of a refugee camp or to break the cycle of poverty, what would it be?

Empower believes that the answer is connectivity. This is because we are living in a refugee crisis unlike any other. We are in a refugee crisis in a digital world where more people own a phone than a toothbrush. Access to the internet gives people the information and communication networks they need to make informed choices, stay up-to-date with their health, continue their education, build their skills and find employment opportunities – ultimately uplifting not only themselves but their families, communities and countries.

Connectivity is the only tool that can build self-sufficiency and allow people to pursue a future that they would have otherwise been denied. Empower’s Internet solution makes connectivity more affordable and available for those who need it most.

CURRENT SITUATION:

THE ACCESS GAP

Refugees currently lack affordable access to the Internet. A 2016 global study by UNHCR found that refugees spend up to 40% of their income on staying connected, sometimes trading food rations for a data plan. When they can get access to the internet, refugees use it to stay in touch with loved ones, reunite with family members, and pursue opportunities for resettlement or an improved life. The lack of an affordable connection ultimately impacts their mental well-being, community relations and possibility of future success.

BRIDGING THE GAP

Introducing EmpowerNet – an innovative web-app that optimizes affordable access to the internet, ultimately closing the access gap for refugee communities. EmpowerNet is the world’s first demand-management web browser that allows users to access the full internet without the need of a stable or high-speed wifi connection; saving refugees both time and money.

HOW IT WORKS:

Empower installs smart WiFi routers in refugee camps and urban slums, provided by our platform partner HITCH. When users come to our WiFi hotspot, they can access a live internet connection through our EmpowerNet webapp to browse the Internet or communicate or they can access a local cache for high-definition video streaming on-demand. Each hotspot can store 1 TB of video content, which is equivalent to 1,000 hours of video or 17,000 hours of audio content.

With EmpowerNet, users only pay for the live data that they use which can reduce their cost by up to 60%. This is because the majority of internet usage is video consumption, which our web browser now allows users to access offline for free on the local cache.

The local cache updates itself regularly (daily or more) with our proprietary algorithm and cloud network so users get access to the most timely and relevant content. EmpowerNet gives users access to the most relevant and helpful slice of the internet.

Take a look at our demo below:

THE KNOWLEDGE ECONOMY

We believe that the knowledge economy is the future of the world economy, and the internet is its backbone.

The economic potential for connecting these consumers is significant - Deloitte estimated in 2016 that extending internet access in Africa, Latin America and India to these very populations would result in:

OUR INSPIRATION:

We met Julian in the Nakivale refugee camp in Uganda. He’s a Burundian refugee who has been in this camp for over three years. Julian relies heavily on the internet. He has traded 12 days worth of food rations for his data plan - it’s the only way for him to keep in touch with his family or have any hope of continuing his education. Julian is just one of the 170,000 refugees in the Nakivale camp and one of 300 million refugees in East Africa alone who live without accessible connectivity.

Connectivity is Julian’s most vital tool – it’s what he used to apply for asylum, prepare for the grueling process, learn languages, start seeking a potential job and ultimately, share the life changing news with his family back home. He needs connectivity just as much as we do. With your support, we can empower Julian, and the millions of refugees just like him around the world.

Are you ready to #empower millions of refugees around the world?

By donating, spreading the word, sending us messages of support and offering to join us, it all brings us closer to accomplishing our vision by 2022: to provide connectivity to even the most remote locations and help refugees participate as global citizens.

By supporting Empower, you are supporting the future of technology in remote areas. You are lifting refugees out of misery and boredom, and giving them the tools that they need to prosper.

If you cannot financially support us, there are other ways in which you can help us!

  • Join our social media #Empower Campaign: We believe that connectivity is productivity. Through our holistic solution, Empower can touch a variety of user needs. How do you want to #empower people? Share a photo with your response!
  • Follow us on our social media platforms:
    • Facebook
    • Twitter
    • Instagram
  • Subscribe to our email list on empower10.org:
    • Be in the know of all our updates and exclusive info!
  • Become a #Empower Ambassador:
    • Email info@empower10.org to learn more on how to join our team.

THE TEAM:

            

Empower’s co-founders: Joseph Truong, Vasiliki Belegrinis, Amal Naufer, and Akash Sidhu (left to right; Skaramagas Refugee Camp, Greece). 

Empower is a social enterprise created by four students from the Schulich School of Business, York University who are Global Finalists in the 2017 Hult Prize Challenge. The Hult Prize, often called ‘the Nobel Prize for students’ is the world’s largest social entrepreneurship competition that challenges students around the world to address a pressing global issue with a business sustainable solution. The winning idea receives $1,000,000 USD in seed capital funding. This year’s competition drew over 50,000 applicants and Empower is one of six Global Finalists who will be pitching in September at the United Nations HQ to kick-off UN Week.

Recognizing that connecting to the internet gives people the power to transform their lives, we’ve been working since October 2016 on a software solution that can not only bring the internet offline for people living on the fringes of mobile networks, but also share the plethora of opportunities that come with this access of information.

Let’s #empower the lives of many and give refugees the opportunities we take for granted everyday - the simple access to a wifi connection and overall world.     

OUR PROGRESS:

Empower in the Media:


For media inquiries, please contact vasiliki@empower10.org.

story:
Summary

Hi, I'm Kelly Brown.

About two years ago I created the Goodwons application to change the things we value in American society. Way too often we give value and attention to things that hurt us morally, intellectually, and financially. The Goodwons application hopes to reverse that trend by celebrating the good that people do for strangers, themselves, and their communities. Join me in revolutionizing social media and changing American culture by helping people live with purpose. 

What We Need 

We need additional capitol to complete backend development and to launch an initial marketing campaign. The following breakdown is how we will allocate funds. 

  • $12,000 - Backend development for new and exciting functionality.
  • $8,000 - Marketing and Endorsements. 

* We also need your help by sharing this campaign with your friends and family. If you're a software developer or engineer and you want to join the project, please contact me at kb4mdena@gmail.com

The Impact

The impact of the application could be monumental in how America moves forward. The application could take our country from politically divided, to morally united. The Goodwons has the potential to drive social and economic change from the private sector.

Challenges

The biggest challenge we face is competition. The social networking application industry is saturated along with a few industry titans. Lucky for us, our application satisfies a need in the market. We offer a unique product that addresses a major issue in todays time. We also have a unique founder who our key demographics identify with. Both these advantages, put us in a strong position to be successful. 

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT

story:
About us

We are Central Saint Martin's Product Design graduates of 2016. Years of hard work, through trials and error, have gone into the making of our final year products, and we are finally ready to share them with the world from the 21st till the 26th of June in London. 

This year, we will be exhibiting products around themes such as private spaces in domestic or public spaces, making everyday life easier, customer experience innovation design in collaboration with companies Lexon, Marset, Hitch mylius, Micro Scooter, Policy Lab, and ID mobile - together with self initiated projects that truly show the identity of each student.

The title of this years show is UNDO

“Undo” plays such a pivotal role in the design process, constantly refining ideas by making mistakes. The show is a celebration, not only of our strong final projects, but the process that got us there.

Why are we asking for donations? 

The degree show will be the first platform and opportunity for us to present ourselves to the public. Therefore, it is a great turning point on our adventure into becoming Product Designers.

We have great ideas and aspiring plans to make the best show possible, but for this we need your help.


Other ways to help us: 

Please spread the word of our campaign so we can reach as many people as possible! Our Facebook group is called 'CSM Product Design Degree Show'. 

Any other support (such as materials, printing, equipment, press coverage, food and beverages, or love) is much appreciated. 

If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to contact our organisation team, please refer to the following e-mail address:
csmbapd2016@gmail.com

story:
Life tends to put us in difficult financial situations, these times come unexpectedly. In these moments we have to find a new source of income very fast, to resolve our temporary money issues. The problem is we don’t have the time to learn a new way or do in depth trainings to earn fast cash. The fastest solution is doing what you are already doing everyday. Gulsy has now made needing a quick income solution possible.

Have you ever recommended great places for food, drinks, entertainment or vacations to anybody? Think about social media or Yelp... I'm sure a lot of you have. Have you ever been compensated for your recommendations? Probably not, right? With Gulsy, you could be making money every time you simply recommend a friend to one of your favorite places. 

Keep sharing the places you love and now get paid for it! This is the cornerstone principle of Gulsy. It’s a new digital income platform app that allows you to make money from sharing places you love and even get discounts to the places you already go. The people you refer will also receive large discounts or free items.

Gain a new stream of revenue without spending hours a day trying to do it - just keep doing what you have already been doing all your life and now get PAID for it. Think of our App as the “digital word-of-mouth” payment platform. 

Our goal is to provide members with large discounts, encourage them to accumulate Gulsy Coins quickly and create an opportunity for anyone that will create an additional income they will be proud of. 

  • No Selling
  • No inviting strangers to your house
  • No buying lotions/potions/products to take up space – No inventory!
  • No large down lines needed to make money
  • No monthly membership costs
  • There is nothing to sell, simply share!

 

 

Members are customers who sign up as members and then benefit by receiving large discounts on their purchases. When they share Gulsy with other potential members they receive Gulsy coins. These G-Coins can be used to purchase products/services from stores on our platform.

 

 

As an approved Affiliate Partner, our system gives you the ability to obtain true passive income, without having to sell anything. You will receive a commission every time you sign up new businesses, new affiliate partners and new members. Gulsy is already fully operational and you can start making money right now. Here’s how:

  • Sign Up New Businesses - For all business owners, advertising on Gulsy is Free and that's why there are simply no sales. Just ask your favorite places if they would like more customers/clients. When the business signs up on our platform, you will receive commission from each Gulsy member that makes a purchase at that business.
  • Sign up New Affiliate Partners - receive a commission upon signing up new affiliate partners, you will receive commissions on all of their Gulsy activity. Just ask your friends if they want to earn money by recommending their favorite places and products! 
  • Sign Up New Members  - receive a commission Upon signing up new members you will receive commissions on all of their Gulsy activity. It’s very easy to sign up!
  • Affiliate Partners have the ability to purchase an Affiliate Membership for coins and resell to another individual for money.
  • Every month when you achieve the top 20% status as an Affiliate Partner, you qualify to exchange Gulsy Coins you earned that month for money. 

Refer a business who buys a Loyalty Club package and earn 20% of the contract and receive a commission every time a member of the club uses Gulsy. 

The more you share the app to sign up others that will personally use our platform, the more Gulsy Coins you receive and the more money you can potentially make! Gulsy is a true loyalty system platform that creates reliable additional income quickly and easily!

Simply open the Gulsy App and create your account. Once you start we want you to know that it’s not just an opportunity, it is an investment in you and your family’s future. You are becoming a part of the Gulsy Team at the ground floor of the expansion into the United States! How slow or fast you build your business and how much money you want to make, is based on your actions and your recommendations. Your success is extremely important to us and all of us at Gulsy want you to achieve the goals you have set for yourself to reach the level of success that fits your dreams. We are giving you the opportunity plus the road map to get there!!

 

Read through our Indiegogo campaign and decide that Gulsy fits your needs and your future goals. If you have any questions feel free to email us, a team member will respond with answers to your questions. Riley@Gulsy.com

 

Read through the perks options we have available. Our goal is to help you be successful with any package you choose. Here are a few questions to think about before you choose one...

  • How fast do I want to grow my Gulsy business?
  • How much money would I like to generate with Gulsy business?
  • How easy will it be for me to invite my circle of friends and family to join me?

 

Select and purchase one of our perks packages and after the purchase is confirmed, you will receive a welcome email letter with a link to set up a personal phone call with one our Professional Trainers. The strategy call will answer any further questions you may have and discuss how quickly you want to build your business and set up goals. 

If you believe you can do more and BE more than you are now, jump on board with us, and we'll work together and profit together. You are in control of how far and how fast you will grow with us.

Most importantly, we want you to be happy with decision of joining our family. We will be there to support you every step of the way. However, it is up to you and your actions and commitment that will help you reach your goals.

Everybody who purchases any package on our Indiegogo Campaign will personally receive a strategy call by one of our trainers to answer all of your questions & set up your personal strategy. Join us!

 

 
 
 
 

Monetary compensations - Affiliate Partners are distributed as two separate streams.

First Stream:

1. When an Affiliate-Partner adds a business to Gulsy platform, able to receive 20% monetary commission from each visit of any Gulsy member. 

2. Their up-line will receive 10% commission.

Second Stream:

1. When an Affiliate adds any member, the affiliate will receive 20% from any member’s visit.

2. When an Affiliate signs another affiliate will receive 10% from each of his visits

Third Stream:

1. Gulsy Affiliate Partners you’re able to earn immediate cash by buying a new membership for your Gulsy Coins (GLPs) and selling it right away to anyone who’s interested.

* 20% of the commission amount that’s paid to Gulsy goes to managers’ pool to be paid out as additional bonuses according to performance. All monetary commissions are paid out on a monthly basis.

 
 

 

Gulsy is for anyone looking to save money, make a little extra money or wants to achieve financial freedom. Are you a college student who needs a little extra to get by until finishing school?  Or, maybe you are a single mom who is looking for a way to pay the bills? What about if you are retired? That extra income can put your mind at ease and let you enjoy retirement. Perhaps you are an entrepreneur who has a million-dollar dream. Do you have a lot of friends, colleagues and contacts? Invite them into Gulsy and challenge each other to see who can invite the most people. You will all win!

 

Regardless of where or who you are in life, Gulsy is for you. Remember, there are No Sales, you can Make Money Right Away, do what you have been doing all your life and now Get Paid for it. We have made it so simple that everyone can benefit from our platform. If you can use a smartphone, you can earn with Gulsy! 

The more you personally use our platform and share the app to sign up others, the more Gulsy Coins you receive and the more money you can put into your pocket.  Gulsy is a true loyalty system that creates reliable additional income quickly and easily!                      

You can receive discounts at any business that is registered on the Gulsy platform. Visit and make purchases at Restaurants, Hotels, Clothing Stores, Dentists, Automotive Shops, Hotels, Bars, Medical Centers, and more!  Think of pretty much any place of business you use and with your help, Gulsy will be there. 

 

 

 

(Note: Actual Images/Discounts From The Gulsy App.)

 

 

 

 

 

                             

The feedback and growth we have been experiencing in Mexico and Europe has now allowed us to start this new expansion in the United States. This new digital platform has opened the door for convenient way to establish a reliable and trustworthy income with just your smartphone. The goal is to make it so simple and yet powerful and effective, that anyone can use Gulsy to supplement or even replace their income. We truly believe we have achieved that goal, and we are now looking to the future. Within the next 12 months we plan to have our presence in the major cities of each of the 50 States and from there we will start to expand more into other countries. The projections for next 3-5 years have Gulsy being Global across the World! Are you ready to join us?  

We recently engaged the Sheffield Marketing Group, an independent leader in the industry for over 20 years, who has worked with and helped develop several billion-dollar companies including Amway, Isagenix, Shaklee, among others, to work with our platform. They provided us with an independent analysis for projections and a worst-case scenario for our expansion model. We have included a summary of the analysis below.

Over the last several years the consistent trend of successful IPOs (Initial Public Offering) and private start-ups were focused in the technology sector and specifically in Digital Platforms, such as: Uber, Lyft, Airbnb and others. The reasons for these trends are obvious due to the exponentially increasing reliance on technology in every part of our lives. The value of these platforms will only increase and become more and more of an everyday necessity.

 

 

"I had the chance to invest in Uber in the early days and I passed it up — twice. My friends, Travis and Garrett, started the company, and I still didn't invest! The ride-sharing company started as a side hustle and they hired someone else to run it, so I didn't think they were going to make it."

"Had I invested $25,000 in Uber, like I did with many other companies, the value would have reached $300 million a few years ago. I regret not investing in the company, but I'm also glad the market punched me in the face. I deserved it — and I'm even more driven now because of it. That's why I grab every opportunity I can."

— Gary Vaynerchuk,
founder and CEO of VaynerX
five-time New York Times bestselling author of "Crushing It!"

Mark Cuban also passed on investing in Uber early. Investors said Uber would never succeed outside of San Francisco, Los Angeles, and NYC. Now, they eat their words. Uber recently launched in Kenya, Africa and is in nearly 500 cities in over 75 countries. The investors didn't underestimate the idea, they underestimated the founders.

The same happened with Brian Chesky, co-founder of Airbnb. Chesky received seven rejection letters from seven prominent VCs when Airbnb tried to raise $150,000 in exchange for 10% of the company. Airbnb is valued at $30 billion at the time of this writing. That $150,000 investment would have been worth $3 billion today. Chesky even published the rejection letters as motivation for other founders.

 

Each individual Indiegogo contribution will boost Gulsy into reaching these estimated projections even faster. When Gulsy grows and expands, your Gulsy business will continue to grow faster & faster.

  • Help fund any needed upgrades to our app/website in order to provide the best user experience possible.
  • Allow Gulsy to do additional marketing/advertising to expand across the United States ensuring we have the necessary strategy and people in place to handle rapid growth.
  •  
  • Onboard qualified Gulsy Personal Mentors to provide 1 on 1 training to all Affiliate Partners. This is key to your success and the success of Gulsy.
  •  
  • Provide the necessary funds to create our own lead pool in our efforts to distribute quality leads to the active Affiliate Partners. We want to reward the Affiliate Partners who are working hard.
  • Creates funds to add more benefits for all Gulsy Members, Affiliate Partners & Businesses.

 

 

We will be there to help you every step of the way to help your business. Our way of thinking is that when we help you WIN, we WIN. Your contribution is very important to the success of Gulsy. We invite you to join us now. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions.

We look forward to personally working with all of you. If you have questions about our Indiegogo Campaign or questions about Gulsy please contact us at 866-77-GULSY (48579) or Gulsy.com

With Gulsy, you could be making money every time you simply recommend a friend to one of your favorite places. Keep sharing the places you love and now get paid for it! This is the cornerstone principle of Gulsy. It’s a new digital income platform app that allows you to make money from sharing places you love and even get discounts to the places you already go. The people you refer will also receive large discounts or free items.Gain a new stream of revenue without spending hours a day trying to do it - just keep doing what you have already been doing all your life and now get PAID for it. Think of our App as the “digital word-of-mouth” payment platform. Our goal is to provide members with large discounts, encourage them to accumulate Gulsy Coins quickly and create an opportunity for anyone that will create an additional income they will be proud of. 
No Selling
No inviting strangers to your house
No buying lotions/potions/products to take up space – No inventory!
No large down lines needed to make money
No monthly membership costs
There is nothing to sell, simply share!
  Members are customers who sign up as members and then benefit by receiving large discounts on their purchases. When they share Gulsy with other potential members they receive Gulsy coins. These G-Coins can be used to purchase products/services from stores on our platform.  As an approved Affiliate Partner, our system gives you the ability to obtain true passive income, without having to sell anything. You will receive a commission every time you sign up new businesses, new affiliate partners and new members. Gulsy is already fully operational and you can start making money right now. Here’s how:

Sign Up New Businesses - For all business owners, advertising on Gulsy is Free and that's why there are simply no sales. Just ask your favorite places if they would like more customers/clients. When the business signs up on our platform, you will receive commission from each Gulsy member that makes a purchase at that business.

Sign up New Affiliate Partners - receive a commission upon signing up new affiliate partners, you will receive commissions on all of their Gulsy activity. Just ask your friends if they want to earn money by recommending their favorite places and products! 

Sign Up New Members  - receive a commission Upon signing up new members you will receive commissions on all of their Gulsy activity. It’s very easy to sign up!
Affiliate Partners have the ability to purchase an Affiliate Membership for coins and resell to another individual for money.
Every month when you achieve the top 20% status as an Affiliate Partner, you qualify to exchange Gulsy Coins you earned that month for money. 
Refer a business who buys a Loyalty Club package and earn 20% of the contract and receive a commission every time a member of the club uses Gulsy. The more you share the app to sign up others that will personally use our platform, the more Gulsy Coins you receive and the more money you can potentially make! Gulsy is a true loyalty system platform that creates reliable additional income quickly and easily!Simply open the Gulsy App and create your account. Once you start we want you to know that it’s not just an opportunity, it is an investment in you and your family’s future. You are becoming a part of the Gulsy Team at the ground floor of the expansion into the United States! How slow or fast you build your business and how much money you want to make, is based on your actions and your recommendations. Your success is extremely important to us and all of us at Gulsy want you to achieve the goals you have set for yourself to reach the level of success that fits your dreams. We are giving you the opportunity plus the road map to get there!! Read through our Indiegogo campaign and decide that Gulsy fits your needs and your future goals. If you have any questions feel free to email us, a team member will respond with answers to your questions. Riley@Gulsy.com Read through the perks options we have available. Our goal is to help you be successful with any package you choose. Here are a few questions to think about before you choose one...
How fast do I want to grow my Gulsy business?
How much money would I like to generate with Gulsy business?
How easy will it be for me to invite my circle of friends and family to join me?
 Select and purchase one of our perks packages and after the purchase is confirmed, you will receive a welcome email letter with a link to set up a personal phone call with one our Professional Trainers. The strategy call will answer any further questions you may have and discuss how quickly you want to build your business and set up goals. If you believe you can do more and BE more than you are now, jump on board with us, and we'll work together and profit together. You are in control of how far and how fast you will grow with us.Most importantly, we want you to be happy with decision of joining our family. We will be there to support you every step of the way. However, it is up to you and your actions and commitment that will help you reach your goals.Everybody who purchases any package on our Indiegogo Campaign will personally receive a strategy call by one of our trainers to answer all of your questions & set up your personal strategy. Join us!     
Monetary compensations - Affiliate Partners are distributed as two separate streams.
First Stream:
1. When an Affiliate-Partner adds a business to Gulsy platform, able to receive 20% monetary commission from each visit of any Gulsy member. 
2. Their up-line will receive 10% commission.
Second Stream:
1. When an Affiliate adds any member, the affiliate will receive 20% from any member’s visit.
2. When an Affiliate signs another affiliate will receive 10% from each of his visits
Third Stream:
1. Gulsy Affiliate Partners you’re able to earn immediate cash by buying a new membership for your Gulsy Coins (GLPs) and selling it right away to anyone who’s interested.
* 20% of the commission amount that’s paid to Gulsy goes to managers’ pool to be paid out as additional bonuses according to performance. All monetary commissions are paid out on a monthly basis.
   Gulsy is for anyone looking to save money, make a little extra money or wants to achieve financial freedom. Are you a college student who needs a little extra to get by until finishing school?  Or, maybe you are a single mom who is looking for a way to pay the bills? What about if you are retired? That extra income can put your mind at ease and let you enjoy retirement. Perhaps you are an entrepreneur who has a million-dollar dream. Do you have a lot of friends, colleagues and contacts? Invite them into Gulsy and challenge each other to see who can invite the most people. You will all win! Regardless of where or who you are in life, Gulsy is for you. Remember, there are No Sales, you can Make Money Right Away, do what you have been doing all your life and now Get Paid for it. We have made it so simple that everyone can benefit from our platform. If you can use a smartphone, you can earn with Gulsy! The more you personally use our platform and share the app to sign up others, the more Gulsy Coins you receive and the more money you can put into your pocket.  Gulsy is a true loyalty system that creates reliable additional income quickly and easily!                      You can receive discounts at any business that is registered on the Gulsy platform. Visit and make purchases at Restaurants, Hotels, Clothing Stores, Dentists, Automotive Shops, Hotels, Bars, Medical Centers, and more!  Think of pretty much any place of business you use and with your help, Gulsy will be there.    (Note: Actual Images/Discounts From The Gulsy App.)                                  The feedback and growth we have been experiencing in Mexico and Europe has now allowed us to start this new expansion in the United States. This new digital platform has opened the door for convenient way to establish a reliable and trustworthy income with just your smartphone. The goal is to make it so simple and yet powerful and effective, that anyone can use Gulsy to supplement or even replace their income. We truly believe we have achieved that goal, and we are now looking to the future. Within the next 12 months we plan to have our presence in the major cities of each of the 50 States and from there we will start to expand more into other countries. The projections for next 3-5 years have Gulsy being Global across the World! Are you ready to join us?  We recently engaged the Sheffield Marketing Group, an independent leader in the industry for over 20 years, who has worked with and helped develop several billion-dollar companies including Amway, Isagenix, Shaklee, among others, to work with our platform. They provided us with an independent analysis for projections and a worst-case scenario for our expansion model. We have included a summary of the analysis below.Over the last several years the consistent trend of successful IPOs (Initial Public Offering) and private start-ups were focused in the technology sector and specifically in Digital Platforms, such as: Uber, Lyft, Airbnb and others. The reasons for these trends are obvious due to the exponentially increasing reliance on technology in every part of our lives. The value of these platforms will only increase and become more and more of an everyday necessity.  "I had the chance to invest in Uber in the early days and I passed it up — twice. My friends, Travis and Garrett, started the company, and I still didn't invest! The ride-sharing company started as a side hustle and they hired someone else to run it, so I didn't think they were going to make it.""Had I invested $25,000 in Uber, like I did with many other companies, the value would have reached $300 million a few years ago. I regret not investing in the company, but I'm also glad the market punched me in the face. I deserved it — and I'm even more driven now because of it. That's why I grab every opportunity I can."— Gary Vaynerchuk,founder and CEO of VaynerXfive-time New York Times bestselling author of "Crushing It!"Mark Cuban also passed on investing in Uber early. Investors said Uber would never succeed outside of San Francisco, Los Angeles, and NYC. Now, they eat their words. Uber recently launched in Kenya, Africa and is in nearly 500 cities in over 75 countries. The investors didn't underestimate the idea, they underestimated the founders.The same happened with Brian Chesky, co-founder of Airbnb. Chesky received seven rejection letters from seven prominent VCs when Airbnb tried to raise $150,000 in exchange for 10% of the company. Airbnb is valued at $30 billion at the time of this writing. That $150,000 investment would have been worth $3 billion today. Chesky even published the rejection letters as motivation for other founders. Each individual Indiegogo contribution will boost Gulsy into reaching these estimated projections even faster. When Gulsy grows and expands, your Gulsy business will continue to grow faster & faster.
Help fund any needed upgrades to our app/website in order to provide the best user experience possible.
Allow Gulsy to do additional marketing/advertising to expand across the United States ensuring we have the necessary strategy and people in place to handle rapid growth.
 
Onboard qualified Gulsy Personal Mentors to provide 1 on 1 training to all Affiliate Partners. This is key to your success and the success of Gulsy.
 
Provide the necessary funds to create our own lead pool in our efforts to distribute quality leads to the active Affiliate Partners. We want to reward the Affiliate Partners who are working hard.
Creates funds to add more benefits for all Gulsy Members, Affiliate Partners & Businesses.
  We will be there to help you every step of the way to help your business. Our way of thinking is that when we help you WIN, we WIN. Your contribution is very important to the success of Gulsy. We invite you to join us now. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions.We look forward to personally working with all of you. If you have questions about our Indiegogo Campaign or questions about Gulsy please contact us at 866-77-GULSY (48579) or Gulsy.com

story:
We believe that the power of technology can bring more happiness to every pet owner. DogCare Pet Clipper is World's First Smart Clipper that turns every pet owner into a pet groomer. With the smart chip, groom your pet at home is as easy as pie! Click on the ’SMART’ button and let DogCare do the rest of the job.

 

 

  • Perfect For Dogs With Super Long & Thick Coats!

Featuring a heavy-duty motor with high torque speed, DogCare provides strong and lasting power to the running blades that excludes any occurrences of clogging and snagging. It performs perfectly especially on dogs with long and thick coats like German shepherds.

  • 62dB with 6600 RPM

Using quiet mode for slow and gentle clipping. DogCare runs at a very low volume especially suitable for sensitive pets.

  •  Clip With No Extreme Heat 

Equipped with Aluminum Allot Structure Stimulates Airflow + Patented Heatproof Blades Technology, DogCare prevents the blades from overheating during clipping, protecting your pet at all times.

 
  • Heatproof Blades

Have you ever wondered why your pet always struggles during trimming? Experiencing pain or discomfort might be one of the reasons! DogCare has features that make grooming a quick, comfortable, and safe experience for your beloved pet.

Featuring unique heatproof blades and air-flow mechanics structure design, DogCare keeps the blades cooler at 107.6ºF or lower. Other clippers can reach up to 118.4ºF to 136.4°F, temps that are uncomfortable for pets.

Ps. Normal body temperature for dogs and cats is 101°F to 102.5°F.

According to American Pet Products Associations, cat and dog owners in the US spend approximately $700 - $1200 a year on their pets. Grooming at home cuts down the costs especially when you own a pet clipper with a 5-year warranty!

 

 
  • Dismantled & Assembled Easily For Cleaning

We started small in Rockville, Maryland 6 years ago and have been able to help millions of families build better relationships with their pets. We deeply value the special bond between humans and animals. Our mission is to enhance the close connection between pets and their owners through technology.

Our design and technology have been awarded more than 50 patents while 58 items are still under patent examination procedure. We have launched a series of products including WELL-D Dog Training System, NONO Bark Control Collar, MANNER Pet Training Mat, EDGE Ultrasonic Dog Trainer, NOAH Pet Water Fountain and MAGICLIP Deluxe Smart Cordless Pet Clipper.

story:
With A/STAND's ergonomic, portable, and transformable features you can work comfortably anywhere.

 

 

 

 

​

Where will you work with A/STAND? 

 

We offer 20 different viewing configurations so you can work comfortably anytime, anywhere. A/STAND is specifically designed to create a unique, personalized environment, allowing you to interact with your devices effectively & optimally. It's perfect for working while traveling, commuting, & working remotely. 

 

 

 

 

A/STAND makes you the master of your digital domain by ensuring that your viewing your device in the best angle possible. In tablet world land, it also offers the opportunity to go hands free in the most comfortable way possible. For laptop users, A/STAND is designed to dissipate the heat generated by these devices—you'll find it much more comfortable to sit with your laptop for extended periods of times.

 

 

 

 

​

 

 

Our product improves the angle in which you interact with your screen by offering over 20 viewing configurations. With A/STAND you have the option to choose what viewing position is most optimal for you, easing stress and omitting neck and back pains.

 

 

 

 

 

Just under 2 pounds & measuring the dimensions of a magazine, A/STAND is the go-to accessory that’s ready to go anywhere. Students can even use A/STAND in libraries & home chefs in their kitchen!

 

 

 

 

 

 

With over 20 different viewing configurations the A/STAND will quickly become your best friend. A/STAND is specifically designed to create a unique, personalized working environment, allowing you to interact with your devices effectively & optimally.

 

 

 

 

With A/STAND’s two-tiered option, your work space is effectively doubled. Our customers use the space below for everything from a meal on a flight to an easy access for papers/files even to have a great space to store another portable power source.

 

 

​

 

 

 

 

We know your devices are important to you, so we created a beverage tray to keep them safe and you hydrated. The A/STAND's a slide out drink tray keeps your coffee, soda, and water out of the computer spill zone

 

 

 

 

 

 

A/STAND makes tablet computing seamless - simply, pull out your device from its storage area + choose your view angle

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Even if your device is lying flat, you can still take advantage of the perfect perch for your digital device.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We offer 20 different viewing configurations - including a double tiered desk option. You can even read your favorite book using A/STAND!

 

 

 

 

 

Our strong and compact aluminum cross bars are the virtual spine of the device and the main ingredient of A/STAND's sturdiness. The inherent strength of bamboo and ABS plastic adds an extra element of durability to A/STAND's design. 

 

 

 

 

A/STAND comes in a variety of materials and color options to best fit your individual style and preferences. Get A/STAND in grey, black, or bamboo! 

 

 

​

 

 

 

 

 

A/FOLIO is a compact, next generation, microfiber carrying case for busy professionals on the go. Light and efficient travelers like that A/FOLIO has a place for everything: separate pockets for tablets and today's most popular devices like MacBook Airs and Surface products. A/FOLIO is designed to maximize A/STANDS' unique attributes allowing you to truly master your digital domain.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 
How do I open the A/STAND? 
Hold your A/STAND in both hands so that the A/STAND logo is closest to you and the groove at the top is further away. Position your thumb on the sliding latch on the side of a/Stand and your index finger on the top edge above the slot. Squeezing your hands together will release the latch—lift up the rear of a/Stand to open it. 

 
What are the slots on the bottom shelf of A/STAND? 
There are two sets of these slots, one on either side. As you lift up the rear of A/STAND, you’ll see a set of legs at the top of the device fall down (if they don’t do this automatically, just pull down on the little black tabs at the top of A/STAND closest to the tablet display slot). The series of the slots on the bottom plate of A/STAND are arranged to adjust the angle of the main viewing surface. The further you go back, the smaller your angle becomes. Slots closer to the front of the device (where the logo is stamped in the bottom right hand corner) will greatly increase the viewing angle. 

 
How do I make the A/STAND a double decker desk? 
This is a fantastic, space saving configuration of A/STAND which is very easy to set up. First, open A/STAND by following the How do I open A/STAND instructions above. Once opened pull both of the rear leg supports down and secure them in the slot on the bottom of the tray that is the third from the rear of the device—this slot will have a boz outlining it. Next, lift up the front of your A/STAND. Place the front legs securely in the slots on the silver crossbar and make sure they are firmly in place. You’re done. 

 
Can I use the A/STAND for Hands Free Viewing with my tablet? 
In many different ways. If your A/STAND is sitting flat on a surface or if it is in the double-decker desk configuration, take your tablet and insert it into the long horizontal slot that is positioned at the top of A/STAND. Lean it back, or away from you, and make sure that it is securely resting in slot. Let go and you’re all set for hand free viewing. 

 
Where do I store my tablet in the A/STAND? 
When you open the A/STAND, you will see a storage area positioned between the A/STAND two primary support legs. Most popular tablets will fit into this area. A rounded indentation on the four corners of the beverage stand holder show exactly where to position your tablet. The storage area is designed so that tablets fit in with their longer sides being parallel to the top and bottom edges of A/STAND (those with the logo and the tablet slot at the top). 

 
My tablet has a case or cover—can I still use A/STAND to carry it? 
This depends on exactly what kind of cover you have. The storage compartment is currently designed to fit tablet covers which are thin and frequently magnetic that cover the front of a tablet. Thicker more protective covers, especially those embedded with chargers will not fit into A/STAND's tablet storage area. 

 
How does the pull-out beverage tray work? 
Centered in the bottom section of A/STAND is a pull-out beverage tray. To access it, center your finger under A/STAND — you’ll feel a semi-circular indentation and a small ledge at the front. Pull out the beverage tray and then position your drink in the circular hole. Note: the top of your drink must be wider than this hole. 

 
What is the circular embossed ring on the beverage stand? 
This ring fits the exact dimensions of your most popular soda cans. 
 
Does A/STAND have a warranty?
 A/STAND has a one (1) year limited warranty. 

 
Domestic Shipping Methods/Rates: 
We are happy to announce A/STAND ships domestically and internationally! All a/Stands will be shipped standard ground by a major shipper. Shipping rates for A/STAND are as follows:
*Free shipping to the US 
*$10 shipping to Canada, UK, EU
*$15 shipping to Australia & Japan
*$20 Rest of World 

 

Can I get a refund?

During our live campaign on Indiegogo, you can modify, upgrade, or cancel your contribution at any time by going to the "My Contributions" tab of your Indiegogo account. To request a refund, please follow these steps (https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...). Once the campaign has finished its initial live phase, all requests for modifications, upgrades, or cancellations to your contribution will be considered on a case-by-case basis and can be sent to info@a-stand.com.

 

 

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

We are currently receiving a lot of inquiries, but we make sure to try our best to respond to you as fast as possible! Please contact info@a-stand.com with any questions you might have.

story:
During the turn of the century, when websites were truly beginning to gain traction, most businesses held the notion that they were "too small" or "didn't have enough resources" to invest in a professional looking webpage for their customers. As we know, almost all businesses today have a webpage to enhance their customer's experience. Over a decade later, we at Stratified Mobile have noticed a shockingly similar trend with regard to mobile apps and mobile computing. 

Our business model is simple. We strive to design, develop, and deliver professional quality mobile applications to the small and medium businesses of today. 

To that end, we feel that a mobile application cannot truly be professional unless it is written natively for the operating system that it supports. That ideation leads us to develop apps for iOS and Android using Swift, Apple’s newest programming language, and Java, a classic language with boundless customization. 

By creating truly native mobile applications we can assure our clients that users will be thrilled by the speed and fluidity of our apps. In addition, building native apps means that our client’s customers can access their app for download from the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store. 

As a company, trying to change the landscape of business app availability, we have undoubtedly faced some challenges. One of our biggest hurdles comes in the form of scalability, and that's where our wonderful backers come in!

The pledges that we receive from this campaign will go directly to the development of our own personal server infrastructure, and the streamlining of our revolutionary design process. 

Currently, we rent server space from a third-party company, and while it works wonderfully, our goal is to streamline our process by developing our own internal servers. In addition, your pledges will also be dedicated to speed improvements for our design process. These improvements can only further help us in cutting costs and offering our services at even more affordable prices.

With our campaign, we are doing something that no development company has done before. We're offering to design, and develop a completely functional iOS mobile app for your business! 

With a pledge of at least $40, we will design and develop an iOS app according to your business's branding guidelines. That means we use your colors, your logos, your images, and anything else that you'd like included!

Once the app is developed, we will send it to you and your office staff to test and use as much as you'd like. If you and your staff enjoy your mobile app experience, Stratified Mobile will offer you special contract terms, reserved solely for our Indiegogo backers, for the distribution and ongoing support of not only an iOS app, but an Android version as well!

 As a special thanks to backers, if our campaign reaches 150% funding, we will include an Apple Watch App at each pledge level. Your business can have the unique opportunity of getting in on the "ground floor" of the Apple Watch boom! 

Unlocked at $2,250

At this point, our only risks come in the form of unforeseen events or circumstances regarding our backers' businesses. That is, we aim to work closely with each of our backers at the various reward levels, and that may cause some slight delays. We are committed and enthusiastic about working with a multitude of backers' businesses, and strive to always offer the best services possible, regardless of perceived constraints.

story:
Thank You!

To our backers, friends and supporters, we are so excited to take you on our journey. The campaign to fast track the development of our first app is over, and we are storming ahead, extending the Kindom™ platform and establishing our key partnerships within child development and technology. The input we have received throughout the campaign has been tremendous and we cannot wait to apply our key validations and findings. 
Please read on to see what Kindom™ is about, join our Facebook Community or check out our website at kindom.co.  

Your Child's Best Advocate

As a parent, you are your child's best advocate. Sometimes it can be daunting to try to find the best pathway for your child, especially if something is "a little different". Maybe you ask yourself questions like:
  • do you have all our records and files readily available?
  • where do you start looking for information and other resources? 
  • who do you need to see? do you need a specialist?
  • are there things you can do at home with your child?
  • how do you get your point across to the health and education professionals?
  • so you trust the specialist, but that doesn't really seem right? 
  • who else can you ask?
  • what do other parents know that you can use to support your child?
Kindom™ is designed to ensure that you have all the resources you need in one place so you can support your child through any challenges they may have or to give them an edge in their development.

Kindom™ is that digital personal assistant you have always wanted. 

We aim to bridge the gap and lag between research discoveries and parents to help ensure that your children get the support they deserve - as early as possible.


Kindom Features & Perks

Kindom™  is the 'all in one' parenting app. Check out the table below for an overview of features at each level (you can use this to select the Perks (headings) most relevant to you).


Kindom in The News

Helping our children should be easy!

We hear from parents that they often struggle to feel they have the resources they need to support their children effectively, have difficulty knowing where to begin, or find navigating their way through conflicting health, education and developmental opinions challenging.  

Parents discover a health care system full of specialists focused on specific conditions, and an education system designed as if one size fits all.  

Kindom™  breaks down these silos of information, and brings everything together in one unified place.

Most importantly, Kindom™  grows with your child.  The more that Kindom™  is used over time, the more valuable it becomes to you and your family and the more insight, support and resources, personalised to your specific needs, become available.

Who would use Kindom™

Whilst we think Kindom™ will be especially valued by parents who have a child with health, learning or developmental challenges, we have learnt from our research that most families will have benefits from the system. 
Here are a few examples of concerns parents and health / educations providers have raised with us, and why we have designed Kindom™.  
  • New parents find it hard to know how to track growth and remember when health checks or immunisations are due... is their child developing "normally"... they want access to milestones, reminders, immunisations and collaboration with professionals

  • Where do you start looking if one of your children suddenly seems to stop in his tracks
  • Multi-child families want to make sure they pay all their children the attention they deserve

  • Families who move to a new country (or state) struggle to explain or translate their intrinsic knowledge and it is even more difficult to access existing records if you are in a different country
The following are some specific stories from our community, and we would love to hear yours too.

Asthma / allergies: Self appointed father of the year
Having a child with asthma or allergies can be challenging. Not only do you need to keep track of symptoms, medication and effectiveness of the medication, you also need to communicate effectively with both the service providers and your partner. 


Four children - so much information to keep track of
Every child is unique and different, and when you have more than one or two, the challenge of keeping on top of every different situation and condition can seem insurmountable.

Dental journey: Being able to keep track of everything
Dental issues can have any number of causes. Being able to document and access everything in one place might reveal correlations you might not even have thought of, but that support the dentist to make an informed diagnosis.


Skin Conditions: Finding the right resources and specialists
With four children there are a lot of health and developmental issues. Like most families, it is always a challenge to find the right resources and help.  When you want to do the best by your child, it can be a very emotional journey.


"Dr Google" - Can  I trust the information and is it relevant?
With so much Information at our fingertips, how do you know what to trust and if it is relevant to you and your children?


Kindom™ Benefits

Kindom™ is like having your own personal parenting assistant.  

Kindom™ helps you identify gaps and strengths, enlist children in their own development, find qualified and relevant information sources, and communicate and share specific information with education and health service providers. 

Kindom™ enables you to gain an overview and meaningful insights into the developmental and experiential journeys of each family member over time and how they interrelate with each other.

.  


Whilst every parent could benefit from having their own personal assistant, we think it will be especially valued by parents who have a child with health, learning or developmental challenges.  We know that these parents have to deal with a whole lot more than other parents.  


What Kindom™ can do for YOU!



Secure online storage

One central and secure place where you can store all your child’s health and education records, developmental milestones and other important data, including those many memorable moments.  No more scrambling through filing cabinets to find your child’s immunisation records, the latest school reports, or photos you want to show your mum.

Access to records

We know that accessing data anywhere and at any time is vital for parents. Whether at home, at school, at your child’s doctor, or travelling the world, Kindom™ will enable you to access records instantly, allowing you to consult with educators, and update health professionals, no matter where you are.

 

Tools, Strategies and Resources for Parents

Sometimes the waiting periods for professional support can be months or even a year.  In the meantime, the chance to make a developmental difference is running out and, as a parent, you can feel helpless and frustrated.

Kindom™  can link you with local and online service providers relevant to your child's specific needs, as well as tools and strategies you can apply at home.   You will be able to use that critical waiting time to support your child's health, learning and developmental needs.

Privacy & Security

Security is the one thing that every parent has asked us about so far. Kindom™ adheres to some of the strictest privacy requirements in the world such as HIPAA/PHI and is built on privacy by design - which means we use bank level security as a minimum.  


Collaborating with specialists

We've been working with health and education providers to discover the best ways parents can advocate on behalf of their children.  Using the latest in cognitive technologies, Kindom™ draws on the information parents have collected and automatically translates it into a structure and format best suited to collaboration.  This ensures faster and more personalised assessment, diagnosis and treatment.

Insights, trends over time and correlations

One of the most powerful aspects of Kindom™ will be its ability to provide you with insights to identify ongoing correlations between different events and observations, visualising trends over time. It will help you to gain better understanding of patterns of health and behaviour in your child and demonstrate this information more clearly to health professionals and educators working with you.  

Informed Decisions

This is where Kindom really shines and brings the latest technology into your hands.

Imagine if you didn't have to sift through masses of information and conflicting opinions, not knowing which is most relevant to your family. Kindom™ automatically searches information you have provided, or that is pulled in from other sources (only accessible to you), matches that with the preferences you set, and uses the latest in cognitive technology (similar to Siri) to draw on an extensive knowledge bank.  Kindom™ is then able to help you analyse information, identify opportunities and issues, and make informed decisions relevant to your specific needs.

To accomplish this, we are developing partnerships with the world’s leading research institutions, health and education providers, along with quality service providers in areas near you.

We get very excited about the fact that this information will also enable parents and professionals to identify early indicators that need addressing and to put in place timely intervention strategies where needed.  
Let’s get on to it early!

Select your Perk or Donate to make Kindom™ a reality NOW!


Who's behind Kindom™ 

Kindom™  has grown out of the personal journeys of Catherine Resnick and Gry Stene.

Cath and Gry met at a young and innovative local service group, Rotary of Crawley (ROC), in 2010.  It soon became apparent that they shared a passion, vision and a drive to make a difference. 

Cath’s interest in developmental differences began when her own children experienced challenges.  Desperately seeking solutions, she read and researched extensively, went from ‘expert to expert”, attended numerous parenting courses and support groups. Her interest in children’s development, didn’t end there.  She later founded a drop in centre for at-risk youth and trained as a psychotherapist.

“I have been stunned to discover that parents are still dealing with same challenges I met back in 1992 - and they don’t need to.”

Gry came across it from a different angle. Her teenage dream was to become a doctor and work in Africa where she lived in her early teens. Her interest in science and technology  lead her to do a degree in the emerging  field of computer science, which she felt would be a more powerful enabler to fight inequality and poverty. Gry has always been involved with children and young people; as a big sister, mentor, foster carer and coach, and has had a hand in a number of initiatives aiming to empower and encourage those in need.

"The tools and technologies that are available today are just waiting for someone to apply them in a meaningful manner and that is what we are doing with Kindom."

We are passionate about ensuring that people have quality, relevant information at hand in a timely manner and in a form that is meaningful to them, and we are excited to be using technology as an enabler. We are setting up as a social enterprise that is focused on overall positive outcomes and social impact.

Cath has owned and run businesses for over 20 years and has spent the last 8 years consulting to high growth private and family businesses on strategic planning, performance management and governance.

Gry has immersed herself in the world of  integration and interoperability for the past 20 years.  She has led multicultural, cross-disciplinary teams across countries, designing and developing commercial products. Practising agile and lean UX / startup principles, she currently helps companies streamline their organisations for software innovation.  Gry has supplemented her technical skills with an MBA from UWA.  

Combining their expertise in getting systems, people and businesses to work together, Gry and Cath gathered years of research and data, and the idea of Kindom was born. 


Kindom™ To Date

The prototype testing - what we learnt

We’ve been researching for over a year now and our Kindom prototype testing clearly showed that most parents want to find the best pathways for their children. No surprises there.

But, parents told us they often didn't trust the information they were provided, they felt it wasn't relevant, or they didn't have a good way of collaborating with specialists where required.  

Other key findings from usability testing of our prototype were that if it wasn't obvious how to do something, the users didn't do it. Comments we hear from target users are "it has to be simple", "I need to be able to do it on the fly", "can you just make it work like my inbox", "I would like it to be like Facebook, but secure".

That’s why we have designed Kindom™ to address these problems.  

By incorporating the world’s latest research, best methods in child development and individual record keeping in the one app, we will make it so much easier for parents and for the professionals working with children.  

We know that better information and greater clarity will always improve outcomes - that’s the value of this app.  It drives what we all want - better outcomes for our children.

About The Perks!

Kindom™ Lite gives you a taster for the basic features including secure, central record keeping to store and retrieve your child’s milestones, health and education records, anywhere access, reminders & immunisations, safe sharing of select data, and 1 GB cloud storage (Est delivery October 2015).

Kindom™ Community extends Kindom™ Lite by allowing you to monitor development and remember significant milestones, understand where your child sits in comparison to their age and stage, reveal trends and patterns over time, and consult and share experiences with the community forum (Est delivery October 2015).


Kindom™ Insights, builds on Kindom™ Community by using all the data you have selected to generate personalised insights. It is a secure collaboration portal, ensuring that health and education providers have up to date and relevant information on which to base their assessments, diagnosis and treatment and provides parents direct access to tools, services and strategies relevant to their child’s needs. (Est delivery March 2016).

Kindom™ Decisions extends Kindom™ Insights and is like having your very own expert personal assistant for parenting!  Using the latest in cognitive technologies, Kindom™ Decisions brings the world of precision health and individualised education support into the hands of parents.  Drawing on a parent’s own insights, combined with world leading health and education resources, Kindom™ supports parents to make the best decisions for their child and their family.  Linking with quality resources and service providers ensures children receive personalised support at the earliest opportunity providing the greatest opportunity to reach their full potential. (Est delivery June 2016).


The ACCELERATED perks include TOBY Playpad,  a unique, therapist-and-parent designed Early Intervention application for children. It has been designed to help any child having difficulty with the early skills needed for learning.  TOBY stands for Therapy Outcomes By You, because it aims to empower parents to commence early intervention to maximize your child’s development. TOBY’s curriculum covers social skills, language, sensory discrimination, and cognitive skills.  It comes with a built-in reward system that reinforces learning, is based on evidence-based interventions and has been more than 5 years in development. (Est delivery August 2015).


How we will use the money

Primary Goal

If we reach our goal of $50,000, we can take our app from prototype to fully functional app with our new designs and start beta trials. The Kindom Lite  / Community app will let you store all your records in one central, secure place that you can access from anywhere and share securely (ETD Oct 2015).

Stretch Goal 2

With $100,000, we will be able to develop Kindom Insights, that gives you more advanced insights into your data and the ability to share the insights with health and education professionals. We connect to more systems to automatically load your data into Kindom  (ETD Mar 2016). 

Stretch Goal 3

We need $200,000 to develop the Kindom Decisions (Premium) with personalised decision support engine using artificial intelligence and commence beta trials (ETD Jun 2016). 


Now we need you to make this happen.  It take a village to raise a child and it takes a community to make sure we develop Kindom to give every child the opportunities they deserve to develop to their potential!!


So please select your perk and help us make Kindom a reality NOW!


Contact!

Contact us at info@kinchipsystems.co.

Subscribe to join the Kindom community. It's free.

Kindom™ Community extends Kindom™ Lite by allowing you to monitor development and remember significant milestones, understand where your child sits in comparison to their age and stage, reveal trends and patterns over time, and consult and share experiences with the community forum (Est delivery October 2015).




Kindom™ Insights, builds on Kindom™ Community by using all the data you have selected to generate personalised insights. It is a secure collaboration portal, ensuring that health and education providers have up to date and relevant information on which to base their assessments, diagnosis and treatment and provides parents direct access to tools, services and strategies relevant to their child’s needs. (Est delivery March 2016).



Kindom™ Decisions extends Kindom™ Insights and is like having your very own expert personal assistant for parenting!  Using the latest in cognitive technologies, Kindom™ Decisions brings the world of precision health and individualised education support into the hands of parents.  Drawing on a parent’s own insights, combined with world leading health and education resources, Kindom™ supports parents to make the best decisions for their child and their family.  Linking with quality resources and service providers ensures children receive personalised support at the earliest opportunity providing the greatest opportunity to reach their full potential. (Est delivery June 2016).



The ACCELERATED perks include TOBY Playpad,  a unique, therapist-and-parent designed Early Intervention application for children. It has been designed to help any child having difficulty with the early skills needed for learning.  TOBY stands for Therapy Outcomes By You, because it aims to empower parents to commence early intervention to maximize your child’s development. TOBY’s curriculum covers social skills, language, sensory discrimination, and cognitive skills.  It comes with a built-in reward system that reinforces learning, is based on evidence-based interventions and has been more than 5 years in development. (Est delivery August 2015).



How we will use the money


Primary Goal
If we reach our goal of $50,000, we can take our app from prototype to fully functional app with our new designs and start beta trials. The Kindom Lite  / Community app will let you store all your records in one central, secure place that you can access from anywhere and share securely (ETD Oct 2015).
Stretch Goal 2

With $100,000, we will be able to develop Kindom Insights, that gives you more advanced insights into your data and the ability to share the insights with health and education professionals. We connect to more systems to automatically load your data into Kindom  (ETD Mar 2016). 

Stretch Goal 3

We need $200,000 to develop the Kindom Decisions (Premium) with personalised decision support engine using artificial intelligence and commence beta trials (ETD Jun 2016). 

Now we need you to make this happen.  It take a village to raise a child and it takes a community to make sure we develop Kindom to give every child the opportunities they deserve to develop to their potential!!




So please select your perk and help us make Kindom a reality NOW!



Contact!
Contact us at info@kinchipsystems.co.
Subscribe to join the Kindom community. It's free.

story:
• We would like to present a new technology, how to dye textiles with fotosensitive colour.

  • After 30 years of work in textile industry, one old idea (how to change simple white t-shirt) came to life.

    This technology is new because color is dyed on textiles such as cotton, silk, polyester, nylon, wool an so on, in relation to existing work with print.

    Color reacts to UV-rays, it's harmless for health, and it does not lose intensity with washing on 30 degrees. Completely diferent and new, we feel that we came in front of the time. Time that need investment or investers. Time where we would like to buy machinery to make industrial, faster and much easier production, because so far we did it all by hands.

    Like it was mentoned before, we would like to produce whole new collection for year in advance, not only our collection, but collections of any other existing brand and producers that will be happy to have our magic color changing Technology.

  •                                **************************************

  • Magic touch of sunshine

    Check up our video and you'll be able to see magical color change!

  • By now...What we did?

As we are the only one company in the world who have managed to stabilize photosensitive colour for dyeing clothes, we have proven that our textile can change colour in whole or partially when exposed to the Sunlight. We did everything in our small studio with our extensive knowledge and experience to make our first collection.

We went to" Fashion Fair" where interest was shown by numerous clients from all over the world. Not just interest but we received orders,too.

After that we decided to join Indiegogo campaign to let world know about our magical NEW inovation.

Why do we need your investment...?

We would like to raise funds to enable us  to open up our own fabric dying and textile production.

With this campaign we aim to develop faster and more efficient mass production manufacture of our textiles. Rapidly expanding our business to provide jobs for the local community.

We need investment to buy special machinery, support us while we create new and exciting designs, and provide financial assistance with marketing,including visits to trade and fashion fairs.

To do that, we need Your help!

                               ****************************************

                       ***************************************

T-shirt “Colored explosion” $35


Hand made T-shirt:

-man: 100% cotton

-woman: 97% viscose & 3% elastine

When exposed to sunlight, blue design becomes visible.


                                          ***************************************





T-shirt “Selfie” $55


Hand made T-shirt:

-for man & woman: 100% cotton

When exposed to sunlight, the white T-shirt becomes coloured around selfie photo

You just need to send us any of your foto or design by e-mail. Simple as that!


                                    ***************************************



    *Delivery: shipping is not included


                                      ***************************************


IMPORTANT....EXTRAS

*It`s patented

*It`s 100% safe for your health

*handwash max 30 °C

*photosensitive colour does not wash off

*And will always make you happy with Glow Smile & Shine

                                    ***************************************

If you have any questions, comments or suggestions

Please let us know!


You can contact us at contactforyouangels@gmail.com

Like Us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/glowsmileandshine

story:
Intro

Over the past several years, we at Aaron High-Tech developed and released a cross-platform programming language called "8th".  It allows the programmer to write the program code just once, and using the same code, produce applications which run on Windows, OS X, Linux, Android, iOS and Raspberry Pi.

In the space of just under a year and a half, the 8th user-base has expanded to over seven-hundred, and continues growing at a healthy pace. Our forum is very active and our users have come to expect a high level of customer service from us, which we are proud to provide.

This campaign's goal is to help us raise the funds to expand the 8th family of supported hardware to include ARM embedded processors. Specifically, we are producing a board based on  a powerful STM32F756 Cortex-M7 microcontroller, which will be the first platform supported. 

This board will be a powerful yet low-power device, with special care given to security concerns.  You can find more details on the 8th forum.


With your contribution, we will be able to greatly expand our offering, and make 8th the "go-to" solution for comprehensive cross-platform programming needs.


What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $30,000 which will be entirely used to fund the R&D and testing needed to bring 8th to the board mentioned above.  The development process will take between 3 and 5 months once we've received the funds.


If we don't receive all the funds we are requesting, the development will simply take proportionately longer: we will still use whatever funds we receive to advance this development effort.


What do you get for your contribution?


Depending on the amount of your contribution, you may additionally get a license for embedded 8th (which allows you to produce unrestricted applications).  You will also get an embedded-8th board when it becomes available!


The embedded 8th license includes a separate license for the developer's edition of 8th.


The Impact

Your contribution will make it possible for us to create more embedded versions of 8th, much sooner than we would otherwise be able. 


Your contribution will enable embedded programmers to leverage the many advantages of 8th both in their embedded software as well as in the desktop or mobile software they use to control it.


We've been very successful in making 8th work for a wide range of hardware.  Come and help us extend it to the embedded world!


Risks & Challenges

A truly embedded version of 8th will have its own challenges.  We'll have to pare-down the functionality of the current version in order to make it fit.  We'll have to write some very low-level code to work without an operating-system.  


The ultimate goal is to have a version of 8th which is as similar to the full version as possible, but which provides support specific to the embedded platform on which it is running.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute money right now, that's OK -- we understand!  You can still help out by sharing information about our campaign and by using the Indiegogo share tools.

We appreciate your help!
