story:
Thai | French

Update Monday, May 30, 2016

Our program is now open to the resellers!
You can now easily buy a pack of devices, and resale them to your customers ( hotels, coffee shop... )
Every device comes with a subscription (3 or 12months).
You are free to sale the device, and it's subscription at the price that you want.
When the subscription is ended, the monthly price that you have to pay us is $29USD (and you still free to set up your own price for you customer).

Reseller 5 devices will be a Premium reseller and:
- get priority in customer service and support
- get priority suggestion features support
- be on the top of the list of our resellers with a link to their website or email

1. Introducing 12FreeWiFi

We believe that local businesses must ensure their presence on web local searches and for that, they firstly need good reviews, likes and shares. That’s why we have created the 12FreeWiFi box: a tiny router, providing Internet access to your customers through a captive social login page.


So, the system happens automatically during the login process enabling maximum information about your customers. Furthermore, with a fully customizable landing page, you can choose anything you want to display ( promotions, discounts, informations about future events, your Facebook page... )

Then, from your dashboard, boost your social reputation with our tools such as automatic email review sending, emailing campaigns for events, special offers...

Furthermore, you can easily manage your customer relationship with the help of an internal review form and the possibility to converse with your customers in order to solve any complaints, and keep your customers happy.

2. Who for?

  • Every company who wants to propose a free WiFi to their customers and ensure an online presence, as long as your customers have a reason to connect to your WiFi at your place.
    Companies can be: restaurants and cafes, retail stores, night clubs, hotels, franchises, health, fitness and beauty centers or shopping malls.
  • Everybody wants to start reseller activities. We will open our sofware to people who want to sell the device and it's subscription to companies (on our website only, after the Indiegogo campaign end).

3. Features

4. How does it work?


Contribute now and get a WiFi router

  • Plug the device to Internet.
  • In your 12FreeWiFi dashboard, create a captive login page, choose your social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, LinkedIn, or even just by email or SMS).
  • Define a landing page for your customers (Facebook page, sales page, personnal website, or create your own page)
  • Define some automations:
    • Send an email X days after a login for asking a review.
    • Ask your customers to rate your services.
    • Thank your customers for coming: increase your customer satisfaction.
  • Get more and better reviews on the most important websites for you (Tripadvisor, Yelp, Facebook...)
  • Improve your Local Search Engine Optimisation for your business.
  • Know your customers better.

5. When and how

6. Specifications

  • Wireless: 2.4GHZ 802.11b/g/n
  • MediaTek MT7620n
  • CPU speed: 580MHz
  • RAM: 64MB DDR
  • Wired: 2 x Ethernet 100 Mbps
  • Custom firmware based on OpenWRT
  • Own software to manage your hotspot

7. Stretch goals

  • 50k$: More stats about your customers and personalize their experience:
    • How long did they stay in your shop.
    • What time do they come the most often.
    • Personal message to your customer at the next login.
    • IFTTT connexion.
    • Set up lists groups of customers for a better target.
  • 75k$: Android app to manage your campaigns, captive login pages...
  • 100k$: Live communication tool B2C

8. The future

  • More stats, settings and social networks.
  • Other routers models for big structures or special needs.
  • Reward programs: keep a track of your customers orders, assign rewards points to their account.
  • 3g/4g device for your salons.
  • Any idea you would like to see :)

Contribute now and get a WiFi router

9. Our team

At 12FreeWiFi, our team is comprised of a mix of young and passionnate talents, representing over 30 years in web development, web marketing and network systems.
Our force is to be a multicultural company, as we are from Thailand, France and New Zealand, so we have to confront daily our ideas in order to find the best solutions.

10. Questions & Answers

Feel free to let us any question you could have in the comments section, and we will answer you here as soon as possible.

Q: Can I use my 12FreeWiFi Account before I get the 12FreeWiFi Box?

A: Yes! When this campaign is over, you will be able to create your account so that you can start taking a look at your dashboard, start making your social networks applications (not mandatory), start creating your captive login page...
When you receive your router, you can then activate your subscription.

Q: How can I help the 12FreeWiFi System become a reality?

A: In order to support us, tweet and share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter or Google+! Also, obviously, the best support you can give us is by becoming a backer and start this big adventure with us!


Contribute now and get a WiFi router

 

12FreeWifi

เปิดการตลาดใหม่ด้วยมุมมองที่ไม่เหมือนใครด้วย FreeWifi แบบอัตโนมัติ



อัพเดทเมื่อ วันจันทร์ที่ 30 พฤษภาคม 2016

พร้อมแล้ว! สำหรับตัวแทนจำหน่าย
โปรเจค 12freeWiFi พร้อมให้ตัวแทนจำหน่ายสั่งซื้อและนำไปขายได้ในราคาที่ต้องการ โดยมีให้เลือกแพ็คเกจสำหรับ 3 เดือน หรือ 12 เดือน เมื่อแพ็คเกจหมดอายุสามารถต่อแพ็คเกจกับเราในราคาพิเศษเพียง 980 บาท


1. 12FreeWiFi คืออะไร?

พวกเราเชื่อว่าธุรกิจของคุณจะถูกค้นหาเจอก่อนธุรกิจคู่แข่งของคุณอย่างแน่นอนจากเว็บค้นหาที่ถูกใช้งานบ่อยที่สุด และนั่นแหละ คือ การรีวิวที่ดี ไลค์และแชร์ธุรกิจของคุณ นี่คือเหตุผลว่าทำไมพวกเราถึงสร้าง 12FreeWifi ขึ้นมา ด้วยเราเตอร์ที่มีขนาดเล็กที่ให้บริการอินเทอร์เน็ตกับลูกค้าของคุณโดยเชื่อมต่อเข้าสู่ระบบผ่านโซเชียลมีเดีย เช่น Facebook Twitter Instagram Google+ Linkedln เป็นต้น 


คุณสามารถปรับแต่งหน้าโฆษณาของคุณได้อย่างเต็มที่ตามที่คุณต้องการ เช่น โปรโมชั่น ส่วนลด ข้อมูลการจัดกิจกรรมในอนาคต และบน Facebook ของธุรกิจของคุณเป็นต้น ดังนั้นเมื่อลูกค้าของคุณเชื่อมต่อกับ 12FreeWifi ระบบจะดำเนินการรวบรวมข้อมูลของลูกค้าที่เเป็นประโยชน์ต่อธุรกิจของคุณ 

โดยผ่านหน้า dashboard ซึ่งคุณ สามารถโปรโมทธุรกิจของคุณมีชื่อเสียงมากขึ้น โดยให้ลูกค้ามารีวิว ส่งอีเมล์แคมเปญให้ลูกค้า และส่งข้อเสนอพิเศษให้ลูกค้า.. 

นอกจากนี้ คุณสามารถ ดูแลความสัมพันธ์กับลูกค้า ของคุณได้ง่ายดายด้วยการคุยกับลูกค้าส่วนตัวผ่านระบบ เพื่อสอบถามความคิดเห็นลูกค้าเกี่ยวกับการบริการของคุณหรืออย่างอื่นตามต้องการ อีกทั้งคุณสามารถแก้ไขปัญหาให้กับลูกค้าได้ทันที สิ่งนี้แหละจะทำให้ลูกค้าของคุณแฮปปี้.

2. 12FreeWiFi เหมาะสำหรับใคร?

  • ทุกบริษัทที่ต้องการนำเสนอ FreeWifi ให้กับลูกค้าและเพิ่มสถานะการออนไลน์ให้กับสถานที่คุณให้ถูกค้นหามากขึ้น เช่น ธุรกิจร้านกาแฟ ร้านอาหาร โรงแรม สุขภาพ ฟิตเนส ศูนย์ความงาม ห้างสรรพสินค้า หรือธุรกิจแฟรนไชส์ เป็นต้น
  • ทุกคนที่ต้องการจะเริ่มต้นเป็นตัวแทนจำหน่ายกับเรา เราจะเปิดซอฟต์แวร์ของเราให้กับผู้ที่ต้องการที่จะขายอุปกรณ์โดยคุณสามารถทำการสมัครเป็นสมาชิกกับเราได้(บนเว็บไซต์ของเราเท่านั้น หลังจากผ่านเคมเปญ Indiegogo จบลง).

สนับสนุนเรา!

3. คุณสมบัติ

4. 12FreeWiFi ทำงานอย่างไร?


  • เสียบอุปกรณ์ต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต
  • ในส่วน 12FreeWifi dashboard ของคุณ ทำการสร้างหน้า Login และเลือกโซเชียลเน็ตเวิร์คที่คุณต้องการ (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, LinkedIn, หรือแม้เพียงแค่ทางอีเมล์ หรือ SMS)
  • ออกแบบหน้าโฆษณาของคุณที่คุณต้องการ เช่น เพจ Facebook, หน้าโฆษณา, เว็บไซต์ส่วนตัว หรือ สร้างเพจส่วนตัว)
  • ตั้งค่าอัตโนมัติ:
    • หลังจากที่ลูกค้า login สามารถส่งอีเมล์เพื่อขอความคิดเห็นได้
    • ถามลูกค้าเกี่ยวกับคะแนนความพึงพอใจ สำหรับการบริการ
    • ขอบคุณลูกค้าที่มาใช้บริการ
  • ได้รับการรีวิวไปทางที่ดีมากขึ้นบนเว็บไซต์ต่างๆ (TripAdvisor, Facebook...)
  • เพิ่มประสิทธิภาพการค้นหาตำแหน่งธุรกิจของคุณผ่านสื่อสังคมออนไลน์
  • เข้าใจความต้องการของลูกค้า และนำมาเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพให้กับธุรกิจ

สนับสนุนเรา!

5. เมื่อไหร่และอย่างไร?

6. รายละเอียด

    ไวเลส: 2.4GHZ 802.11b/g/n
  • MediaTek MT7620n
  • ความเร็ว CPU : 580MHz
  • หน่วยความจำ: 64MB DDR
  • อินเตอร์เน็ต: 2 x Ethernet 100 Mbps
  • ปรับแต่งเฟิร์มแวร์ บนพื้นฐาน OpenWRT
  • ซอฟต์แวร์จัดการระบบ wifi

7. เป้าหมาย

  • 50k$: สถิติอื่นๆ เกี่ยวกับลูกค้าและผลตอบรับต่างๆ :
    • ลูกค้าอยู่ในร้านคุณนานเท่าไหร่
    • ช่วงเวลาไหนที่ลูกค้ามาประจำ
    • ส่งข้อความส่วนตัวเมื่อลูกค้าเข้าสู่ระบบครั้งต่อไป
    • การเชื่อมต่อระบบ IFTTT
    • จัดการแยกกลุ่มลูกค้าเพื่อเลือกแคมเปญที่ดีขึ้นในอนาคต
  • 75k$: แอพพลิเคชั่นสำหรับแอนดรอยด์เพื่อจัดการแคมเปญและตรวจสอบสถิติผ่านหน้าจอมือถือ
  • 100k$: เครื่องมือการสนทนาสดระหว่างคุณกับลูกค้า

สนับสนุนเรา!

8. ในอนาคต

  • สถิติอื่น ๆ การตั้งค่าและ เครือข่ายทางสังคม ( Weibo กำลังจะมาเร็ว ๆ นี้ )
  • รุ่นเราเตอร์อื่น ๆ สำหรับโครงสร้างขนาดใหญ่ หรือ ความต้องการพิเศษ
  • โปรแกรมตอบแทนลูกค้าสมาชิก : ติดตามการสั่งซื้อของลูกค้าของคุณ และส่งโปรโมชั่นถึงสมาชิกตามคะแนนสะสม
  • เราเตอร์รองรับ 3G/4G
  • ทุกความคิดเห็นที่คุณต้องการ :)

9. ทีมงานของเรา

ทีมงาน 12FreeWifi ทีมงานของเราประกอบไปด้วยบุคคลที่เต็มไปด้วยความสามารถและ เชี่ยวชาญในด้านสาขาของตนซึ่งมีประสบการณ์มากกว่า 30 ปีทั้ง ด้านการตลาดออนไลน์ ด้านการพัฒนาเว็บไซต์ และ ระบบเครือข่าย.

พวกเราเป็นบริษัทที่มีความหลากหลายทางวัฒนธรรม จากประเทศไทย ฝรั่งเศส และนิวซีแลนด์ ดังนั้นพวกเราจึงมีความคิดที่จะพัฒนาและแก้ไขปัญาให้มีคุณภาพที่สุด

10. ถาม & ตอบ

คุณมีอิสระที่จะตั้งคำถามใด ๆ ที่คุณต้องการ เราจะพยายามที่จะตอบคุณโดยเร็วที่สุด

ถาม: ฉันสามารถสร้างบัญชีใช้งาน 12FreeWifi ก่อนที่จะได้กล่อง 12FreeWifi ได้หรือไม่?

ตอบ: แน่นอน! เมื่อไหร่ที่แคญเปญนี้จบลง คุณจะสามารถสร้างบัญชีของคุณเพื่อเริ่มใช้งาน dashboard ของคุณ อีกทั้งสามารถเริ่มทำแอพพลิเคชั่นบนโซเชียลเน็ตเวิร์คต่างๆ ของคุณได้ และคุณยังสามารถสร้างหน้าล็อคอินของคุณได้อีกด้วย
จากนั้น เมื่อคุณได้รับเราเตอร์แล้ว คุณถึงสามารถเปิดใช้งานระบบสมาชิกได้อย่างสมบูรณ์

ถาม: ฉันสามารถช่วยให้ระบบ 12FreeWifi ใช้งานได้จริงโดยวิธีไหนบ้าง

ตอบ: เพื่อที่จะสนับสนุนเรา เพียงแค่คุณ tweet และ แชร์แคญเปญนี้บน Facebook, Twitter หรือ Google+! นอกจากนี้จะเห็นได้ชัดว่า การสนับสนุนที่ยิ่งใหญ่ของคุณจะกลายเป็นจุดเริ่มต้นที่ยิ่งใหญ่ของพวกเรา!


สนับสนุนเรา!

12FreeWiFi

Transformez votre Wi-Fi actuel en machine marketing automatique.

Mise a jour le lundi 30 mai 2016

notre programme est desormais ouvert aux revendeurs !
Vous avez desormais la possibilite d'acheter plusieurs appareils en une seule fois, et de les revendre a vos propres clients ( hotels, cafe, bar... )
Chaque routeur est livre avec un abonnement ( 3 ou 12 mois )
Vous etes libre de vendre les routeurs, mais aussi l'abonnement mensuel au prix de votre choix.
Une fois l'abonnement inclus de bas termine, le prix mensuel par appareil sera de 29 USD (et vous continuez d'etre libre de fixer vos propres prix a vos clients ).

Les acheteurs du pack 5 routeurs seront premium et auront:
- priorite au niveau du support clientele
- priorite dans la suggestion et l'implementation de nouvelles fonctionnalites
- seront en top de notre liste des revendeurs avec un lien vers leur site Internet ou leur email

1. 12FreeWiFi c'est quoi ?

Nous pensons que les commerces de proximité se doivent désormais d'assurer leur présence sur les résultats des moteurs de recherche au niveau local, et pour cela, ils ont tout d'abord besoin de bonnes critiques sur les sites spécialisés, mais aussi de "likes" et de partages. C'est pourquoi nous avons imaginé 12FreeWiFi : un petit routeur qui crée un point Wi-Fi pour vos clients, qui vont devoir se connecter au travers d'un login sur un réseau social.


Ainsi, le système capture automatiquement pour vous, durant le processus de connexion, le maximum d'informations à propos de vos clients. De plus, avec une page de destination complètement customisable, vous pouvez proposer à vos clients toute information que vous souhaitez ( des promotions, des réductions, des informations à propos d'un futur évènement, votre page facebook... )

Ensuite, grâce à votre tableau de bord, boostez votre réputation online avec nos différents outils marketing tels que l'envoi automatique d'emails X jours après une connexion, la gestion de campagnes d'emailing pour vos évènements, vos offres spéciales...

Vous pouvez également gérer vos retours clients grâce à un formulaire de satisfaction, et la possibilité de converser avec eux afin de résoudre tout problème le plus tôt possible, et ainsi garder une satisfaction clientèle maximale.

2. Pour qui ?

  • Toute entreprise qui souhaite proposer le Wi-Fi gratuitement à ses clients et augmenter sa présence en ligne. Les entreprises peuvent être : des restaurants ou cafés, des hôtels, des franchises, des lieux dédiés aux soins ou au bien-être, des boites de nuits, des centres de fitness...
  • Toute personne voulant démarrer une activité de revendeur. Nous allons en effet ouvrir notre solution de marketing automatique aux personnes voulant revendre le router et son abonnement à d'autres compagnies ( cela se fera sur notre site Internet uniquement, après la campagne Indiegogo ) .

Soutenez ce projet et obtenez un routeur WiFi en contrepartie

3. Caractéristiques du service

4. Comment ça marche ?

  • Connectez le routeur à votre box Internet.
  • Dans votre panneau de contrôle 12FreeWiFi, créez une page de connexion, choisissez les réseaux sociaux à proposer ( Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, LinkedIn, ou simplement par email ou même SMS ).
  • Définissez une page d'arrivée après un login réussi : une page Facebook, une page de vente, un site Internet ou créez votre propre page.
  • Définissez des automatismes :
    • Envoyer un email X jours après un login pour demander de noter votre service ou de laisser un commentaire sur un site de votre choix.
    • Envoyez des promotions ou prévenez d'un évènement spécial.
    • Remerciez tout simplement vos clients d'être venus : augmentez la satisfaction clientèle et fidélisez-les.
  • Obtenez de meilleurs et plus nombreux avis sur les sites qui comptent pour vous ( TripAdvisor, LaFourchette, Facebook... )
  • Améliorez votre position sur les recherches locales des moteurs Internet.

Soutenez ce projet et obtenez un routeur WiFi en contrepartie

5. Quand et comment ?

6. Caractéristiques du router

  • WiFi : 2.4GHZ 802.11b/g/n
  • MediaTek MT7620n
  • Vitesse processeur : 580MHz
  • RAM: 64MB DDR
  • Connexion : 2 x Ethernet 100 Mbps
  • Système d'exploitation basé sur un OpenWRT modifié
  • Logiciel Internet developpé par notre équipe pour gérer votre point Wi-Fi

7. Objectifs

  • 50k$ : Plus de statistiques disponibles à propos de vos clients et la possibilité de mieux personnaliser leur expérience :
    • Combien de temps sont-ils restés dans votre magasin ?
    • A quels moment de la journée sont-ils le plus nombreux ?
    • Personnalisez le message adressé à votre client à sa prochaine connexion.
    • Possibilité d'utiliser IFTTT.
    • Regroupez vos clients en groupe afin de mieux cibler vos futures campagnes.
  • 75k$ : Une application Android afin de manager depuis votre téléphone vos campagnes et accéder a vos statistiques.
  • 100k$ : Outil de communication Wi-Fi B2C

Soutenez ce projet et obtenez un routeur WiFi en contrepartie

8. Dans le futur

  • Plus de stats, plus d'options, de nouveaux réseaux sociaux ajoutés...
  • D'autres modèles de routeurs pour les très grosses structures ou pour des besoins particuliers.
  • Programme de fidelité : gardez une trace des achats de vos clients sans besoin d'une carte physique, et envoyez leur sur leur mobile des promotions en fonctions de leurs achats passés.
  • Routeur compatible 3g/4g afin d'être mobile ( pour des salons par exemple ).
  • Toute idée que vous souhaiteriez voir :)

9. Notre équipe

À 12FreeWiFi, notre équipe est composée de jeunes et talentueuses personnes, passionnées par leur domaine, et qui représentent plus de 30 ans dans les domaines du marketing online, du dévelopemenent web et des systèmes réseaux.
Une de nos force est d'être une entreprise multi-culturelle : nous sommes en effet ici issus de différents pays, à savoir la Thaïlande, la France et la Nouvelle-Zélande, ce qui nous pousse à confronter quotidiennement nos idées afin de trouver les meilleures solutions.

10. Foire aux questions

Vous êtes libres de nous poser toutes les questions que vous souhaitez dans les commentaires, nous essaierons de vous répondre aussi vite que possible

Question : Puis-je utiliser mon compte 12FreeWiFi avant de recevoir mon routeur ?

Réponse : Absolument ! Dès que la campagne sera finie, vous serez en mesure de créer votre compte sur notre espace membre, et commencer à vous familiariser avec l'interface de gestion ( et même déja personnaliser les pages de connexion pour vos clients, vos réseaux sociaux... )
Une fois le routeur en votre possession, vous pourrez activer votre abonnement, et utiliser le produit en quelques minutes seulement !

Question : Comment puis-je aider 12FreeWiFi ?

Réponse : Pour nous aider, vous pouvez partager notre campagne sur les réseaux sociaux que sont Facebook, Twitter ou Google+. Bien entendu, la meilleure facon est encore de participer à cette campagne, et de nous rejoindre dans l'aventure !


Soutenez ce projet et obtenez un routeur WiFi en contrepartie
story_txt:
Thai |  French


Update Monday, May 30, 2016
Our program is now open to the resellers!
You can now easily buy a pack of devices, and resale them to your customers ( hotels, coffee shop... )
Every device comes with a subscription (3 or 12months).
You are free to sale the device, and it's subscription at the price that you want.
When the subscription is ended, the monthly price that you have to pay us is $29USD (and you still free to set up your own price for you customer).
Reseller 5 devices will be a Premium reseller and: 
- get priority in customer service and support 
- get priority suggestion features support 
- be on the top of the list of our resellers with a link to their website or email 

1. Introducing 12FreeWiFi
We believe that local businesses must ensure their presence on web local searches and for that, they firstly need good reviews, likes and shares. That’s why we have created the 12FreeWiFi box: a tiny router, providing Internet access to your customers through a captive social login page.





So, the system happens automatically during the login process enabling maximum information about your customers. Furthermore, with a fully customizable landing page, you can choose anything you want to display ( promotions, discounts, informations about future events, your Facebook page... )

Then, from your dashboard, boost your social reputation with our tools such as automatic email review sending, emailing campaigns for events, special offers...

Furthermore, you can easily manage your customer relationship with the help of an internal review form and the possibility to converse with your customers in order to solve any complaints, and keep your customers happy.




2. Who for?


Every company who wants to propose a free WiFi to their customers and ensure an online presence, as long as your customers have a reason to connect to your WiFi at your place.
Companies can be: restaurants and cafes, retail stores, night clubs, hotels, franchises, health, fitness and beauty centers or shopping malls. 
Everybody wants to start reseller activities. We will open our sofware to people who want to sell the device and it's subscription to companies (on our website only, after the Indiegogo campaign end).

3. Features



4. How does it work?




Contribute now and get a WiFi router


Plug the device to Internet.
In your 12FreeWiFi dashboard, create a captive login page, choose your social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, LinkedIn, or even just by email or SMS).
Define a landing page for your customers (Facebook page, sales page, personnal website, or create your own page)
Define some automations:
        
Send an email X days after a login for asking a review.
Ask your customers to rate your services.
Thank your customers for coming: increase your customer satisfaction.


Get more and better reviews on the most important websites for you (Tripadvisor, Yelp, Facebook...)
Improve your Local Search Engine Optimisation for your business.
Know your customers better.

5. When and how



6. Specifications


Wireless: 2.4GHZ 802.11b/g/n
MediaTek MT7620n
CPU speed: 580MHz
RAM: 64MB DDR
Wired: 2 x Ethernet 100 Mbps
Custom firmware based on OpenWRT
Own software to manage your hotspot

7. Stretch goals



50k$: More stats about your customers and personalize their experience: 
      
How long did they stay in your shop.
What time do they come the most often.
Personal message to your customer at the next login.
IFTTT connexion.
Set up lists groups of customers for a better target.



75k$: Android app to manage your campaigns, captive login pages...

100k$: Live communication tool B2C

8. The future


More stats, settings and social networks.
Other routers models for big structures or special needs.
Reward programs: keep a track of your customers orders, assign rewards points to their account.
3g/4g device for your salons.
Any idea you would like to see :)


Contribute now and get a WiFi router
9. Our team
At 12FreeWiFi, our team is comprised of a mix of young and passionnate talents, representing over 30 years in web development, web marketing and network systems.

Our force is to be a multicultural company, as we are from Thailand, France and New Zealand, so we have to confront daily our ideas in order to find the best solutions.



10. Questions & Answers

Feel free to let us any question you could have in the comments section, and we will answer you here as soon as possible.

Q: Can I use my 12FreeWiFi Account before I get the 12FreeWiFi Box?
A: Yes! When this campaign is over, you will be able to create your account so that you can start taking a look at your dashboard, start making your social networks applications (not mandatory), start creating your captive login page...
When you receive your router, you can then activate your subscription.

Q: How can I help the 12FreeWiFi System become a reality?
A: In order to support us, tweet and share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter or Google+! Also, obviously, the best support you can give us is by becoming a backer and start this big adventure with us!

Contribute now and get a WiFi router

 




 12FreeWifi
เปิดการตลาดใหม่ด้วยมุมมองที่ไม่เหมือนใครด้วย FreeWifi แบบอัตโนมัติ



อัพเดทเมื่อ วันจันทร์ที่ 30 พฤษภาคม 2016
พร้อมแล้ว! สำหรับตัวแทนจำหน่าย
โปรเจค 12freeWiFi พร้อมให้ตัวแทนจำหน่ายสั่งซื้อและนำไปขายได้ในราคาที่ต้องการ โดยมีให้เลือกแพ็คเกจสำหรับ 3 เดือน หรือ 12 เดือน เมื่อแพ็คเกจหมดอายุสามารถต่อแพ็คเกจกับเราในราคาพิเศษเพียง 980 บาท

1. 12FreeWiFi คืออะไร?
พวกเราเชื่อว่าธุรกิจของคุณจะถูกค้นหาเจอก่อนธุรกิจคู่แข่งของคุณอย่างแน่นอนจากเว็บค้นหาที่ถูกใช้งานบ่อยที่สุด และนั่นแหละ คือ การรีวิวที่ดี ไลค์และแชร์ธุรกิจของคุณ นี่คือเหตุผลว่าทำไมพวกเราถึงสร้าง 12FreeWifi ขึ้นมา ด้วยเราเตอร์ที่มีขนาดเล็กที่ให้บริการอินเทอร์เน็ตกับลูกค้าของคุณโดยเชื่อมต่อเข้าสู่ระบบผ่านโซเชียลมีเดีย เช่น Facebook Twitter Instagram Google+ Linkedln เป็นต้น 





คุณสามารถปรับแต่งหน้าโฆษณาของคุณได้อย่างเต็มที่ตามที่คุณต้องการ เช่น โปรโมชั่น ส่วนลด ข้อมูลการจัดกิจกรรมในอนาคต และบน Facebook ของธุรกิจของคุณเป็นต้น ดังนั้นเมื่อลูกค้าของคุณเชื่อมต่อกับ 12FreeWifi ระบบจะดำเนินการรวบรวมข้อมูลของลูกค้าที่เเป็นประโยชน์ต่อธุรกิจของคุณ โดยผ่านหน้า dashboard ซึ่งคุณ สามารถโปรโมทธุรกิจของคุณมีชื่อเสียงมากขึ้น โดยให้ลูกค้ามารีวิว ส่งอีเมล์แคมเปญให้ลูกค้า และส่งข้อเสนอพิเศษให้ลูกค้า.. นอกจากนี้ คุณสามารถ ดูแลความสัมพันธ์กับลูกค้า ของคุณได้ง่ายดายด้วยการคุยกับลูกค้าส่วนตัวผ่านระบบ เพื่อสอบถามความคิดเห็นลูกค้าเกี่ยวกับการบริการของคุณหรืออย่างอื่นตามต้องการ อีกทั้งคุณสามารถแก้ไขปัญหาให้กับลูกค้าได้ทันที สิ่งนี้แหละจะทำให้ลูกค้าของคุณแฮปปี้.




2. 12FreeWiFi เหมาะสำหรับใคร?


ทุกบริษัทที่ต้องการนำเสนอ FreeWifi ให้กับลูกค้าและเพิ่มสถานะการออนไลน์ให้กับสถานที่คุณให้ถูกค้นหามากขึ้น เช่น ธุรกิจร้านกาแฟ ร้านอาหาร โรงแรม สุขภาพ ฟิตเนส ศูนย์ความงาม ห้างสรรพสินค้า หรือธุรกิจแฟรนไชส์ เป็นต้น

ทุกคนที่ต้องการจะเริ่มต้นเป็นตัวแทนจำหน่ายกับเรา เราจะเปิดซอฟต์แวร์ของเราให้กับผู้ที่ต้องการที่จะขายอุปกรณ์โดยคุณสามารถทำการสมัครเป็นสมาชิกกับเราได้(บนเว็บไซต์ของเราเท่านั้น หลังจากผ่านเคมเปญ Indiegogo จบลง).


สนับสนุนเรา!
3. คุณสมบัติ



4. 12FreeWiFi ทำงานอย่างไร?


เสียบอุปกรณ์ต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต
ในส่วน 12FreeWifi dashboard ของคุณ ทำการสร้างหน้า Login และเลือกโซเชียลเน็ตเวิร์คที่คุณต้องการ (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, LinkedIn, หรือแม้เพียงแค่ทางอีเมล์ หรือ SMS)
ออกแบบหน้าโฆษณาของคุณที่คุณต้องการ เช่น  เพจ Facebook, หน้าโฆษณา, เว็บไซต์ส่วนตัว  หรือ  สร้างเพจส่วนตัว)
ตั้งค่าอัตโนมัติ:
        
หลังจากที่ลูกค้า login สามารถส่งอีเมล์เพื่อขอความคิดเห็นได้
ถามลูกค้าเกี่ยวกับคะแนนความพึงพอใจ สำหรับการบริการ
ขอบคุณลูกค้าที่มาใช้บริการ


ได้รับการรีวิวไปทางที่ดีมากขึ้นบนเว็บไซต์ต่างๆ (TripAdvisor, Facebook...)
เพิ่มประสิทธิภาพการค้นหาตำแหน่งธุรกิจของคุณผ่านสื่อสังคมออนไลน์
เข้าใจความต้องการของลูกค้า และนำมาเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพให้กับธุรกิจ

สนับสนุนเรา!
5. เมื่อไหร่และอย่างไร?



6. รายละเอียด

	ไวเลส: 2.4GHZ 802.11b/g/n
	MediaTek MT7620n
ความเร็ว CPU : 580MHz
หน่วยความจำ: 64MB DDR
อินเตอร์เน็ต: 2 x Ethernet 100 Mbps
ปรับแต่งเฟิร์มแวร์ บนพื้นฐาน OpenWRT
ซอฟต์แวร์จัดการระบบ wifi

7. เป้าหมาย



50k$: สถิติอื่นๆ เกี่ยวกับลูกค้าและผลตอบรับต่างๆ : 
      
ลูกค้าอยู่ในร้านคุณนานเท่าไหร่
ช่วงเวลาไหนที่ลูกค้ามาประจำ
ส่งข้อความส่วนตัวเมื่อลูกค้าเข้าสู่ระบบครั้งต่อไป
การเชื่อมต่อระบบ IFTTT 
จัดการแยกกลุ่มลูกค้าเพื่อเลือกแคมเปญที่ดีขึ้นในอนาคต



75k$: แอพพลิเคชั่นสำหรับแอนดรอยด์เพื่อจัดการแคมเปญและตรวจสอบสถิติผ่านหน้าจอมือถือ

100k$: เครื่องมือการสนทนาสดระหว่างคุณกับลูกค้า

สนับสนุนเรา!
8. ในอนาคต

สถิติอื่น ๆ  การตั้งค่าและ เครือข่ายทางสังคม ( Weibo กำลังจะมาเร็ว ๆ นี้ )
รุ่นเราเตอร์อื่น ๆ สำหรับโครงสร้างขนาดใหญ่ หรือ ความต้องการพิเศษ
โปรแกรมตอบแทนลูกค้าสมาชิก : ติดตามการสั่งซื้อของลูกค้าของคุณ และส่งโปรโมชั่นถึงสมาชิกตามคะแนนสะสม
เราเตอร์รองรับ 3G/4G
ทุกความคิดเห็นที่คุณต้องการ  :)

9.  ทีมงานของเรา
ทีมงาน 12FreeWifi ทีมงานของเราประกอบไปด้วยบุคคลที่เต็มไปด้วยความสามารถและ เชี่ยวชาญในด้านสาขาของตนซึ่งมีประสบการณ์มากกว่า 30 ปีทั้ง ด้านการตลาดออนไลน์  ด้านการพัฒนาเว็บไซต์ และ ระบบเครือข่าย. 
พวกเราเป็นบริษัทที่มีความหลากหลายทางวัฒนธรรม จากประเทศไทย ฝรั่งเศส และนิวซีแลนด์ ดังนั้นพวกเราจึงมีความคิดที่จะพัฒนาและแก้ไขปัญาให้มีคุณภาพที่สุด



10. ถาม & ตอบ

คุณมีอิสระที่จะตั้งคำถามใด ๆ ที่คุณต้องการ เราจะพยายามที่จะตอบคุณโดยเร็วที่สุด
ถาม: ฉันสามารถสร้างบัญชีใช้งาน 12FreeWifi ก่อนที่จะได้กล่อง 12FreeWifi ได้หรือไม่?
ตอบ: แน่นอน! เมื่อไหร่ที่แคญเปญนี้จบลง คุณจะสามารถสร้างบัญชีของคุณเพื่อเริ่มใช้งาน dashboard ของคุณ อีกทั้งสามารถเริ่มทำแอพพลิเคชั่นบนโซเชียลเน็ตเวิร์คต่างๆ ของคุณได้ และคุณยังสามารถสร้างหน้าล็อคอินของคุณได้อีกด้วย
จากนั้น เมื่อคุณได้รับเราเตอร์แล้ว คุณถึงสามารถเปิดใช้งานระบบสมาชิกได้อย่างสมบูรณ์

ถาม: ฉันสามารถช่วยให้ระบบ 12FreeWifi ใช้งานได้จริงโดยวิธีไหนบ้าง
ตอบ: เพื่อที่จะสนับสนุนเรา เพียงแค่คุณ tweet และ แชร์แคญเปญนี้บน Facebook, Twitter หรือ Google+! นอกจากนี้จะเห็นได้ชัดว่า การสนับสนุนที่ยิ่งใหญ่ของคุณจะกลายเป็นจุดเริ่มต้นที่ยิ่งใหญ่ของพวกเรา!
สนับสนุนเรา!



 12FreeWiFi
Transformez votre Wi-Fi actuel en machine marketing automatique.
Mise a jour le lundi 30 mai 2016
notre programme est desormais ouvert aux revendeurs !
Vous avez desormais la possibilite d'acheter plusieurs appareils en une seule fois, et de les revendre a vos propres clients ( hotels, cafe, bar... )
Chaque routeur est livre avec un abonnement ( 3 ou 12 mois )
Vous etes libre de vendre les routeurs, mais aussi l'abonnement mensuel au prix de votre choix.
Une fois l'abonnement inclus de bas termine, le prix mensuel par appareil sera de 29 USD (et vous continuez d'etre libre de fixer vos propres prix a vos clients ).
Les acheteurs du pack 5 routeurs seront premium et auront: 
- priorite au niveau du support clientele 
- priorite dans la suggestion et l'implementation de nouvelles fonctionnalites 
- seront en top de notre liste des revendeurs avec un lien vers leur site Internet ou leur email 

1. 12FreeWiFi c'est quoi ?
Nous pensons que les commerces de proximité se doivent désormais d'assurer leur présence sur les résultats des moteurs de recherche au niveau local, et pour cela, ils ont tout d'abord besoin de bonnes critiques sur les sites spécialisés, mais aussi de "likes" et de partages. C'est pourquoi nous avons imaginé 12FreeWiFi : un petit routeur qui crée un point Wi-Fi pour vos clients, qui vont devoir se connecter au travers d'un login sur un réseau social.





Ainsi, le système capture automatiquement pour vous, durant le processus de connexion, le maximum d'informations à propos de vos clients. De plus, avec une page de destination complètement customisable, vous pouvez proposer à vos clients toute information que vous souhaitez ( des promotions, des réductions, des informations à propos d'un futur évènement, votre page facebook... )

Ensuite, grâce à votre tableau de bord, boostez votre réputation online avec nos différents outils marketing tels que l'envoi automatique d'emails X jours après une connexion, la gestion de campagnes d'emailing pour vos évènements, vos offres spéciales... 

Vous pouvez également gérer vos retours clients grâce à un formulaire de satisfaction, et la possibilité de converser avec eux afin de résoudre tout problème le plus tôt possible, et ainsi garder une satisfaction clientèle maximale.




2. Pour qui ?


Toute entreprise qui souhaite proposer le Wi-Fi gratuitement à ses clients et augmenter sa présence en ligne. Les entreprises peuvent être : des restaurants ou cafés, des hôtels, des franchises, des lieux dédiés aux soins ou au bien-être, des boites de nuits, des centres de fitness...

Toute personne voulant démarrer une activité de revendeur. Nous allons en effet ouvrir notre solution de marketing automatique  aux personnes voulant revendre le router et son abonnement à d'autres compagnies ( cela se fera sur notre site Internet uniquement, après la campagne Indiegogo ) .

Soutenez ce projet et obtenez un routeur WiFi en contrepartie
3. Caractéristiques du service



4. Comment ça marche ?





Connectez le routeur à votre box Internet.
Dans votre panneau de contrôle 12FreeWiFi, créez une page de connexion, choisissez les réseaux sociaux à proposer ( Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, LinkedIn, ou simplement par email ou même SMS ).
Définissez une page d'arrivée après un login réussi : une page Facebook, une page de vente, un site Internet ou créez votre propre page.

Définissez des automatismes :
        
Envoyer un email X jours après un login pour demander de noter votre service ou de laisser un commentaire sur un site de votre choix.
Envoyez des promotions ou prévenez d'un évènement spécial.
Remerciez tout simplement vos clients d'être venus : augmentez la satisfaction clientèle et fidélisez-les.


Obtenez de meilleurs et plus nombreux avis sur les sites qui comptent pour vous ( TripAdvisor, LaFourchette, Facebook... )
Améliorez votre position sur les recherches locales des moteurs Internet.


Soutenez ce projet et obtenez un routeur WiFi en contrepartie
5. Quand et comment ?



6. Caractéristiques du router


WiFi : 2.4GHZ 802.11b/g/n
MediaTek MT7620n
Vitesse processeur : 580MHz
RAM: 64MB DDR
Connexion : 2 x Ethernet 100 Mbps
Système d'exploitation basé sur un OpenWRT modifié
Logiciel Internet developpé par notre équipe pour gérer votre point Wi-Fi 

7. Objectifs



50k$ : Plus de statistiques disponibles à propos de vos clients et la possibilité de mieux personnaliser leur expérience :
      
Combien de temps sont-ils restés dans votre magasin ?
A quels moment de la journée sont-ils le plus nombreux ?
Personnalisez le message adressé à votre client à sa prochaine connexion.
Possibilité d'utiliser IFTTT.
Regroupez vos clients en groupe afin de mieux cibler vos futures campagnes.



75k$ : Une application Android afin de manager depuis votre téléphone vos campagnes et accéder a vos statistiques.

100k$ : Outil de communication Wi-Fi B2C


Soutenez ce projet et obtenez un routeur WiFi en contrepartie
8. Dans le futur


Plus de stats, plus d'options, de nouveaux réseaux sociaux ajoutés...
D'autres modèles de routeurs pour les très grosses structures ou pour des besoins particuliers.
Programme de fidelité : gardez une trace des achats de vos clients sans besoin d'une carte physique, et envoyez leur sur leur mobile des promotions en fonctions de leurs achats passés.
Routeur compatible 3g/4g afin d'être mobile ( pour des salons par exemple ).
Toute idée que vous souhaiteriez voir :)

9. Notre équipe
À 12FreeWiFi, notre équipe est composée de jeunes et talentueuses personnes, passionnées par leur domaine, et qui représentent plus de 30 ans dans les domaines du marketing online, du dévelopemenent web et des systèmes réseaux.
Une de nos force est d'être une entreprise multi-culturelle : nous sommes en effet ici issus de différents pays, à savoir la Thaïlande, la France et la Nouvelle-Zélande, ce qui nous pousse à confronter quotidiennement nos idées afin de trouver les meilleures solutions.



10. Foire aux questions

Vous êtes libres de nous poser toutes les questions que vous souhaitez dans les commentaires, nous essaierons de vous répondre aussi vite que possible

Question : Puis-je utiliser mon compte 12FreeWiFi avant de recevoir mon routeur ?
Réponse : Absolument ! Dès que la campagne sera finie, vous serez en mesure de créer votre compte sur notre espace membre, et commencer à vous familiariser avec l'interface de gestion ( et même déja personnaliser les pages de connexion pour vos clients, vos réseaux sociaux... )
Une fois le routeur en votre possession, vous pourrez activer votre abonnement, et utiliser le produit en quelques minutes seulement !

Question : Comment puis-je aider 12FreeWiFi ?
Réponse : Pour nous aider, vous pouvez partager notre campagne sur les réseaux sociaux que sont Facebook, Twitter ou Google+. Bien entendu, la meilleure facon est encore de participer à cette campagne, et de nous rejoindre dans l'aventure !

Soutenez ce projet et obtenez un routeur WiFi en contrepartie

story:
We Are A Registered Canadian Charity

International Student Ministries Canada—ISMC—is a registered Canadian Charity with the mission to empower international students to impact the world.  Our CRA registered charity number is 129543302RR0001.  We love international students and we want to assist them to feel at home while studying in Canada. For more than 30 years, we have offered programs such as weekly social gatherings and ESL classes to help international students to adapt to and enjoy life in our great country.

ISMC has over 110 staff and 500 volunteers who serve in 34 cities from the Pacific to the Atlantic. There are students from over 50 countries—all five continents—in our programs.

What We Need

We need help getting the CADlife app professionally done. It’s not cheap to do it well and make it accessible on all platforms, and keep it updated. Our expertise is helping students. We are hiring 2 SOLID Technologies to provide their expertise in building the app. They are giving us a significant discount but we need you to help us pay the bill and get this app out there. This one time funding will get the frame work built out and then it will be self-sustaining. If you own a company or run a business would you consider being a founding sponsor and getting your message in front of all these students? 

Anything raised above the minimum target will be used to ensure we have the staff to provide personal response that is a phone call or a text away. We have staff in every province. We are the interface to a strange country. The app is our front door and calling card.

The Project

There are thousands of  young adults landing in a new country, needing to figure out housing, transit, groceries, furniture, friends, and so much more. Many are on a tight budget. Sure they are all tech savvy but you still have to know the local names, figure out what search tags work locally and how to determine which of the thousands of results are legit. They need to figure out life in Canada. Of course, the university provides some help and encourages them to live in the dorms, but that can be the most expensive and isolated way to live here.

The CADlife app is like taking a plate of cookies and introducing ourselves to the new international students and helping them find what they need. We want to be good neighbors and welcome them in our midst. There are over 400,000 International students in Canada. We want our international student guests to feel at home in Canada, learn practical information, better plan their journey, navigate our communities, find friendly faces, get local advice, and connect with a real person available to answer questions. We want it all in one place, in the CADlife app, where students can find the latest information at their fingertips in one place, filtered by our staff and international students that are already here. The CADlife app will allow students to:

EXPLORE

EXPLORE: The CADlife app has everything covered with information for before departure and after arrival; tips and advice to settle and integrate; as well as the available options for after graduation and staying in Canada for work.
 

PLAN

PLAN: The CADlife app provides students with the tools to schedule events, set reminders, add to-dos and personal notes in order to stay organized in their journey abroad. As well they have access to lists and things to think about from previous students. 
 

CONNECT

CONNECT: CADlife will help students build relationships with local and international friends. Thanks to the chat feature, students can connect with individuals or groups of people to share experiences. With the connect feature they can send a message and get connected to a real life person that can provide advice, information and connection to a local volunteer or staff member for help. 


 

What You Get

Everyone who participates by making a contribution or spreading the word is helping us to launch a life-changing app. If everyone does a little, we will achieve something great. Arriving in a new country, new school, with often a new language can be very intimidating. You get to help make it easier by building the CADlife app that bridges international students to information, services, and people dedicated helping them feel at home in Canada.

Check out our perks on the sidebar. Do your part to help our International students become part of our community and feel the Canadian welcome. Give yourself a pat on the back and share it with friends. That warm feeling inside is worth every penny you give. You will notice that we have chosen internet deliverable perks (with a hard copy available for those who want it). As a charity we want to ensure that every dollar goes towards the app. Your participation is greatly appreciated and we hope you will download and share the app when it is ready. 

Because we are a registered Charity, tax deductible receipts are available for Canadian donors for gifts over $20. However, Indiegogo cannot supply charitable receipts. Gifts requiring charitable receipts must be processed through ISMC, but will count towards the Indiegogo campaign goals.
 

The Impact

We want to empower international students to feel at home in Canada: To be welcomed by community groups and be connected to social and cultural networks. Did you know that less than 1 in 4 International Students is ever invited inside a Canadian home? ISMC wants to change that. Let’s get international students connected and cared for. They will find friends, communities, and caring Canadians via the app.

  1. Inspire someone by providing a platform where community groups can connect with International students.
  2. Provide connection by having a phone and text line available connecting to a real person that can answer questions, give advice and put a student in contact with a local person to help them.
  3. Find trusted advice. Previous International students can give tips and experiences that will help the new students, but there is no where for them to connect without this app. The app will allow us to share those tips and post trusted info of what has worked.
  4. Crowd Sourcing Info. In every city and university there are local groups, FaceBook groups, give away groups, sources of insider information that an outsider has trouble finding. The app will connect them to local groups and sources, providing a place where crowd sourcing helps the students find what they need.
  5. Share the Spirit of being Canadian. We are known as polite, loving, open people, but for a new student feeling lost it can be hard to know who to trust, who to go to, who to ask about cough syrup. Nothing looks familiar. The app will help students connect, make choices, and get the help they deserve.
     

Risks & Challenges

#1  There are 400,000 International Students in Canada this year. There are more coming next year. The challenge is to get the word out to them so that they know this resource is available. We appreciate every share and every conversation you have to promote the app among international students and those who have contact with them.

#2  We need community groups, pages, social groups and more to submit their info so we can make the connections and provide the links. Our staff at universities across the country will be gathering tried and true contacts, places, links, and activities to include. It’s a gigantic task and will be an ongoing effort to keep adding and updating info until we cover every city where international students are living in Canada. We are starting with the 34 cities where we have staff.

#3  Ongoing funding to keep the app updated and technologically current as platforms and links change rapidly. We will have ongoing funding every year to keep the app current through ads, sponsorships, donations, and local community events.


 

Other Ways You Can Help

We need to get the word out about this campaign and about the app.  We don’t have a big marketing budget. We are a charity, so we are counting on all of you to spread the word. 

We’d love it if you’d make a contribution or buy a sponsorship but even if you can’t, you can be a HUGE help to the team by doing any of the following things.

Share this campaign with others.  Spread the word.  There are easy to use links on the left side of this page to share via Facebook, Twitter, etc.

Get involved.  Contact us at Communications@ISMC.ca and let Synica know how you’d like to help.

Write an email to your email address book contacts and promote the app and share the opportunity to help International Students.

Post the campaign in groups, forums, pages, and other social media that will reach all the countries that send international students to Canada. Get them connected even before they come. Many of their parents will appreciate this app and help fund it as a way to help their own children who are students here.

They will find friends, communities, and caring Canadians via the app.


Inspire someone by providing a platform where community groups can connect with International students.

Provide connection by having a phone and text line available connecting to a real person that can answer questions, give advice and put a student in contact with a local person to help them.

Find trusted advice. Previous International students can give tips and experiences that will help the new students, but there is no where for them to connect without this app. The app will allow us to share those tips and post trusted info of what has worked.

Crowd Sourcing Info. In every city and university there are local groups, FaceBook groups, give away groups, sources of insider information that an outsider has trouble finding. The app will connect them to local groups and sources, providing a place where crowd sourcing helps the students find what they need.

Share the Spirit of being Canadian. We are known as polite, loving, open people, but for a new student feeling lost it can be hard to know who to trust, who to go to, who to ask about cough syrup. Nothing looks familiar. The app will help students connect, make choices, and get the help they deserve. 


Risks & Challenges
#1  There are 400,000 International Students in Canada this year. There are more coming next year. The challenge is to get the word out to them so that they know this resource is available. We appreciate every share and every conversation you have to promote the app among international students and those who have contact with them.
#2  We need community groups, pages, social groups and more to submit their info so we can make the connections and provide the links. Our staff at universities across the country will be gathering tried and true contacts, places, links, and activities to include. It’s a gigantic task and will be an ongoing effort to keep adding and updating info until we cover every city where international students are living in Canada. We are starting with the 34 cities where we have staff.
#3  Ongoing funding to keep the app updated and technologically current as platforms and links change rapidly. We will have ongoing funding every year to keep the app current through ads, sponsorships, donations, and local community events.

 

Other Ways You Can Help
We need to get the word out about this campaign and about the app.  We don’t have a big marketing budget. We are a charity, so we are counting on all of you to spread the word. 
We’d love it if you’d make a contribution or buy a sponsorship but even if you can’t, you can be a HUGE help to the team by doing any of the following things.
Share this campaign with others.  Spread the word.  There are easy to use links on the left side of this page to share via Facebook, Twitter, etc.
Get involved.  Contact us at Communications@ISMC.ca and let Synica know how you’d like to help.
Write an email to your email address book contacts and promote the app and share the opportunity to help International Students.
Post the campaign in groups, forums, pages, and other social media that will reach all the countries that send international students to Canada. Get them connected even before they come. Many of their parents will appreciate this app and help fund it as a way to help their own children who are students here.

story:
The team behind the development of pcInternet Patrol is introducing another revolutionary product: General Number, which not only makes our daily lives easier but stands for the social cause of respecting individual privacy in marketing.  

What do you get? 

We estimate that in less than two years, every business and professional in the world will have a GN.

By becoming an early GN adopter, you get to pick the coolest and most valuable GN before anyone else. 

This opportunity is similar to being able to register a domain name before most people even knew the word "Internet." One of the first GN adopters, Joel Gordon, Esq, who registered GN during our test-marketing, has recently refused an offer of $15,000 for his GN - "attorney" or "77".


On top of this, you contribute to GN's cause - respect to the consumer's right to privacy in advertising. 

What is General Number?

GN is a rare case when technology disrupts not one but several markets. It improves a customer's experience so drastically, that not offering GN will place a company at a major competitive disadvantage. 

Therefore the pressure to adopt GN is coming from both individuals and businesses. 

Yet, GN is not just a clever piece of software, it is also a social cause of re-introducing privacy into relationships between people and brands. 

GN offers a way for businesses to interact with consumers, which is more efficient not in-spite, but because it respects people's privacy. It works through two distinctive entities: Public GN and Private GN.

Public GN

Public GN is a permanent number and a word (vanity GN) chosen by an organization or a professional. Examples of a Public GN are "Dentist" and "2933".




Private GN

GN requires no registration for consumers and their GN is a random, disposable number, which is generated for a single exchange of information with another individual or organization. Consumer information always travels end-to-end and is NOT stored in the cloud. 

                                                


Unlike QR codes, Public GNs can be captured from any medium 



and appears like a phone contact, which takes no additional space on the home screen of a smartphone:



Each Public GN is an interactive contact card aggregating all social media with the functionality of a custom mobile application, which includes a number of proprietary functions available only through GN!



                                   

General Number completely transforms the customer support experience

     

No more frustration or delays with road-side assistance

                 Free on-demand advertising that respects privacy

GN is not just a new technology, it is also a cause. It creates an environment where brands do not need to infringe on individuals' privacy to deliver an advertisement.              

                           

Make a donation pledge in under 12 seconds 

Listeners are more likely to donate and will donate the most while they are emotionally connected to a non-profit's story that they heard over the radio. 

By the time they come home, they will not remember the URL, but they are not likely to get on the phone with a campaign volunteer while they are driving. 

GN enables a donation pledge faster, easier and more accurately than any other platform!

Lisa Benjamini, President of the PCOS Foundation and well known Houston philanthropist, shares her GN experience: "Rather than waiting for at least a month and investing almost $3,000 in the development of our own mobile app, it took my administrative assistant only five minutes to create a GN. It does everything we would want to have in our mobile app and has some functionality that is only available through GN. For example, our patrons can now make a donation pledge in under 10 seconds."



"There are a lot more uses for GN, and we are certain you will find a new one yourself." - Bill Fogarty 

The team

Our team has a history of developing very effective consumer products that were far ahead of their time. Back in 2000, we developed the first in the world cloud based personal firewall, pcInternet Patrol (PCIP), before the word "cloud" even entered the mainstream language. In 2007, we were acquired by pcTools, just before it became a part of the Symantec corporation, which now owns our patent. PCIP technology is incorporated into many security products and is referenced in more than one hundred subsequent patents of Microsoft, Symantec, Kaspersky, IBM, Dell, Fujitsu, AT&T and a lot more small and large companies around the world

Traction

Up until now, GN could only be reserved by private invitation. We want to spread the word about GN before opening public registration, in order to give everyone an equal chance in getting the best GN, whether you live in New York, California, or anywhere else. 

Our pre-marketing experience has shown very strong interest coming from across all industries: Early GN adopters include the PCOS Foundation (GN “PCOS” or “2933”), Don McGill Toyota (GN "Autos" or "2000"), Jonathan Kaplow (GN "CPA" or "1040"), the University of Houston Investment Banking Scholars Club (GN: "4272" or "ISBC"), Grace Point Community Church (and many other organizations and businesses).

We also are working with major payment brands, which are interested in GN's ability to close the last security vulnerability during card-not-present transactions.

In sum, without a doubt GN has the potential to become a household name, and with your help, we are determined to make it happen.

Other ways you can help

Many of our early adopters have reported that when they share their Public GN with others, the most common question they are asked is, "How can I get a GN for my business too?" You can help by spreading the word about GN through social media as well as through word of mouth.

In addition to that, while GN is reaching critical mass, there may be other opportunities about which you can inquire by emailing to support@generalnumber.com.


What else do you get?

 You may also get a GN t-shirt with your number:

story:
About Most Advanced 3-in-1 Wireless Charger

Integrated chip synchronous digital demodulation circuit is what we use to improve this 3-in-1 wireless charger and make the wireless charging more functional, stable, quick fast, lower the working heat and much more safety.

This Wireless Charger is designed for fast charging your smart watch and smartphone at the same time.  

One of the best feature of this wireless is the detachable function.

You can easily detach the wireless charger and carry it with you for travel or put the wireless charger to a different room or office.

make the wireless charging more functional, stable, quick fast, lower the working heat and much more safety.

There are two surfaces for this wireless charger, one surface has double function

1, On the left side of this charger, We put double coils, the center coil special made for charging Apple watch and outer coil made for charging any kind of smart phones with QI enable.

2, On the right side is for smart phone charging only. You may charge any smart with QI enable.  

You are Covered !

 No matter your smart phone has QI ready or not, we have prepared two wireless charging receivers for you 100% free. And you are ready to go!  or you have one  a choice for you  device  is wireless adapter receiver.  

1, One build in wireless receiver phone case for iphone 6 /iphone 6 plus/ iphone 6s/ iphone 6s plus / iphone 7 / iphone 7 plus..

2, or one wireless receiver adapter for  iOS  or Android  smart phone.  

 Just feel free to let us know what’s the best way to fit your need. You are 100% covered.

Specification 

Smart watch power output:                 2.5W

Smart phone power output:                10W

PCBA Size:                                                26 x 26

Coil Size:                                                    50 x 50mmmm

Input Power:                                             10w DC5V/2A, 9V/1.8A

Conversion Rate：                                  82%

Transmitting Distance：                      5-8mm

Working Frequency:                               110-250KHZ

Product Standard:                                  WPCv.1.2.3.

Protective Measures:                            FODVRVS DPL Function, Over temperature, Over Voltage protection, soft / hardware dual over current protection.

Dedicated High Power low loss MOS & MOS Driver

Compatible:                                              QC2.0/QC3.0

Our Team

QI (Wireless charging function) is standard equipment for all smart devices from late of 2017, Very soon any smart device will no longer need wire cable to charge it anymore and the true story is now trending for our daily life.

We focus on the development of products related to communication fields , such as mobile phones, Bluetooth ear bud and two way radio also consumer electronic products, keeping the youngest technology for people is our passion. we have been working very hard and will do forever.

This is not the first time for us to running a campaign here in Indiegogo, the first one we had an excellent result and reach out our campaign goal. The another most important is that what we have learned from our first campaign and will make this one ever much better!

                              

   Ben Qin                       Lina Li                         Roke Xu                    Tina Fang                     Lee Zhang            Senior Engineer        Senior Engineer      Senior  Engineer     Director/ Founder    Founder

Video of Our Manufacturer and Partner.

 

FAQ.

Q. how many devices can this device charge at the same time?

A. you may charge two devices at the same time.

Q. what is the mean of this three in one wireless charger?

A. there are two different kind of the surface at the top of this wireless charger surface, one it can charge the device such as smart phone both Apple or Android or any device has QI ready. Another surface of this wireless charger has double function, one special made for Apple watch Product Features
100% compatible with all Apple Watch series and one for smart phone both iOS and Android.

Risks and challenges

There are always risks & challenges with creating and delivering a good new product, minimized the entire process for a smooth moving ahead are always the top priority for us to keep the new product to reach the final stage, from concept to a product and to de delivered to the market is not first time us to get the job done.

The prototype of this model has been finalized. As a partnership We have been with the manufacture almost three years and the key Parts chain supplier are ready for us to begin production. and the Qi certification for this special model is under way to achieved. The appearance of the product has also been applied for patent.

The manufactory was established by high-end R&D team from original Samsung company and began to research and design the wireless solution in 2011.One of the best solution provider of wireless charger in the industry.

All of this, along with our strategic partnerships with experienced crowdfunding and fulfillment experts leaves little room for error and ensures a good customer service and quick delivery.

 

What We Need & What You Get

There are several projects we are working on in 2018 , to make good and competitive products are the purpose of our efforts to research and develop.  Reach our campaign goal is important for us so we can get things smoothly moving forward. also the minimum order required for some of the  parts are the key to keep our cost low.

The Impact

Every product is born for the marketing and to make our life better and convenient. We are planning for another campaign and will start in this coming June of this year.  BY the time is ready you will see the different. Multiple functions will add on our wireless charger line and make the top quality, more functionally wireless charger is one of our dreams.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our project with your friends or co-worker and help us to get the word out  and make some noise about our campaign.Thanks a lot ! please to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Your tool for creating achievable goals.

 The Daily Goal Setter by Mål Paper is a productivity and gratitude planner, specifically designed to help you to achieve your goals.

The Daily Goal Setter planner is Mål Paper’s first product to be launched. Simple and effective, the Daily Goal Setter enables you to create a clutter-free canvas for optimising your potential. 

The Daily Goal Setter is more than just a planner. It explains how to effectively set goals so you can identify and prioritise your long-term, medium-term and short-term goals, while creating actionable tasks to help you achieve tasks. 

Mål Paper was created due to a lack of stationery available specifically designed as a tool to help de-clutter your mind. 

The word ‘Mål’ means ‘goal’ in Swedish. Our stationery range also takes inspiration from the Scandinavian clean and clutter-free way of living.  As a result, Mål Paper was born - the stylish and simplistic stationery brand that helps us to be more productive by focusing our minds on the most important tasks.

The Daily Goal Setter planner is the result of seeking a product to solve the common problem of jumping from one task to the next, without prioritising them or even completing the previous task. We were tired of having countless ‘to-do’ lists on notepads, notebooks and journals that did nothing more than complicate our goals and tasks further, to the point of feeling overwhelmed and uninspired to hold ourselves accountable.

That’s exactly why we designed a planner that will help you to confirm and structure your goals, keeping you organised and focused.

Our mission with the Daily Goal Setter planner is simple. Focus on creating a product that gives the user clarity on what they want to achieve, while helping them plan out the tasks that will help them to get there with the use of positive mind shift setting, measurement and effectiveness. We also wanted the planner to help create a positive mindset with the use of daily gratitude practices and affirmations. 

To help us create this planner we looked towards the methods used by outstanding performers and how they set themselves for a productive day, week or month. In the Daily Goal Setter planner, you will see elements from some of the principles and methods they use, most notably the methods from Brian Tracy’s Eat That Frog. A simple method used to help rid you of procrastination and help you in achieving more goals in less time.

While there are a number of productivity and gratitude based planners and journals on the market, we believe that we have de-cluttered some of the fussier designs and added more practicality. 

 We want you to have the most productive, gratifying and fulfilling life possible. With the Daily Goal Setter planner, you’ve taken the first step.

Be clear on what it is you want to achieve in your short, medium and long-term goals. Stay focussed by referring back to your goals and the tasks that will help achieve these.

Plan your day, week and months tasks by prioritising them in order of importance. Prioritising and planning your tasks will mean you have a proactive day, rather than a reactive day. Focus on the tasks you’ve prioritised, rather than the less important, quick win tasks.

Start and end your day on a high, by reflecting on everything that you are grateful for. Using the daily practice of gratitude and affirmations will help create a positive mindset that will be carried on to all aspects of your life.

Celebrate your wins, and work out what you can do to improve on tasks that didn’t go to plan. At the end of each day, week and month you’ll reflect on how effective and productive you were, and how much closer you are to achieving your goals.

 

  • 6 months worth: The planner has been designed to be used for 6 months
  • Goal Setting: Goal setting guide to help you define your short-term, medium-term and long-term goals
  • Morning Routine: How to set your day off right 
  • Evening Routine: How to reflect and recharge to wake up productive
  • Weekly / Monthly Routine: How to get the most out of your weeks and months
  • 2x Ribbon dividers: To allow for quick reference to your daily, weekly, monthly tasks
  • Flat design: Lays completely flat

  • Undated: The planner has purposely been designed undated so that you can pick up and put down the planner at any point during the year, and avoid wasting pages
  • Gratitude practice: List 3 things that you are grateful for to start your day on a positive note
  • Affirmation practice: Start your day with a positive affirmation
  • Today’s tasks: List your daily tasks and prioritise these in order of importance
  • Eat That Frog: We have set the daily task pages up to be used alongside Brian Tracy’s method from Eat That Frog, whereby you get more done in less time and with less procrastination
  • Great things that happened: Review and rate your day. Were there any wins? Was there anything that you could have done to make it even better?
  • Undated design: Missed a day? Don’t worry about wasting pages. The planner can also be used as a 5-day or a 7-day weekly planner

  • Plan your week: Create a reference for what needs to be completed this week. You’ll be able to refer to this page throughout the week to keep you on track
  • Five most important tasks: List the top five tasks that must be completed this week
  • Secondary importance tasks: Tasks that can be attempted once your top five tasks are complete
  • Additional tasks: Once all the above tasks are complete, you can move on to your additional tasks
  • Review: Review and rate your week to see if there is any room for improvement on your upcoming week

  • Plan your month: Create a reference for what needs to be completed this month. You’ll be able to refer to this page throughout the week to keep you on track
  • Blank grid: A blank and undated grid that can be filled in with any appointments or key dates
  • Most important tasks: List the tasks which you must attempt or complete this month. These will be your main focus for the upcoming month
  • Notes: An area to jot down any notes that refer to your monthly planning
  • Review: Review and rate your month

  • Short, Medium and Long-term goals: 2 pages dedicated to each of your short, medium and long-term goals
  • Numbered goals: There are up to 14 slots to list your goals and write a short description of what your goals are, why they are important and how you might go about completing these
  • Quotes: Throughout the planner, there are motivational and encouraging quotes to help create a positive mindset

By backing our project, you will be one of the first in the world to receive a Mål Paper Daily Goal Setter planner. This will help us put the planners into production, and in exchange, you will receive either the pdf version or physical hard copy of the planner at a discounted price.

At Mål Paper we believe in giving back and helping our community where we can. We thought of no better way to do this by supporting YoungMinds, the UK's leading charity committed to improving the mental health of children and young people.

For every pledge, through Indiegogo of a Daily Goal Setter planner, we will donate £1 to YoungMinds charity. Following on from the Indiegogo campaign, we will donate £1 from every sale made from malpaper.com
story_txt:
Your tool for creating achievable goals.
 The Daily Goal Setter by Mål Paper is a productivity and gratitude planner, specifically designed to help you to achieve your goals.
The Daily Goal Setter planner is Mål Paper’s first product to be launched. Simple and effective, the Daily Goal Setter enables you to create a clutter-free canvas for optimising your potential. 
The Daily Goal Setter is more than just a planner. It explains how to effectively set goals so you can identify and prioritise your long-term, medium-term and short-term goals, while creating actionable tasks to help you achieve tasks. 


Mål Paper was created due to a lack of stationery available specifically designed as a tool to help de-clutter your mind. 
The word ‘Mål’ means ‘goal’ in Swedish. Our stationery range also takes inspiration from the Scandinavian clean and clutter-free way of living.  As a result, Mål Paper was born - the stylish and simplistic stationery brand that helps us to be more productive by focusing our minds on the most important tasks.
The Daily Goal Setter planner is the result of seeking a product to solve the common problem of jumping from one task to the next, without prioritising them or even completing the previous task. We were tired of having countless ‘to-do’ lists on notepads, notebooks and journals that did nothing more than complicate our goals and tasks further, to the point of feeling overwhelmed and uninspired to hold ourselves accountable.

That’s exactly why we designed a planner that will help you to confirm and structure your goals, keeping you organised and focused.
Our mission with the Daily Goal Setter planner is simple. Focus on creating a product that gives the user clarity on what they want to achieve, while helping them plan out the tasks that will help them to get there with the use of positive mind shift setting, measurement and effectiveness. We also wanted the planner to help create a positive mindset with the use of daily gratitude practices and affirmations. 
To help us create this planner we looked towards the methods used by outstanding performers and how they set themselves for a productive day, week or month. In the Daily Goal Setter planner, you will see elements from some of the principles and methods they use, most notably the methods from Brian Tracy’s Eat That Frog. A simple method used to help rid you of procrastination and help you in achieving more goals in less time.

While there are a number of productivity and gratitude based planners and journals on the market, we believe that we have de-cluttered some of the fussier designs and added more practicality. 
 We want you to have the most productive, gratifying and fulfilling life possible. With the Daily Goal Setter planner, you’ve taken the first step.


Be clear on what it is you want to achieve in your short, medium and long-term goals. Stay focussed by referring back to your goals and the tasks that will help achieve these.

Plan your day, week and months tasks by prioritising them in order of importance. Prioritising and planning your tasks will mean you have a proactive day, rather than a reactive day. Focus on the tasks you’ve prioritised, rather than the less important, quick win tasks.

Start and end your day on a high, by reflecting on everything that you are grateful for. Using the daily practice of gratitude and affirmations will help create a positive mindset that will be carried on to all aspects of your life.

Celebrate your wins, and work out what you can do to improve on tasks that didn’t go to plan. At the end of each day, week and month you’ll reflect on how effective and productive you were, and how much closer you are to achieving your goals.



 



6 months worth: The planner has been designed to be used for 6 months

Goal Setting: Goal setting guide to help you define your short-term, medium-term and long-term goals

Morning Routine: How to set your day off right 

Evening Routine: How to reflect and recharge to wake up productive

Weekly / Monthly Routine: How to get the most out of your weeks and months

2x Ribbon dividers: To allow for quick reference to your daily, weekly, monthly tasks

Flat design: Lays completely flat






Undated: The planner has purposely been designed undated so that you can pick up and put down the planner at any point during the year, and avoid wasting pages

Gratitude practice: List 3 things that you are grateful for to start your day on a positive note

Affirmation practice: Start your day with a positive affirmation

Today’s tasks: List your daily tasks and prioritise these in order of importance

Eat That Frog: We have set the daily task pages up to be used alongside Brian Tracy’s method from Eat That Frog, whereby you get more done in less time and with less procrastination

Great things that happened: Review and rate your day. Were there any wins? Was there anything that you could have done to make it even better?

Undated design: Missed a day? Don’t worry about wasting pages. The planner can also be used as a 5-day or a 7-day weekly planner





Plan your week: Create a reference for what needs to be completed this week. You’ll be able to refer to this page throughout the week to keep you on track

Five most important tasks: List the top five tasks that must be completed this week

Secondary importance tasks: Tasks that can be attempted once your top five tasks are complete

Additional tasks: Once all the above tasks are complete, you can move on to your additional tasks

Review: Review and rate your week to see if there is any room for improvement on your upcoming week





Plan your month: Create a reference for what needs to be completed this month. You’ll be able to refer to this page throughout the week to keep you on track

Blank grid: A blank and undated grid that can be filled in with any appointments or key dates

Most important tasks: List the tasks which you must attempt or complete this month. These will be your main focus for the upcoming month

Notes: An area to jot down any notes that refer to your monthly planning

Review: Review and rate your month





Short, Medium and Long-term goals: 2 pages dedicated to each of your short, medium and long-term goals

Numbered goals: There are up to 14 slots to list your goals and write a short description of what your goals are, why they are important and how you might go about completing these

Quotes: Throughout the planner, there are motivational and encouraging quotes to help create a positive mindset


By backing our project, you will be one of the first in the world to receive a Mål Paper Daily Goal Setter planner. This will help us put the planners into production, and in exchange, you will receive either the pdf version or physical hard copy of the planner at a discounted price.



At Mål Paper we believe in giving back and helping our community where we can. We thought of no better way to do this by supporting YoungMinds, the UK's leading charity committed to improving the mental health of children and young people.
For every pledge, through Indiegogo of a Daily Goal Setter planner, we will donate £1 to YoungMinds charity. Following on from the Indiegogo campaign, we will donate £1 from every sale made from malpaper.com

story:
Who is Truba News & Where Did We Come From?

Truba.news is Montreal tech startup that began in the Fintech industry as a research tool for financial industry analysts. As the development process evolved, the team quickly realized the algorithm and functionality of our product could be used for something bigger and better. In April 2018, Truba took on a new shape and focused its efforts on personalized news aggregation.

What Does Our App Do & Why Was It Created?

Let’s face it, the news is broken. But we feel it's much too important to let fail, that’s why we created Truba News! Truba News is passionate about free press and an informed public to ensure a healthy, open democratic society.

Lots of people want to keep up with the news, but there is so much out there and lots of it is sensationalized, poorly covered, or untrustworthy. We want to help fix these problems, so we are developing a tailored personal news service. Our web application will use the latest AI technology and machine learning to break down the wall of tedious, nonsense news articles and provide users with news articles that they are interested in reading, and from multiple sources so that users get the whole story. No more click-bait articles and no more one sided reporting.

And let’s not forget about that indisputable disruption: ads. We hate ads as much as the next person and we don’t feel that quality journalism should be based on constant annoying advertising that clog up your access to information. That’s why our platform is 100% ad free and blocks trackers from following your activity.

We have so many ideas for great tools and features that will make our news app special for our users. Now we need your help! We need fuel for our developers and enough funds to support us for our first year as a startup. Are you ready to help us fight this broken news system with us?!

What We Need & Why :

Our goal is to reach $10,000 in 40 days! By contributing to our goal, you will be funding the first stage of our product development. Your contributions will be used to develop these specific functionalities:

  • A top-of-the-line clustering function :

What is clustering and why is it useful? Clustering is a way of grouping a set of articles together that are similar in terms of content. This means you can either read one article in the cluster to get information from one source, or read the whole cluster to understand the whole story from multiple sources.

  • Increase the number and variety of articles and sources

We currently have access to a limited supply of articles, but we want to get you as much as possible, so we can fill our clusters and provide you with hundreds of sources and topics.

What You Get From Your Contribution :

Join our campaign and help us to take digital news into the AI age! We're looking to raise $10,000 so here are some great perks we put together just for you:

Future Features:

As we speak, Truba is hard at work on a multi-stage set of features. Here’s what our team is working on and hoping to offer to our end-users:

Personalization : Our AI algorithm will be able to learn which articles you enjoy reading and which ones you don’t and will recommend you news articles based on your likes and dislikes. Enjoyed that science article about Mars? Truba will suggest other planetary articles that you might also enjoy. Liked that article by The Wall Street Journal? Truba will bring you other articles by that source.

Filter Bubble Control: We are pioneering user-centric machine learning by building an interface that lets you get your hands on the heart of the algorithm. Worried you are getting trapped in an echo chamber? Increase your filter bubble size. Want to prioritize your favourite sources, not the ones the algorithm picks for you? Go right ahead!

Social Platform : The social platform will allow users to upvote (thumbs up) or downvote (thumbs down) articles on Truba, and share articles between Truba users. See what other users enjoyed reading and what they didn’t. In addition, the social platform will allow Truba to learn how users interact with our app and whether or not they are enjoying the content being featured.

If all goes well with this campaign, you can expect to see us on here again with a new campaign to raise funds for the second stage of development: personalized news aggregation.

Other Ways You Can Help Us! ↓↓↓

Join Truba's premium membership, the first 100 subscribers get 50% off for 2 years AND will be among the first users of our app. You’ll be able to give us feedback and give us ideas for future features. Who knows, maybe your idea will be the next feature released!

So you don't have the cash to contribute to our campaign? No problem, we feel you! Here's a few other ways you can help us out (the free way) :

  • Make some noise for us! Post about Truba and our campaign on your social media pages. Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn so that you see our updates and can share our posts and updates. Go like and share ASAP!
  • Subscribe to our newsletter! Our newsletter brings you exclusive information about our product updates, new features, and special offers. 
  • Use the free version of our web app! That's right, we said FREE. Our app is available for free (with limited features) to any and all internet users. You still get dozens of interesting articles in one convenient place, with no ads and no trackers. The more you visit, the more we know you like our service.

Contact us at info@truba.news for more information about referral opportunities.
