story:
Welcome to AplhaAtomic's second campaign The Titan: The Titanium Guitar Pick. Following the success of our first metallic pick campaign, we decided to concentrate on everyone's favourite titanium pick. We listened to your requests and added a high-precision 0.5mm option alongside our original 1mm pick.  We also created 3 awesome finishes through a combination of flame tinting and precise metallic polishing techniques.

 Pure titanium was selected for its excellent strength to weight ratio, durability and toughness. Pure titanium is primarily used for medical implants for its high specific strength, its ability to osseointegrate with the human body and superior properties compared to other metals. This combination of beneficial properties made titanium an easy choice for our pick material. 

 The pick design was brought to life with computer-aided design (CAD) where we created 3D models and produce drawings for the manufacturing process.  We created both 0.5mm and 1mm thickness for the Titan pick and engraved the front the pick with its parent material identifier. Once the pick dimensions were confirmed, we sent the manufacturing drawings to start the wire cutting process.

 

 Our titanium picks are manufactured through wire EDM and milling techniques....why I hear you ask? Ultimately,  the precision obtained and edge finishing is far superior to traditional methods. And crucially, it allows for repeatability. Using these methods reduces material waste and actually uses less power than traditional machining methods = better for the environment. Finally, the picks are polished to provide a mirror finish and also to reduce friction between the picks and the guitar strings and heat-treated to create a unique finish.

 

Titanium grade 2 (99.5% purity), unlike many metals such as aluminium, can be coloured via a heat tinting process. The fabricator can achieve a variety of colours other than the raw finish, allowing it to be more aesthetically pleasing and provide a protective layer. During the process of heat tinting, a thin oxide layer is produced. Interference of light rays reflecting from the inner and outer film surfaces will produce colours characteristic of the underlying microstructural features.

 

Three distinct surface finishes have been produced through applying a direct flame heat treatment. Three finishes are outlined below:

 

 

We have two case options available: the slide case and the pop case. Each case comes with a set of custom-designed foam inserts for each Titan guitar pick!

 

 

 Our Titan guitar pick can be easily attached as a key-ring so you'll never forget your favourite pick again!

 

 We have specifically chosen 100% recycled cardboard and instead of using hazardous glueing products we have opted to use twine to secure our beautiful craft pillows. Twine is manufactured from natural products and is 100% recyclable.

AlphaAtomic was founded by two PhD graduates from Glasgow who specialise in aerospace metallurgy. The company specialise in the design,  manufacture and analysis of metallic components made from aerospace-grade materials.

story:
THE STORY BEHIND PENTIUM

As a college student, I learned that I desperately needed to have better time management and planning skills. So I began looking for a portable daily planner that would help me focus on one day at a time and also give me an overview of the month when necessary. However, almost everything that I found was either too bulky or poorly formatted.

Instead of just settling for an imperfect alternative, I decided to create my own solution! I purchased a blank, pocket-sized notebook and developed my own layout for each page, with two specific pages for each month and day. A few weeks later, I began to consider combining the two things that I carried in my back pockets every day: my wallet and my pocket planner. After all, my wallet was overloaded with stuff I hardly ever needed, so I merged my wallet with my new planner.

Because my planner was now so accessible, I found myself using it more frequently and accomplishing more important things with my time. Not only was I achieving better productivity with my time, but I was also able to free up more time to do the things I cared most about! And to top it off, the simplified wallet design helped me eliminate my bulky wallet and minimize what I carried in my pockets every day.

After receiving a noticeable number of compliments and questions about my planner wallet, I began to wonder if I could share my product and the value it adds with others. So after plenty of design iterations, product trials, and open doors, we’re here to bring you the first Pentium Planner Wallet!

WE NEED YOUR HELP!

Even after our successful Kickstarter campaign, we were still $1,600 short of what we needed to buy our first inventory order. While we are extremely thankful for the $5,400 worth of support from our friends on Kickstarter, we need your help to make it the rest of the way!

All of the money that we raise through this campaign will be directed towards our first inventory order, and at this point every dollar counts! While there are other means for raising money, we truly believe that crowdfunding is the best way to share our product with the world and raise the money we need to bring it to life! So here are 3 BIG THINGS you can do to help us make it happen:

  1. CONTRIBUTE TO THE CAMPAIGN! Everyone could use some help managing their time and boosting their productivity, so take advantage of this special opportunity!
  2. SHARE THE CAMPAIGN personally with friends and on social media, and don't forget about the share tools here on Indiegogo!
  3. GIVE US YOUR FEEDBACK! We want to know what you think about the product, the campaign, and anything else related to what we're trying to accomplish

You can have a HUGE impact on the success of our campaign if you help in any of these ways! We've already had hundreds of people contribute to and support the Pentium Planner Wallet through Kickstarter, BUT NOW WE NEED YOUR HELP!!!

Risks & Challenges

The general challenge that we (and so many other small businesses face) is developing a solid cycle of sourcing materials, manufacturing the product, storing the inventory, and fulfilling orders. Thankfully, we have found a great manufacturer and shipping partner who will help us produce and fulfill our orders at an affordable cost. The biggest hurdle we face now is raising the money for the first inventory order!

In terms of order fulfillment, we have given ourselves and our manufacturer a conservative window of time to deliver our products to our invaluable backers, though we hope to deliver our rewards much sooner than July of 2017 (this is the date that the rewards are set to be delivered to backers).

story:
Short Summary

Our users are fed up with having to download an app for every service that they use.
They download Uber or Lyft for rides, Airbnb for rooms, Rover for pet sitting, care.com for babysitting,
homeadvisor to get a home improvement quote, and the list goes on and on and on...
This is called App Clutter. You try to download one more app and your phone is out of space.
You are frustrated. You try to find apps you don't use as much and delete them. So much for those RubyTuesday coupons.

AllMyNeeds.com created a solution by creating one single app for ALL services you use.
Whether you need a room or a ride or a carpet cleaned or a pizza, you can do all that on one single app.

Where are we now?

1. We have created a single, simple to use app. Our users love it and are telling their friends about it.
2. More than 180,000 monthly, active users.
3. We have signed up over 200,000 service providers and over 3 million users on our platform. We are working on finishing all the features you requested, so we can make your life easier.

What We Need and What You Get

$30,000 USD will add:

1. Additional servers to handle the volume as our advertising campaigns kick into full gear in the fall.
2. Additional staff to contact your favorite service providers to get them on board with us to serve you.
3. Better design to allow you to navigate our app easier. We still have a few features and bug to fix. We want you to have a much better user experience. Would you agree?


$50,000 USD will add:

1. More categories of services you want or need. Isn't this why we created this app in the firt place?
2. Add 100,000 more service providers to handle your service needs. This gives you more choices and better service.

$1 Million USD will add:

1. A private jet for the CEO. Whoa! Let's stop right here. You can rent one on AllMyNeeds.com. No need to buy one.
2. An end to the crowd funding campaign. We need to take a breather and deliver the services to you, for which you purchased gift cards for.
3. Add 500,000 more service providers to handle your service needs. Maybe a bunch of cool restaurants that deliver. You want more than just pizza, right?


Risk and Challenges

It's a big challenge to create a platform that handles over 1,200 different services and serves over 100 million users, but we are up to the challenge. Our management has consulted for or worked for companies, like Amazom.com, Priceline.com, eBay, and others, so we know what it takes to maintain a huge and reliable platform, plus find reliable and trustworthy service providers.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not ready to donate yet? We understand. You can help us by spreading the word and telling your service providers to get on our platform. This will help yoou get all of your service providers on one single app ad make it easier for you to do business with them.

Finally

Thanks to all of our supporters for getting us this far. This includes our customers, vendors, staff, friends, family, investors, followers, and you!
Join us now and enjo your gift cards, plus other rewards you earn, the more you use our app or website at:
https://www.allmyneeds.com

Download our Android App on Google Play Store. Apple Ios version coming in a few months.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Our users are fed up with having to download an app for every service that they use.They download Uber or Lyft for rides, Airbnb for rooms, Rover for pet sitting, care.com for babysitting,homeadvisor to get a home improvement quote, and the list goes on and on and on...This is called App Clutter. You try to download one more app and your phone is out of space.You are frustrated. You try to find apps you don't use as much and delete them. So much for those RubyTuesday coupons.
AllMyNeeds.com created a solution by creating one single app for ALL services you use.Whether you need a room or a ride or a carpet cleaned or a pizza, you can do all that on one single app.
Where are we now?
1. We have created a single, simple to use app. Our users love it and are telling their friends about it.2. More than 180,000 monthly, active users.3. We have signed up over 200,000 service providers and over 3 million users on our platform. We are working on finishing all the features you requested, so we can make your life easier.
What We Need and What You Get
$30,000 USD will add:
1. Additional servers to handle the volume as our advertising campaigns kick into full gear in the fall.2. Additional staff to contact your favorite service providers to get them on board with us to serve you.3. Better design to allow you to navigate our app easier. story:
BGNY.io

                       Between Gigs in New York                                                            

- The First Part-time and Remote Job Matching App for NYC Actors -

BGNY will be the first on-demand, part-time, and remote job matching app for NYC actors based on a candidates top 5 transferable skills. Quickly create a simple profile, add your resume, check off your top 5 skills, connect with others, and swipe to apply. Employers post jobs and choose your candidates! 

 

Made by 

 

    BGNY IOS Mobile App

 

 

 

                           Overview

                                                                     BGNY at a glance..

BGNY IOS Mobile App View

 

BGNY Homepage | Simple Sleek Design   

BGNY User Profile | Chat - See Messages - Connect - and Apply    

BGNY Login Page | Signup & Login via email

 

 

 

Upload a Profile Pic & Select Your Top 5 Transferable Skills

    

BGNY Has Recently Been Featured in:

 

        

 

 

 

 

 

Timeline

 

 

The Future is Part-time and Remote Jobs..

 

 ..create a flexible schedule around auditions!

 ..make up to $40 hourly!

 ..network with industry professionals at VIP events - get paid!

 

The Problem:

This source of data is derived from our (Actorscomfort Company) 200+ survey responses and several interviews of actors. We highlighted the two stats below because they display the challenges and obstacles actors face in the New York City Metropolitan area. 

 

 

Additional Insights:

  • 80% of NYC actors are seeking part-time or remote work 
  • Most actors earn a minimum wage ranging between $6 - $12 dollars an hour 
  • Since 2006 the cost of a NYC apartment has gone up 41%, a 30-day metro-card has increased 53%, and the Off-Broadway salary has only increased 17% 
  • The average student loan debt for theater graduates is approximately $80,000 

 

Our Plan & Budget: 

The money we raise will be used for the following expenses: 

(Planned Launch 3/2017)

  • Design and Develop ($4000)
  • Testing and debugging ($500)
  • Beta Testing | User Testing ($500)
  • Debugging and resolving issues & concerns that arise from Beta Testers ($1000)
  • Market BGNY ($2000)
  • Launch BGNY Web App to the public ($1000)
  • Upgrading & Supporting BGNY and its users ($1000)

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

 

 If you read this far we hope you've decided to donate and become a part of the solution by helping our app become reality. BUT if you can't contribute monetarily there are other ways you can help us reach our goal. If you can take a minute or 2 of your time and help share our campaign page across your social media platforms it could go along way in producing the results we need.

Also the worlds oldest and truest form of getting the word out is through 'Word Of Mouth" which is still the best proven way to market your ideas. We'd be forever grateful if you could spread our campaign and make some noise about it! The more eyes and ears the better.

 

                                Risks and challenges

 

1. The cycle of high unemployment rates for actors would continue to increase and tons of magnificently talented individuals will walk away from their life long dream. Think about the long term positive effect your donation will have on young drama hopefuls from NYU, The Lee Strasberg Institute, The Atlantic Theater, AMDA, New York Conservatory for Dramatic Arts, NYFA, and more! Will this web app eradicate unemployment within the performing arts industry? No. Yet, I believe we're headed in the right direction by focusing on an actor's strengths and marketable skill sets. Your donation is an investment in building the bright futures of our up and coming thespians.

2. As with any crowdfunding campaign there's a risk of not obtaining enough funding in order to successfully complete your projects goals due to unforeseen issues and changes. Startups, Theaters, and Remote Companies will play a very important role in making BGNY a reality. Their involvement and partnership will be paramount to our success giving performing artists access to great paying flexible employment opportunities. As our workforce evolves employers tend to seek candidates that bring unique and valuable skills sets to the table. Actors and performing artists are the perfect match - Communication, Teaching/Creativity, Interpersonal Skills, Detail Oriented, and Public Speaking all in one.

We look forward to collaborating with forward thinking creatives and innovative companies!

story:
The First Digital Life Planner That Helps You Define Your Purpose and Act on It!

Mi Purpose isn't just software. It is a system that helps to relieve pressure on the brain and bring a sense of calm  and control back into peoples lives.

Over 10,000 people have used the system and the digital version is based on Tracey Carr 's 15 years plus experience as a Corporate Leadership expert and  single working Mom with 3 daughters.

Want To See How Mi Purpose Can Help You Save time, Reduce Stress and Reach Your Dreams Faster? Read On...

No more looking in different apps, searching for bits of paper or walls covered in post-it-notes.   Now,  you can have peace of mind that everything is in the same place and you are getting the right things done. 

After 2 years development and 5 product revisions we now have a dream list of features:  

  • A coaching workshop where you can answer 12 carefully crafted coaching questions, expertly designed to tease our your unique purpose
  • An annual plan certificate  which you can print or view online as often as you need
  • A vision board where you can upload images that reflect every important role in your life 
  • Set quarterly  goals that match your annual plan 
  • Score your monthly compass to track your progress 
  • Set monthly goals that reflect every important role in your life 
  • ​Use Dump. Chunk. Do. daily to make sure your activity is aligned to your purpose 
  • ​Schedule important tasks and events in Do-Cal 
  • Coaches and businesses can have their own customized platform and add their own clients or employees 

We have come to Indiegogo  to ask for your help to make our web application into a truly mobile experience. . With your support we will get our Android and iOS  Apps to  market faster.

We dream of a world where every person who has a phone can  reduce overwhelm, and save time for the things and people they love.  With your help we can make this happen for 1 million people.

There is just one more small step to getting this innovation into your pocket. 

Imagine being able to capture your ideas and to-do's as you go along and then categorize those ideas into color-coded chunks of meaningful activity that makes sense for YOUR life.

Schedule only those things that need to be done in Do-Cal. Align your  color coded activity to your monthly goals, quarterly milestones, vision and purpose by simply switching tabs.  

Awesome features 

We have so many stories from current users of our software. We are helping Graduates to reduce overwhelm in their first roles. Helping people stay organized who are nursing elderly parents and helping property investors stay focused on their goals.  We love hearing about how much people enjoy using the software and that inspires  us to want to make the app even more beautiful and now mobile.

How cool would it be to have a smart pocket organizer for your entire life?

Score a monthly compass  to make sure the ladder of your life is up against the right wall 

Set your goals monthly knowing that you can easily refer back to your annual mission and plan and your quarterly milestones.  

And simply switch tabs to align your daily activity to get the right things done.  The entire system is color coded and  designed purposefully to match the way your brain prefers to work.

No more boring black and white static task lists! 

 
 
Upload your favorite images to your vision board where you can easily re-connect emotionally to your vision and purpose for every important role of your life BEFORE you start work for the day. 
 
In an age of overwhelm and distraction managing our precious time is our most challenging issue.
 
Now, for the first time,  you can make sure that your daily activity is aligned to your purpose in a simple, easy to use digital application that  guarantees to take you to you goals, dreams and mission.
 
 

What People Are Saying

 
"I just love it. My dozens of pages of lists are disappearing – not all gone yet. I particularly love being able to drag and re-prioritize items – makes my old numbering and highlighting seem very pedestrian." Linda Cairns 
 
"I use Dump Chunk Do every day without fail. Not that this is an achievement but it is a necessity for me. As a graduate in my first role, it can be really overwhelming to learn to manage what's expected of me on a day to day basis. Dump Chunk Do reduces that overwhelm because I am able to Dump all of the to-do's and demands that are constantly arising. I can then organize my time and prioritize  easily with the simple color coding and drag and drop system. I love how it also takes care of my personal goals too."  Grace Phelan
 

 

Premium Features for Coaches and Businesses

If you are an Executive Coach who cares about client results or a business that cares about employee well being, you can see below a  dashboard. This is where you add your clients or employees and  customize the user experience: All from your own unique platform called Coaching Room. 

All together we can make the mobile app free for everyone and co-create a positive wave that will impact a million lives

Everybody who contributes to our first campaign will become part of our story. Our values are around community building and we want to continue  to build the community with people who believe in the dream: As a  force for good. 

Our future product plan is driven by our users.

We now want to create a fun mobile experience that everybody can use - even offline! Always thinking of things on the tube or train where you have no signal? No problem, we will make sure you can Dump Chunk Do offline and then make sure there is full synch when you get back online.

Where we are and why we need you

After several years working our butts off, we now have a fully functional validated digital life planner.  Together with 13 International  Executive Coaching experts, our Founding Partners, we've harnessed the best of all our knowledge and expertise to provide amazing features to solve all of the productivity problems of the modern day busy working person who wants to reach their purpose.

We are lucky to be working with one of the most experienced app developers in Eurpope. To get a brilliant version 1 app we need to invest $62K for the IOS and Android versions and to deliver a digital marketing campaign for the app we need $50K. This will give us the data and feedback we need to raise our Series A funding.

This will help us reach our goal of positivley impacting 1M people. 

Our future product  development plan is based on what our users need. They have told us that it would be amazing to use our app  on the move. 

 

Join us to help 1M people reduce overwhelm

I spent over 15 years in corporate leadership development and as an International Speaker on women in Leadership. My research was published in the Financial Times, Daily Telegraph, Time Magazine and endorsed by the Secretary of State. 

I created my own system for reaching my goals because I had to manage my career and simultaneously bring up my 3 children as a single parent. I tried the Franklin Covey planner and Filofax and even Tony Robbins RPM but nothing worked for me as a single working Mum. I needed something simple that would help me manage my complex life. 

So I created my own productivity system that took care of my whole life from my health and spiritual goals to my businesses and career and simultaneously put my children center stage. I then taught that system to my Blue Chip clients.

I turned my proprietary system into a paper planner in 2010

(Old Facebook pic of my paper planner 2010 ) 

 

Then, whilst delivering a seminar at Google HQ 2012,  my  clients asked me to turn my paper system into software. 

This is me on stage in Belgium . I love my work because I love helping people and my mission is to reach as many people as possible in my lifetime. 

I also love to learn and grow so I said YES to the challenge from the  Google seminar and started putting my IP into  a digital format.  With no knowledge of Technology or the digital world it was to become the steepest learning curve of my entire career! 

We now have over 1000 happy users who have helped  us build this dream product by telling us what they needed from a digital planner. 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk to the business has been my lack of Tech knowledge. . I am a single Mom of 3 girls and I have a background in psychology not Technology or software. My passion is what drives me and I am committed to building the very best Tech Team who share my values to get this amazing product out to as many people as we can find in our lifetime. 

Strategic Partner

We are delighted to be working with Noble Manhattan as our key strategic partner:  The world’s longest established Professional Life Coach and Executive Coach training company. If you are interested in our Founding Partner offer but are not yet a coach, we offer training and provide accreditation. This opportunity could  provide you with a revenue stream: Please see the perk for limited number of Ambassadors to join our International Founding Partner team. 

 

Advisory Board & Team 

Our Advisory Board brings decades of experience across finance, technology and business operations. 

Zouhair Khaliq 

An international business executive with experience in board level strategy, operations, M&A, startups, turnarounds, telecommunications, mobile financial services, micro-finance and mobile related services.

 

Jim Jordan 

Jim is an experienced business executive whose current commitments include being a Director Consultant of BNI, which has over 200,000 members and 7.500 chapters worldwide. He is a Master Coach with the Coaching Standards Authority and a Platinum Member of LPW in the USA as a Marketing and Business Strategist.


 

Investors

Please contact us for our full business plan including deck and detailed financials which show a X 10 ROI over 3 years. Experienced  investors only please 

 

Other Ways You Can Help    

  • Please share this message as widely as you can can to help us reach more people and get closer to our goal of positvlely impacting 1M lives 
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

This opportunity could  provide you with a revenue stream: Please see the perk for limited number of Ambassadors to join our International Founding Partner team. 

 
Advisory Board & Team 
Our Advisory Board brings decades of experience across finance, technology and business operations. 
Zouhair Khaliq 
An international business executive with experience in board level strategy, operations, M&A, startups, turnarounds, telecommunications, mobile financial services, micro-finance and mobile related services.
 
Jim Jordan 
Jim is an experienced business executive whose current commitments include being a Director Consultant of BNI, which has over 200,000 members and 7.500 chapters worldwide. He is a Master Coach with the Coaching Standards Authority and a Platinum Member of LPW in the USA as a Marketing and Business Strategist.
 

Investors
Please contact us for our full business plan including deck and detailed financials which show a X 10 ROI over 3 years. Experienced  investors only please 
 
Other Ways You Can Help    

Please share this message as widely as you can can to help us reach more people and get closer to our goal of positvlely impacting 1M lives 
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Our coworking book / manual is almost done. You can choose between the German and English version. If there are many people interested for other languages we can translate it of course. 

 

What you give and what you get:

We use the money to get the first 1.000 books printed for you and to find out if we should print them rather 100 - 1.000 or 1.000.000 times and also in which language. How much money we need is very much depending on the number of books ordered. That's why we have chosen a flexible funding target.

 

If you want to support / pre-order our book about coworking you can choose between the following 6 options: 

  1. get the first edition of OUR BOOK: 25 Euro 
  2. OUR BOOK + come and cowork with us at CoworkingSalzburg.com for 1 day: 50 Euro
  3. OUR BOOK + we mention you with your name or company name as a supporter in our book: 100 Euro
  4. OUR BOOK + come and cowork with us at CoworkingSalzburg.com for 10 days: 250 Euro
  5. OUR BOOK + a dinner with us, the authors Romana Hasenöhrl and Romy Sigl. We cook a nice dinner (4 courses) for you and 1 friend: 450 Euro
  6. donation: give 5 Euros and get our good "do what you love" energy. We will send you a nice email and update you about the book.

 

How to support the coworking book without spending money? No problem!
 

Sharing is caring and spreading the coworking book to potential coworkers or coworking hosts is as important as financing the book. The coworking concept has the potential to make the planet a place where supporting each other becomes a common thing. This book is our tool to get the concept to the people - let's make it happen.

What you can do: share our indiegogo video with as many people in what ever way works best for you. Social media, blogging, writing about us and the idea, on any kind of media is great. We also appreciate if you tell your family and friends about us when you meet them in real life.

story:
My name is Zaynah Echols and I am the owner of ZaynahChantel LLC. ZaynahChantel is a company devoted to providing natural skin and hair care products to Men, Women, and children. To assist my customers in their natural hair/skin journey I would like to produce video tutorials for each of my  products so that my customers can get the best possible results. In order to do this i will need a quality camera (the camera that i currently have is broken) and I need help raising to money to buy a new and better one.

  I just need for you to donate 1 dollar so that I can bring my YouTube channel back. This would mean so much to me because it would open up so many doors by adding a YouTube Platform to my business. I have been wanting to make informational YouTube videos for a while now and I would really appreciate any help that I can get.

Every single cent of the money raised will be going towards the purchase of a Canon EOS Rebel T5i camera. I already have lighting equipment, editing equipment and a backdrop, all i need is the camera. So please donate A Dollar and share, it would mean so much to me (:

 

If you cant donate a dollar its okay-Please Share This Post ♥

story:
What is GoWriter?

GoWriter has already been described as the world's most advanced writer's software. After years of working with Windows 98 word processors, we thought it was time authors took a giant leap for all writers! 

Us writer's have been described as having multiple personality disorder, as we have to be in the heads of each and every one of our characters; each with different traits and characteristics. However, we've yearned for years for a software program that can keep up with us!

We are striving to integrate every major player in our writing world, including WattPad, NaNoWriMo challenges, #JustWriteIt challenges and much more!

No more. That's why I founded GoWriter. It keeps track of every personality, chapter, group, location and any other novel asset you can think to add to a book. It also cleverly organizes research to promote historical/trade accuracy and does it all while looking good.












We have two versions planned for this milestone. Each version and its features are listed below (don't want to bore you with a bunch of text).





What We Need


Expenses




Development (myself included) - Three total developers to focus on functionality, forward progress, bugs and issues : $9,500

Design - Two designers for application development and site layout : $3,600

Content Marketing - A single content marketer for optimal language throughout GoWriter : $1,500

QA Testing - A single dedicated QA Engineer to provide a fresh pair of eyes to locate issues and bugs for the best experience : $1,200

Encryption & Security - This includes EV Plus level SSL and AES 256-bit encryption of your data to ensure the highest level of security: $1,200

Development Server - A dedicated server for development and hosting of the live environment to make GoWriter available. This includes a basic dedicated environment (no stretch goals included) : $4,200

TinyMCE Enterprise - We've already negotiated with the official makers of TinyMCE to provide you with a MORE functional WYSIWYG editor with inline spellcheck and SUPER paste (one of the best Microsoft Word paste applications ever made) : $2,200

IGG Fee - We didn't want to inflate our goal and play it off as something else. We've included the IndieGoGo fee into our goals and want you to know about it : $2,150

This brings the total to $25,550 - a small price to pay for a huge leap for authors everywhere!


If we can't reach our goal:

We have a fail-safe in place, unfortunately it means it will take longer to develop. We will finish everything, even if it takes us a year, but if we can't meet our goal, we will cut the budget of the following categories in order:
* TinyMCE Enterprise
* Content Marketing
* Development Server
* QA Testing


Stretch Goals

We have three AWESOME stretch goals already planned:

  • GoWriter Premium Version
  • GoWriter Pass
  • BPE Engine and Sygno Thesaurus

What is GoWriter Premium? 

We are planning an even bigger and better version of GoWriter, one that includes never-before-used technologies like visual maps! 


This adds tremendous functionality to the GoWriter platform. This stretch goal comes to a total of $6,750 in addition to our base goal.
$32,300 total funding to make GoWriter Premium happen!


What is GoWriter Pass? 


Multi-Writer Collaboration

We love online-functionalities as much as the next person. If you're a gamer, as soon as you hear "online" you know exactly what that means: multiplayer. Just like the gaming multiplayer idea, we want to give you the ability to collaborate on projects. You would be able to add as many writers as you'd like to create a novel by multiple authors!


Cloud Storage

In addition to online collaboration, we want to add the ability to store your projects in the cloud. You shouldn't be confined to just one computer, we want you to be able to open and work on your projects from anywhere!

This is probably the most exciting stretch goal yet, except that we need to have GoWriter Premium done first. The total for this stretch goal is 14,800 in addition to our base goal + the GoWriter Premium stretch goal.
$47,100 total funding to make GoWriter Pass happen!


What is the BPE and Sygno Thesaurus? 

We're in the process of patenting two distinct idea concepts: a Behavioral Prediction Engine and a Writer's Thesaurus.

The Behavioral Prediction Engine

Ever hit a roadblock because you've been busy with your multiple-personality disorder from writing all of your characters? Fear not! We want to add an incredibly in-depth character creation process - so in-depth that we would be actually able to predict what your characters would do for you!

Not sure what your main character would do if he were tied up and thrown into a pool? Based on how you document his traits, he may panic and drown or he may realize that he kept that piece of glass in his sock for a reason.

This has to be our favorite stretch goal ever, we will make it happen one way or another - whether it's in two years or in six months is up to you!

Sygno Thesaurus

One of the biggest complaints of writer's is that they will repeat descriptive text. 
"His hair was peppered with gray linings."
We want to give you other writers' perspectives on another way to describe this gentlemen's hair! With online collaboration we may find that "a few rogue streaks of gray had begun to show his age."
Don't limit your writing to repetative nature. Beat it with our Sygno Thesaurus!

As you can imagine, these two are probably the largest projects of the stretch goals, but we're determined! The total amount of this stretch goal would be $18,250 in addition to our base goal + the first two stretch goals.
$63,550 total funding to make the BPE and Sygno Thesaurus happen!

story:
It's kind of like a rapid fire game-like price countdown! This brand new fast-paced concept provokes nail biting adrenaline rushes as consumers make split-second decisions: either risk losing the product altogether by holding out for a lower price or buy it as quickly as possible before anyone else has a chance.

App Availability

Our full app is still in development. In the meantime, you can download the iBuySell BETA!The full version of the app will be live after the campaign is over.

iOS: iOS limits BETA downloads to 2,000 users. To request access, click the button and leave your details. If there is a spot available, we will be in touch the instructions.

Android: Download BETA by clicking the below button- downloads are unlimited! 

*These BETA options offer limited functionality- you’re getting exclusive access to the platform before anyone else! Please provide your feedback here.


            

 






For Buyers - Keep discovering new products as the revolving showroom refreshes minute by minute with tons of new deals. Sales last for no more than 90 seconds and will give you a rush of excitement as you compete to win your favorite products at the best possible price. You’ll be faced split second decisions to either buy that coveted dress or purse at its current price or risk losing it to another shopper in hopes of getting a better deal as the prices fall lower by the second.


Sellers - Set secret sale minimums and move inventory quickly. With sales that last at the most 90 seconds and a limit of 15 minutes for payments, you'll know what you sold and at exactly what price in less than 30 minutes. That's a huge improvement over other platforms where auctions run for around seven days.



Unlike existing platforms, you won’t get stuck browsing the same products on a loop. With iBuySell, you’ll see the latest sale items under various categories every time in real-time. You discover new items rather than just search for products you already know.

The seller is responsible for shipping on iBuySell, but we provide the shipping labels that can be printed right from the app

Before the payment is released to sellers, sellers have to ship the products.Once the product has been shipped and updated with a tracking number, payment is released to the sellers. Buyers have 14 days to return an item if not satisfied. Buyers also rate the sellers once the item has been received.

Sellers can post their listings and share socially to attract more buyers. Every buyer gets iBuySell credit for sharing the purchase with his/her friends in social media. That is, for every social network share, you get credit towards your next purchase when your friends join through your shared link


iBuySell is for anyone -- individual sellers and buyers, small retailers, mom & pop shops, etc. Anyone who likes to online shop with no risk, small fees, and flexible options will love iBuySell. We will always be easy and cheap, but for a limited time,we are also completely free. The time to sign up is now!



Thanks for supporting our Indiegogo campaign! Back us, refer your friends and you can save a lot of $$ and win a genuine Coach Women's Crosby Signature Carryall plus many more rewards. Make sure you copy the unique “Share This Campaign” link on the iBuySell Indiegogo campaign page, and share it with friends, family and everybody you know.More details can be found in the update




iBuySell was co-founded by Kaus Mukherjee and his wife, Suchi, who migrated to the United States in the late 1990s. Kaus has always been a technologist and is currently working as a manager at Citigroup. His wife and partner, Suchi, is a realtor. With common interests of shopping and technology, they came up with the idea of iBuySell after researching different options for setting up an online retail business.

When he’s not developing iBuySell, Kaustuva works as an IT professional for a financial company. His long-held desire to create something new, mixed with a love of mobile technology, led to his creation of the company. For the past few years, he has also been running a very successful technical service based business and a small online retail business. It was his personal experience with the current state of mobile shopping -- too slow, unrewarding, unexciting, and too costly -- that finally gave him the push to create something better.

His goal is to help fellow retailers and small business owners use iBuySell to drive traffic to their own websites while continuing to sell successfully on iBuySell.

Suchismita handles everything financial, including fund management and operations.


We have boot strapped and self-funded the development of the app and is ready in beta. We need your support to finalize the development, and make iBuySell available for everybody, so please back our campaign and spread the word. We believe iBuySell will not only provide an exciting platform to shop for a variety of your favorite products in a fun and exciting way, but also provide economic opportunities for many small businesses and individual sellers

.

$25,000

  • Support for 20+ international currencies, including EUR, INR, CAD, and AUD.

  • Support for printing shipping labels outside of USA and international shipping carriers

  • Add wallet and automated payout.

$50,000

  • Improve personalization of the app

  • Support multiple languages

  • Additional support team to support global requirements

  • Sellers can set up their own schedule to sell products

  • Increase ad budget

Other Ways You Can Help

In case you can't contribute, you can still help 

  • help us get the word out and make some noise about the campaign.
  • You can use the Indiegogo sharing links on the campaign to spread the word and share the message

His goal is to help fellow retailers and small business owners use iBuySell to drive traffic to their own websites while continuing to sell successfully on iBuySell.

Suchismita handles everything financial, including fund management and operations.


We have boot strapped and self-funded the development of the app and is ready in beta. We need your support to finalize the development, and make iBuySell available for everybody, so please back our campaign and spread the word. We believe iBuySell will not only provide an exciting platform to shop for a variety of your favorite products in a fun and exciting way, but also provide economic opportunities for many small businesses and individual sellers
.
$25,000

Support for 20+ international currencies, including EUR, INR, CAD, and AUD.
Support for printing shipping labels outside of USA and international shipping carriers
Add wallet and automated payout.

$50,000

Improve personalization of the app
Support multiple languages
Additional support team to support global requirements
Sellers can set up their own schedule to sell products
Increase ad budget



  Other Ways You Can Help In case you can't contribute, you can still help   help us get the word out and make some noise about the campaign. You can use the Indiegogo sharing links on the campaign to spread the word and share the message

story:
TIDY-KEY, 

          A GADGET WICH IS UNRIVALED IN ITS CLASS

          A GADGET MADE OF FULL CARBONFIBRE

          A GADGET WITH A TRENDY, TIMELESS AND NEW DESIGN

          A GADGET WICH MAKES OUR EVERYDAY LIFE EASY

TIDY-KEY is the perfect tool to organize your keys and protect your pockets against holes and damage. Besides that, TIDY-KEY stops that annoying jingling of your keys. 

TIDY-KEY is the intelligent solution to sort your keys in a smarter and space-saving way –easy to set-up and maintain! (No assembly tool needed)

By using different lengths of screws (16 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40mm) TIDY-KEY can be expanded to contain any number of keys (up to 26 keys). Missing keys can easily be replaced with our carbon spacer rings.

Use our TIDY-KEY adapter to add big keys (e. g. car keys) to the TIDY-KEY

Always carry your most important data with you by using our perfectly fitting key-shaped USB-stick.

Never ever search for a bottleopener again or misuse a lighter. Upgrade your TIDY-KEY with our carbonfibre bottleopener.

TIDY-KEY is made of full high-class carbonfibre for maximum stability and an elegantcarbon fibre look. The shape is designed to contain both round and angularly keys.

TIDY-KEY is designed to hold 99% of all commercial keys. That means suitable keys are all keys with a hole and a length of up to 80mm.

TIDY-KEY is a registered trademark with protected design and form. Now we need your help to expand our production, set up our engine and to bring alife our brand new key organizer. 

As another Addition we are currently developing a lost-and-found Service by manufacturing small inividual and registered ID-Pendants that can be added to the TIDY-KEY.  (Will be available soon in case of a successful campaign)

Futhermore we intend to produce and integrate several matching add-ons like ascrewdriver and keyknife as you can see on the first picture. (Will be available in case of a successful campaign)

We are now ready to change up! - What ails you?

Possible Risks:

We have worked hard during the last months organizing our business, developing the design and setting up the production. As of today we have solved the initial problems concerning the substance and the right tooling equipment for cutting out and engraving the TIDY-KEY.

However, there are always some issues when a business is growing and you can never be safe that evertything works as intended. We currently plan to start shipping in Mai to have a little margin in case of unscheduled Problems.

We will do your best and promise full transparency on any unforeseen issues.
story_txt: TIDY-KEY,           A GADGET WICH IS UNRIVALED IN ITS CLASS          A GADGET MADE OF FULL CARBONFIBRE          A GADGET WITH A TRENDY, TIMELESS AND NEW DESIGN          A GADGET WICH MAKES OUR EVERYDAY LIFE EASYTIDY-KEY is the perfect tool to organize your keys and protect your pockets against holes and damage. Besides that, TIDY-KEY stops that annoying jingling of your keys. TIDY-KEY is the intelligent solution to sort your keys in a smarter and space-saving way –easy to set-up and maintain! (No assembly tool needed)By using different lengths of screws (16 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40mm) TIDY-KEY can be expanded to contain any number of keys (up to 26 keys). Missing keys can easily be replaced with our carbon spacer rings.Use our TIDY-KEY adapter to add big keys (e. g. car keys) to the TIDY-KEYAlways carry your most important data with you by using our perfectly fitting key-shaped USB-stick.Never ever search for a bottleopener again or misuse a lighter. Upgrade your TIDY-KEY with our carbonfibre bottleopener.TIDY-KEY is made of full high-class carbonfibre for maximum stability and an elegantcarbon fibre look. The shape is designed to contain both round and angularly keys.TIDY-KEY is designed to hold 99% of all commercial keys. That means suitable keys are all keys with a hole and a length of up to 80mm.TIDY-KEY is a registered trademark with protected design and form. Now we need your help to expand our production, set up our engine and to bring alife our brand new key organizer. As another Addition we are currently developing a lost-and-found Service by manufacturing small inividual and registered ID-Pendants that can be added to the TIDY-KEY.  (Will be available soon in case of a successful campaign)Futhermore we intend to produce and integrate several matching add-ons like ascrewdriver and keyknife as you can see on the first picture. (Will be available in case of a successful campaign)We are now ready to change up! - What ails you?Possible Risks:We have worked hard during the last months organizing our business, developing the design and setting up the production. As of today we have solved the initial problems concerning the substance and the right tooling equipment for cutting out and engraving the TIDY-KEY.However, there are always some issues when a business is growing and you can never be safe that evertything works as intended. We currently plan to start shipping in Mai to have a little margin in case of unscheduled Problems.We will do your best and promise full transparency on any unforeseen issues.

story:
Business in Heels began it’s journey over 4 years ago and quickly the fastest growing networking group. Today it connects over 100,000 business women and operates in 8 countries. Its mission to create a marketplace where women can succeed with equality.

Jo and Lisa the co-owners feel that today women in business seem to have the odds stacked against them

•They gender pay gap is in double digits and growing

•Women starting businesses is the fastest growing category in the economy and yet..

•Almost 40% fail in the first 3 years

We at Business in Heels are passionate about giving women the opportunities, resources and choices to help them succeed. Six months ago inspired by ideas of the shared economy we launched the Xchange platform which today connects a few thousand women.

To date we have tipped in all our money to get this off the ground. Now we need your help to make it fly.

•We need to tell more people about it and to help it get to the critical mass that will make it sustainable.

•We need to add a function that will simplify it use to filter for your preferences.

To do this we need $10,000

There are other platforms out there but they all want to either force you to do business or they want a cut of every transaction.  Ours is unique in that it combines our networking & trading platforms so you can build relationships and do business.  Plus we have one simple fee and no restrictions.

•Currently we have a couple of thousand women with access to the platform and we need about 5,000 to make it sustainable. If we used the money we raise on marketing then we would achieve this.

•It will take the balance to invest in the backend to add the filtering function so you can register your preferences, get notified when something that fits your criteria comes up. Either an outsourced job or a new product.

How can you Help?

By investing in us and our services you can make a difference not only for yourself but also for other women.

story:
As a HOST on Here & there you are not limited to what you can offer.

 

 

The categories are as follows: Indoor, Outdoor, Aquatic, Services.

  • Indoor - Activities can be anything from piano lessons to personal trainer sessions or even private events!
  • Outdoor - You LOVE yoga? Trecking? You know that very special picnic spot and had this magnificent idea of teaching Spanish there? This is your Category!
  • Aquatic - Anything from Paddle-boarding, surfing classes, Kite-surfing, as long as you are in the water. Feel free to categorize your activity as Aquatic!
  • Services - This is the category dedicated to the local service providers. If you are a nanny, carpenter, plumber, dog walker, you name it! Feel free to advertise your services with us.

 

 - The objective is to present you based on location

 - Simple to use and easy to find!

 

As a USER:

 

  • This is for you if you have ever found yourself visiting a new country and searching for "activities  nearby".
  • If you ever found yourself missing a player to play tennis or participate in a football match, this is the app for you.
  • If you ever found yourself looking to learn a new language, this is the perfect place for you.
  • If you ever found yourself looking for someone to fix your oven, this is the app for you.
 

Anywhere you are, you can find real activities and services offered by real people.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We come to the crowdfunding community because we know how passionate you are with innovation and change.

We set a minimal funding target simply because we already have the platform ready, however, we would like to be able to proceed with new functionalities as well as being able to offer guided support to our fellow entrepreneurs!

  • We hope that crowdfunding helps us reach out to the most service providers and we would like to dedicate a marketing budget to advertise their services!
  • We also have innovative features that are being developed but we can't share them just yet!
  • As for Licensing and infrastructure, we all have to take care of our legal due diligence but we would also like to grow the team.
  • Our perks are for those interested in becoming a part of the community, we really can't wait to get to know what you have to offer the world!
  • If we don't reach our entire funding goal we will continue to develop the platform, simply with less features and languages. (We still move forward, just not as fast as we can!)

Other Ways You Can Help?

Some of us just can't contribute financially but that doesn't mean there is no other way to help!

  • Please help spread the word!
  • Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Meet the Team!

Story from the Founder

Hello Crowdfunders!

Just to introduce myself briefly, my name is Mikahil, founder of the Here & there platform.

Throughout my life I've had the pleasure of living in multiple countries and getting to know diverse people and cultures, namely, Mozambique,China, the UAE, Portugal, Cyprus.

The story I would like to share is of when my family moved back from China to Mozambique 13 years ago.

It was 8th grade design and technology class and while we waited for the bell to ring our teacher decided to start the following debate:

Is money important?

As you would expect, 99% of the class went on to argue why money was/is important and how it basically meant independence, power, etc etc.

Once the class had settled, our teacher - Mr. Tom - asked if anyone had a different opinion, if someone thought money was not all that important.

Unfortunately for me at the time, I would be the only one to argue that case.

As the shy "new kid" it was difficult to debate this, seeing as even my new friends did not share this opinion.

However, I went on to argue how money is simply a means to an end, how previously we would simply "trade items" (as an adult I know this is called Bartering). I made other points to support my opinion but it was emotional, contradicting a class full of 12-year-olds!

Towards the end, our teacher finally told us to settle down and asked if I could make a final closing statement.

My final statement would be:

"If I could give you a billion dollars and put you alone on an island, the value of that piece of paper would be nothing. Instead, you would value the experience of being able to hunt or fish."

Mr. Tom always expected a fully disciplined class, waiting until we were all quiet to let us leave (even if the bell rang!). He would always end with "Ladies, you may be excused", followed by "gents" 2 minutes later.

On that day, after my final statement he said "Mika, you may be excused", the only one to leave the class early.

It was weird at first, I even thought I did something wrong!

In hindsight, it was very liberating and empowering.

 

The lesson I learned:

As an adult, I still believe what holds the most value is what WE have to offer the world. Being able to share our knowledge and experience is what gives us value in the “marketplace”. This is true with a 9-5 job as much as with freelance jobs.

It is with this same opinion that I would like to present a platform where activity  and service providers share what they have to offer the world, even if it is only their part-time passion!

In university and as a part-time freelance football coach it was difficult for me to find new clients if not through word-of-mouth.

I had no newspaper ad, no website or social media group to promote what I had to offer the world.

story:
dodl.es makes it simple to animate on mobile devices through collaboration with artists and other creators, leading to incredible new opportunities for creative expression!

Users can rapidly create animated scenes using their own content or by mixing, matching and tweaking animated characters, assets and content created by others.

Over the past decade, social media has evolved from text-based posts, emojis, and photos to more visually engaging memes, video with overlays and digital drawings to provide users with the ability to express themselves more creatively than ever before. dodl.es will fuel the next big leap in self-expression, removing the barriers for digital drawing, animation, and collaboration over social media.

In today’s fast-paced digital world, there is increasing demand for visual communication in order to stand out. Animation is at the forefront of effective communication and expression but has historically been a time-consuming, technical process. dodl.es has simplified this process for mobile in order to help users create impressive animations faster than ever.

 

By leveraging the creative content of others through dodl.es' open marketplace, users can produce animated stories (or “dodles”) without requiring drawing or animation skills.  The user simply searches for pre-animated characters, objects, and scenes they want to add to their dodle, and selects licensed assets to tweak, if necessary.  Users can then quickly develop an animated dodle, visually directing these assets by selecting actions and recording audio for characters to lip sync.

dodl.es is positioning itself as an advocate for creators by offering new revenue streams for self-publishing animated stories and to license assets such as scenes, objects, characters, sound effects, music, and voice acting, while also protecting intellectual property.

The groundbreaking animation techniques within dodl.es  revolutionize the process of creating animated messages, memes, interactive comics, stories, games and more. The capabilities of the app appeal to everyone from the casual hobbyist looking to create the next viral meme to the serious professional seeking to produce interactive advertising more efficiently.

 

We put dodl.es to the test and let you be the judge:

Dodles solves relationship problems

Getting parents off your back

Dodles takes on workplace violence

Craig Doriot has worked hard to overcome personal challenges of being on the autism spectrum and believes dodl.es will be a tool that helps others on the spectrum build effective outlets for their incredible gifts. It will help them forge careers without being hindered by the social stresses that leads to underemployment.

Recent Interviews about the benefits of dodles for those on the Autism Spectrum 

WBAY (TV Feature Report)

Tech.co (Article)

All Autism Talk (Podcast Show Interview)

The Autism Show (Podcast Show Interview)

 

Press

Recent press:

Tech Crunch (Article)

Techli (Article)

Spaceboy Universe (Live Interview)

Game skinny (Article)

Benzinga (Article)

First Comics News (Article)

The Pullbox (Article)

Comicsverse (Show Highlights)

 

Engaging at the Comic Cons

Check out how busy our dodles booth is at the Salt Lake City Comic Con. From our info table around to our dodleing contest drawing tables we consistently sustain a packed out booth.

SLCCC - Sep 2017

dodl.es is engaging creators, artists, and fans through participation at popular comic cons including the recent & upcoming exhibits at Wondercon (April 2017, Anaheim, CA), C2E2 (April 2017, Chicago, IL), Wizard World Minneapolis (May 2017), and Comicpalooza (May 2017) Salt Lake City Comic Con  (September 2017, SLC, Utah), LA Comic Con / Comikaze (Los Angeles, Oct 2017), CTNX (November 2017, Anaheim, CA), Emerald City Comic Con (March 2018, Seattle, WA)

We've been experiencing great enthusiasm at the shows from media personalities and people checking out the app:

Thorngard Art 

Joel VLogs (1:45 marker)

https://www.facebook.com/dodles/videos/vb.562729740535601/896131517195420/?type=3&theater

https://www.facebook.com/dodles/videos/vb.56272...

https://www.facebook.com/dodles/videos/pcb.8982... 

https://www.facebook.com/groups/335179706829203/permalink/518944895119349/

https://www.facebook.com/dodles/videos/986558894819348/

 

History & Risks

The physical rewards are being procured already, as we are filling the orders from a separate campaign. Our mobile app is over 95% ready for beta launch and we will begin beta by early November 2017.

Craig Doriot has a strong history of building successful tech startups from initial idea to sale (co-founder of Yupi who sold to Microsoft and Loansifter who sold to Optimal Blue).

Craig Doriot invested the initial $2 million to develop dodles over the past couple of years, and we've recently taken on a round of funding through 10 investors with $300K for our first external round and are in discussions for the second round of funding.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share to your friends and social networks to get the word out and make some noise!
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Meet Our Team

story:
Nagendra Goel 

has been researching speech technologies his whole adult life.  With a PhD, he set off to create a new kind of speech technology company ten years ago, called GoVivace.  Years of research on voice characteristics, the combination of powerful AI tools and advanced cloud infrastructure, made the time right to launch CALLai.  In the Enterprise market, GoVivace currently transcribes millions of words per month.

Contributors

Contributors will be funding R&D around the User Experience, as well as Sales and Marketing resources to create marketing programs, and distribution channels

What We Need & What You Get

We've settled on which characteristics to expose in Version one.  With you're help, we'll

  • Buy more curated data.  The more data, the more accurate our analysis
  • Finish the User Interface.  With the help of some world class UI designers, we can make a UI that is intuitive, and easy to view.
  • Create world class marketing campaigns to get the word out on this incredible tool.

The Impact

We're out to do nothing short of changing the conversation.  Today, we feel confident we can help you have more productive phone calls with our Version 1 product release.  But think about the other characteristics that wecharacteristics exposed in Version 1 'll be researching and testing for a future version.  With what confidence level can we detect a lie, or deceit.  Can we detect the stress that a person exhibits when their being forced to answer in a specific way?  The potential is enormous.

Risks & Challenges

Of course, with any AI based product there are risks and challenges.  Can we find enough good training data to get our confidence levels to a high enough level?  For the characteristics exposed in V1, we are already very close.

Ways you can help

By contributing $59 today, you'll get access to an early beta, and, if you like, help us mold CALLai with your feedback.  You'll also get the final released product for free, as well as any add ons in future releases.

story:
The Problems You Have:

  • Have you ever wondered where the money you make is spent every month?
  • Are you frustrated by countless apps that never seem to actually help you?
  • Are you tired of updating your budget spreadsheets every month or quarter?
  • Do you need a way to budget that takes up less of your time?
 

We get it  - most of you do not like to budget because:

  • Circumstances can change in an instant.
  • It’s too easy to get into a fight with my significant other.
  • It makes me feel like a dummy.
  • It’s too hard!
  • I never know how to begin.
  • Budgeting is a complicated process.

 

Budget Referee’s answers my questions:

  • Can I easily figure out where my money is planned to go every month? YES
  • Can this budget software actually help me with my stressing about money? YES
  • Can my budget take up much less of my time? YES

Budget Referee is the solution to all of these issues!

What do I do when:

My spouse and I have opposite views, and arguing is like trying to blow out a light bulb?

What the experts say about “financial literacy” seems outdated or too generic?

None of the other apps have worked, and I’m not so sure about this one?

 

Budget Referee reduces stress by:

  • Quickly understanding YOU and your FINANCES
  • Tracking expenses
  • Helping you save up for something down the road
  • Organizing your debt
  • Avoiding future trouble

 

They’ll tell you budgets are simple.

They are NOT simple - Managing your money is complicated.  Budget Referee is the answer.

  • Why?  Because it:

  • Connects to your bank accounts through a secured encrypted connection.
  • Automatically classifies your purchases, payments, and money in and out.
  • Cleverly gives you a quick overview of your current financial condition.

 

Used by individuals, couples, and households, Budget Referee is a proprietary budget app for multiple users, where each user can easily monitor their expenses.

 

Budget Referee is designed with a simplicity that makes it simple for users to control their finances.
story_txt:
The Problems You Have:

Have you ever wondered where the money you make is spent every month?
Are you frustrated by countless apps that never seem to actually help you?
Are you tired of updating your budget spreadsheets every month or quarter?
Do you need a way to budget that takes up less of your time?
 
We get it  - most of you do not like to budget because:

Circumstances can change in an instant.
It’s too easy to get into a fight with my significant other.
It makes me feel like a dummy.
It’s too hard!
I never know how to begin.
Budgeting is a complicated process.


 
Budget Referee’s answers my questions:

Can I easily figure out where my money is planned to go every month? YES
Can this budget software actually help me with my stressing about money? YES
Can my budget take up much less of my time? YES

Budget Referee is the solution to all of these issues!

What do I do when:My spouse and I have opposite views, and arguing is like trying to blow out a light bulb?What the experts say about “financial literacy” seems outdated or too generic?None of the other apps have worked, and I’m not so sure about this one? Budget Referee reduces stress by:
Quickly understanding YOU and your FINANCES
Tracking expenses
Helping you save up for something down the road
Organizing your debt
Avoiding future trouble
 They’ll tell you budgets are simple.They are NOT simple - Managing your money is complicated.  Budget Referee is the answer.
Why?  Because it:
Connects to your bank accounts through a secured encrypted connection.
Automatically classifies your purchases, payments, and money in and out.
Cleverly gives you a quick overview of your current financial condition.
 Used by individuals, couples, and households, Budget Referee is a proprietary budget app for multiple users, where each user can easily monitor their expenses. Budget Referee is designed with a simplicity that makes it simple for users to control their finances.

story:
It all started when our CEO, a racecar driver, had to start racing online due to COVID-19 restrictions. When trying to find a slim and comfortable sim cockpit, all he could find were ugly and bulky chairs hat didn’t fit anywhere, so he decided to create his own. The simple yet stylish design of the cockpit allowed us to adapt it to make it a desk and chair.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Adjust the right position for you.

 

 

Multiple driving positions, go from Formula to GT.

 

 

 

Double density foam that adjusts to your body for maximum comfort.

 

Our design allows for a proper posture with an even weight distribution, keeping you comfortable in long racing/working hours. 

 

Use your preferred sim racing gear, only adapt your wheel and pedals on our universal supports, and adjust the angle.

 

We have created the most rigid single arm cockpit on the market. Try to stand on any sim cockpit like this and see what happens.

 

 

 

Enjoy numerous features in a compact design. 

Dimensions when folded: 40 x 120 x 25 cm  -   15.7 x 47.2 x 9.8 in

 

We use premium materials that give the Speed Cockpit/Desk/Chair a unique look and make it durable. You can also upgrade and customize materials on some pieces.  

 

FROM COCKPIT TO DESK..

By just changing some bolts you can add different pieces like the desk surface and improve your outdated working setup.

 

OR SIMPLY USE IT AS A CHAIR..

Remove all accessories and you have a comfortable and adjustable chair you can put and carry anywhere you want.

 

Just remove the floor cushion to fold it properly as a chair.

 

 

Choose the version you want and get it with an incredible 20% OFF only during the campaign.

 

KEEP IN MIND:

  • Refunds do not cover taxes unless it is a manufacturing defect.
  • Deciding not to pay for import duties does not make you elegible for a full refund.

 

Choose any add-ons at checkout to customize or upgrade your Speed Chair/Desk/Cockpit and get incredible discounts available only during the campaign.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This might seem like an unconventional product coming from a fashion and accessories brand, but we put our efforts and knowledge into designing the most stylish and functional racing sim cockpit on the market. We have also worked hand in hand with a former formula 2 racer and with a team of engineers from an LMP 2 killer race car brand.

Since we are committed to the quality of every single product, we will not accept flaws until all components of the Speed Cockpit/Desk/Chair are perfect, this means that if there’s any imperfection on any of the pieces, we will fix them or re-make them if necessary. 

Manufacturing will start as soon as possible, we’ve made sure there’s available materials to produce enough pieces and have our team ready to pack and review all your orders. We also made the design as simple as possible to avoid any complication during production.

We plan on starting deliveries by October-November and if everything goes as planned it will remain that way. There is always risk in global shipping but we want to make sure our products can reach everyone and we will do everything in our hands to maintain a regular and quick shipping pace.

As an established company we have a very strict policy of 100% satisfaction or money back guaranteed for our customers. If for any reason any of our customers is not satisfied with our products or service we guarantee we will offer a full refund on what they paid. 

KEEP IN MIND:

  • Refunds do not cover taxes unless it is a manufacturing defect
  • Deciding not to pay for import duties is not valid for refund eligibility.
