story:
Our Story

The PEN project was established with our firm belief that each individual has interesting stories or ideas to share. Would it not be fascinating if all of us could share our findings by means of high-quality books?

At present, publishing a book involves a large team of editors, designers, publishers and promoters. This process is complex and costly, which discourages many talented writers from sharing their findings with the world. To encourage publishing, we develop PEN, which is a cloud platform that brings together all involved parties (writers, designers, publishers and promoters) for an enjoyable and streamlined writing and publishing experience.

 

Everyone will Benefit from PEN

Writers — PEN will empower you to publish professional-grade books without going through the hassles of layout design, typesetting, and marketing. Writing will finally be brought back to its essence: you will only be required to provide the actual content and PEN will handle everything else. Furthermore, you will be able to compare the costs and analyse the audiences of different publishing and promotion options.

Designers and Typesetters — PEN will provide you a market for promoting and selling custom-made layout templates to writers.

Independent Publishers and Marketing Agents — PEN will enable you to become listed as an official publisher or promoter, thereby enabling writers to easily find you. Any fee involved will be strictly between you and the writers. PEN will never claim any commission.

Readers — PEN will encourage aspiring writers to publish their works, resulting in a larger number of books to choose from!

 

12 Stunning Features

PEN will be a web-based platform – it will be accessed through your browser and no additional software installations will be required. The only requirement to start writing with PEN will be a free account registration. Every member can write two books for free! On top of that, every member will have access to the following 12 stunning features.

Feature 1: Write and Publish Your Own Book for Free

PEN will provide the basic design templates and useful tools to write and publish books for free.

 

Feature 2: Rely on Affordable Services to Improve Your Writing Experience

PEN will offer additional optional services at affordable prices, which include premium design templates, proofreading, marketing, and tailor-made solutions from publishing experts.

 

Feature 3: Mobile Friendly

Did you encounter a stroke of genius away from your workplace? Don't worry because PEN will be supported on all devices, including Windows, Mac, iPhone, and Android.

 

Feature 4: Never Lose Work and Write Anywhere with Instant Cloud Backups

You can rest while using PEN to write your book because instant cloud backups will ensure that your data will not be lost even when your own system fails. These backups will also allow you to write anywhere without the need to install additional software. Note: If you prefer to use PEN offline instead of our cloud service, we also have a PEN app for you.

 

Feature 5: Benefit from Advanced Typographical Techniques

Unlike many common word processors, PEN will optimise hyphenation to ensure a comfortable and pleasant reading experience.

Most common word processors have poor kerning or the ability to adjust spaces between the characters of words to enhance readability. PEN will use advanced typesetting techniques that will result in professional kerning.

Inadequate ligature functionality is another major problem of most word processors. This feature may seem a minor issue, but it can dramatically enhance reading experience. PEN will provide professional ligature to your text.

 

Feature 6: Use Professional Layout Designs

PEN will offer plenty of professionally designed layout options for writers. Regardless of the type of publication created — whether it be science-fiction, a cookbook, a travel journal, a comic book, or even a dictionary — PEN will have suitable templates for it.

 

Feature 7: Include Multimedia in Your eBook

A picture is worth a thousand words, and a video clip arguably many more than that. PEN will allow you to create eBooks with multimedia content, a feature that is currently missing from most eBook creation software.

Include your adventurous video clips into your travel journal, add scary sound effects to your horror novel, embed instructional videos next to your cooking recipes, or include trailers of the movies you reviewed. The possibilities are only limited by your own imagination!

 

Feature 8: Edit Images Easily

Pictures are a great way to bring more life into a book. PEN will make it trivial to include and modify images. Adding a new image will be as simple as drag and drop, and with just a few clicks our various retouching tools will produce stunning outcomes..

 

Feature 9: Collaborate Together in Real-time

PEN will enable writers to simultaneously work together on books in real-time, thereby encouraging instant feedback and allowing synergistic effect. Writers will be able to assign different levels of permissions to different contributors, which will clearly define the responsibilities of team members.

 

Feature 10: Publish in Multiple Channels

In just a few clicks, PEN will facilitate writers with the price-setting and publishing of works on channels such as Amazon, Kindle, and Lulu.

 

Feature 11: Spread the Word

PEN will integrate several social media platforms, such as Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. Besides this, PEN will partner with advertising agencies in order to offer advanced possibilities for publicity. This will allow writers to promote their works to large audiences, and with minimal effort.

 

Feature 12: Open API

This is a little technical: PEN will provide REST-based Open APIs that will allow developers to connect their websites and apps straight to PEN. This will enable the features provided by PEN can serve as a basis for other useful products and services.

 

Our Business Model: For The Community, Not For Profit

We aim for PEN to become a self-sustaining project. Many software projects provide great visions and deliver promising results, but they slowly fade away once the source of income dries out. We positioned PEN as a non-profit project to ensure that nobody owns a share of monetary value in this project. Every dollar of profit will flow back into PEN to further increase its functionality.

We are building PEN because we aim to provide enjoyable writing and simple publishing experience.

 

We Need Your Support

If you support us — We've taken the initial concept and ideas, sketched and now have a working prototype, but it's still a way off of being finished. Your funding will bring everything we've built so far to life.

If you don't support us — Without your funding support, we have no idea when PEN can be completed and released. It is definitely a great loss to writers and readers. If you love reading, if you love writing, if you love design, please don't hesitate, fund us now! Every penny you fund must be worthwhile, we guarantee.

 

Gift For Generous Supporters

As a token of appreciation, we will give all generous supporters a "Writer Emergency Pack" for free. It is a deck of cards full of brilliant ideas designed to help obtain creativity rejuvenation.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love PEN but not able to fund us, you can still help through the following:

  • Share this campaign via Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, YouTube, etc.
  • Share this campaign during lunch with your colleagues, friends, parents, daughters, sons and anyone you know.
  • Share this campaign with your cats and dogs before you go to bed.

Thank you for your support. Without your support, PEN will not be able to realize.

 

Development Timeline

The PEN project started in October 2015 — over two years ago! During this time we made a great progress, and we have now arrived in the most crucial phase: to acquire sufficient backing to fully develop the platform.

 

Technical Details

The core component of PEN is based on Python. The data is stored in a MongoDB setup, as this is fully compatible with Python and very reliable and performant. PEN will provide its services via Nginx and uWSGI. The Open API's will strictly adhere to the REST architecture. Everything will be hosted on Namecheap cloud servers, which will allow us to focus on developing the platform without having to worry about managing the hardware. As the development progresses we will be happy to provide more technical details to you.

 

About The Team

We are a team of designers and developers with over a decade of experience in building software and mid-stream research development and deployment. We are also book lovers and fond of writing. For a long time we felt the desire to create services to make writing and publishing easier and more enjoyable, so that many new talented writers can reach large audiences. We therefore co-operate with Lab Viso Limited, an experienced software company, to develop PEN. Lab Viso already successfully released numerous apps and web applications for the industry, including Gothic Institut, KEF, Red Wing Shoes, and Hotels.com.

The key members in the team are Gabriel and Cathy from Lab Viso Limited, Jimmy, and Maxime.

 

Risk & Challenges

The biggest challenge of the majority of software projects is to deliver the end result within the allocated time. Software development is notoriously hard to estimate in terms of the total amount of work required. The team leader, Gabriel, holds a PhD. in Computer Science and currently conducts mid-stream development and deployment as a R&D manager at The Chinese University of Hong Kong. He also teaches various subjects in Computer Science in the areas of system design and implementation. With his project management skills and academic credentials, we are confident that we can hit our targets within budget and on time.

 

FAQ

1. How can I use PEN to write my book?
PEN is a web-based platform. Thus, installation of any software is not required. You are only required to register an account in PEN, which will allow you to start writing through the platform.

2. What is the difference between PEN and other word processing software such as MS Word?
The grand majority of word processing software, including Microsoft Word, is developed for general purpose documentation. These programs usually provide plenty of basic formatting options. However, it is very difficult to achieve the level of quality that a book needs and deserves. PEN is designed specifically for writing books, providing professional results without overcomplicating the design aspects. Examples of such professional layout properties include an advanced hyphenation algorithm that produces beautifully spaced paragraphs, meticulous kerning, and automatic ligature generation that groups letters together whenever desirable.

3. What is the difference between PEN and existing typesetting software, such as Adobe InDesign?
Existing typesetting software is usually very advanced and targets expert designers and typesetters. Its learning curves are very steep, and for this reason a writer traditionally first finishes the content and then sends this to a designer in order to obtain a book with a professional appearance. Once the typesetting is completed, the output is returned to the writer for proofreading. Frequently, this cycle is repeated multiple times before the book is actually completed. This is extremely inefficient. PEN will reverse this process: designers will first produce the templates, and then writers will use these templates when creating content. As a result, writers can at any time be able to see how the book really looks like.

4. What is the difference between PEN and existing publishing solution such as Kindle Direct Publish (KDP)?
KDP is a traditional publishing model. When you finish writing the content in a word processor, your book is not yet ready for publish unless content layout design and typesetting have been performed, PEN is a new publishing model. You select the layout first before write directly on it. Typesetting is automatic. You will know exactly how your book looks like during writing. Once you finish writing the content, your book is in a format that is ready for publication.

5. Which file formats will PEN provide?
PEN will support exporting to PDF and EPUB, which are the two most common eBook formats. Publishers may offer additional formats. Once a book is created in PEN, it will be stored in a 24/7 online repository, so that it can be read or modified at any time.

6. Will it be possible for authors to request specific layouts?
Yes! Authors who wish to work with custom-made templates, or modified existing templates, will be able to request from the template designers.

7. I have additional questions, how can I reach out to the team?
For questions related to this Indiegogo campaign, feel free to email us at indiegogo@labviso.com. We welcome all your other questions at support@labviso.com.

Authors who wish to work with custom-made templates, or modified existing templates, will be able to request from the template designers.7. I have additional questions, how can I reach out to the team?For questions related to this Indiegogo campaign, feel free to email us at indiegogo@labviso.com. We welcome all your other questions at support@labviso.com.

story:
Short Summary

Consider an automobile engine without the expensive and annoying need for frequent trips to the  dealership or garage.  Think of an engine that has only five moving parts, no internal seals, weighs less, delivers superior fuel efficiency and lasts longer than the internal combustion engine.  Think of a replacement that also runs better in cold weather and doesn’t lose power at high altitude.

This is possible with the High-Pressure Double-Acting Rotary Stirling Engine.  And not just for cars.

Other applications include emergency preparedness, boating, camping; practically anything that requires a quiet, clean, reliable and efficient source of power.  This Rotary Stirling Engine also works in applications where heat needs to be moved from one place to another,  such as in refrigeration. Stirling engines, when rotated will pump heat quite efficiently.

The Internal Combustion Engine has been around for over two centuries.  During this time, its inherent flaw has required a legion of workarounds and modifications to address the problem.  Still, that initial, inherent flaw remains...  that the combustion is internal.  This is a problem that the Rotary Stirling engine avoids completely.  So the possibilities are amazing.

The internal combustion engine presently runs just about everything that moves, from cars to pumps, to airplanes, boats and backup generators. The Stirling Engine is used in spacecraft and in submarines. This variation of the Stirling engine, the Rotary Stirling Engine,  can produce power comparable to  the internal combustion engine.  It produces this energy more efficiently and, without all the extra parts, is simple to build.

I was brought up in a home where both my parents were private pilots. My mother taught elementary school and was a talented musician.  My father was constantly tinkering and inventing things.  He had little business education and was unaware that he could or should patent his inventions.  Everyone in my home town either worked for NASA, or one of the aircraft manufacturers or in a support business.  My father worked for NASA and one of his jobs was to do the actual wiring so that an ambulance could transmit EKG data from the field to a hospital. It was leading edge at the time.

With my father’s encouragement and guidance, I was always able to look at something and understand how it works and then imagine how it could work better.  I did well in Chemistry and physics.  I really liked the shop classes, and I was frequently the only one to solve the riddles posed by our drafting teacher.  After college, family, working, running a business, selling the business, I found myself with some spare time. After having to re-design the Stirling engine to work in another project, I began to see the possibilities of this design.

For further details about the High-Pressure Double-Acting Rotary Stirling Engine, go to http://stirling.nevadacan.com  


What We Need & What You Get

In addition to the initial designs and legal costs that I have already covered, there are five main categories of expense for this project:

  • Engineering                                          $25,000
  • Legal                                                       $25,000
  • Manufacturing                                     $17,000
  • Travel                                                      $18,000
  • Project coordination                          $20,000
This is the preliminary budget for a fully engineered prototype.  To complete the next steps  which are legal work and engineering I need $15,000

Manufacturing costs will depend on the final design.  I started out trying for a shade tree design that used existing parts, but a shade tree design can’t be efficiently manufactured and won’t maximize the advantages of this engine.  The whole point of this exercise is to build something that works better, costs less and pollutes less. Using a poor final design could delay the adoption of this engine for years. I have determined what kind of machining a test engine would take and a great design is less costly to produce than a poor design.

Engineering fees  are estimated at about $25,000.  The design is mine, but I don’t have the specialized expertise that is needed. For example: the expansion coefficients of various materials and which metal should be used where, what size bearings to use, how much material it takes to give a piston rod enough strength so that it only flexes within tolerance, or how thick the walls need to be to hold the pressure.  The working design has to be easy to assemble, use materials that are readily recycled at the end of their useful life, be manufacturable without special tooling and be repairable with a minimum of trouble by people twenty years from now if it gets damaged.  Engineers already know how to do these things better than I could even if I had time off work to go to school and learn each engineering specialty.

Legal fees, according to my attorney at Holland and Hart LLC, will run a minimum of about $25,000 by the time I get an engine combined with an alternator packaged and ready for market.  

The Impact

The Stirling engine as it exists today, runs in spacecraft, submarines, solar energy plants, commercial refrigeration plants and on the hobbyist's workbench. If they were cheap and powerful in addition to being reliable, non polluting and quiet - we could all be using them.  On many occasions, I have wished that something were available so I could buy it. A back up generator that doesn’t get fouled from sitting idle too long and that could run on whatever fuel was available for example. With volume production this rotary Stirling engine could produce the same power more efficiently and for about one-half of the cost of  the average internal combustion engine it would replace.

Risks & Challenges

When I look at existing Stirling engines and see them working with the limited heat transfer area and limited fill pressures and their slide seals I see a principle that works . Since I am not changing the basic physics of the Stirling, just rearranging the parts and getting rid of the internal seals, I am confident that it will work better than existing Stirling engines.This design has some engineering challenges. By hiring a competent engineering company, these challenges can be optimally addressed.  

Other Ways You Can Help

A lot of people each doing a little can accomplish great things. I am spread too thin.  Between working, taking care of a friend’s two year old while she recovers her health, keeping my family together and running this project I am overwhelmed. This project needs to be done.  I learned to build a website, but I don’t have time to maintain it.  I learned CAD but I don’t have time to learn to do it well.  I had to learn about patents and contracts  There are so many skills that I don’t have that are needed in this project.  All of these problems can be solved with a little money.

If you know about crowdsourcing, maybe we can design this project online. Are you an artist who can help communicate this project?  We need logos and illustrations.  We need a good name for both the project and the engine.

If you know someone that hates pollution and the internal combustion engine, tell them about this project.  If you know people who are worried about global warming and are open to a green replacement for their air conditioners and refrigerators, tell them about this project.  If you know someone who likes cool stuff, tell them about this project.  The more people that are aware of this project, the more likely it is to succeed.  The technical problems are simple, any other challenges can be met with your help

story:
Black Faves is a travel & lifestyle community created to make it easy for people to discover recommended black-owned businesses.

Why Black Faves Matters

The Nielsen Company projected that the annual buying power of African-American consumers would reach $1.1 trillion by 2015. Translation, if African-Americans were a country we would be the 16th largest country in the world. 

So how much of that spending is done with black-owned businesses? The NAACP reported that "only 2 cents of every dollar an African American spends in this country goes to black owned businesses." This is a problem. 

How Our Technology Helps

  • We make sharing and discovering black-owned businesses easy. Visitors can easily find nearby businesses with our location detection functionality.
  • Our members offer insider tips. We rely on our registered members to submit recommendations that give our visitors a first-hand account about their experiences with a business.
  • You can save a business you want to visit. Registered members have the ability to bookmark a business to their "My Favorites" list. This allows them to keep track of businesses they want to remember to visit. 
  • We provide business leads. Our members and visitors are motivated, they are actively looking to spend with a black-owned business. 

How Your Donation Will Help

  • 30% of your donations will be used to fund operational cost of the existing website (www.blackfaves.com). This includes editing, research, design, marketing to grow our member recommendations, web maintenance, and development to make web functionality improvements.
  • 70% of your donations will be used to build a mobile app (for iPhone and Android) that will significantly improve the user experience of finding and recommending black-owned businesses while you're on your smartphone. The goal is to launch by summer 2016.
If we don't meet our entire funding goals, this could delay launching on both Android or iPhone platforms. We would consider launching on one platform, for example on Android only.

The Founder

Black Faves was founded by Tanisha Blakely. Most recently she served as a digital product manager at Time Inc. Tanisha graduated from Columbia College Chicago, with a B.A. in Magazine Journalism. She started her career in Chicago as an online editor and then moved to New York and worked as an editor for VIBE and AOL Black Voices. She eventually transitioned to product management, launching web and mobile apps for New York magazine, Nickelodeon, Travel + Leisure, and Food & Wine magazine.

The Perks

(Note: This is a prototype of the mug, not the final product. Don't worry it will be very close to this but more awesome, I promise.) IMPORTANT: Included in the "Black & Highly Favored" Swag perk

(Note: This is a prototype of the tote, not the final product. Don't worry it will be very close to this but more awesome, I swear.) IMPORTANT: Included in the "Black & Highly Favored" Swag perk


(Note: This is a prototype of the tshirt, not the final product. Don't worry it will be very close to this but more awesome, foreal, foreal.) *IMPORTANT: You can choose a t-shirt or sweatshirt for the "Black & Highly Favored" Swag

(Note: This is a prototype of the sweatshirt, not the final product. Don't worry it will be very close to this but more awesome, pinky promise.) *IMPORTANT: You can choose a t-shirt or sweatshirt for the "Black & Highly Favored" Swag

Your business logo will appear in the footer on BlackFaves.com for 6-months. IMPORTANT: Includes the "Black & Highly Favored" Swag perk

Other Ways You Can Help Black Faves

If you're not able to contribute monetarily, there are other ways you can help:

  • Share this campaign with EVERYONE...on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, your Podcast, Website, over email, with your local business owners, your family, or wherever you can.
  • Become a member of Black Faves and recommend your favorite black-owned businesses, here: http://www.blackfaves.com/

story:
Just One Out Of Seven Billion Construction Blocks

I am an engineer (B.S. Mechanical Engineering/ B.A. German, University of Rhode Island; M.S. Material Science, University of Pittsburgh; Executive MBA, IE Business School) who has found his way to entrepreneurship.  In the automotive, industrial and aerospace industries, I have worked in some of the most exciting applications on the planet alongside some incredible teams.  Though I was born in the US, I have also lived in the Caribbean, in Canada and in Germany.  My work and leisure travels have taken me from Guatemala to Tierra del Fuego in the Americas, as well as to China, New Zealand and throughout Europe.
In spite of the political and geographical boundaries, I have found that people the world over share many commonalities: a smile means the same everywhere, everyone cares about their children, everyone cares for the environment, everyone would like to ensure that tomorrow is better than today, and everyone enjoys a day in the sun!

     

Welcome to a new way of thinking about the construction block! Welcome to Hadali Toys! “Hadali” means “sun” in the ancient Arawak language of the pre-Colombian Caribbean Antilles. And, who doesn’t enjoy playing in the sun! Hadali blocks promise to be the safest magnetic toy on the planet, while providing your children with an educational platform to learn about magnetism, colors, numbers and shapes, while also developing motor skills and abstract thinking.  Hadali blocks come in nine shapes with embedded magnets on all surfaces.  Some blocks have as few a six contact points, while others may have as many as 28.  Each side of the block is marked + or -, to let the user know the polarity of the surface.

 

Bring the blocks close to one another, and you find out how cool it is to build with Hadali blocks.  Unlike other laminar magnetic blocks, Hadali offers stair interlocking, which means that you are able to lock them together mid-way, one-third of the way, or one-fifth of the way.

Hadali blocks come in a rainbow of colors, including: gold, black, red, blue, yellow, brown, white, purple, orange, green and pink.  As time evolves, more colors may be added.

 

 

 

     Safety and environmental consciousness are integral to the Hadali design.  Our blocks integrate Polylactic Acid (PLA), neodymium magnets, a bit of arts and crafts glue and creativity (from you!).  PLA is a polymer made from sustainable, biodegradable resources such as tapioca roots, corn starch or sugar cane.  This means that we aim to protect our forests, create no carcinogens in the production process, and provide less waste when the toy is no longer needed.  Since no paint is present, as the color is integrated into the PLA, there are no interactions with Volatile Organic Compounds (VOC).  The overall size of each of the seamless blocks into which the magnets are embedded exceeds the choking hazard gauges by 10%, as illustrated below.  Did you ever step on the sharp edge of a toy at night when the lights are off? No need to worry, the corners and edges are all rounded to prevent such mishaps!

 

 

    “Whose blocks are these?”  You’ll know when you opt for the personalization of the blocks. Each block set can be personalized with your child’s name, providing a unique sense of ownership.

     “Please put away your blocks!” You’ll have such an easy time storing the Hadali blocks, because the sets of 26 or more come in a colorful lunch box. Smaller sets come in a cool recyclable cotton drawstring pouch.  Each option provides an easy and manageable way for kids to carry and store their blocks.

 

Why choose Hadali?  Compare the features with other blocks below.

 

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.

Hadali has been designed for additive manufacturing/3D Printers, allowing us to create the seamless bodies of our blocks. In addition to using the funds to purchased the raw materials, we will be purchasing additional additive manufacturing machines to keep up with demand.  Our operation is based in the United States and will ship world-wide.  We will manufacture in the US with components from across the globe.

PERKS

When you invest in Hadali blocks, you are not destroying the world’s forests, and you are not contributing to the build-up of non-biodegradable plastics.

You are getting a product that stands out with regards to:

  • Safety, with seamless bodies to protect the embedded magnets
  • Educational features, such as color recognition and geometric shapes, as well as an understanding of magnetism, structures, math and physics
  • Development of motor skills
  • Hours of entertainment
  • Personalization
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!

Our Perks Are More than Just Blocks:

  • Did you know that annually over 15.3 Billion trees are felled?  And our product does not require any wood?
  • Did you know that it takes PLA close to 24 months to break down in the ocean?
  • Did you know that 3% of our profits will go to charitable efforts?

For these and other reasons, we believe that our perks begin with the blocks, but others will follow, such as great value, including:

  • The use of sustainable/biodegradable material such as PLA to manufacture our blocks.
  • Zero emission of harmful gasses during the production of your product.
  • Safety such as seamless bodies to protect the magnets inside the body.
  • Educational features, such as geometry, magnetism, colors, structures, math, physics
  • Motor skills development
  • Entertainment
  • Personalized blocks

Hadali Bunny Set: 

  • 4 x Transitional L - Brown
  • 2 x Quarter Arc - Pink
  • 2 x Quarter Circle - White
  • 1 x Apollo Capsule - White
  • 1 x Cube - Brown
  • 1 x Rectangular Slab - Brown
  • 1 x Cotton Drawstring Pouch Bag
  • Instructions

 

Hadali Scorpion Set:

  • 5 x Cubes - 5 Red
  • 4 Quarter Circles - 4 Black
  • 2 x Right Triangles - 1 Red, 1 Black
  • 2 x Equilateral Triangles - 2 Black
  • 1 Quarter Circle - 1 Black
  • 1 x Cotton Drawstring Pouch Bag
  • Instructions

 

Hadali Pegasus Set:

  • 8 x Cubes - 2 Red, 2 Yellow, 2 Purple, 2 Blue
  • 2 x Quarter Arc - 1 Blue, 1 Red
  • 2 x Rectangular Slabs - 1 Green, 1 Yellow
  • 1 x Equilateral Triangle - 1 Red
  • 1 x Large Rectangle - 1 Blue
  • 1 x Right Triangle - 1 Purple
  • 1 x Cotton Drawstring Pouch Bag
  • Instructions

26 Piece Set - Colorful:

  • 8 x Cubes - 2 Red, 2 Blue, 2 Purple, 2 Yellow
  • 4 x Rectangular Slab - 1 Red, 1 Yellow, 1 Green, 1 Orange
  • 3 x Right Triangle - 1 Red, 1 Blue, 1 Purple
  • 3 x Equilateral Triangle - 1 Red, 1 Yellow, 1 Orange
  • 2 x Quarter Arc - 1 Red, 1 Blue
  • 2 x Quarter Circle - 1 Gray, 1 Green
  • 2 x Apollo Capsule - 1 Gold, 1 Black
  • 1 x Large Rectangle - 1 Blue
  • 1 x Transitional L - 1 Blue
  • 1 Lunch Box
  • Instructions include (Pegasus, Bunny, snail, camels (bactrian, dromedary), sleigh, more) 

The 26 Piece Set is Also Available in Single Color Sets Including:

  • Blue
  • White
  • Yellow
  • Red
  • Purple
  • Pink
  • Orange
  • Green
  • Black (Secret Perk and Toy Store Bundle only)

 

50 Piece Set

  • 12 x Cubes
  • 4 x Quarter Arc
  • 4 x Large Rectangle
  • 6 x Equilateral Triangle
  • 8 x Rectangular Slab
  • 6 x Right Triangle
  • 4 x Quarter Circle
  • 4 x Apollo Capsule
  • 2 x Transitional L

100 Piece Set

  • 24 x Cubes
  • 8 x Quarter Arc
  • 8 x Large Rectangle
  • 12 x Equilateral Triangle
  • 16 x Rectangular Slab
  • 12 x Right Triangle
  • 8 x Quarter Circle
  • 8 x Apollo Capsule
  • 4 x Transitional L

150 Piece Set

  • 34 x Cubes
  • 12 x Quarter Arc
  • 12 x Large Rectangle
  • 18 x Equilateral Triangle
  • 24 x Rectangular Slab
  • 18 x Right Triangle
  • 12 x Quarter Circle
  • 12 x Apollo Capsule
  • 8 x Transitional L

200 Piece Set

  • 40 x Cubes
  • 16 x Quarter Arc
  • 16 x Large Rectangle
  • 24 x Equilateral Triangle
  • 32 x Rectangular Slab
  • 24 x Right Triangle
  • 16 x Quarter Circle
  • 16 x Apollo Capsule
  • 16 x Transitional L

 

Where the funds go?

Currently, due to the support of a few contributors, this dream is ready to start a small production operation. A greater number of units delivered to you, however, would allow us to expand operations to include more equipment and raw materials.  Any funds raised would go towards the entire process: the purchase of raw materials, the production of the Hadali blocks, and the packaging and shipping, all done within the US. 

Primarily, funding aims to purchase capital assets and assume labor costs for a team to take Hadali to the next level.  Our effort will be manufactured and packaged in the USA.  Therefore, a win for Hadali Toys is a win for everyone involved in the process, from the suppliers to the children who receive the blocks to the recipients of our charitable efforts

The Giving Tree - Community Giveback

     Hadali Toys is more than just a company.  We aim to be a contributor to society by donating 3% of our profits back to the local community by investing in local educational programs.  Through these efforts, we hope to build more than just a toy, we hope to build a strong educational foundation in our community.

Risks & Challenges

There are two areas which will require some attention in the very near future:

  1. Purchase Capital Equipment 

Operations is among the largest investments for a company particularly when it relies heavily on manufacturing.  Overlooking operations can impact a number of levels from conceptual design to delivery, so lots must be simplified to execute to perfection.  

Considering the challenges, suppliers have been selected and are ready to fulfill the challenge ahead, from the most basic component to the most complex one.  The fabrication of these blocks has been optimized over the course of a year.  We are ready to go.  

A particular challenge ahead is a large demand, which would require for the operation to find a different location to manufacture your product.  Considering this case, we have reviewed a number of locations which could easily accommodate our operations right here in New England.

This operation can provide jobs with benefits from 11-15 individuals, thus providing creating a positive impact in families lives.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Following Us On Social Media

I’d like to thank the folks who have supported us throughout on social media. Even if you can’t contribute financially, you can still help by spreading the word on social media.
story_txt:
Just One Out Of Seven Billion Construction Blocks
I am an engineer (B.S. Mechanical Engineering/ B.A. German, University of Rhode Island; M.S. Material Science, University of Pittsburgh; Executive MBA, IE Business School) who has found his way to entrepreneurship.  In the automotive, industrial and aerospace industries, I have worked in some of the most exciting applications on the planet alongside some incredible teams.  Though I was born in the US, I have also lived in the Caribbean, in Canada and in Germany.  My work and leisure travels have taken me from Guatemala to Tierra del Fuego in the Americas, as well as to China, New Zealand and throughout Europe.In spite of the political and geographical boundaries, I have found that people the world over share many commonalities: a smile means the same everywhere, everyone cares about their children, everyone cares for the environment, everyone would like to ensure that tomorrow is better than today, and everyone enjoys a day in the sun!
     
Welcome to a new way of thinking about the construction block! Welcome to Hadali Toys! “Hadali” means “sun” in the ancient Arawak language of the pre-Colombian Caribbean Antilles. And, who doesn’t enjoy playing in the sun! Hadali blocks promise to be the safest magnetic toy on the planet, while providing your children with an educational platform to learn about magnetism, colors, numbers and shapes, while also developing motor skills and abstract thinking.  Hadali blocks come in nine shapes with embedded magnets on all surfaces.  Some blocks have as few a six contact points, while others may have as many as 28.  Each side of the block is marked + or -, to let the user know the polarity of the surface.

 

Bring the blocks close to one another, and you find out how cool it is to build with Hadali blocks.  Unlike other laminar magnetic blocks, Hadali offers stair interlocking, which means that you are able to lock them together mid-way, one-third of the way, or one-fifth of the way.
Hadali blocks come in a rainbow of colors, including: gold, black, red, blue, yellow, brown, white, purple, orange, green and pink.  As time evolves, more colors may be added.


 

 

 
     Safety and environmental consciousness are integral to the Hadali design.  Our blocks integrate Polylactic Acid (PLA), neodymium magnets, a bit of arts and crafts glue and creativity (from you!).  PLA is a polymer made from sustainable, biodegradable resources such as tapioca roots, corn starch or sugar cane.  This means that we aim to protect our forests, create no carcinogens in the production process, and provide less waste when the toy is no longer needed.  Since no paint is present, as the color is integrated into the PLA, there are no interactions with Volatile Organic Compounds (VOC).  The overall size of each of the seamless blocks into which the magnets are embedded exceeds the choking hazard gauges by 10%, as illustrated below.  Did you ever step on the sharp edge of a toy at night when the lights are off? No need to worry, the corners and edges are all rounded to prevent such mishaps!


 

 
    “Whose blocks are these?”  You’ll know when you opt for the personalization of the blocks. Each block set can be personalized with your child’s name, providing a unique sense of ownership.

     “Please put away your blocks!” You’ll have such an easy time storing the Hadali blocks, because the sets of 26 or more come in a colorful lunch box. Smaller sets come in a cool recyclable cotton drawstring pouch.  Each option provides an easy and manageable way for kids to carry and store their blocks.


 

Why choose Hadali?  Compare the features with other blocks below.


 
Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get
Break it down for folks in more detail:
Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
Hadali has been designed for additive manufacturing/3D Printers, allowing us to create the seamless bodies of our blocks. In addition to using the funds to purchased the raw materials, we will be purchasing additional additive manufacturing machines to keep up with demand.  Our operation is based in the United States and will ship world-wide.  We will manufacture in the US with components from across the globe.
PERKS
When you invest in Hadali blocks, you are not destroying the world’s forests, and you are not contributing to the build-up of non-biodegradable plastics.
You are getting a product that stands out with regards to:

Safety, with seamless bodies to protect the embedded magnets
Educational features, such as color recognition and geometric shapes, as well as an understanding of magnetism, structures, math and physics
Development of motor skills
Hours of entertainment
Personalization

Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
Our Perks Are More than Just Blocks:

Did you know that annually over 15.3 Billion trees are felled?  And our product does not require any wood?
Did you know that it takes PLA close to 24 months to break down in the ocean?
Did you know that 3% of our profits will go to charitable efforts?

For these and other reasons, we believe that our perks begin with the blocks, but others will follow, such as great value, including:

The use of sustainable/biodegradable material such as PLA to manufacture our blocks.
Zero emission of harmful gasses during the production of your product.
Safety such as seamless bodies to protect the magnets inside the body.
Educational features, such as geometry, magnetism, colors, structures, math, physics
Motor skills development
Entertainment
Personalized blocks

Purchase Capital Equipment 
Operations is among the largest investments for a company particularly when it relies heavily on manufacturing.  Overlooking operations can impact a number of levels from conceptual design to delivery, so lots must be simplified to execute to perfection.  
Considering the challenges, suppliers have been selected and are ready to fulfill the challenge ahead, from the most basic component to the most complex one.  The fabrication of these blocks has been optimized over the course of a year.  We are ready to go.

story:
Vote for your T-Shirt

Voting is now open. Vote https://trello.com/b/0upWCBmq/user-feedback
Exclusive design just for our Indiegogo-backers.


Featured on

Vice Motherboard | Techcrunch | Security.nl (Dutch)


Who is Lavaboom and what is this campaign about?

Lavaboom is a small team of developers and designers in Cologne, Germany. 

We’ve spent the better part of last year working on an email service that protects its users' privacy instead of abusing it.  Encryption and zero knowledge are baked in, and you don't have to worry about any technical details if you don't want to.

We've been under closed beta for the past 12 months and as we're preparing a stable release, we want to give you a chance to get early access at a great price.


The problem we want to solve: Your emails are like open postcards

Email is still the number one communication tool online - 2.3 million people are sending 150 billion emails every day. 

In 2013 Edward Snowden revealed the scope of the mass surveillance of the NSA and their partners in the UK, Canada, Australia and New Zealand. 90% of the data that NSA collects comes from coercive partnerships with Gmail, Hotmail, Yahoo and other US-based email services. American companies are forced by the US law to grant access to their servers and data - databases of users, their private communication and metadata- without having a way to oppose it! If you are a client of one of the biggest email providers, your privacy is compromised. The NSA can read your emails and investigate your online activity whenever they want.

Your email is like an open postcard. And you would’t put your bank details or other sensitive, private information on a postcard, right? 




Status quo: Encryption is still too complicated

How can we prevent our emails from being read by third parties? By encrypting them.

Email encryption used properly would prevent surveillance and take back your privacy. The main encryption technology used for email, PGP (Pretty Good Privacy), is mathematically and empirically proven to be unbreakable. It has been used by security professionals, hacktivists, journalists and governments for over 20 years. In fact, American three-letter agencies are probably using it to protect their secret communication.

You may wonder then, why isn't PGP email as common as say, HTTPS websites?

The answer is: because encryption is still very difficult to use. So difficult in fact, that if you aren’t a security professional or a very devoted individual, you would either not put up with the complexity/inconvenience or have a high risk of using it incorrectly (thus getting zero privacy gains coupled with increased exposure caused by using encryption).

Do you know how to handle key generation, key exchange, public and private keys, signing, generating subkeys? Do you know how to control the amount of metadata sent with your emails? Have you ever used your terminal or a PGP/GPG client? Do you even know what a terminal is and where to find it? See, it’s complicated :-) 

This is the main reason why, even though everyone is aware of the ongoing mass surveillance, only 0.1% of all emails are really private. The rest of us are still sending unencrypted emails, just because encryption is either unfeasible (most notably on smartphones) or too hard for casual use. 




Solution: Lavaboom - email encryption made easy

We at Lavaboom set out to fix this. We want to make sending encrypted emails as easy as dealing with simple, unencrypted emails. If you don't want to, you don't even need to learn anything about encryption. With Lavaboom you send email like you always did - our application takes care of encryption to make your communication secure and private.

1. Easy to use, modern interface

We spent a lot of time on creating a gorgeous and functional interface that works just like what you're used to. The technical knobs and dials are neatly out of sight, but they're still here, waiting for the tech-savvy users who want to feel in control.

2. End-to-end encryption

Lavaboom is basically putting your open postcard into a secure envelope that only you and the recipients can open. Key generation, discovery and exchange are all happening in the background - you can simply focus on writing emails. Based on PGP (Pretty Good Privacy) it's the same the NSA uses internally.


And hit send, that's it!

3. Zero-knowledge policy

Not only is the content of your emails private, your personal data is private too. Our policy is to collect as little data about our users as possible. If you don’t want to tell us your real name, that’s fine with us. Even if you'd like to buy a premium account, you can avoid sharing your personal details with us by paying anonymously via Bitcoin or cash.

4. Fully open-source codebase

When a company is claiming to be very secure, usually our first reaction is to doubt it. We believe that many of you do the same, so we have published all of our source code on GitHub. If you want, you can easily validate our claims.

5. Protected by German privacy law

The German privacy-protecting laws are among the strictest in the world. Lavaboom is a German company and all our servers are in Germany, which means that we do not have to comply with the subpoenas and warrants sent to us by the US government. Additionally, if the German government wanted shut us down one day, they would have to change their own privacy laws first.

What we need the money for?


In order to provide Lavaboom to the millions who deserve to be able to communicate securely, we need your help. This is how we are planning to spend the raised money:



What are the features of the Premium account?

1) Larger inbox size - a 15GB bonues added to the 2GB from the supporter package.

2) Custom domain support, so that you can use your @yourdomain.com with Lavaboom's email service.

3) Early access to our mobile apps and native desktop applications.

4) Access to experimental features in the client

5) As a Premium Supporter, you'll get a direct line and contact to our CEO, Felix.

About us

The Lavaboom HQ Team. From the left to right: Felix von Looz, Andrei Simionescu, Jonas Reisenauer, Felix Müller-Irion and Julia Zimmermann.


Felix Müller-Irion is an ex-hacker, cofounder and CEO of Lavaboom. He has worked for Bethesda, EA and was a part of the Chaos Computer Club during his teens. Felix has over ten years experience of testing security systems; he’s the reason Lavaboom came to be. 

Andrei Simionescu is the CTO at Lavaboom. Prior to joining Lavaboom, Andrei studied Computer Science in the UK, worked in open source (Google Summer of Code), research, and the industry. Andrei is the reason Lavaboom is so secure. 

Felix von Looz is our Head of Design. His experience in the design world spans over almost a decade and gives him a unique focus on usability which is reflected in Lavaboom’s interface. He’s the reason Lavaboom doesn’t feel like a security product. And yes, we try to hire at least 2 employees for every name.

Julia Zimmermann is our operations officer. She's the glue for the team, the one person who makes come together. She is a studied tradeswoman and service designer and has worked in the past in a renowned design agency. She's Lavaboom's mind and conscience. 

Jonas Reisenauer is our Office Assistant. Without him we would disappear in empty Club Mate bottles, starve and try to work without WiFi. He also diligently conducts user tests to help improve Lavaboom.


As a team we're absolutely dedicated to protecting privacy as a basic human right and we use Lavaboom on a daily basis.


Please support us!


Every single dollar gets us closer to the goal of bringing secure email to everyone.

Thank you!

story:
Introducing Main pyrus dms

(You can find a German version of our campaign directly on our website.)

Main pyrus dms is a document management system, which has been developed by a German team consisting of sighted and blind software developers. We aim to make everyday working practices easier for handicapped people.

Too many handicapped people still have no chance of taking part in professional life because the necessary software is lacking or not available at all. We want to solve this problem with our accessible software solution.


Digital document management for everyone

Across the globe, Main pyrus is the first document management system used to manage and archive digital data, which is accessible and can easily be used by everyone. It contains a search function that makes it possible to search for documents and projects by means of using different criteria. Furhtermore, all data is archived in an audit-compliant manner and document management processes can be retraced.

Another unique feature is the easy handling of the software. It has been designed specifically for blind and visually handicapped people, though the easy to use nature of the software can also support people with other handicaps or elderly people who want to have a professional come-back.



You can access the DMS with any current Internet browser. Main pyrus offers an elaborate roles and rights management to assign individual access rights for functionalities and data to a user. In addition, Main pyrus is multilingual. At the moment, our software is offered in English and German. More languages are being planned.



How will we use your contribution?

With $31,000 we will be able to make our DMS publicly available to everyone using the cloud. It will finally be affordable not only for big companies, but also for private individuals, as well as micro enterprises. For that purpose, we will rent more server space to set up our system. As soon as more people find out about the campaign and get inspired by it, our project is really going to take off.

We still have a bigger vision that goes beyond what we have already accomplished. There are more possibilities in using Main pyrus and we need your help to reach those aims. Here are some of our stretch goals:



We will remain true to our commitment of making inclusion possible, even if we don't reach our goal here. It will just take us much more time. More funds would also make it possible for us to expand and improve our services regarding updating and enhancing our software system. With your help, we can set an example concerning social sustainability and make inclusion in everyday working life possible.



What the press writes about Main pyrus

"Sighted users are also profiting from the easy, logical, and clear structure. The frequent 'disappearance' of data on your computer is now a thing of the past." - Frankfurter Rundschau

"As the worldwide first and only accessible document management system, the developed product prevents barriers in the handling of digital documents." - (idw) Informationsdienst Wissenschaft

"Workstations for handicapped people still have to be individually adjusted, which is expensive. However, that is not inclusion, meaning standard, but integration, meaning an exception, which has to be adjusted to the standard. Main IT is working on this new standard." - IHK WirtschaftsForum

"The innovative document management system by Main IT can considerably improve the participation of handicapped employees in IT working processes. [...] It is an extremely sensible product, which can improve quality of life for many handicapped people." - Pressemitteilung Hessisches Ministerium der Finanzen (press release of the Hessian Ministry of Finance, State Secretary Dr. Bernadette Weyland)

"Every person is different and has strengths and weaknesses. The accessible software can build bridges, so that everyone can work with it; namely people with severe disabilities, as well as everyone else. [...] Even mechanical engineering companies could, to Brinkmann's mind, [...], employ blind people, and then work with the system." - taunus nachrichten

"[T]he document management system can be integrated into an already existing software environment without problems. Expensive single-user solutions are thus a thing of the past." - PädWork

"[Blind employees] can now work with a web-based interface without needing to see anything. Content, for example, is being read out, so that the employee can orientate himself quickly." - Rhein-Main EXTRA TIPP

"The standard in handling has been set in such a way, that all employees can work with [Main pyrus], no matter if they are blind, visually impaired, having movement disorders or psychological limitations. The expandability of the application during the ongoing operations and the automatic process documentation are further innovations." - Hessen ModellProjekte

"Just as you wouldn't buy a shoe two sizes too big and then fill it with paper, or two sizes too small and squash your toes in it, Main IT supplies made-to-measure software." - Frankfurter Neue  Presse




Why do we need your help?

In the beginning, Main pyrus was developed for companies with an extensive amount of data. Now we also want to make it possible for private users and small companies to manage their data as uncomplicated and accessible as possible. We need your help to provide enough server capacity and enable the use of the DMS in our cloud.

Consequently, not only will handicapped and elderly people be able to use a very simple data management, but everybody who is interested in it. By using crowd funding, we can ensure that our products are kept independent and therefore will be affordable for every user.



Our Perks

We have different perks for you, including our very special T-shirt with our logo - which displays "Main pyrus" in Braille. And the gift certificate for your loved ones is available in English and German.




Our Partners 

These are some of our co-operation partners.




FAQ

I still have questions. How can I reach you guys?

You can send your questions concerning the Indiegogo campaign via E-mail to indiegogo@main-it.com  at any time. Otherwise, you can also reach us via E-mail to kontakt@main-it.de.


How can I redeem one of my perks (e.g. discounts) for Main pyrus?
After the end of the campaign, we will send you a voucher number either via message on Indiegogo or via E-mail. Please provide at least one possibility of those when choosing a perk. The gift certificate will also be sent that way.
Furthermore, we will contact you concerning your address for the USB sticks and shirts, as well as the shirt sizes.
Nevertheless, should there be any other questions on this topic, please don't hesitate to send us an E-mail to indiegogo@main-it.com .

When can I expect my perks to be delivered?
We will make an effort to send out the perks as soon as possible after the end of the campaign. Of course, sending out the E-mails and messages is a bit faster than sending out the USB sticks and shirts. As soon as we have a time frame, we will let you know.

Can I help in some other way?
The more people are interested in making accessibility possible, the better! Therefore, it's important to tell family, friends, colleagues and acquaintances about the topic, so that our project can gain a bigger platform - online, as well as offline.
story_txt:
Introducing Main pyrus dms (You can find a German version of our campaign directly on our website.)
Main pyrus dms is a document management system, which has been developed by a German team consisting of sighted and blind software developers. We aim to make everyday working practices easier for handicapped people.
Too many handicapped people still have no chance of taking part in professional life because the necessary software is lacking or not available at all. We want to solve this problem with our accessible software solution.


   Digital document management for everyone Across the globe, Main pyrus is the first document management system used to manage and archive digital data, which is accessible and can easily be used by everyone. It contains a search function that makes it possible to search for documents and projects by means of using different criteria. Furhtermore, all data is archived in an audit-compliant manner and document management processes can be retraced.
Another unique feature is the easy handling of the software. It has been designed specifically for blind and visually handicapped people, though the easy to use nature of the software can also support people with other handicaps or elderly people who want to have a professional come-back.




You can access the DMS with any current Internet browser. Main pyrus offers an elaborate roles and rights management to assign individual access rights for functionalities and data to a user. In addition, Main pyrus is multilingual. At the moment, our software is offered in English and German. More languages are being planned.





    How will we use your contribution? With $31,000 we will be able to make our DMS publicly available to everyone using the cloud. It will finally be affordable not only for big companies, but also for private individuals, as well as micro enterprises. For that purpose, we will rent more server space to set up our system. As soon as more people find out about the campaign and get inspired by it, our project is really going to take off.
We still have a bigger vision that goes beyond what we have already accomplished. There are more possibilities in using Main pyrus and we need your help to reach those aims. Here are some of our stretch goals:



We will remain true to our commitment of making inclusion possible, even if we don't reach our goal here. It will just take us much more time. More funds would also make it possible for us to expand and improve our services regarding updating and enhancing our software system. With your help, we can set an example concerning social sustainability and make inclusion in everyday working life possible.



    What the press writes about Main pyrus "Sighted users are also profiting from the easy, logical, and clear structure. The frequent 'disappearance' of data on your computer is now a thing of the past." - Frankfurter Rundschau
"As the worldwide first and only accessible document management system, the developed product prevents barriers in the handling of digital documents." - (idw) Informationsdienst Wissenschaft
"Workstations for handicapped people still have to be individually adjusted, which is expensive. However, that is not inclusion, meaning standard, but integration, meaning an exception, which has to be adjusted to the standard. Main IT is working on this new standard." - IHK WirtschaftsForum
"The innovative document management system by Main IT can considerably improve the participation of handicapped employees in IT working processes. [...] It is an extremely sensible product, which can improve quality of life for many handicapped people." - Pressemitteilung Hessisches Ministerium der Finanzen (press release of the Hessian Ministry of Finance, State Secretary Dr. Bernadette Weyland)
"Every person is different and has strengths and weaknesses. The accessible software can build bridges, so that everyone can work with it; namely people with severe disabilities, as well as everyone else. [...] Even mechanical engineering companies could, to Brinkmann's mind, [...], employ blind people, and then work with the system." - taunus nachrichten
"[T]he document management system can be integrated into an already existing software environment without problems. Expensive single-user solutions are thus a thing of the past." - PädWork
"[Blind employees] can now work with a web-based interface without needing to see anything. Content, for example, is being read out, so that the employee can orientate himself quickly." - Rhein-Main EXTRA TIPP
"The standard in handling has been set in such a way, that all employees can work with [Main pyrus], no matter if they are blind, visually impaired, having movement disorders or psychological limitations. The expandability of the application during the ongoing operations and the automatic process documentation are further innovations." - Hessen ModellProjekte
"Just as you wouldn't buy a shoe two sizes too big and then fill it with paper, or two sizes too small and squash your toes in it, Main IT supplies made-to-measure software." - Frankfurter Neue  Presse




    Why do we need your help? In the beginning, Main pyrus was developed for companies with an extensive amount of data. Now we also want to make it possible for private users and small companies to manage their data as uncomplicated and accessible as possible. We need your help to provide enough server capacity and enable the use of the DMS in our cloud.
Consequently, not only will handicapped and elderly people be able to use a very simple data management, but everybody who is interested in it. By using crowd funding, we can ensure that our products are kept independent and therefore will be affordable for every user.







Our Perks
We have different perks for you, including our very special T-shirt with our logo - which displays "Main pyrus" in Braille. And the gift certificate for your loved ones is available in English and German.












Our Partners 

These are some of our co-operation partners.









FAQ
I still have questions. How can I reach you guys?
You can send your questions concerning the Indiegogo campaign via E-mail to indiegogo@main-it.com  at any time. Otherwise, you can also reach us via E-mail to kontakt@main-it.de.

How can I redeem one of my perks (e.g. discounts) for Main pyrus?After the end of the campaign, we will send you a voucher number either via message on Indiegogo or via E-mail. Please provide at least one possibility of those when choosing a perk. The gift certificate will also be sent that way.Furthermore, we will contact you concerning your address for the USB sticks and shirts, as well as the shirt sizes.Nevertheless, should there be any other questions on this topic, please don't hesitate to send us an E-mail to indiegogo@main-it.com .When can I expect my perks to be delivered?We will make an effort to send out the perks as soon as possible after the end of the campaign. Of course, sending out the E-mails and messages is a bit faster than sending out the USB sticks and shirts. As soon as we have a time frame, we will let you know.Can I help in some other way?The more people are interested in making accessibility possible, the better! Therefore, it's important to tell family, friends, colleagues and acquaintances about the topic, so that our project can gain a bigger platform - online, as well as offline.

story:
The organizer to change your life

The FlowBook is the simplest yet most powerful tool to successfully organize your everyday tasks while ensuring that you work towards your life goals.

The best part: No preparation needed because the FlowBook meets you where you are right now. From there, your daily actions will lead to the fulfillment of your life goals while letting go of the non-essential.

 

Make 2021 your year!

The year 2021 will be the year of change. Seize the opportunity and make it your year with the FlowBook - with more clarity and focus.

We all are overwhelmed with information, expectations, and distractions and feel as if we are being lived instead of pro-actively shaping our life. We've tried a myriad of approaches to solving this problem and found the simplest and most effective system to be non-digital design:

 

Introducing the FlowBook

The FlowBook is a unique organizer that unites three parts in a beautiful cover:

  • The Task-Book is where you manage and tick-off your daily tasks while keeping them linked to your life goals.
  • The Goal-Book is where you refine and operationalize your life goals.
  • The Goal-Card is where you always have your life goals in sight.
     

With the FlowBook you only need three minutes a day to balance your daily routine with your desires for your life. 

 

How it works (only 3 minutes daily)

In the Task-Book note three tasks for the day designed to make the day a good one for you. Do that daily at the same time and before anything else, e.g. while sipping your first cup of coffee (see picture below).

Next, consider which life goal is supported by each task. The Goal-Card with its simple symbols helps you do this.

This short reflection brings clarity to what you have been living for so far. With the three tasks, you are prepared for the day with a clear focus.

 

Weekly 5-Minute-Review

Sundays the Task-Book will ask you to do a 5-Minute-Review of the goals you´ve been working on lately by scanning the last pages. You then pivot to a life goal that holds more value and plan at least one corresponding task for the following week.

 

Elaborating your life goals

The Goal-Book helps you cultivate your life goals to become clear on where you actually want to go. And the goal-oriented tasks make sure that you get there.

Once a week set some time aside to elaborate on your life goals. Choose one, that you haven´t thought through yet, elaborate it, define sub-goals and tasks for it, and keep them all in your Goal-Book.

 

The benefits of the FlowBook

After three weeks you will get a much better sense of what you are spending your precious time on and naturally will start to scrutinize your habits and focus more on the things that really matter to you.

That is why it is so powerful and effective: It´s easy to use and the learning and change happen automatically and without any extra effort. The only rule is that you have to use it daily for at least three weeks to start the ripple effect.

Each Task-Book has space for 8 weeks. After that simply replace it with a fresh one in seconds. Your Goal-Book and your Goal-Card is meant to stay. They are your stable set of goals that you sharpen and refine over time.

 

It´s simple, powerful, and elegant.

A spring bar made of stainless steel with a Swiss watchmaker´s precision replaces the typical ring mechanism. Our books have a stainless steel tube on the spine and are easily clipped into the spring rail. The advantage is obvious: You can turn the pages easily, write more comfortably, and changing the inlays works like a charm.

Replacing paper in the FlowBook takes two seconds!

 

Our FlowBook is flatter than any ring binder and much more comfortable to write. We produce everything by hand in Germany and we even produce our own special paper because we want you to get the best.  

This ring binder (left) and the FlowBook (right) have the same writing estate.

 

The FlowBook comes with three convenient metal clips, that help you to always find the right page immediately.

It's laid out in A6 landscape format to perfectly fit where you need it, e.g. in front of your workstation.

Here is our blog article with all the information for notebook experts incl. downloadable PDFs with the interior design of the Task-Book and the Goal-Book.

It´s sustainable

The FlowBook is built to last. We give you a 17-year warranty on the cover and a 47-year warranty on the stainless steel spring rails.

You can choose from vegan material, recycled leather, and fine leather, that is tanned with only vegetable products.

The FlowBook is 100% hand-made in Germany by Matthias and his company X47 and we do everything we can to reduce waste and produce as environmental-friendly as possible. We even produce our own paper, that meets our highest standards.

 

The FlowBook as a Christmas present

If you would like to give the FlowBook as a Christmas gift, we will send you a digital gift pack by e-mail or WhatsApp in time for Christmas Eve. Thus you can put it "under the Christmas tree" and the presentee can see what he/she can look forward to. We will deliver your FlowBook in January.

 

Pick your favorite style!

The FlowBook is handmade in Germany and available in two variants:

  • The exclusive FlowBook Steel uses two spring rail made of stainless steel
  • The more affordable FlowBook Flex uses two black Elastix

 

You can choose from three materials:

  • recycled leather in 13 fresh colors (for FlowBook Steel and FlowBook Flex)
  • vegan material in two ecological colors (for FlowBook Steel and FlowBook Flex)
  • fine leather in four modern colors (only FowBook Steel) 

The FlowBook Flex and FlowBook Steel come with three Task-Books (two are spares that keeps you covered for 6 months), one Goal-Book, the Goal-Card, the cover, and three metal clips. 

In this video Matthias explains and shows the differences between "Flex" and "Steel": 

 

Choose your favorite color!

You can pick from 17 (FlowBook Steel) and 15 (FlowBook Flex) different colors. We know they are all amazing but don´t worry, you will receive a survey after the campaign, so no need to decide now. 

We offer a range of crispy colors for you to choose from.

 

Save up to 40% more with your mates!

Find some friends to save even more on your FlowBook. Or give the FlowBook as a gift to friends or business partners. You can even design your own FlowBook and have your brand, logo, or name embossed if you buy 50 FlowBooks saving you a whopping 40% on the original price.

 

How is the FlowBook different from other journals?

100% offline: While working with the FlowBook there will be no pop-ups, alerts, messages, or any other attention magnet draining your focus. And you never need to charge it.

Light-weight routine: It´s so fast and easy to use that you will actually use it.

Made for real-life: The FlowBook starts where you are now and doesn´t require you a long upfront soul search that only delivers a high-flying plan that will be smashed by tomorrow's daily routine.

Clear overview: All your life goals are on one page and always in clear sight

Liberating constraints: improve your focus and get things done by limiting yourself to three important tasks

Short- and long-term: The holistic approach has it both covered: Getting things done today while constantly working towards your long-term goals

Visual: Uses your left and right brain hemisphere for better results

Process: Different from other task lists and apps the FlowBook provides you with a powerful process to continuously improve your self-organization

Wonderfully tactile feeling: finest materials flatter your hand

Simplicity: In most bullet journals you fill out so many boxes and lines that you hardly get the things done that you want. That´s why the FlowBook is reduced to the max.

Get some distance from the hustle and bustle by caring for your life before anything else.

 

What you get

Every FlowBook consists of:

  • 1 x cover (in the material and color you choose)
  • 2 x stainless steel spring rail (Steel) or 2 x black Elastix (Flex)
  • 3 x Task-Book (each has 64 pages for 8 weeks, Monday - Sunday, enough for 6 months)
  • 1 x Goal-Book (64 pages give you space for 15 life goals)
  • 1 x Goal-Card (a card for 15 life goals)
  • 3 x metal clip bookmakers (to find the right pages immediately)

 

Roadmap

We are close to the end of a creative journey that started 20 years ago when Matthias invented the revolutionary "spring rail". The FlowBook prototype is ready and thoroughly tested. Now we are ready to kick off "mass production" (if this is what you want to call our production process which is done by hand) as soon as we have enough backers to make the first batch.

 

 

Why we need your support

To produce the FlowBook we need a minimum amount of pieces to cover the cost of the die-cutting tool, printing one batch of paper-inlays, and producing the required batch of spring rails in this special format.

Thank you for your support!

Please let us know if you are missing any information by clicking "ask a question" above the funding progress bar.

Cheers from Germany and stay safe

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
