story:
Hello my name is David, thank you for visiting my latest project. I'm a design engineer located in Central Florida. This is the newest Dozer Gear product design project as we continue to get the Dozer Gear brand and business launched. Using Kickstarter to launch our product allows to broaden our product line as we transition to a full online retailer.

While we are neither the first nor the last Crowdfunding project to make magnets we think the DG-MAG magnets are by far the coolest. You can use them on any ferrous metal object such as your refrigerator, toolbox or locker to stick and metal pin notes or pictures. DG-MAG makes a great gift for everyone, they are safe, fun to use and play with. Choose from our great list of rewards with multiple material and color options. As always we would love to hear any comments or questions you have.

  Titanium DG-MAGs come with your choice of anodized color options.

The DG-MAG will come in 4 material choices

Make cool shapes, this reminds me of Darth Vader's shuttle

Vinyl Stickers included with some rewards

Thank you for stopping by and taking a look at my project. We know none of this would be possible with out the support from you as a backer. As always Dozer, my faithful slobbery snorting French Bulldog says thank you!

www.instagram.com/dmtgraphx

www.dozergear.net

Risks and challenges

With every project there is the potential for unforeseen problems or bumps in the road. This is my not my first Crowdfunding project and I feel confident that all potential bottle necks and problem areas have been addressed. I have spent a considerable amount of time designing and an equal amount of time planning the manufacturing and shipping components of this project. Please see the image detailing project scope and fulfillment timeline. We will be working with the same raw material supplier and a local machine shop here in Central Florida to manufacture the part. If all goes according to plan all pieces will ship on time. The advantage of using few materials and one design configurations is less variables and potential for issue during manufacturing, as taught by years of experience. Please do not hesitate to send me a message directly or ask a question on the project feedback page.
story_txt:
Hello my name is David, thank you for visiting my latest project. I'm a
 design engineer located in Central Florida. This is the newest Dozer 
Gear product design project as we continue to get the Dozer Gear brand 
and business launched. Using Kickstarter to launch our product allows to
 broaden our product line as we transition to a full online retailer.While we are neither the first nor the last Crowdfunding project to make 
magnets we think the DG-MAG magnets are by far the coolest. You can use 
them on any ferrous metal object such as your refrigerator, toolbox or 
locker to stick and metal pin notes or pictures. DG-MAG makes a great 
gift for everyone, they are safe, fun to use and play with. Choose from 
our great list of rewards with multiple material and color options. As 
always we would love to hear any comments or questions you have.  Titanium DG-MAGs come with your choice of anodized color options.The DG-MAG will come in 4 material choicesMake cool shapes, this reminds me of Darth Vader's shuttleVinyl Stickers included with some rewardsThank you for stopping by and taking a look at my project. We know none 
of this would be possible with out the support from you as a backer. As 
always Dozer, my faithful slobbery snorting French Bulldog says thank 
you!www.instagram.com/dmtgraphxwww.dozergear.netRisks and challenges
With every project there is the potential for unforeseen problems or 
bumps in the road. This is my not my first Crowdfunding project and I 
feel confident that all potential bottle necks and problem areas have 
been addressed. I have spent a considerable amount of time designing and
 an equal amount of time planning the manufacturing and shipping 
components of this project. Please see the image detailing project scope
 and fulfillment timeline. We will be working with the same raw material
 supplier and a local machine shop here in Central Florida to 
manufacture the part. If all goes according to plan all pieces will ship
 on time. The advantage of using few materials and one design 
configurations is less variables and potential for issue during 
manufacturing, as taught by years of experience. Please do not hesitate 
to send me a message directly or ask a question on the project feedback 
page.

story:
P.I.N.K. stands for

Persistent. Intelligent. Necessary. Kind.

New gender-equal opportunities for girls and women are (rightfully!) appearing daily. To prepare for these new opportunities, young girls are venturing alone across the Internet. They know there are opportunities out there and they're determined to find them. But they need help understanding what they're looking for and where to look.

Most guidance is taught at home so I designed my project to use everyday digital-device connections between parents and daughters to help parents steer daughters in the right direction. My goal is for girls to know that the person(s) they trust the most will help them navigate uncharted gender-equal possibilities.

Been There. Looking back on my days as an active single mom, it would have been so helpful if I could have read a succinct ebook or listened to a podcast on my commute home from work. It would have prepared me with smart ideas so that I could talk to my daughter about what needed accomplishing for school and beyond. And if she had a website to access with matching content, we could have had a productive discussion about her options and how to move forward.

At the time, there really wasn't anything available that could help me wisely engage in my daughter's development and simultaneously navigate my own life. Those thoughts, and my fierce will to succeed, are what fuel my drive to grow this project.

P.I.N.K. Backpack streamlines and strengthens parent-daughter engagement by using two-way hyperlinks between everyday digital devices like smart phones, laptops, tablets, and ebook readers.

Using hyperlinks and matching numbered steps, I designed a digitally synchronized environment between daughters' website instructions and parents' ebook guidance. For example, for the 'How to Respond to Gender Bias' topic, I provide a simplified explanation for daughters on the website and then a more comprehensive (but brief!) treatment of the same topic in the parent guidebook. The reason I designed content this way is so that parents can fill in the gap(s) of their daughter's understanding.

Benefits. By starting at home, you and your daughter can easily become a part of the gender-equality movement. For every girl who grows into her potential by utilizing P.I.N.K. Backpack resources, the women's movement will be that much closer to making gender-equality a permanent reality.

More details about P.I.N.K. Backpack's design and functionality:

http://www.pink-backpack.com

My dream is to help empower a generation of girls just like ​Trisha Prabhu. Trisha is a 17-year-old innovator, social entrepreneur, global advocate, and inventor of patented ReThink™ Technology. When Trisha was 13-years-old, she read a news story about the suicide of a 12-year-old girl from Florida who had been repeatedly cyber-bullied by her classmates. Trisha was shocked, heartbroken, and outraged. She was also motivated to pursue her love of technology to create something that would help prevent future cyber-bullying suicides. She created an app called ReThink™ that forces potential bullies to pause before sending a potentially-harmful message. You can read all about her work here:   http://www.trishaprabhu.com/media

Trisha was lucky to be able to follow her dream with the hard-won help of her parents. But along her road to success, Trisha and her parents experienced countless back-and-forth communication struggles and gender-based hurdles.
Their story inspired me to create a project that could streamline the information connection between parents and daughters so girls have an easier time of pursuing gender-equal possibilities.

For the past year, I've been working hard, in-between my day-job work commitments, to design and create P.I.N.K. Backpack. Here are the four topics that I published to http://www.pink-backpack.com and Amazon:

  1. How to help your daughter respond to gender bias
  2. How to keep your daughter safe online while she's exploring STEM resources
  3. How to help your daughter reduce science fair stress (so she can focus on her strengths)
  4. How to help your daughter find the right STEM role model

And here are the topics I want to add:

  • How to encourage and sustain your daughter's interest in STEM
  • How to help your daughter gain STEM practical experience (volunteering, internships, summer programs, etc)
  • How to help your daughter find a STEM summer program
  • How to create a STEM-friendly project space in your home
  • How to help your daughter bring her STEM invention to life
  • How to help your daughter find the best STEM books, apps, and games

Note: If you have other topic ideas, feel free to email me at info@pink-backpack.com.

Timeline

 I also want to add a podcast option to each STEM topic so that parents have the choice of listening to or reading gender-equality guidance tips for their daughter.

I want to pay it forward. I need your help to be able to quit my day job and focus full-time on creating more content to reach more girls. As the #timesup movement sweeps the country and gender-equality becomes an increasingly important topic, P.I.N.K. Backpack is becoming progressively well-positioned for long-term growth and success.  

My stretch goal is for targeted marketing to groups like Girl Scouts and Girls Inc. and other positive organizations for young girls that have a healthy dose of parent engagement.

If  you're not into donating money, no problem! This campaign's 'Referral Champion' perk offers cool rewards for helping to spread the word.

"This is exactly the type of work we

need in our ecosystem 

right now."

- Kate Brodock CEO Women 2,0

story:
Ahhaa- "A Free App" is a People to People Inspiration/Help Engine.
Ahhaa has already crossed 25000 users since its launch in April 2015 and has reached 3000 average downloads per day. The target is to take it to 1 million users by march 2016.
Money raised will be used towards spreading the awareness of ahhaa, thus more and more lives will benefit from this positive platform, also to enhance the technology whereby more people can shift their thinking and embrace positivity in all walks of life.

story:
Texting Can Be Dangerous! 

You know that you shouldn’t drive and text. It’s just too dangerous! You know you shouldn’t ride a bike and text. It’s too dangerous! You know you shouldn’t walk and text. Well, walking and texting are as dangerous but bad things can happen when you’re not paying attention to where you’re going!

But seriously, texting while doing anything else is not safe. And, what makes it even worst is that the average text user uses THREE messaging apps if she’s in Europe or the USA and SIX if she’s in Asia! Really? Yes! Not to mention all of the app-surfing that has most users spending 36 hours a week jumping back and forth between 27 different apps! 

Enough! Can we make texting easier? And safer?

Yes, we can. With YOUR help we can make it happen!  

Introducing the Text Message App Changing the Way We Text

Introducing Mingo, the app that will change  how you and everyone else texts by making text messaging easier and a bit safer. 


Here’s the deal, Mingo makes text messaging much easier because it brings all of your texting apps together into one easy-to-use app! No more text app surfing! And this means that you won’t need to jump from text app to text app to read all of your texts so you’ll have at least one less distraction when reading your messages.

You save time.

You save space on your mobile phone.

You’re on top of all your text conversations in one place, and...

You may save yourself from injury or worse because you'll have less jumping around to do. And you can help save others too. Plus...

It’s free! 


Your Help CAN Make it Happen!

Follow us here and at www.mingome.com. Join us in this quest to make text messaging easier and - more important - safer. Thanks!

Mingo in the News

http://www.prweb.com/releases/2016/05/prweb1340...

What the experts say




Joe Arthur, CEO, is a veteran of sales and networking. Joe’s initial vision is what has driven the development of Mingo.

Deirdre Arthur CO- CEO, is an entrepreneur and business owner with experience in sales and management.

Ken Anderson, Lead Architect, is a leader in web and mobile app technologies.

Ryan Leckey, Lead Engineer, specializes in engineering testable, performant, secure, and manageable software applications.

Cathal Glackin, Principle IT engineering Manager at Microsoft with over 20 years of experience.

Stephen Taylor Long term Group Manager with Microsoft with broad background in diverse technologies and international markets working with large high-tech companies in Ireland and U.S.A. 

Michael Corcoran has been involved directly in financial services for over eleven years with Corporate and Commercial clients.

story:
Wool mill in Iceland
Hi we are Guðrún Lilja og Brynjar Þór on Gilhagi farm in far north Iceland, near the arctic circle. We recently moved to Brynjars family farm with our 2 daughters. We are building up our future here with animals and nature and our goal is to make our full living here on the farm. We aim to be as sustainable as possible in work, food, energy and environmental footprint. After we moved to Gilhagi with our old cat, we´ve gotten ourself a few sheeps and a dog, the basic farmlife startpack. But at the farm we have been keeping bees for few years, we‘ve got now 2 beehives. Our project now is to open a woolmill here on the farm. We will buy wool from our local region and spin it to a great knitting yarn. We aim to make wool more valuable to farmers. The yarn will be high quality pure icelandic yarn. Not blended with other fibers. Your contribution will help us to buy specialized wool machines from Canada.
Our yarn
We will make high quality pure icelandic yarn from our farming neighbours here in the northern region of Iceland. It will be in all shapes and form. From thin to bulky, tight or loose woven. We need machines from Canada to make our yarn. We are aiming to raise $25.000 which is not totaly enough for the machines but it will help us much. Since this crowdfund is flexible we will get our raised fund so every little contribution will help us.
Our perks are of all sorts of yarn and wool, clothing from our yarn, photography from around our farm, handcrafted goods, planting trees and many other thing.
The project
Our woolmill will make different for us, our farming neighbors and knitters. We will be able to work at home, farmers will get more value for their wool and knitters will get high quality pure yarn which is desirable and much sought after. It is soft and warm, where lambswool is softer than from their mothers. We will use lamb and sheeps wool. We will get all types of wool, soft to rough which all can be used for different types of product. We will try to limit the waste of wool. So every workable fiber will be used.
Parallel to the mill we will open a visitor centre where our product will be sold and visitors can come to learn about sheepherding through out icelandic history mainly focused on their fleece usage. The icelandic sheep has played a very important role in keeping icelanders alive since they settled the island around the year 874. Visitors can also walk around Gilhagi´s farm to admire the nature and forestry with more than 50 different tree species and enjoy the beautiful landscape, scenery and stillness.
Icelandic wool
The icelandic sheep has unique high quality fleece of double fiber coat named tog and thel, that can be separated. Thel is closest to their skin, short fluffy fibers that is soft, warm and insulating. Thel is softer then tog while tog is the weather coat, long coarsed hair and water repellent. The icelandic sheep has many beautiful color variations and we intend to use them undyed or use natural herb dyeing technique from localy sourced material. Pure icelandic yarn has been hard to get on a regular basis in large quantities, but with this mill access will be easier.
The journey
To get the machines we will need to get a loan. Your contribuition in all shapes will help us much. We aim to be able to order the machines this spring and hopefully get everything set up and working this summer. We will change the farm workshop to house the mill but that all will be ready in the beginning of summer.

Can you help?
We hope you can help us in one way or another.
If you are not able to donate you can help us by sharing this with everyone you know.
You can share on Facebook or other media, send people you know E-mail. Maybe give your friends a call.
Keep in mind to use Indiegogo.com and share
Find us and follow on Facebook and Instagram
With love, peace, yarn and happiness to you all.
Guðrún and Brynjar; Gilhagi

 

Íslensk ullarvinnsla
Hæ öll, við erum Guðrún Lilja og Brynjar Þór í Gilhaga, Öxarfirði. Við fluttum loksins í Gilhaga í sumar, fjölskyldu sveitabæ Brynjars, ásamt dætrum okkar og stefnum að því að koma okkur upp heilsársvinnu hér á bænum. Hægt og rólega höfum við verið að koma okkur fyrir með nokkrum dýrum og nátturunni og stefnum að því að gera okkur eins sjálfbær og hægt er með tilliti til vinnu, matar, orku og umhverfis. Við höfum stundað býflugnarækt á bænum í nokkur ár.
Verkefnið
Við tókum við verkefni í haust sem hefur verið í undirbúningi hér í Öxarfirði í nokkur ár og snýr að því að vinna ull úr héraði, auka verðmæti ullarinnar beint til bænda, stytta flutningsleiðir og bjóða öllu handverksfólki upp á spennandi efni til að vinna með. Verkefnið snýr að fullvinnslu á gæða ullarbandi fullunnu í héraði. Til þess þurfum við sérhæfðar vélar til vinnslunar. Við munum kaupa ull af bændum hér á bæjum í nágreninu, ásamt því að vinna fyrir alla aðra áhugasama.
Þar sem ullarvinnslan er lítil í sér og unnið í smáum skömmtum verður hægt að benda á kindina sem unnið var af. Við munum fyrst og fremst nýta alla fallegu sauðarlitina án þess að lita bandið. Hægt yrði samt að lita með jurtum og helst þá með sem mestu hráefni af jörðinni okkar.
Bandið verður í öllum gerðum og stærðum allt frá næfuþunnum þræði, venjulega prjónabandi og yfir í stórband. Eins léttspunnu yfir í harðspunnið, í handspunann eða þæfinguna. Ykkar framlag mun auðvelda okkur að kaupa vélarnar og byrja sem fyrst.
Vinnslan
Vélarnar koma frá Kanada og ná að vinna ullina á hátt og stærðarskala sem ekki hefur verið mjög aðgengileg hér á íslandi áður. Vélarnar skilja sundur þelið og togið og vinna bandið í þykktum, gerðum og gæðum sem fyrri tækni hefur ekki ráðið við af íslensku sauðfé.
Hægt er að vinna allskonar þræði í vélunum svo sem geitafiðu, angóru af kanínum og alpakkaull sem og flestum öðrum ullardýrum.
Við vonumst til að ná að panta vélarnar núna í vor og byrja vinnslu í sumar. Söfnunin er með sveigjanlegri söfnunarupphæð sem þýðir að við fáum það sem safnast, þó við náum ekki heildar markmiðinu hjálpar allt mikið, allt smátt gerir eitt stórt.
Gangi allt að óskum náum við vonandi að skila af okkur styrkbandinu í septermber-nóvember, kannski aðeins seinna en helst fyrr.
Áfangastaðurinn Gilhagi
Ásamt vinnslunni munum við að setja upp gestastofu þar sem hægt verður að skoða vinnsluna og kynnast nýtingu sauðfjár með áherslu á ullarvinnslu allt frá því að land byggðist og til dagsins í dag. Þar verður hægt að kaupa afurðirnar sem og á heimasíðu.
Í boði verður að kíkja fallegan hring um jörðina og skógræktina hér í Gilhaga sem telur nú yfir 50 trjátegundir og njóta í leiðinni friðsældarinnar og náttúrunnar.
Hvernig geturðu þú hjálpa okkur?
Fyrir hina ýmsu styrkupphæðir er hægt að fá allskonar gleði. Ullarband í ýmsum gerðum, fullunnar ullarvörur, myndir og handunnar gjafavörur úr Gilhaga, trjáplöntun ásamt mörgu öðru spennandi.
Vonandi nærðu að hjálpa okkur að safna, sértu hinsvegar ekki fær um að styrkja en hefur áhuga á verkefninu máttu endilega deila því með sem flestum.T.d á Facebook, Twitter, senda tölvupósta og hringja í áhugasama um handverk og almenna gleði.
Endilega deildu í gegnum indieggogo.com
Finndu og fylgdu okkur á Facebook og Instagram
Endilega vertu líka í sambandi ef þú getur hjálpað okkur á einhvern annan hátt.

Ást, garn og hamingju á ykkur öll.
Guðrún Lilja og Brynjar Þór, Gilhaga

Visitors can also walk around Gilhagi´s farm to admire the nature and forestry with more than 50 different tree species and enjoy the beautiful landscape, scenery and stillness.Icelandic woolThe icelandic sheep has unique high quality fleece of double fiber coat named tog and thel, that can be separated. Thel is closest to their skin, short fluffy fibers that is soft, warm and insulating. Thel is softer then tog while tog is the weather coat, long coarsed hair and water repellent. The icelandic sheep has many beautiful color variations and we intend to use them undyed or use natural herb dyeing technique from localy sourced material. Pure icelandic yarn has been hard to get on a regular basis in large quantities, but with this mill access will be easier.The journeyTo get the machines we will need to get a loan. Your contribuition in all shapes will help us much. We aim to be able to order the machines this spring and hopefully get everything set up and working this summer. We will change the farm workshop to house the mill but that all will be ready in the beginning of summer.
Can you help?We hope you can help us in one way or another.If you are not able to donate you can help us by sharing this with everyone you know.You can share on Facebook or other media, send people you know E-mail. Maybe give your friends a call.Keep in mind to use Indiegogo.com and shareFind us and follow on Facebook and InstagramWith love, peace, yarn and happiness to you all.Guðrún and Brynjar; Gilhagi
 
Íslensk ullarvinnslaHæ öll, við erum Guðrún Lilja og Brynjar Þór í Gilhaga, Öxarfirði. Við fluttum loksins í Gilhaga í sumar, fjölskyldu sveitabæ Brynjars, ásamt dætrum okkar og stefnum að því að koma okkur upp heilsársvinnu hér á bænum. Hægt og rólega höfum við verið að koma okkur fyrir með nokkrum dýrum og nátturunni og stefnum að því að gera okkur eins sjálfbær og hægt er með tilliti til vinnu, matar, orku og umhverfis. Við höfum stundað býflugnarækt á bænum í nokkur ár.VerkefniðVið tókum við verkefni í haust sem hefur verið í undirbúningi hér í Öxarfirði í nokkur ár og snýr að því að vinna ull úr héraði, auka verðmæti ullarinnar beint til bænda, stytta flutningsleiðir og bjóða öllu handverksfólki upp á spennandi efni til að vinna með. Verkefnið snýr að fullvinnslu á gæða ullarbandi fullunnu í héraði. Til þess þurfum við sérhæfðar vélar til vinnslunar. Við munum kaupa ull af bændum hér á bæjum í nágreninu, ásamt því að vinna fyrir alla aðra áhugasama.Þar sem ullarvinnslan er lítil í sér og unnið í smáum skömmtum verður hægt að benda á kindina sem unnið var af. Við munum fyrst og fremst nýta alla fallegu sauðarlitina án þess að lita bandið. Hægt yrði samt að lita með jurtum og helst þá með sem mestu hráefni af jörðinni okkar.Bandið verður í öllum gerðum og stærðum allt frá næfuþunnum þræði, venjulega prjónabandi og yfir í stórband. Eins léttspunnu yfir í harðspunnið, í handspunann eða þæfinguna. Ykkar framlag mun auðvelda okkur að kaupa vélarnar og byrja sem fyrst.VinnslanVélarnar koma frá Kanada og ná að vinna ullina á hátt og stærðarskala sem ekki hefur verið mjög aðgengileg hér á íslandi áður. Vélarnar skilja sundur þelið og togið og vinna bandið í þykktum, gerðum og gæðum sem fyrri tækni hefur ekki ráðið við af íslensku sauðfé.Hægt er að vinna allskonar þræði í vélunum svo sem geitafiðu, angóru af kanínum og alpakkaull sem og flestum öðrum ullardýrum.Við vonumst til að ná að panta vélarnar núna í vor og byrja vinnslu í sumar. Söfnunin er með sveigjanlegri söfnunarupphæð sem þýðir að við fáum það sem safnast, þó við náum ekki heildar markmiðinu hjálpar allt mikið, allt smátt gerir eitt stórt.Gangi allt að óskum náum við vonandi að skila af okkur styrkbandinu í septermber-nóvember, kannski aðeins seinna en helst fyrr.Áfangastaðurinn GilhagiÁsamt vinnslunni munum við að setja upp gestastofu þar sem hægt verður að skoða vinnsluna og kynnast nýtingu sauðfjár með áherslu á ullarvinnslu allt frá því að land byggðist og til dagsins í dag. Þar verður hægt að kaupa afurðirnar sem og á heimasíðu.Í boði verður að kíkja fallegan hring um jörðina og skógræktina hér í Gilhaga sem telur nú yfir 50 trjátegundir og njóta í leiðinni friðsældarinnar og náttúrunnar.Hvernig geturðu þú hjálpa okkur?Fyrir hina ýmsu styrkupphæðir er hægt að fá allskonar gleði. Ullarband í ýmsum gerðum, fullunnar ullarvörur, myndir og handunnar gjafavörur úr Gilhaga, trjáplöntun ásamt mörgu öðru spennandi.Vonandi nærðu að hjálpa okkur að safna, sértu hinsvegar ekki fær um að styrkja en hefur áhuga á verkefninu máttu endilega deila því með sem flestum.T.d á Facebook, Twitter, senda tölvupósta og hringja í áhugasama um handverk og almenna gleði.Endilega deildu í gegnum indieggogo.comFinndu og fylgdu okkur á Facebook og InstagramEndilega vertu líka í sambandi ef þú getur hjálpað okkur á einhvern annan hátt.Ást, garn og hamingju á ykkur öll.Guðrún Lilja og Brynjar Þór, Gilhaga

story:
Technology is changing all around us, advances popping up at an unprecedented rate. It has gotten to the point that it is expected for life to get easier day after day and offer us greater levels of comfort. From the living room to the bathroom and beyond, out into the world, no matter where you decide to go, you can count on technology to simplify any task and keep you connected to the services and people you need.

In this trend, we have developed a mobile app for on-demand laundry service. It’s called Washitto, and it’s designed to make it easier for you to get laundry delivered when you need it. Whereas other laundry services are unreliable and slow, Washitto is the promising revolution. Top-quality laundry service is just a few clicks away. The rates are fixed for small and large bags. Dry cleaning, tailoring, membership and rewards programs are also offered. This app is simultaneously going to create new, flexible jobs and make the process of doing your laundry more convenient!

The Laundry industry has been the same for more than 2 decades. Most local laundromats offer drop-off but not pick-up, delivery, customizable, and personalized laundry service, when you want it and how you want it.  

Some of the issues include;

  • Lack of Time
  • Lack of Resources
  • Not all Laundromats are open 24/7
  • No rush service under 8 hours
  • Non-personalized logistics
  • Scarcity of details on how you want your laundry done. 

Laundry service is just a few clicks away! True on demand service so you don’t have to call or walk over to your local laundromat to place your order. 

User friendly interface that allows you to get your laundry picked up Right NOW! The UI also lets you to modify delivery options even after you placed your order.

At a flat-rate, you don't have to worry about being charged per pound or hidden fees. The fixed rates are $39 for a small bag and $49 for a large bag. This is an exclusive offer for backers on Indiegogo.

 
 
 
 
 

We are turning to the people on Indiegogo, those that hate doing laundry in order to crowdfund twenty grand. Every contribution will help us expand our business to major cities, pre-sell the service, and finish our app development. We will focus first on the major markets and expand Washitto into areas worldwide. As a thank you, we are offering some exciting rewards to our contributors, including exclusive beta access to Washitto App and branded merchandise, perfect for advertising your support for the app.

After my last job, looking to have some sort of absentee business, I considered purchasing a laundromat. After heavy research and making a business plan, I got the idea of creating a laundry app to market the existing business. A few months later, after researching and testing other delivery services, I decided to jump in the venture of pursuing my tech side and create my first mobile app. That’s when Washitto was born, an on-demand laundry service, that is based on a per bag rate with instant pick up and delivery in 6 hours or less. Food and e-commerce industries offer 2 hour delivery, why doesn’t laundry?

After gathering the ideas and current issues in the laundry industry, I started to design the UI/UX of the mobile app. I started spreading the word by going to networking events and everyone told me that this was a great idea. So instead of buying a laundromat, I began development in June. The app is currently 85% done, but we want to take it to the next level. Instead of just having it locally, we want to expand to other major cities. That’s why we are turning to all the people that hate doing laundry.

Anytime something new comes along, it always takes time for people to adopt it. People are fed up with traditional laundry services, from the prices to the service itself. We believe that this is going to catch on very quickly. Whatever challenges arise along the way, we will face them efficiently and intelligently!

 

Outside of making a monetary contribution, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing our campaign with everyone you know. Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram are all excellent avenues for letting people know what we are doing, or walk around sporting our cool merch. We appreciate your support and thank you for taking the time to read our plans.

story:
Hi! I am Graham. 

I am an physicist, though, I work as an engineer. I spend a lot my day reading the web, whether it is for research or entertainment, since I am dyslexic this reading is slow and requires a large amount of concentration.

Reading is a vital part of studying any subject, and with almost any career. The constant struggle with figuring out words breaks the immersiveness of a good story as you never really get pulled into the flow. I hope that LucidRead will get you better grades, or a promotion or just make reading a more immersive and enjoyable experience.

Spell check is a great way to detect errors from brain to page. But, there is no software that can detect errors from page to brain. This is a huge obstacle for people with dyslexia. This project aims to help minimise reading errors for those with dyslexia, and who knows, perhaps those without as well. The concept is simple increase the contrast between letters that are often misread, using colour. The user can configure the letters they commonly confuse and choose the color and formatting for each. This allows each individual to set up their browser to be the best suited to their needs. This project intends to achieve this as a Google Chrome extension.

The proof of concept results are below with contrast on 'b' and 'd'

 

below is a mock up of the themes and settings for Lucid read.

 

 

Check out the trello board to follow my progress: https://trello.com/b/b1ZbZfiT/lucidread 

intrested in the code? its on Github https://github.com/G-Webber/LucidRead

story:
Risks and challenges

We will be manufacturing in Chandler, AZ, USA. The primary challenge we would be facing is the manufacturing and logistics side of things. Our delivery estimate already includes the extra time to account for the inevitable small delays that accumulate in a project of this complexity.

However, if a supplier experiences an unexpected and significant delay – natural disaster, localized trade disruption, financial insolvency, alien invasion – our delivery schedule could be impacted.

We have carefully selected our suppliers based on a number of criteria, including:

• Reliability & trustworthiness 
• Experience of suppliers 
• Personal rapport 
• In-person factory visits

We are confident that our choice of factory partner will limit potential challenges. Furthermore, we have visited and inspected their factories on several occasions, preparing them for this project. And if all else fails, we have a ready backup factory all prepped and raring to go.

story:
Imagine waking up, feeling inspired + excited to begin your day with intention.

Imagine having a place to plot your dreams, having the space to plan your goals.

Imagine having a day-to-day system to keep track of the person you are becoming.

Healthy, happy, whole.

Inspired + inspiring.

Powerful. Proud.

 

The Empowered Life Planner is not just a day planner. It's a LIFE PLANNER.

It's your goal setter.

Your accountability partner.

Your life coach. Your healthy living advocate.

Yes, it has space to keep track of your appointments and commitments. But it features space to log your healthy meals, self care and movement each day, to list what you're grateful for and to create a mantra along with your goals for the week. 

Throughout the planner you also will find wellness tips, inspirational quotes, short recipes, guided short journal entries, and motivation to complete specific acts for yourself and others.

 

It's Nice To Meet You!

I'm Stephanie Popso, veteran wellness coach & founder of the Empowered Life Planner. Many of us know things we could change to be happier and healthier versions of ourselves. But why is it so hard to take action? I created The Empowered Life Planner so we can have the support we need to stay organized and accountable, and create time for a healthier and happier mind and body. So we can put our goals into action & be the director of our life in just 3 minutes a day. 

Features and Specifications:

 Cover Options:

Faux black leather | Taupe Linen with Black Stamping | Red & Navy Linen with Gold Stamping.

One large inside pocket inside the cover 


Two ribbons to easily locate your monthly or daily calendar location

 Explanation and example pages


2018 goals worksheet

Monthly calendar at the beginning of each month

Daily prompts to greet the day with power & ease

Perforated and unperforated blank sheets in the back
Made from 30% recycled paper and printed with soy ink
Created, printed and manufactured in Michigan

 

The Empowered Life Planner is an Overflowing Toolbox for Personal Growth, Accountability & Development

Inside of it's pages lives: 

 

This is a stepping stone to the next version of you.

A system to keep you moving forward.

A structure to keep you supported.

The Empowered Life Planner is a place to create your life.

To plan with power.

To plan with ease.

To make life happen, one page at a time.

 

Invest in you & reserve your planner today for a more optimal 2018!

 

More than 1,000 people purchased The Empowered Life Planner in 2017.  

                   

Here is what a few of them had to say:
• "Planning has become a self-care measure and allows me space to journal thoughts and emotions along with the to-dos... Highly recommend to anyone looking to elevate their well being and organization!"
• "I am a very organized person who has relied on google calendar for years but realized that I was missing an opportunity to reflect on my day, set goals, and monitor progress throughout the year. I am so glad that I stumbled on the Naturally Empowered planner."
•  "The planner is so well thought out and a true guide, no matter what one's situation might be. And I love the wellness tips and quotes -- they are helping me take care of my mind and body in ways I may not have without the gentle reminders and realize the ways in which I should feel proud of the healthy choices I'm making." 

 

Our Goal

Our goal of $10,000 will ensure we can place a minimum order quantity of 500 planners. This doubles last years goal & we are more than passionate to reach it so we can help even more people live their optimal lives. If we do not reach our entire goal, we will order as many planners as we can with the final contributions. With your help, I hope we can blast through our goal & I promise to come up with some creative and enticing PUSH goals!

 

The sooner we reach our goal, the sooner you have your planner!

They will ship no later than early December, but if we reach our goal early, we hope to have your planners in your arms by the end November!

 

And...We're Giving Back!

We are proud to note that $1 from each planner purchase will go to these organizations:         

-Alternatives for Girls: Helping homeless and high-risk girls and young women avoid violence, teen pregnancy and exploitation, and help them to explore and access the support, resources and opportunities necessary to be safe, to grow strong and to make positive choices in their lives.

-Mercy Corps: Alleviating suffering, poverty and oppression by helping people build secure, productive and just communities.

With many perks ranging from package deals, to tote bags, and secret perks yet to be released, we're positive you'll find something to peak your interest and at the same time, accelerate your wellness and contribute to some great causes.

 

Invest in you & the ones you love. Reserve your Empowered Life Planners Today! 

 

Production almost finished! Jackets are constructed & stamped. Now the printer is just finishing up binding the inner pages to the jacket! Set to ship December 28th!

story:
Worldwide Patent Pending

The built-in magnets of OmniHub connect the modules firmly. Makes them sleek, compact and easy to carry

OmniHub is the first and only modular hub designed to tap into two Thunderbolt 3 USB-C ports on the MacBook Pro without interference and deliver more ports in the smallest size.

Designed specifically for the new 2016/2017 MacBook Pro.

OmniHub could be applied separately to any of the 4 Thunderbolt 3 USB-C ports, which provides the most comfortable way to use it.

The new modules still work perfectly with the current ones without any interference.

The same OmniHub works with the 13 and 15 inch Macbook Pro.

Connect both 4K HDMI, 4K Display Port and Thunderbolt 3
(e.g. Samsung 105“ UHD) Displays at the same time.

Connect both 4K@30Hz HDMI and up to 8K@60Hz Thunderbolt 3 Displays at the same time.

 

The Type-C port on OmniHub supports up to 100W power delivery. You can charge your MacBook Pro at full speed through OmniHub, delivering the maximum 61W power to the 13" MacBook Pro and 87W to the 15" MacBook Pro.

 

Function Test by MadSpace TV

 

Other Specifications

• DC/DC efficiency: Up to 96%

• Device Operating Temperature: Less than 48ºC / 118ºF

• Enclosure: CNC aluminum available in Silver color Designed specifically for the new 2016/2017 MacBook Pro.

 

Rewards

 

 

Reward Fulfilment

To ensure timely reward delivery, we will ship rewards via insured postal service from 2 fulfillment and distribution centers in:

• California USA - fulfilling rewards within the United States

• Hong Kong - fulfilling rewards to the rest of the world

 

Timeline

About MadHub

Team MadHub has been working on creating patents holding Apple accessories since 2010, we are the innovative designer of miniDP to HDMI&VGA 2 in 1 Adapter for MacBook and also the first one who brought it to the market in 2012. We pursue minimalist design, bring you the product that makes your life better and without any excess functions.

FAQ

Q: Could we add the DP port into the pledge? if yes, how much do we need to top up?

A: We are not able to add it onindiegogo, but you can send an email to crowdfund@madhublabs.com, we'll send you an instruction to add it. Thank you for the support!

 

Q: The hub compatible with the razer blade 14? It has USB 3 near the thunderbolt and no 2 thunderbolt near each other.

A: Yes, OmniHub can work with any laptop who has USB-C or Thunderbolt 3 port. It's modular, each module can be used separately.

 

Q: HDMI and DP display same screen view or can we use in extended mode or different screen? And also can you make it work on Laptop case cover on it, as most of the products in market doesn’t support or loose hang if we plug in.

A: You can choose same screen view or extended mode by yourself in the MacBook setting. And it will work if you plug 1 module each side only, but if you want to put 2 modules at the same side, you'll need take off the laptop case.

 

Q: Hi. I have space gray macbook pro, do you intend to produce spacevgray to match it. TIA

A: Yes, it will be a stretch goal.

 

Q: I would like a USB type c port and an ethernet port, but i guess we can't have everything. I know however that the one USB 3.0 only supports 5g speeds. How would both have 5g speeds, since you are splitting the one into two? Also is it a powered hub? Also, how is the display not affected if we use both the miny dp and the HDMI?

A: Firstly, when we say 5Gbps speed, it's for Thunderbolt 3 port input and USB-C output. As you may know, the Thunderbolt 3 supports 40Gbps speed. So it won't be a surprise that the USB-C output speed is up to 5Gbps. Secondly, the MacBook Pro support dual port video output, so we can use both the DP and HDMI module. Thirdly, the USB-C port supports power delivery, you can charge your laptop through it.

 

Q: I'm using a Dell XPS15, and the power input jack is located about 5mm above the Thunderbolt connector on the left side.

I'll only be using the USB module, and I want to ensure that I can plug the Dell power adapted in at the same time as the USB module.

A: Actually, the distance between the 2 USB-C ports is just about 5mm, and you can see that the 2 modules can fit. So it means the USB module will fit with your power adapter.

 

Q: Are you thinking about VGA adaptor?

A: Hi Rafael, it is in the plan, we'll add more modules if the campaign goes well.
story_txt:
Worldwide Patent PendingThe built-in magnets of OmniHub connect the modules firmly. Makes them sleek, compact and easy to carryOmniHub is the first and only modular hub designed to tap into two Thunderbolt 3 USB-C ports on the MacBook Pro without interference and deliver more ports in the smallest size.Designed specifically for the new 2016/2017 MacBook Pro.OmniHub could be applied separately to any of the 4 Thunderbolt 3 USB-C ports, which provides the most comfortable way to use it.The new modules still work perfectly with the current ones without any interference.The same OmniHub works with the 13 and 15 inch Macbook Pro.Connect both 4K HDMI, 4K Display Port and Thunderbolt 3(e.g. Samsung 105“ UHD) Displays at the same time.Connect both 4K@30Hz HDMI and up to 8K@60Hz Thunderbolt 3 Displays at the same time. The Type-C port on OmniHub supports up to 100W power delivery. You can charge your MacBook Pro at full speed through OmniHub, delivering the maximum 61W power to the 13" MacBook Pro and 87W to the 15" MacBook Pro. Function Test by MadSpace TV

 
Other Specifications• DC/DC efficiency: Up to 96%• Device Operating Temperature: Less than 48ºC / 118ºF• Enclosure: CNC aluminum available in Silver color Designed specifically for the new 2016/2017 MacBook Pro. Rewards  Reward FulfilmentTo ensure timely reward delivery, we will ship rewards via insured postal service from 2 fulfillment and distribution centers in:• California USA - fulfilling rewards within the United States• Hong Kong - fulfilling rewards to the rest of the world TimelineAbout MadHubTeam MadHub has been working on creating patents holding Apple accessories since 2010, we are the innovative designer of miniDP to HDMI&VGA 2 in 1 Adapter for MacBook and also the first one who brought it to the market in 2012. story:
We have engineered Forge 1 with great precision in an effort to produce a 3D printer that will far outlast every other device currently in your life. This 3D printer is the first to ever utilize the light of a tablet to cure the resin. The ramifications of this improved process are enormous: Forge 1 is going to make 3D printing more accessible than ever to consumers by drastically lowering the cost and enhancing the quality that is available. We are ushering in a new age of 3D printing with Forge 1, and everyone is invited to take part in it.

Easy to use, Forge 1 makes 3D printing simpler and faster than it has ever been before. You can approach this printer little or even no 3D printing experience and get what you need in no time at all. From the time that you open the box to the time that you start printing, no more than ten minutes should have passed, all the parts that you need fully assembled and the instructions making your role totally clear.

We have committed ourselves to a lofty goal – altering the face of the 3D printing world – and we intend to follow through on the plan that we have laid out here. Bringing together a diverse collection of experts and masters, we intend on becoming the new face of 3D printing by doing for this technology what Microsoft did for the PC and what Facebook did for social media, drawing in people who would otherwise think that this technology is “not for them.”

 

 

 

 

Made in Switzerland, this printer is a reliable piece of hardware, and thanks to wireless charging and Bluetooth / Wifi connections, there are no cables to worry about either. The print volume is enormous compared to our competitors' products, saving you money and time. Quiet, precise, and effective, Forge 1 is truly the printer that is going to bring 3D printing into homes around the world.  

 

 

What We Need & What You Get  

We have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising CHF 50,000. These funds will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing the initial run of Forge 1 printers, getting this cutting-edge product into homes and offices everywhere. As a thank-you, we have put together some killer deals as rewards for our contributors.  

The Impact

Forge 1 is going to fast-track 3D printing into the mainstream. Right now, the majority of consumers have access to this technology only indirectly, but with this printer, all of that is about to change. Forge 1 is a printer that people will pick up easily and take to immediately. This is a printer destined to make a big splash.

In this short Video you see the self test that Forge 1 does to its Z-axis, which is succeful when the vibrations sensors do not register anomalous vibrations, which would compromise the print quality.
 
  

 

Slicing

 

 

 

Explanations to the video below
The most important premise first:
Forge 1 utilises daylight resin, and normally is totally black inside it.

The only way to film Forge 1 in action, was to open the doors wide open, to demount the lower front part for having a decent viewing angle.

After that, we put the platform much higher than the normal starting position (which is in the VAT), otherwise, you would not be able to see the tablet, projecting light from below the VAT and for the same reason it is empty.

Last but not least, we unmounted some components, that would allow professionals (competitors), to understand some discoveries we made.

story:
Check Out Our New Landing Page!
Http://Launch.GambixIT.Com


If a Website Is Great, an Intelligent Website is Extraordinary...

And you can’t do with less than that. Nowadays, from small to large businesses, personal blogs or artistic projects, the need to grab—and keep—the attention of visitors and convert it into value actions on a website is extreme. After all, no endeavor works without that. That’s why you need an extraordinary and intelligent website for your business—but obviously without the typical costs or demanding skills that this requires. That’s exactly what Gambix does for you: leveraging the power of AI to seamlessly create the absolutely perfect high-performing website that you need for your specific business.

Question> Answer> Solution

One of the amazing features of Gambix is that it intelligently builds the website you need just by asking you questions and based on your answers. Your industry, name of the company, company address, most important terms, and other elements are simple answers that Gambix turns into a beautifully designed website that instantly makes your business look professional and impressive for those who visit. Have the beauty of machine learning and True AI effortlessly working for you.

Optimize, Optimize, Optimize

What if you don’t know how to optimize a website, both as to the metadata and the design? That’s another extraordinary aspect of Gambix—it doesn’t require you to know anything special about website building, design or SEO. You see, Gambix is the first web design platform to incorporate machine learning into templates allowing them to optimize themselves. Instead of leaving you stuck with static templates, Gambix optimizes each template according to your requirements. End result: you truly get the website that you need, professionally designed, built and optimized to bring the results you want.

Add Whatever You Want

Ok, so Gambix does everything for you. There’s no question about it. It doesn’t mean, however, that it doesn’t let you add your own input. On the contrary, Gambix goes wherever you want it to go. That means that you can let it do everything for you and you just add the essential information about your business—or you can use its user-friendly features to seamlessly personalize your website with as much input as you want to add.

Extra Responsiveness: Build Fast, Work Fast

This is one of the most important features that Gambix offers and that competitors fail to deliver on. As a website builder platform, Gambix is extremely fast and bug-free. It builds your website in less than 5 minutes. It will literally be ready before you know it! At the same time, your website’s visitors will truly find a welcoming experience: no bugs, no delays, no waiting. Move from one page to the other and the website will swiftly load in any case, which will not only provide a superb user experience but will also greatly help to increase your website’s ranking on search engines—given that page load time is such an essential criteria that Google and other search engines have in consideration when ranking your page.

No Skills Required but Very Skill-Friendly

We can’t highlight this enough: most people feel discouraged when trying to build a website because they don’t know the essentials most platforms require them to have in order to use them. Gambix is a use-as-you-want-it simplified platform. If you’re a very basic user, Gambix does everything for you requesting only essential details about your business. If you want to engage in a more advanced experience, there’s a guide wizard for new developers that makes the user experience extremely smooth. If however you’re an expert, then Gambix offers custom CSS and PHP options for power users.

E-Commerce 2.0—The Neural Engine That Sells More

Gambix is equipped with a highly accurate neural engine that tailors each website more uniquely to each person—and that goes for business and website owners as much as for website visitors and customers. With endless e-commerce features and options for ads and promotions, advanced analytics settings, and powerful logistics settings baked into the platform, Gambix helps e-commerce stores drive and close more sales and save impressively on typically high enterprise logistical costs.

A Top Website Builder for a Fraction of the Cost

Freelancers and small businesses who can’t afford the cost of top tier website builders, coders and web designers can rely on Gambix to accomplish the same results for a fraction of the price. With different packages available, from individuals wanting an excellent blog-like website to an actual established e-commerce business that wants to grow more, Gambix has an affordable intelligent AI-powered solution for everyone.

How We’ll Employ the Funds

We’re seeking to raise $50,000 in order to deepen our use of Artificial Intelligence functions to expand SEO and automate it. We will also expand the number of third-party integrations and apps based on constant feedback from users, which means the platform will be constantly improved and expanded based on your requirements and preferences. The funds raised will also allow us to add millions of images and visual assets to the website builder, making them accessible to you, as well as to a separate feature that graphic designers will find extremely useful for their work when using Gambix. In other words, we’ll take the existing excellent tried and tested version of Gambix into the Ultimate AI-Powered Website Builder!

story:
mumu it sounds funny, but it is beautiful! It is our favorite word and therefore our favorite thing in the multiverse! mumu is a colorful, clever, fair & eco-effective notebook and sketchbook! Various color combinations just make life more fun and the minimal design helps you to find cool friends.
No matter how chaotic or structured you organize, write, draw, paint, collect, procrastinate and learn, due to the modular workflow and free grid-printables you can customize mumu imperfectly or perfectly the way you work.
Regional production in a socially-oriented organization (sheltered Workshop) in Berlin and carefully selected materials are just two of many reasons why we are starting very well. In terms of function, mumu is the best modular notebook we can imagine, but we want to work with you to create the fairest and most eco-effective mumu of all time.

Big plus: We also think of the neighborhood (figuratively)! 1 € per notebook will be reinvested into cultural projects, cradle to cradle education and the eco & fairness improvement of mumu. We will be absolutely transparent by showing you how we use your financial superpower in order to achieve our goals!

With this campaign we want to finance our first production, set up our own online shop and finally get in contact with you! Hello World!

In simple words: It's two metal clips that hold together an cover with 120 pages. With the clever foldback-mechanism, you can fold away the cover in a space-saving and ergonomic way. Stabilize mumu, by installing the supplied cardboard (stiffer). Also, in order to free the world of some advertising, we will deliberately renounced the product branding of the notebooks themselves. Yeah!


Whether you draw your first line in the front, middle or back, thanks to mumu’s modular approach you can finally control the flow of your work. Your notebook, your workflow. Your mother (or father)! Detach the foldback-clips and ...

mumu - GRIDS | FREE & CUSTOMIZED PRINTABLES
mumu & mu come to you with empty pages. So if you love to work with blank pages, you will be very happy! For those who prefer black and colored dots, lines, checks and grids, we have developed 3888 free printables based on five grids.


Why should you squeeze your handwriting into a fixed distance, if you can adjust the line spacing to your handwriting? With our "gridfitter"-form you can find the best line spacing for your writing and reading. 

Grid It Yourself | Create your own framework
For those who can not get enough of checklists, diaries, weekly schedules, bullet journals, storyboards, portfolios, youtube comments, and other organization-psychoses: use your image editing and text software to create brand-new grids and share / play around with them! We don't tell you how life should be beyond good.

ECO & FAIR | INSPIRED BY CRADLE TO CRADLE AND ALL THE OTHER GOOD STUFF!
We want to leave a positive footprint on our planet (it's the only one we have). The Cradle to Cradle design concept guides and inspires us significantly. The use of renewable energies, carbon management, the use of safe ingredients, a positive wastewater management as well as fair working conditions along the supply value chain plays all a central role for mumu and us. In addition, we have developed mumu for recycling and material–just from the beginning!
So far so good, but we are not perfect yet. That's why we use your financial energy and reinvest some of our profits to achieve our long-term goal of 100% eco effectiveness, fairness and cultural diversity. For those who are interested, below you find the details of our goals!

DESIGN, FAIR & ECO does not have to mean expensive at the same time. With price transparency and high ecological and social requirements, we are cheaper than similar notebooks that are produced in China...like möleschkintsz for example : ). Yes, we just do not earn as much because it is more important to us that you get a very good notebook for a good price! We want to send efficient parcels around the world, so we reward you with a volume discount. The larger the mumu & mu package is, the cheaper the shipping will be and therefore the final price.
In addition a pioneer discount applies exclusively to this campaign– because boy/girl scouts are to be rewarded!

 

mumu & mu ANNUAL SUBSCRIPTIONS
The first notebook subscription of the multiverse! Have you found the perfect notebook with us and want to use your power of thought for anything but shopping? Perfekto! Pay once and get mumu or mu for a whole year!

It`s easy:
The 12 months subscription starts on the first delivery date and ends with the last delivery. So you do not have to worry about annoying renewal, just like it should be with a subscription! One month before the expiration we will come to you and ask if you would like to extend your subscription –common automatism does not exist with us.

THE FOUR SEASON ANNUAL SUBSCRIPTION for mumu (A4) OR mu (A5) :
+ 12x mumu /mu within 12 months 
+ 2x mumu /mu every second months (6 packages) 
+ Choose your favorite colors
+ Without extension trap

THE BELIEVER LIFETIME SUBSCRIPTION
Our crowdfunding special! You have a tremendous willpower and a powerful drive to change the analogous world of work, you believe in change and therefore want to set an example...then YOU ARE A BELIEVER! Exclusively we award 4 lifetime subscriptions for mumu. That means you will get the notebooks of your choice every two month until the end of your life!  You will always be up to date, wherever you are: From the Antarctic Research Station to the deepest jungle in Colombia - from Bottrop to Manchester! We provide you with mumu until you become a nutrient yourself. To pick up your first mumu and to sign your contract, we invite you to Berlin to our studio! Here you will get to know us, the production, and all those involved in mumu ...and spend a damn funny weekend together!

+ 6x mumu (A4) and/or mu (A5) within 12 months
+ 1x notebook every second months (6 packages within one year)
+ Choose your favorite colors
+ Until the end of your life! THIS IS REAL!


 

Sharing is Caring!
It all sounds fantastic and you want to share it with your friends and foes now, so you can revolutionize the digital world of work together? With pleasure! Every week we raffle a mumu SPECIAL EXCLUSIVE EDITION KIT!

That means new color combinations and pre-printed mumu-grids of your choice. OH YEAH and after each raffle we will delete your data, of course. Boom!!
 

That's how it works:

    ... that's the e-mail: gambling@mumu.wtf

+ Every Sunday, there will be a lucky winner

 


Benedikt is a social, cultural and product designer. After completing his graduate scholarship at the Academy of Fine Arts in Stuttgart in 2014, he has been coordinating voluntary work in the non-profit Cradle to Cradle e.V. since 2014. His goal was and is to plant the C2C thinking school & design concept into as many minds as possible and at the same time promote the demand for high quality products.

During his studies he had already developed the modular workflow which led him to create mumu, a real C2C-inspired product, besides his educational work.

Lukas is a freelance, unverified professor of applied madness, who studied studying design in Münster and architecture at the Academy of Fine Arts in Stuttgart, Vienna and elsewhere. Within the self-initiated “Leerstuhl für angewandten Wahnsinn / Chair of Applied Madness”, he dealt with many paranoid phenomena and processes.
During a field trip into an  Argentinian wardrobe, he deepened his interest in personalized, psychotic-chaotic writing materials. Today he works on projects of biotechnology, art exhibitions and in an engineering office. If you don´t care, life carries you!
The office for nonsense | B4B nonsense for business
Benedikt and Lukas have been thinking about starting a project of their own since university. Lukas wanted to do something useful with his "Chair of Applied Madness" and Benedikt obsessively searched for mad ideas he could integrate into his C2C sketchbook idea. With the help of stardust and lots of laughter, we have founded the slowest start up in the world: the office for nonsense - the only thing that

makes sense in this crazy world, besides mumu of course!


You do not actually make nonsense, but something useful, right?
YES and NO! If you look at our business from a purely profit-maximizing, business perspective, what we do is pretty stupid.

But we are convinced that we can not solve the social and environmental problems of today with the same methods and ways of thinking with which they came into being (Einstein should have said that).
Nonsense and fun help us to think and act differently in order to break old patterns of thought.
 

With insanity, nonsense, fun and unconventional methods we want to inspire people to rethink and act so that meaningful, eco-efficient and fair-priced products are successfully established on the market and become sustainable. Successful creature-centered design & business development with lots of nonsense!

That’s how far we have taken our journey towards 100% Eco & Fair:

CLICK HERE FOR PDF WITH MORE ECO DETAILS
story_txt: mumu it sounds funny, but it is beautiful! It is our favorite word and therefore our favorite thing in the multiverse! mumu is a colorful, clever, fair & eco-effective notebook and sketchbook! Various color combinations just make life more fun and the minimal design helps you to find cool friends.No matter how chaotic or structured you organize, write, draw, paint, collect, procrastinate and learn, due to the modular workflow and free grid-printables you can customize mumu imperfectly or perfectly the way you work.Regional production in a socially-oriented organization (sheltered Workshop) in Berlin and carefully selected materials are just two of many reasons why we are starting very well. In terms of function, mumu is the best modular notebook we can imagine, but we want to work with you to create the fairest and most eco-effective mumu of all time.Big plus: We also think of the neighborhood (figuratively)! 1 € per notebook will be reinvested into cultural projects, cradle to cradle education and the eco & fairness improvement of mumu. We will be absolutely transparent by showing you how we use your financial superpower in order to achieve our goals!With this campaign we want to finance our first production, set up our own online shop and finally get in contact with you! Hello World!In simple words: It's two metal clips that hold together an cover with 120 pages. With the clever foldback-mechanism, you can fold away the cover in a space-saving and ergonomic way. Stabilize mumu, by installing the supplied cardboard (stiffer). Also, in order to free the world of some advertising, we will deliberately renounced the product branding of the notebooks themselves. Yeah!Whether you draw your first line in the front, middle or back, thanks to mumu’s modular approach you can finally control the flow of your work. Your notebook, your workflow. Your mother (or father)! Detach the foldback-clips and ...mumu - GRIDS | FREE & CUSTOMIZED PRINTABLESmumu & mu come to you with empty pages. So if you love to work with blank pages, you will be very happy! For those who prefer black and colored dots, lines, checks and grids, we have developed 3888 free printables based on five grids.Why should you squeeze your handwriting into a fixed distance, if you can adjust the line spacing to your handwriting? With our "gridfitter"-form you can find the best line spacing for your writing and reading. Grid It Yourself | Create your own frameworkFor those who can not get enough of checklists, diaries, weekly schedules, bullet journals, storyboards, portfolios, youtube comments, and other organization-psychoses: use your image editing and text software to create brand-new grids and share / play around with them! We don't tell you how life should be beyond good.ECO & FAIR | INSPIRED BY CRADLE TO CRADLE AND ALL THE OTHER GOOD STUFF!We want to leave a positive footprint on our planet (it's the only one we have). The Cradle to Cradle design concept guides and inspires us significantly. The use of renewable energies, carbon management, the use of safe ingredients, a positive wastewater management as well as fair working conditions along the supply value chain plays all a central role for mumu and us. In addition, we have developed mumu for recycling and material–just from the beginning!So far so good, but we are not perfect yet. That's why we use your financial energy and reinvest some of our profits to achieve our long-term goal of 100% eco effectiveness, fairness and cultural diversity. For those who are interested, below you find the details of our goals!DESIGN, FAIR & ECO does not have to mean expensive at the same time. With price transparency and high ecological and social requirements, we are cheaper than similar notebooks that are produced in China...like möleschkintsz for example : ). Yes, we just do not earn as much because it is more important to us that you get a very good notebook for a good price! We want to send efficient parcels around the world, so we reward you with a volume discount. The larger the mumu & mu package is, the cheaper the shipping will be and therefore the final price.In addition a pioneer discount applies exclusively to this campaign– because boy/girl scouts are to be rewarded! mumu & mu ANNUAL SUBSCRIPTIONSThe first notebook subscription of the multiverse! Have you found the perfect notebook with us and want to use your power of thought for anything but shopping? Perfekto! Pay once and get mumu or mu for a whole year!It`s easy:The 12 months subscription starts on the first delivery date and ends with the last delivery. So you do not have to worry about annoying renewal, just like it should be with a subscription! One month before the expiration we will come to you and ask if you would like to extend your subscription –common automatism does not exist with us.THE FOUR SEASON ANNUAL SUBSCRIPTION for mumu (A4) OR mu (A5) :+ 12x mumu /mu  within 12 months + 2x mumu /mu every second months (6 packages) + Choose your favorite colors+ Without extension trapTHE BELIEVER LIFETIME SUBSCRIPTIONOur crowdfunding special! You have a tremendous willpower and a powerful drive to change the analogous world of work, you believe in change and therefore want to set an example...then YOU ARE A BELIEVER! Exclusively we award 4 lifetime subscriptions for mumu. That means you will get the notebooks of your choice every two month until the end of your life!  You will always be up to date, wherever you are: From the Antarctic Research Station to the deepest jungle in Colombia - from Bottrop to Manchester! We provide you with mumu until you become a nutrient yourself. To pick up your first mumu and to sign your contract, we invite you to Berlin to our studio! Here you will get to know us, the production, and all those involved in mumu ...and spend a damn funny weekend together!+ 6x mumu (A4) and/or mu (A5) within 12 months+ 1x notebook every second months (6 packages within one year)+ Choose your favorite colors+ Until the end of your life! THIS IS REAL! Sharing is Caring!It all sounds fantastic and you want to share it with your friends and foes now, so you can revolutionize the digital world of work together? With pleasure! Every week we raffle a mumu SPECIAL EXCLUSIVE EDITION KIT!That means new color combinations and pre-printed mumu-grids of your choice. OH YEAH and after each raffle we will delete your data, of course. Boom!! That's how it works:    ... that's the e-mail: gambling@mumu.wtf+ Every Sunday, there will be a lucky winner Benedikt is a social, cultural and product designer. After completing his graduate scholarship at the Academy of Fine Arts in Stuttgart in 2014, he has been coordinating voluntary work in the non-profit Cradle to Cradle e.V. since 2014. His goal was and is to plant the C2C thinking school & design concept into as many minds as possible and at the same time promote the demand for high quality products.During his studies he had already developed the modular workflow which led him to create mumu, a real C2C-inspired product, besides his educational work.Lukas is a freelance, unverified professor of applied madness, who studied studying design in Münster and architecture at the Academy of Fine Arts in Stuttgart, Vienna and elsewhere. Within the self-initiated “Leerstuhl für angewandten Wahnsinn / Chair of Applied Madness”, he dealt with many paranoid phenomena and processes.During a field trip into an  Argentinian wardrobe, he deepened his interest in personalized, psychotic-chaotic writing materials. Today he works on projects of biotechnology, art exhibitions and in an engineering office. If you don´t care, life carries you!The office for nonsense | B4B nonsense for businessBenedikt and Lukas have been thinking about starting a project of their own since university. Lukas wanted to do something useful with his "Chair of Applied Madness" and Benedikt obsessively searched for mad ideas he could integrate into his C2C sketchbook idea. With the help of stardust and lots of laughter, we have founded the slowest start up in the world: the office for nonsense - the only thing thatmakes sense in this crazy world, besides mumu of course!You do not actually make nonsense, but something useful, right?YES and NO! If you look at our business from a purely profit-maximizing, business perspective, what we do is pretty stupid.But we are convinced that we can not solve the social and environmental problems of today with the same methods and ways of thinking with which they came into being (Einstein should have said that).Nonsense and fun help us to think and act differently in order to break old patterns of thought. With insanity, nonsense, fun and unconventional methods we want to inspire people to rethink and act so that meaningful, eco-efficient and fair-priced products are successfully established on the market and become sustainable. Successful creature-centered design & business development with lots of nonsense!That’s how far we have taken our journey towards 100% Eco & Fair:CLICK HERE FOR PDF WITH MORE ECO DETAILS

story:
Wish you had that extra screen you could take anywhere?

At 5mm (0.2") thickness, espresso Displays' lightweight, aluminum design is easy to take with you anywhere, whether it is your next flight, a local coffee shop or even right at home.

 

An Award-Winning Portable Monitor


Now available on espressodisplays.com!

— The World's Thinnest Portable Monitor at 5mm (0.2")
— High Quality, dual layer glass, Touch Screen Display.
— Support for Windows, Samsung & Huawei devices, and Mac
— Unique Stands and Accessories. Magnetic mounting means no clips, no straps, no fuss!
— One Cable Plug 'n Play with USB-C, or HDMI for those other devices
— Power Passthrough with USB-C --> Keep your device charging whilst using the display
— Available in two convienient sizes, 13.3" and 15.6" 

 

https://www.forbes.com/sites/bensin/2020/07/23/this-portable-display-brings-touchscreen-functionality-to-macbooks/#5412bb0874d0

 

 

Productivity Booster!

According to a Microsoft study, multiple monitors can increase productivity by 50%

Having two displays can save you 2.5 hours each day, 17.5 hours per week and 910 hours per year.

    Community 

     

    Shipping Update 

    • Batch 1 delivered to most regions, some regions still to go
    • Batch 2 manufactured and has started bulk-shipment to major regions!

    Development

     

    The Team 

    Will and Scott, two of our founders, are always on the move. Whether at the office, at home or traveling, their workspaces could not keep up with their active schedules. Soon after their levels of frustration peaked, they had a discussion on how useful a portable monitor would be with a laptop. This idea would later change their lives.

    The next day, Will 3D printed a simple L-Bracket for his Surface Pro. Seeing this come to life was the catalyst to look into the concept more. At this stage, we had no immediate plans to start a business. Over the next few months, we created prototypes, tested different portable monitors and participated in pitching competitions to help refine our idea. From this came revisions, and we started getting more serious about this project. We designed the 'X-Frame' which could connect one, or even two screens.

    In November 2018, we went to Shenzhen, China to connect with suppliers, do some rapid prototyping and get amongst the hardware ecosystem. We broadened our scope and set ourselves a bigger goal. After many nights of hard work, sweat and tears, we finalized Espresso Displays — the monitor we dreamed up months prior!

Community

Batch 1 delivered to most regions, some regions still to go
Batch 2 manufactured and has started bulk-shipment to major regions!



Development

 
The Team 
Will and Scott, two of our founders, are always on the move. Whether at the office, at home or traveling, their workspaces could not keep up with their active schedules. Soon after their levels of frustration peaked, they had a discussion on how useful a portable monitor would be with a laptop. This idea would later change their lives.
The next day, Will 3D printed a simple L-Bracket for his Surface Pro. Seeing this come to life was the catalyst to look into the concept more. At this stage, we had no immediate plans to start a business. Over the next few months, we created prototypes, tested different portable monitors and participated in pitching competitions to help refine our idea. From this came revisions, and we started getting more serious about this project. We designed the 'X-Frame' which could connect one, or even two screens.
In November 2018, we went to Shenzhen, China to connect with suppliers, do some rapid prototyping and get amongst the hardware ecosystem. We broadened our scope and set ourselves a bigger goal. After many nights of hard work, sweat and tears, we finalized Espresso Displays — the monitor we dreamed up months prior!

• FACEBOOK : https://www.facebook.com/elretron/
  • INSTAGRAM : https://www.instagram.com/elretron/
  • BRAND WEBSITE : https://www.elretron.com/
  • YOUTUBE : Elretron studio

Below are 3D rendered images to help you choose color and switch option for Penna. 
Colors shown on your monitor may differ from the actual product depending on the manufacturer and display settingsand some of the key layouts and design may change during the production. 

 
 

Risks and challenges

Warranty : Keyboard switch is manufactured by Cherry, a German company renown for world’s best technology and strict safety regulations are applied accordingly. Certified technical staff in Elretron is able to process all procedures to ensure safety and quality assurance.

Manufacturing design: Our products, already validated by precedented prototype, have been redesigned after additional modifications. Engineers and mechanical experts at Elretron ceaselessly strive to make perfect product with processes which we will continuously communicate with our backers even after the funding.

Production :To make the highest quality PENNA Keyboard, we place the foremost priority on making it perfect, while having no interests in short-term profit. All manufacturing facilities are located in South Korea to maintain highest quality in production line.

We have conducted numerous simulations with our factories to solve in advance, all of technical problems that could possibly arise from manufacturing process, and we prepared specification requirement and facilities ready for immediate production after the funding. We will provide continuous communication to our backers and deliver the complete product by the promised timeline.

Shipping : PENNA is manufactured and assembled in Korea to ensure first-rate workmanship, and maybe subject to duties when being shipped to international address.
