story:
The use of digital signatures is becoming more and more popular. We digitally sign cryptocurrency transactions, such as Bitcoin or Litecoin, but we also digitally sign documents, emails, and many other legally valid electronic documents. For someone to steal our Bitcoins, or sign in our behalf, thus stealing our digital identity, all it takes is the access to our "Private Key". Today this very important pice of data, the private key, is kept in our smartphones, in our computers, or in online servers. Virus, malware, spyware, and memory sniffers can easily capture our private key from our devices. The Sound Key removes the private key from smartphones, computers, and servers, keeping it safely offline. When a transaction needs to be signed it is sent via audio to The Sound Key to be signed. The Sound Key only return the signature for that specific transaction, without ever exposing the private key, thus guaranteeing total safety and security!


A word from SoundKey’s creator Roberto Capodieci:

First of, thanks for reading this. You are about to contribute to something big in the privacy field, something we all badly need: a way to be really safe from things that want to tap into our personal communications and data.

I have been working in intelligence for many years and this is what I know: you can make a lock as complex as you want, but in the end someone will be smart enough to access the data needed to open it.

SoundKey physically removes connection to these data, and uses sound to transmit them in a format that’s useless to potential attackers. Since it uses sound, no malware can reach it, and man-in-the-middle attacks are impossible.

SoundKey marks the start of a new approach to cryptography, where safety is finally accessible to non technicians and where our digital identities are both portable and secure.  


10 Reasons to support the SoundKey

  • SoundKey is the first device of its kind

  • SoundKey is backed-up by private investors: even if we don’t reach our preorder goal, you will get yours when we will start shipping

  • You can brand with your own logo thanks to our whitebox option (minimum order apply)

  • SoundKey comes with a development kit, to integrate its features to any app and website!

  • SoundKey can be used with any crypto currencies and other digital signatures (more signature algorithms will be implemented with time)

  • SoundKey can encrypt and decrypt any kind of data (size limit apply based on model)

  • SoundKey keeps your private key physically out of reach from malicious programs and people, as it NEVER leaves the device (the signature and encryption/decryption take place IN the device)

  • The top model of SoundKey can encrypt voice messages, without supplementary software, to be decrypted by a specific public key, and thanks to the audio connections, the encrypted messages can be sent via email, IM, or other apps.

  • SoundKey can be used to identify users on websites or over the phone

  • Oh, and it talks :)


A key should fit in your wallet.

A portable cryptographic device would be rather useless if you needed a backpack to carry it. Weighing only a few grams and with no more surface than a credit card, you can keep the SoundKey at the ready, with you at any time.


A key should be easy to use.

SoundKey is nearly as easy to use as a physical key. Each action it performs only takes a couple of steps, and the device quickly integrates into your everyday life, almost frictionless.


A SoundKey should do much more (and it does!)

The SoundKey opens many doors, you decide which. For your business, for private use, for digital signature or encryption, its uses are many and all guaranteed safe.

How does the SoundKey work, in practice?




Who is the SoundKey for?

- Home users

Anyone using crypto-currencies at home can protect their private key and sign their transactions with a SoundKey.

- Businesses

Businesses can implement the SoundKey to their customer services thanks to our SDK, and brand the device itself with their own logo.

- Developers

Working on a credential-free login system? Needing the safest possible authentication method? You can integrate any feature supported by the SoundKey to your website or your app thanks to our SDK.

Thanks for reading that far, and thanks for your support in our crowdfunding campaign!

You can find more information about the SoundKey here:

Like us on Facebook

Follow us on Twitter

story:
We have developed a unique and ultra portable pop-up counter that we are ready to introduce to the market. The counter remains one of the most commonly used pieces at trade shows and in sales settings. Currently, most similar counters require extensive setup instructions, similar to the IKEA furniture we all know too well. With our GO-Counter, you don't need any tools or instructions. You simply pull up, and you're all set!

Our patented design offers sales teams instant set-up and take down, along with branding capabilities. The high-quality fabric wrap can be customized with graphics that meet any brands' needs. At 15 pounds, its durable and lightweight design makes traveling for your next business trip, easier. 

We are looking to raise $60,000 to buy inventory, rent warehouse space, and implement our marketing strategies specifically for the GO-Counter. While a successful launch of the GO-Counter will help Networx Exhibits, it is about establishing the GO-Counter in the market that is in need for an innovative and convenient product.

The GO-Counter has a list price of $375, complete with case and full wrap custom fabric graphic.  Delivery time right now is 2 to 3 weeks. With funding, we will be able to ship from stock.  A replacement graphic cost $150.


If you are interested in being a part of the team that introduces the GO-Counter worldwide, then I urge you to make a contribution. The trade show industry is a $200-billion-dollar industry, and the GO-Counter is something unique in the market. Being in the trade show industry our customers are highly fragmented, in that they often come from varying industries, and multiple levels within the marketing and sales organizations. Every company has the need to purchase marketing materials and services for trade shows. 300,000 companies a year exhibit in trade shows across the United States.  The GO-Counter is one product that each of these companies can utilize in their marketing efforts.

We have seen great success in the limited sales opportunities that we have had, and now we hope to push the GO-Counter out for its wide release. Many of our future customers will discover the GO-Counter by seeing one at a show or event, with your help we can continue to fulfill orders, and putting the counter where more people can see it.

We have generated interest from the University of Southern California who are looking to promote themselves to potential students. Wells Fargo uses the GO-Counter for their employees who travel for outreach programs. Students at the University of Redlands have used the counter on campus as they recruit future members. Food and beverage companies use the GO-Counter when promoting samples at wine tastings, food festivals and art fairs. The GO-Counter has hundreds of possible applications and is perfect for anyone looking for a portable and fully-customizable counter.  

We have the GO-Counter ready for production. We need to build up our inventory so as we introduce the product to more potential customers we will be able to ship from our inventory.  Our production can ramp from one to one hundred units in a two-week period. Lead times currently range from fourteen to twenty-one business days, and we need to have inventory on hand to reduce the delivery from two weeks to two days. The funds will be used to produce the first hundred units, then based on demand production will turn out a steady flow to allow us to meet demand while managing costs.  

To produce the graphics, we have two professional printing partners who can provide high-quality graphics on demand with lead times from 2 days to 5 days, depending on volume.  The graphics are easily replaceable, so it is possible that a client may want several custom wraps depending on their marketing and sales needs. For instance, a winery wanted several different graphics to be able to market their different varieties of wine. Being able to do custom branding for each sample variety gave them a huge advantage when trying to attract customers. This level of interchangeability is just one of the major value features of the GO-Counter.

We launched our PR campaign with PR Newswire on June 16, 2015.  Now we need to follow-up with purchased banner ads on targeted websites along with Google Ad Word buys on search sites targeting our buyers.

Our staff has experience with logistics, design, and print. What we need is a support for our sales team specifically for the GO-Counter.

The target is to raise our funds before the end of August so we can have our inventory in September.  Traditionally August, September are the start of the selling season for Fall trade shows.  It is important to have our inventory on hand when our advertising, direct marketing, email and sales campaigns ramp up during August continuing into the Fall.

  • The GO-Counter weighs 15 pounds with the fabric graphic; the case weighs 2.5 pounds.

  • The top is 27.5” W X 16” D X 37” H

  • Included is the graphic cover, and form-fitting carrying case. (Fabric graphic wrap is replaceable without tools.)

Networx Exhibits is a Boutique Exhibit House and Event Marketing Agency based in Las Vegas. We help small to medium size companies successfully compete at trade shows. With 25 years of experience in the trade show industry, we offer our expertise helping our clients focus on capturing and converting leads. We make sure our clients brand message is concise and apparent through a well developed and functional design strategy.

Here are just a few of our recent clients who have purchased or are looking to purchase the GO-Counter for their sales and marketing teams.

With your support we can fulfill these orders and continue to grow our company. Thank you!

Every company has the need to purchase marketing materials and services for trade shows. 300,000 companies a year exhibit in trade shows across the United States.  The GO-Counter is one product that each of these companies can utilize in their marketing efforts.
We have seen great success in the limited sales opportunities that we have had, and now we hope to push the GO-Counter out for its wide release. Many of our future customers will discover the GO-Counter by seeing one at a show or event, with your help we can continue to fulfill orders, and putting the counter where more people can see it.We have generated interest from the University of Southern California who are looking to promote themselves to potential students. Wells Fargo uses the GO-Counter for their employees who travel for outreach programs. Students at the University of Redlands have used the counter on campus as they recruit future members. Food and beverage companies use the GO-Counter when promoting samples at wine tastings, food festivals and art fairs. The GO-Counter has hundreds of possible applications and is perfect for anyone looking for a portable and fully-customizable counter.  
 
We have the GO-Counter ready for production. We need to build up our inventory so as we introduce the product to more potential customers we will be able to ship from our inventory.  Our production can ramp from one to one hundred units in a two-week period. Lead times currently range from fourteen to twenty-one business days, and we need to have inventory on hand to reduce the delivery from two weeks to two days. The funds will be used to produce the first hundred units, then based on demand production will turn out a steady flow to allow us to meet demand while managing costs.  
To produce the graphics, we have two professional printing partners who can provide high-quality graphics on demand with lead times from 2 days to 5 days, depending on volume.  The graphics are easily replaceable, so it is possible that a client may want several custom wraps depending on their marketing and sales needs. For instance, a winery wanted several different graphics to be able to market their different varieties of wine. Being able to do custom branding for each sample variety gave them a huge advantage when trying to attract customers. This level of interchangeability is just one of the major value features of the GO-Counter.
We launched our PR campaign with PR Newswire on June 16, 2015.  Now we need to follow-up with purchased banner ads on targeted websites along with Google Ad Word buys on search sites targeting our buyers.Our staff has experience with logistics, design, and print. What we need is a support for our sales team specifically for the GO-Counter.   
The target is to raise our funds before the end of August so we can have our inventory in September.  Traditionally August, September are the start of the selling season for Fall trade shows.  It is important to have our inventory on hand when our advertising, direct marketing, email and sales campaigns ramp up during August continuing into the Fall.   

The GO-Counter weighs 15 pounds with the fabric graphic; the case weighs 2.5 pounds.
The top is 27.5” W X 16” D X 37” H
Included is the graphic cover, and form-fitting carrying case. (Fabric graphic wrap is replaceable without tools.)




Networx Exhibits is a Boutique Exhibit House and Event Marketing Agency based in Las Vegas. We help small to medium size companies successfully compete at trade shows. With 25 years of experience in the trade show industry, we offer our expertise helping our clients focus on capturing and converting leads. We make sure our clients brand message is concise and apparent through a well developed and functional design strategy.


Here are just a few of our recent clients who have purchased or are looking to purchase the GO-Counter for their sales and marketing teams.
With your support we can fulfill these orders and continue to grow our company. Thank you!

story:
It has been known that a creative environment and tools can empower your creativity and suffuse you with positive energy.  So what can be more enjoyable and invigorating than using a vibrant, artful pen for both your work and your leisure?  

BENU pens are handcrafted after the company’s own original designs in the company’s Moscow-based workshop. Each part of the pens and the final assembling are made in- house in Russia, except for nib units, ink cartridges, clips and rollerballs refills which are provided by Schmidt Technology and made in Germany.

A broad and vivid color palette is the key characteristic of the BENU collections. The designers and artisans take great care to create high-quality, scratch – resistant materials of vibrant colors and diverse textures.

Type of the pens: rollerballs and fountain pens

Body material: acrylic resin

Decorative ring material: rhodium plated brass

Clip material: chrome plated brass

Length Capped: 13.2 cm / 5.1 inches

Weight: 24.5 gr / 0.8 ounces

Cap: Screw On, can be posted

Rollerball  refill: Schmidt 5888 Ceramic Rollerball  Refill;  the pens can be used with any international standard size (11.1 cm/ 4.3 inch) rollerball refills. 

Fountain pens filling system: Schmidt converter K5, the pens can be used with any Standard international  large sized (7.2 cm/ 2.8 inches) cartridges and converters  

Fountain pens nibs: Schmidt nib units with  #6 stainless steel JoWo nibs- 

 F, M and B stroke width availible . 

In addition to their pledge, the first backers that support us within the first 2 days of the campaign will receive 20% discount for any other BENU pen that they may buy anytime later within a year.

We offer our backers two options to choose from:

  1. To receive ( with a free delivery) any of the 4 existing models  from the Supreme collections after 2 months from the end of the campaign OR
  2. To receive a coupon for any future Supreme models (a special price for backers +pen holder gift+ free delivery). Within a year after the end of the campaign we are planning to introduce more than 20 new color combinations in Supreme collection to choose from. The coupon will be valid for a single use within a year after the end of the campaign.

4 additional options for backing us on more than $180:

BENU pen holder for all our backers:

Backers also get a free gift for sharing! Every backer that shares this project on their social media will receive 2 free refills ( ink cartridges or rollerball refills)  with their pledge.  Simply message us with the link that you shared and we will add the ink refills to your pledge. Please help spread the word about our campaign!

BENU pens have been reviewed by various trusted bloggers

Check out the reviews at www.benupen.com/reviews

BENU is a young brand of writing instruments from Russia. All BENU pens are produced in the company’s own workshop located in Moscow.  Benu’s story began in January 2016 when its two co-founders, Alex Semanin and Kate Dmitrieva, decided to join forces to set up а new creative concept of writing instrument. Since then the company has produced and successfully marketed 2 collections of fountain pens and ballpoints, selling its products through the online store at www.benupen.com and delivering internationally. Our team pays  great attention to the quality of our products and customer service. The company only allows pens that meet the highest quality requirements to be shipped to its customers.

Help us to spread the world and receive a free gift for sharing! ( 2 ink cartridges or 2 rollerball refills). Please  message us with the link that you shared and we will add the ink refills to your pledge.

If you have any questions please feel free to message us and we will be happy to provide you with any additional information.

Warm regards, Alex Semanin & Kate Dmitrieva

story:
OUR VISION

The Mentorch team is bringing Mentorch to life! Our platform will connect you to mentors and mentees online and in person. We believe that mentorship is one of the most critical relationships a person can have whether it is personal or professional. Mentorch facilitates that relationship, making it fun, easy and meaningful. Every single one of us are Torch-holders of society and we should strive to Seek Knowledge and Pass the Torch at every opportunity!

Our team meeting with Gary Vaynerchuk, CEO of Vaynermedia

(Gary would be the best mentor ever)

 

Voice Only Capability for Mentorch

What if you had the option to only use voice to navigate through our social network? The Mentorch team has you covered. We are working on allowing you to ask questions about the mentors and mentees you are connected to and anyone who gives permission for their account to be accessed by voice. Now if you're about to meet your mentee or mentor for coffee or lunch and you forgot a really important detail... just ask. 

 
Virtual Reality Capability- Coming Soon
 
There is just something special about being able to experience virtual reality. You can concentrate without any distractions, you can customize your favorite environment. Whatever it is Mentorch wants to help you do it. Soon you will be able to Seek Knowledge and Pass the Torch in the virtual domain and from there not even the sky is the limit.
 

 

 
 


THE BENEFITS

Why be a mentor or mentee? Here are just a few of the benefits?

OUR TIMELINE

The Mentorch platform is well on its way to completion–here's our timeline.

OUR GOAL

We're raising $65,000.00

to bring our platform to life!


Our funding will be used for:

Product Design and Development

Platform/Server Hosting

User Outreach

Technology Acquisition: AR/VR, Voice, and Machine Learning

With your support you will allow Mentorch to continue to evolve and reach many more people. We want to make your mobile, desktop and voice controlled social network experience unparalleled.  We also feel that the more people who care about mentorship who are connected to our platform the better. Mentorch will be a community of mentors and mentees who can offer value in all areas of life.

MEET OUR FOUNDER

My name is Lavontay Santos (@lavontaysantos) and I am the Founder of Mentorch. I am a strong believer in the power of mentorship and the impact it can have in the lives of others. I would not be where I am today without the help of mentors who took time out of their busy schedules to check in and offer guidance. I understand that people can be successful without a mentor but having a person who has been there and done that is an invaluable resource to have at your fingertips. Mentorch will give you the ability to connect with mentors and mentees and form meaningful relationships today, for a season or the rest of your life.

Get to know Lavontay more on the Mentorch Instagram or listen to
the latest Pass the Torch Podcast!

 

THE MENTORCH TEAM

  • Mentorch has a diverse team of people passionate about mentorship, personal development and making a difference in the lives of others.
  • We will continue to improve the program so that mentors and mentees can better target specific categories, so we are making the best matches every day.

 

​  

         From left to right:

  • Our Founder and CEO- Lavontay Santos is an active duty Marine Corps officer who has built highly trained military teams through a combat training pipeline made possible through effective mentorship.

  • The Mentorch Chief Operating Officer- Aileen Santos, attained her MBA while also working as the Chair of Volunteers the highest volunteer position providing mentorship and guidance to other volunteers and benefiting from mentorship herself in the Navy-Marine Corps Relief Society that ensures Sailors and Marines have the monetary and support resources when they need it most.

  • The Mentorch Chief Technology Officer- James Boushell is a talented web developer and graphic designer who has made a name for himself by freelancing and building his own clientele network and allowed him to make a living on his own.

  • Our Chief Innovation Officer- Todd Deshane is a respected Web Development Operations leader and his work includes co-authoring a guide for cutting edge software called Running Xen: A Hands-On guide to the Art of Virtualization.

  • Our UI/UX Startup Advisor and Designer - Tara Scruggs has years of experience working with small to mid-size media firms and has worked on a startup prior to advising our team.

PLEASE SHARE THE MENTORCH PLATFORM!

We understand that everyone will not be able to donate but you can help our campaign by getting the word out to your friends, family and co-workers.

You can find us on Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, and more! Like, follow and share Mentorch on social media to stay updated about the company and our crowdfunding campaign.

 

Tay's Day Vlog

This vlog is about my journey as the founder of our mentorship tech startup “Mentorch”.   I am so excited to share this adventure...the good and the bad. You will see my life and business as we build the next tech startup, some of the most notable vlogs to date are below and the others can be found on YouTube! 

Tay's Day Vlog 013

Mentorch had an amazing opportunity to go all they way up to the Big City ( New York City) to be exact and pitch to the CEO of Vaynermedia, Gary Vaynerchuk. It was an awesome experience for Aileen and Bekah and the entire team was excited to be associated with it. We talked to Gary about our company and even gave him an official Mentorch T-shirt. Mentorch is about mentorship and mentorship is about leaving a legacy. We could not have imagined being able to talk to an awesome legacy maker like Gary so early in our journey but we are thankful for the interaction and we will continue to work hard to take Mentorch to the next level.

-Tay Santos and the Mentorch Team

 

 
 
Mentorship is not just for the board room...
 
Mentorship is not just for people who wear fancy suits and work in board rooms. Anyone can benefit from a good mentorship relationship. Mentorch will help you see how fun it can be to be in a mentorship relationship and most importantly, how meaningful it can be.
 
 

 

Tay's Day Vlog 019:

This vlog features a little behind the scenes of what it is like to be the founder of Mentorch. I show you some podcast content, a majority of it shows an insider meeting with the tech team as we do a dive into the functionality and design of Mentorch. It is very important that we get this right and we can not wait to make sure we are getting you the very best experience possible. I am extremely humbled to be able to work with such a motivated, diverse and passionate team. I know we can and will bring you a platform you'll be glad to spend your time on and feel PRODUCTIVE because of it. We need your help to make it a reality and you have come to the right place to help us!

 

 
Mentors really do want to help you...
 
The truth is there are alot of mentors out there who want to help you but you need to come to the table with a game plan. I don't mean to channel Jerry Maguire...hold on yes I do.. Help your mentors so they can help you. I will say that again, help your mentors so they can help you. Don't go up to the person you want to be your mentor and ask them "how do I become successful?" That is an extremely broad question and also shows that you are being lazy. Try to hone in on what your next step should be. Ask how they would navigate through a specific problem you are currently facing. Make every word count because time is precious for both of you. If you are reading this you are already a motivated individual, prove that you are serious about your success and do some research before you approach your mentor and they will be able to fill the gaps on your canvas... not paint the entire picture for you.
 

 

Pass the Torch Podcast- Official Podcast of Mentorch Inc.

 

 

Pass the Torch podcast is really special to me because I am able to talk to really amazing people, record it and share it with the world. I remember always having these amazing conversations but I was never able to share it with other people directly but now I can. Every time I meet someone who is on their own path and doing great things I want to share their story. I believe that each and every one of us has a story and value we can offer to the world. Pass the Torch Podcast is my small portal to do that. I hope to talk with you one day and if the stars align maybe I will have the honor to have you on the show. Until then remember to Seek Knowledge, and Pass the Torch!

-Tay Santos

Pass the Torch Podcast: Episode 21 with Brandy Morgan (@brandymorgan)

 

PLEASE SHARE THE MENTORCH PLATFORM!

We understand that everyone will not be able to donate but you can help our campaign by getting the word out to your friends, family and co-workers.

You can find us on Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, and more! Like, follow and share Mentorch on social media to stay updated about the company and our crowdfunding campaign.

story:
SPECTA Features

As see on

SPECTA Pen

Sleekly machined of entirely out of alloy that reimagines pen fidgeting with a twist. Its nearly silent operation is discreet, letting you fidget without distracting those around you, and the hefty metal build feels rewarding and reassuring in your hand. We love it so much that we've patented it!

The included ballpoint cartridge allows for silky smooth writing as well as for sketching.

A perfectly concealed stylus integrated seamlessly into the pen cap is ready to provide a smudge free experience. Intricate details accomplished through high precision machining.

A gorgeously machined stainless-steel clip secures the pen inside the pocket and prevents it from rolling off the table!  

There is also zero visible screws! It keeps the design clean and sleek.

A great selection of colors and materials to choose from. There is no other pen that look as good and as unique like the SPECTA in its two-tone glory. Scroll down to see all the available selections!

Brass and Copper develops a nice patina over time.

Aluminum Machine Gray or Cosmos Black with Copper or Brass barrel pen.

SPECTA Ball  

The SPECTA Ball is a hybrid pen stand and fidget device with 9 unique functions. Like the SPECTA Pen, its durable, spherical unibody is milled from a single block of aluminum, and every inch serves a function. It comes with 9 amazing features. Six for fidgeters!

A turning top-ring bezel. Makes a clicking sound when turned, just like turning the ring bezel on a watch.

A retractable bottle opener that lets you fidget with by flicking it open like a knife. How cool is that!

An integrated spring-loaded silent button.

Two integrated spinners that can spin together, or independently for a short spin. Installed with two premium steel ball-bearings.

Spin it with your thumb!

A soft touch silicone knob to rub against.

Inserting a ¼” hex bit into the ball transforms it into a screw driver for everyday tasks.

A stand that proudly displays your pen.

Technical Specs | 100% Machined, 100% Premium Alloy  

PEN  (Patented!)
Dimension: 10.8mm x 133mm 
Weight + refill (Clip): Aluminum (24g), Aluminum+Brass/Copper (40g/41g), Brass (46g), Copper (48g) 
Weight + refill (Clipless): Aluminum (22g), Aluminum+Brass/Copper (38g/39g), 44g (Brass), Copper (46g) 
Cartridge / Refill: 1 x G2 Parker style Ballpoint refill installed (Black) Designed to take the popular G2 Parker-Style refills. Confirmed accepted refills: Parker Ballpoint(Made in France v.), Schmidt Ballpoint P900, Schmidt Easyflow 9000 Ballpoint, Monteverde Ballpoint/Ceramic Gel. 
Stylus: 5mm Soft Rubber Tip/Nib 
  
BALL 
Dimension: 32mm x 34mm 
Weight: Aluminum (50g) 
Patent Pending

CMF Details 
Aluminum: Pen-The exterior(scales) is anodized in a fine matte finish. The inner pen barrel is in a smooth finish. Ball- is anodized in a fine matte finish.
Brass & Copper: The exterior(scales) is in a machine finish that is very lightly polished and smooth. The inner pen barrel is also in a smooth finish. Brass and copper will develop patina over time.  
Stainless steel clip: Sandbead matte finish with laser engraved logo.Steel bottle opener: Sandbead matte finish

Available Variations

Rewards

Timeline

We anticipate to begin shipping in January 2019. This is carefully planned out to make sure we don't rush things through. If by any chance we are lucky enough to pull the schedule forward, we'll definitely let you know! We will also keep you informed immediately If any unforeseen issues arises.

Funds & Manufacturing  

With your support, all the funds will go into producing the production runs of the pen and ball. This will include tooling(molding) cost, setup fee, labor cost and all other manufacturing cost. The goal will also help us meet the minimum order quantity(MOQ) needed in order for us to offer the lowest discounted price possible. Because the design is more complex and require a lot of parts, manufacturing is very labor intensive and time consuming. We are working with more than ten suppliers to make each SPECTA Pen and Ball. We also carefully choose our suppliers, only those with a solid track record of delivering quality products will pass our screening.

Shipping  

We did our best to provide the most reasonable shipping cost for you. Please note that some countries may charge custom tax, but it all depends. Unfortunately we don't cover that and it will be backer's responsibility.  

Risks and challenges

We are aware of the challenges ahead. But we’ll get through it with your support. We have knowledge and experience in product manufacturing and knows how to execute properly. In the end we want to make sure you are happy with our product. We want to exceed your expectations.

Disclaimer: Please note that we might make some minor tweaks and design changes to the production units for improvement. This may have a slight effect on the weight and dimension, although it will be very small.

Our Story  

We started on the idea of SPECTA back in early 2016. We want to create a solution can improve productivity and reduce anxiety through fidgeting. The product we envisioned has to be unique, high quality and beautifully designed.  

Funmodity is founded in Los Angeles, CA by Shin Feng, an industrial designer and inventor. His mission is to design and make small products that touches our daily lives with a hint of fun and uniqueness.
story_txt: SPECTA FeaturesAs see onSPECTA PenSleekly machined of entirely out of alloy that reimagines pen fidgeting with a twist. Its nearly silent operation is discreet, letting you fidget without distracting those around you, and the hefty metal build feels rewarding and reassuring in your hand. We love it so much that we've patented it!The included ballpoint cartridge allows for silky smooth writing as well as for sketching.A perfectly concealed stylus integrated seamlessly into the pen cap is ready to provide a smudge free experience. Intricate details accomplished through high precision machining.A gorgeously machined stainless-steel clip secures the pen inside the pocket and prevents it from rolling off the table!  There is also zero visible screws! It keeps the design clean and sleek.A great selection of colors and materials to choose from. There is no other pen that look as good and as unique like the SPECTA in its two-tone glory. Scroll down to see all the available selections!Brass and Copper develops a nice patina over time.Aluminum Machine Gray or Cosmos Black with Copper or Brass barrel pen.SPECTA Ball  The SPECTA Ball is a hybrid pen stand and fidget device with 9 unique functions. Like the SPECTA Pen, its durable, spherical unibody is milled from a single block of aluminum, and every inch serves a function. It comes with 9 amazing features. Six for fidgeters!A turning top-ring bezel. Makes a clicking sound when turned, just like turning the ring bezel on a watch.A retractable bottle opener that lets you fidget with by flicking it open like a knife. How cool is that!An integrated spring-loaded silent button.Two integrated spinners that can spin together, or independently for a short spin. Installed with two premium steel ball-bearings.Spin it with your thumb!A soft touch silicone knob to rub against.Inserting a ¼” hex bit into the ball transforms it into a screw driver for everyday tasks.A stand that proudly displays your pen.Technical Specs | 100% Machined, 100% Premium Alloy  PEN  (Patented!)Dimension: 10.8mm x 133mm Weight + refill (Clip): Aluminum (24g), Aluminum+Brass/Copper (40g/41g), Brass (46g), Copper (48g) Weight + refill (Clipless): Aluminum (22g), Aluminum+Brass/Copper (38g/39g), 44g (Brass), Copper (46g) Cartridge / Refill: 1 x G2 Parker style Ballpoint refill installed (Black) Designed to take the popular G2 Parker-Style refills. Confirmed accepted refills: Parker Ballpoint(Made in France v.), Schmidt Ballpoint P900, Schmidt Easyflow 9000 Ballpoint, Monteverde Ballpoint/Ceramic Gel. Stylus: 5mm Soft Rubber Tip/Nib   BALL Dimension: 32mm x 34mm Weight: Aluminum (50g) Patent PendingCMF Details Aluminum: Pen-The exterior(scales) is anodized in a fine matte finish. The inner pen barrel is in a smooth finish. Ball- is anodized in a fine matte finish.Brass & Copper: The exterior(scales) is in a machine finish that is very lightly polished and smooth. The inner pen barrel is also in a smooth finish. Brass and copper will develop patina over time.  Stainless steel clip: Sandbead matte finish with laser engraved logo.Steel bottle opener: Sandbead matte finishAvailable VariationsRewardsTimelineWe anticipate to begin shipping in January 2019. This is carefully planned out to make sure we don't rush things through. If by any chance we are lucky enough to pull the schedule forward, we'll definitely let you know! We will also keep you informed immediately If any unforeseen issues arises.Funds & Manufacturing  With your support, all the funds will go into producing the production runs of the pen and ball. This will include tooling(molding) cost, setup fee, labor cost and all other manufacturing cost. The goal will also help us meet the minimum order quantity(MOQ) needed in order for us to offer the lowest discounted price possible. Because the design is more complex and require a lot of parts, manufacturing is very labor intensive and time consuming. We are working with more than ten suppliers to make each SPECTA Pen and Ball. We also carefully choose our suppliers, only those with a solid track record of delivering quality products will pass our screening.Shipping  We did our best to provide the most reasonable shipping cost for you. Please note that some countries may charge custom tax, but it all depends. Unfortunately we don't cover that and it will be backer's responsibility.  Risks and challengesWe are aware of the challenges ahead. But we’ll get through it with your support. We have knowledge and experience in product manufacturing and knows how to execute properly. In the end we want to make sure you are happy with our product. We want to exceed your expectations.Disclaimer: Please note that we might make some minor tweaks and design changes to the production units for improvement. This may have a slight effect on the weight and dimension, although it will be very small.Our Story  We started on the idea of SPECTA back in early 2016. The product we envisioned has to be unique, high quality and beautifully designed.  Funmodity is founded in Los Angeles, CA by Shin Feng, an industrial designer and inventor. story:
Cast-E-O

EasyPlug is a revolutionary way to save your office space. With interchangeable tiles that can declutter your mass of cables to wirelessly charge your smartphone, EasyPlug's model is your silver bullet. 

 The "Cast-E-O" consists of four interchangeable and customizable tiles that cover your workspace. You can write on it as easily as you do your normal desk, charge your wireless device, control your mouse on the perfect surface, and charge any of your plug-in devices simultaneously, without the hassle of cables. Each tile utilizes a mesh electrical system that distributes energy throughout the mat. Did we also mention it’s waterproof? 

*Note: The monitor is not included with the sale of this product.

 

Different Versions

We have three versions of the Cast-E-O: Entry, Intermediate and Advanced.

The Entry-Level Cast-E-O is designed for everyday use and not necessarily directed to the office space. It includes two Qi Wireless Charging tiles and a USB port.

The Intermediate-Level offers two Qi Wireless Charging tiles, a USB port, as well as a keyboard and mousepad tile.

The Advanced-Level is the all-encompassing version including four Qi Wireless Charging tiles, a  USB port, the keyboard and mousepad tile, as well as a drink warming tile for your coffee cup to ensure it does not become cold. Lastly, you can personally customize the skin of the Advanced-Level EasyCharge to a logo or design of your choice.

All three levels include your choice of a variety of base and trim colors.

 

Designed For Your Desk

Each tile is six inches long and wide, with limitless customization to fit your desk. Whether you have multiple devices, multiple screens, or a simple set-up, EasyPlug will simplify your workplace. If you’re tired of the cable clutter underneath your desk or you are worried about the hidden fire hazard, EasyPlug has a solution for you. 

 

Design and Production

EasyPlug is the result of an entrepreneurial class in college. The CEO, Francis Castillo de Mulert, developed EasyPlug as a final project that morphed into the product now. The prototype is currently being built by SWYM, an engineering firm based out of Boise, Idaho. Please find their work at this link: https://swym.consulting/. Once the product undergoes FCC testing, EasyPlug will transition to the production and mass manufacturing phase with Hong Kong-based Morpho MFG. Please check out their latest updates at this link: https://www.morphomfg.com/. In the "What We Need & What You Get" paragraph, we discuss the significance of partnering with Morpho MFG.

About Us

Founder and Owner, Francis Castillo de Mulert recently graduated with a Bachelor's of Science degree from the United States Military Academy at West Point and is currently serving as an Armor Officer. As a Psychology Major,  he was fortunate to take an entrepreneurship course offered by the Business Management Department at USMA. Although Francis had always dreamt of creating his own company, he did not necessarily have the tools to begin. The idea of incorporating wireless charging technology into the everyday office space went from a mere school project to reality. Francis has partnered with Jason Brodeur who is currently serving as our Chief Financial Officer. Jason also plays a huge role in evaluating our concepts and prototypes, ensuring that the device is meeting our goal of increasing workspace efficiency.  Lastly, Hannah Stith serves as our Social Media Marketing Specialist, assisting EasyPlug to better reach our consumers via the internet.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

In total, we are asking for $60,000 USD to accomplish tasks that are necessary to put EasyPlug devices on the market for office cubicles or home offices. To be specific, we will need $6,000 to complete our prototyping milestone 2 as well as an additional $6,000 for FCC testing and certification. Depending on the costs of materials, it will roughly cost between $15,000 and $20,000 to conduct mass manufacturing. As of now, we will be partnering with Morpho Manufacturing out of Hong Kong. They offer a unique three-phase system of manufacturing that will benefit EasyPlug by allowing Morpho to act as a third party to find the best materials and manufacturing processes for our product. We estimate a cost of $10,000 to ship our first set of devices from Hong Kong. Lastly, we anticipate a $10,000 fee to create and receive approval of a patent. We are including an additional $13,000 USD for unanticipated expenses to include contingencies for issues we may run into with prototyping, manufacturing and shipping.

The Impact

If you decide to back our campaign, you are helping our dream become a reality. As of now in our early stages, we have decided as a team that we would prefer not to approach angel investors in order to keep our team organic in nature. Our organization is comprised of some of the youngest leaders in the nation, quite literally. Hence, it is in our best interest to not stray away from our original path which will allow us to maintain our vision of reducing cord clutter in your workspace.

By donating to our campaign, not only you will have a stake in the charge to pioneer wireless charging, but you will be able to receive first access to our devices as they roll onto the market.

Risks & Challenges

The challenges and risks  of this venture go hand in hand. The risk for the EasyPlug team is that to get to this point, we have spent considerable hours and money with the possibility that we will lose all of our investment. Our team is composed of recent college graduates who are all working full-time jobs, as well as pursuing higher educations. Our biggest challenge is we lack the funds to move forward with our concept. Currently, SWYM and EasyPlug have researched the proper methods to create the device. However, our second (and more expensive) phase, to actually begin prototyping, is what is holding us up due to limited monetary resources.  

Even though we are busy with our young adult lives, we have determined a course of action that allows us to balance our day job along with this entrepreneurial venture.

 

Timeline

March 2020: The idea of EasyPlug came to fruition.

June 2020: SWYM and EasyPlug conduct milestones 1 of researching prototype. 

July-November 2020: Establishing Online Presence; Marketing via IG, working on IGG draft, developing a company website.

December 2020: EasyPlug IGG campaign launched.

February 2021: IGG campaign complete, tentatively have funds to complete milestone 2 and to develop a working prototype.

Spring 2021 begin manufacturing journey with Morpho MFG. 

Late Spring/Early Summer 2021 begin shipping and selling product

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot financially donate to our campaign, we completely understand. However, we’d appreciate it if you could follow our Instagram @easyplug_llc and give us a shoutout. Additionally, we would be extremely grateful if you would spread our name by word of mouth to your friends and families.

story:
Gunmetal Black

 

Artisan Copper

 

Posh White

 

Walnut Elwood

 

 

 

 

Designed for a premium computing experience. The contemporary home and office consists of many premium decors and collectibles. There is, however, something missing to tie it all together. Azio has set out to fill this void, aiming at designing a centerpiece keyboard with properties comprising of high-quality materials, timeless appearance and intuitive usability. Introducing the Azio Retro Compact Keyboard, a premium mechanical keyboard designed for the modern lifestyle.

 

Leather and wood have always been associated with premium customized goods and exclusiveness. It reflects taste, craftsmanship, and culture while emitting a unique charm that inspires. 

 

 

 

The RCK frame is forged from a solid piece of aluminum alloy to give it robustness and durability. Hex bolts are added for structural enhancements and to add an industrial vintage element.

 

 

The RCK features “Blue” mechanical key switches, giving each key a tactile feel and a subtle click, reminiscent of vintage typewriters. Each key incorporates a centered backlight LED, illuminating the keyboard evenly and beautifully.

 

 

Supports both Windows and Mac keyboard layouts. Includes 18 keycaps corresponding to Windows and macOS. Select your desired OS and replace the keycaps accordingly.  

 

 

Connect via wireless Bluetooth or wired-USB. When USB mode is selected, simply connect the included USB-C cable to the computer and type away.

 

 

Built-in is a high-capacity 5,000mAh lithium-ion rechargeable battery. With the backlight off, usage time is about 9 months. With the backlight on, approximately 1 to 2 months depending on backlight intensity and usage frequency.  

 

 

A matching palm rest utilizing the same premium material and design language is included.

 

 

Two sets of interchangeable feet with different heights are included to enhance the ergonomics of your typing position. 

 

 

 

GUNMETAL BLACK

 

ARTISAN COPPER

 

POSH WHITE

 

WALNUT ELWOOD

 

 

 

 

Vintage inspired and packed with modern features, the Azio Retro Classic Mouse is the perfect companion for your Retro Compact Keyboard and Retro Classic Keyboard. Built with premium leather and contrasting alloy frame, this retro mouse renders a sophisticated and timeless impression. Versatility is accentuated with its ambidextrous design and ability to work on virtually any surface. Available in different design themes, the RC mouse is well suited for both mobile and stationary lifestyles.

 

Utilizing top grain chrome-tanned leather to provide a pleasant touch, each leather piece is precision-cut, molded in, and hand-trimmed to perfection. 

 

 

The leather top-cover can be changed after excessive use or to achieve a different look.

 

 

The Retro Classic mouse is constructed with a sand-blasted aluminum frame to give it robustness and durability. Hex bolts are added for structural enhancements and to add an industrial vintage feel. 

 

 

The scroll wheel design starts with a high-grade aluminum rod that is knurled into a diamond-shaped pattern and completed with chamfered edges on a precision CNC lathe. It is then anodized to enhance aesthetics and durability. 

 

 

The PixArt PAW3805 sensor is designed to track flawlessly on virtually any surface, including glass and other high-gloss materials. 

 

 

Mouse setting controls are located on the bottom side. Controls include Bluetooth pairing, BT or RF mode, power on/off, battery level indicator, and DPI. The DPI is adjustable in the following steps: 400, 800, 1600, and 3000 dpi.

 

 

Connect wirelessly with Bluetooth or RF (Radio Frequency) via USB Dongle. Works on Bluetooth enabled devices natively but also includes a USB-RF receiver for computers without Bluetooth. 

 

 

Built-in is a high-capacity 1,000mAh lithium-ion rechargeable battery. Usage is up to 4 months on a single charge. 

 

 

Charging the mouse is simplified with USB Type-C port. Unlike older USB ports, the connector doesn’t have to be inserted in only one direction.  

 

 

This mouse does not discriminate between left or right-handed users. Its ambidextrous design makes it the ideal mouse for everyone. 

 

 

 

GUNMETAL BLACK

 

ARTISAN COPPER

 

POSH WHITE

 

 

 

 

 

AZIO presents its latest interpretation of the mouse pad, a staple piece in its beloved Retro Classic collection. Staying true to minimalist design philosophy, the R.C. mouse pad is stripped of the excess in order to accentuate the integrity of the material. The result is an elegant and enduring accessory made from imported vegetable-tanned leather and embossed with an AZIO logo insignia. Designed to weather with age, the R.C. Mouse Pad is offered in black and nude colorways.

 

 

We chose the best hide to achieve the ideal thickness, strength, and appearance. 

 

 

This leather mouse pad is vegetable-tanned allowing for a beautiful weathering patina over time. 

 

 

Elegant embossed logo finished with an embedded anodized aluminum ring

 

 

The backing of the mouse pad is insulated with a thin polyurethane layer to reduce slipping and improve stability.

 

 

 

BLACK

 

NUDE

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

RETRO COMPACT KEYBOARD (RCK)

Q. What's the shipping charge for the keyboard? 
A. The shipping charge is $12 within USA. For shipping outside of the USA, please check the perk for rates. 

Q. What international layouts do you offer? 
A. We currently only offer USA layout but plan to launch other layouts in December, 2018. These additional layouts includes German, Dutch, French, Italian, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean.

Q. What color are the keyboard backlights? 
A. The Gunmetal Black, Artisan Copper and Walnut Elwood all comes with WHITE backlight. The Posh White version comes with ORANGE backlight. 

Q. What's the warranty on the keyboard? 
A. The keyboard comes with a 2 year limited warranty. 

RETRO CLASSIC MOUSE (RCM)

Q. What's the shipping charge for the mouse? 
A. The shipping charge is FREE within USA. For shipping outside of USA, please check the perk for rates. 

Q. Why doesn't this mouse support Windows 7 or older OS in Bluetooth mode?
A. This mouse uses Bluetooth 4.0 LE (Low Energy) and Windows prior to Windows 8 does not support BT Low Energy protocols. If your system is Windows 7 or older, please use the included USB-RF transceiver dongle.     

Q. How many buttons does the mouse have?
A. This mouse have 3 buttons including the scroll wheel. 

Q. Does the mouse have backlight?
A. Currently, this mouse does not feature any backlight. 

Q. Does the mouse work on glass? 
A. Yes, as long as the glass (or any other surface) exceeds 4mm in thickness. 

Q. What's the warranty on the mouse? 
A. This mouse comes with a 1 year limited warranty. 

RETRO CLASSIC MOUSE PAD (RCMP)

Q. Is this mouse pad stable on glossy surfaces?
A. Yes, the bottom pad is insulated with a thin polyurethane layer to reduce slipping and improve stability.

Q. What's the warranty on the mouse pad? 
A. This mouse pad comes with a 1 year limited warranty. 

ORDERS & SHIPPING

Q. When is expected delivery for these products? 
A. We are aiming to start shipping by early December, in time for the holidays.  

Q. What countries do you ship to? 
A. We can ship to most countries. Please check the perks for shipping destination availability and rates. 

Q. I live outside of USA, can I combine shipping charges? 
A. Yes, we can help you combine shipping charges. Unfortunately the Indiegogo platform have no easy way to do this so we'll need to combine it for you manually. Please leave a comment or send us an email at support@aziocorp.com and we'll be happy to help!

Q. Who pays for customs & duties?
A. For all orders shipping outside of USA, you'll be responsible for any duties or taxes your country requires. At the time of shipping, you'll be contacted by USPS, FedEx, UPS, DHL, or your local customs asking for payment. Once you make that payment to the customs broker, your order will be processed for final delivery. Unfortunately, we will not be able to mark the shipment as a gift or alter the commercial invoice.   

Q. What's your return policy?
A. We want you to be 100% satisfied with our products. Once you back our product, you'll have the option of canceling anytime before the campaign is over for a full refund. You also have the option of returning the product for a refund within 30 days of receiving it (less any shipping charges).

Q. Can I change the product color or shipping address?
A. If the product has already shipped, please contact us at support@aziocorp.com. Otherwise, please login to your Indiegogo account to update your shipping address. To change the product or color, please cancel your order and re-order again. If the perk you purchased is no longer available or if the campaign is already over, please contact us. 

 


 

Azio Website: https://aziocorp.com

Connect with us

                  

Press Kit

   

Contact us

Product/Campaign Questions: support@aziocorp.com 

Press Inquiry & Cross Promotions: marketing@aziocorp.com

Works on Bluetooth enabled devices natively but also includes a USB-RF receiver for computers without Bluetooth.   Built-in is a high-capacity 1,000mAh lithium-ion rechargeable battery. Usage is up to 4 months on a single charge.   Charging the mouse is simplified with USB Type-C port. Unlike older USB ports, the connector doesn’t have to be inserted in only one direction.    This mouse does not discriminate between left or right-handed users. Its ambidextrous design makes it the ideal mouse for everyone.    GUNMETAL BLACK ARTISAN COPPER POSH WHITE     AZIO presents its latest interpretation of the mouse pad, a staple piece in its beloved Retro Classic collection. Staying true to minimalist design philosophy, the R.C. mouse pad is stripped of the excess in order to accentuate the integrity of the material. The result is an elegant and enduring accessory made from imported vegetable-tanned leather and embossed with an AZIO logo insignia. Designed to weather with age, the R.C. Mouse Pad is offered in black and nude colorways.  We chose the best hide to achieve the ideal thickness, strength, and appearance.   This leather mouse pad is vegetable-tanned allowing for a beautiful weathering patina over time.   Elegant embossed logo finished with an embedded anodized aluminum ring  The backing of the mouse pad is insulated with a thin polyurethane layer to reduce slipping and improve stability.   BLACK NUDE          RETRO COMPACT KEYBOARD (RCK)Q. What's the shipping charge for the keyboard? A. The shipping charge is $12 within USA. For shipping outside of the USA, please check the perk for rates. Q. What international layouts do you offer? A. We currently only offer USA layout but plan to launch other layouts in December, 2018. These additional layouts includes German, Dutch, French, Italian, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean.Q. What color are the keyboard backlights? A. The Gunmetal Black, Artisan Copper and Walnut Elwood all comes with WHITE backlight. The Posh White version comes with ORANGE backlight. Q. What's the warranty on the keyboard? A. The keyboard comes with a 2 year limited warranty. RETRO CLASSIC MOUSE (RCM)Q. What's the shipping charge for the mouse? A. The shipping charge is FREE within USA. For shipping outside of USA, please check the perk for rates. Q. Why doesn't this mouse support Windows 7 or older OS in Bluetooth mode?A. This mouse uses Bluetooth 4.0 LE (Low Energy) and Windows prior to Windows 8 does not support BT Low Energy protocols. If your system is Windows 7 or older, please use the included USB-RF transceiver dongle.     Q. How many buttons does the mouse have?A. This mouse have 3 buttons including the scroll wheel. Q. Does the mouse have backlight?A. Currently, this mouse does not feature any backlight. Q. Does the mouse work on glass? A. Yes, as long as the glass (or any other surface) exceeds 4mm in thickness. Q. What's the warranty on the mouse? A. This mouse comes with a 1 year limited warranty. RETRO CLASSIC MOUSE PAD (RCMP)Q. Is this mouse pad stable on glossy surfaces?A. Yes, the bottom pad is insulated with a thin polyurethane layer to reduce slipping and improve stability.Q. What's the warranty on the mouse pad? A. This mouse pad comes with a 1 year limited warranty. ORDERS & SHIPPINGQ. When is expected delivery for these products? A. We are aiming to start shipping by early December, in time for the holidays.  Q. What countries do you ship to? A. We can ship to most countries. Please check the perks for shipping destination availability and rates. Q. I live outside of USA, can I combine shipping charges? A. Yes, we can help you combine shipping charges. Unfortunately the Indiegogo platform have no easy way to do this so we'll need to combine it for you manually. Please leave a comment or send us an email at support@aziocorp.com and we'll be happy to help!Q. Who pays for customs & duties?A. For all orders shipping outside of USA, you'll be responsible for any duties or taxes your country requires. At the time of shipping, you'll be contacted by USPS, FedEx, UPS, DHL, or your local customs asking for payment. Once you make that payment to the customs broker, your order will be processed for final delivery. Unfortunately, we will not be able to mark the shipment as a gift or alter the commercial invoice.   Q. What's your return policy?A. We want you to be 100% satisfied with our products. Once you back our product, you'll have the option of canceling anytime before the campaign is over for a full refund. You also have the option of returning the product for a refund within 30 days of receiving it (less any shipping charges).Q. Can I change the product color or shipping address?A. If the product has already shipped, please contact us at support@aziocorp.com. Otherwise, please login to your Indiegogo account to update your shipping address. To change the product or color, please cancel your order and re-order again. If the perk you purchased is no longer available or if the campaign is already over, please contact us.   Azio Website: https://aziocorp.comConnect with us                  Press Kit   Contact us Product/Campaign Questions: support@aziocorp.com Press Inquiry & Cross Promotions: marketing@aziocorp.com

story:
Overview

Project Highlights: Breakthrough Customization and Weight 

  • Ultralight. No cords. Pure Aim. Experience pure aim accuracy in game.
  • Shell Customization for different user grips.
  • Ergonomic shape for hours of gameplay without any wrist aches or hand pains.
  • Toolless Customization: Change the top button cover, shell cover, DPI buttons (color and height), cable color all without needing to use any tools or removing screws.
  • 100% PTFE Skates: Optimized for buttery smooth glide and movement control. 
  • Lag free: The Ultra Custom has a 1ms USB report rate, optimized MCU and latest R&D wireless technology making input lag virtually negligible.
  • 66Hr Office Average Battery Life and 40Hr Gaming Mode: optimized for low power consumption without sacrificing performance
  • Ultralight and flexible FCC compliant USB Type-C Cabling System: Even in wired mode, the Ultra Custom feels almost wireless. Charges to full power in just 1 hour
  • Customization Software for DPI, RGB and macros
  • Exclusive Perks and Pricing for Early Backers

This project is to bring the Art of the Gaming enthusiast community to the rest of the world through the world's lightest RGB wireless gaming mouse. This mouse is for those who appreciate custom designs, are interested in modding and DIY projects, the look and feel of custom PCs and enthusiast gaming gear. The Ultra Custom is your entry point into the hobby and world of enthusiast gaming and modding.

 

 

Just like a fine tuned engine for a race car driver and custom athletic footwear for a sprinter; there are nuances in a gaming mouse that can enhance a gamer's performance and speak to their persona. We have designed a custom gaming mouse incorporating the latest technology, trends and feedback of the top mouse enthusiasts and pro gaming communities. Here's a summary of the key features we have incorporated into our mouse that will enable anyone to make a custom personalized high end mouse themselves.

 

Features

Ultralight weight design

The Ultra Custom is currently the lightest RGB wireless gaming mouse available on the market at ~66 to 73 grams. Other highend wireless gaming mice on the market weigh around 80 grams. The honeycomb design is based on enthusiasts modding and 3D printing weight reduced shells. The honeycomb shell design enables an ultra light weight while maintaining a structurally strong design. 

You will also have the option to lower weight down further to 58 grams in full wired mode. But why wired mode? For enthusiasts, they want to eliminate any tracking lag from their input devices and that means typical wireless mice have about 12–18 ms of lag which can be seen and felt in game - skating, delayed or floating feeling. The Ultra Custom has a 1ms USB report rate, optimized MCU and latest R&D wireless technology making input lag virtually negligible. You will not be able to distinguish the difference between the Ultra Custom in wireless vs wired mode.

Our Ultra Flexible Type C wired Cables were developed so that even in wired mode, the Ultra Custom will feel almost wireless. Plus, custom matching cables on a mouse enhances the bespoke look and feel of a matching themed battle station. 

Ergonomic Design

Based on a proven ergonomic shape, the Ultra Custom is suitable for small to large hands. The mouse will enable gamers to play for hours without wrist aches or hand pains. With 100% PTFE skate feet, the Ultra Custom glides buttery smooth.

 

Ultra Flexible Type C Wired Cable System

Enthusiasts are usually sick of the stiff heavy cables plaguing typical gaming mice on the market. The stiff cables add to the resistance and friction between the gaming mouse wire and their mouse pad. Enthusiasts have been for years iterating different designs to have the lightest and most flexible cables in order to reduce drag and friction on their mouse movements.

We have developed an FCC compliant cable that is on par with a fully custom paracord cable. You will be able to select from a range of different colored cables for Wired Gaming mode. Modders, DIY and enthusiasts usually order these custom paracord cables for as much as $20 and then proceed to open their mouse and replace and install the cable themselves for both aesthetic and performance reasons.

With our cable system, you can have a custom ultra flexible cable with matching colors to your gaming setup with out all the hassle - simply select a cable and plug it into your mouse. USB-C is the emerging standard for charging and transferring data. The Ultra Custom is perhaps the only type-C wireless rechargeable high end gaming mouse -  you can quickly charge to full power in under 1 Hr. Get up to 66 Hours before re-charging.

 

Mouse Shell Cover & Button Customization 

Enthusiasts take great lengths to optimize and personalize their mouse by disassembling them, modding them and repainting the cover shells. You can now simply select different shell finishes and tool-lessly replace the button and top shell covers in seconds. Select from different color finished top shells with either a honeycomb design or solid cover shape.

 

DPI button Customization

Match and personalize your mouse design by selecting from different colors and button heights for the dpi button to support your grip style. Lower DPI button heights for example are better suited for palm and 1-3-1 users so that there is less accidental DPI clicks in game.

 

With your support and contribution, we can increase production and lower costs. 

Supplemental Mouse Demonstration 

Technical Specs

Sensor: pmw3335 Optical

Size: 120x66x42mm

weight: 58 - 73 Grams

switch: Omron 20M

DPI: 200 – 16000

Max. tracking speed: 40 G , Max Speed 400 ips 

Polling Rate in HZ: 125 / 250 / 500 / 1000

Connection: Wired/Wireless

Cable length: 2 m / 6.5 ft

6 Programable Buttons Wireless / Wired Gaming mouse, Matte coating , Paracord Type C Cable 

RGB Lighting

66Hr Office Average Battery Life and 40Hr Gaming Mode

100% PTFE feet

Battery Removal Instructions

 

Shipping and Fulfillment:

Updates:

The third batch is in production and we expect to receive them around June 18th. We will process and begin shipping out orders the following week. 

 

We want to thank our early backers and supporters for their patience in fulfillment timelines. Although supply chains and workers are still not at full capacity due to the Coronavirus, we expect the second batch production and cover shells to be completed in about two weeks and fulfillment can resume again. We have fulfilled most of the first production batch. Those who ordered the extra colored shells will have their orders fulfilled as soon as we receive the shell shipment.

DPI: 200 – 16000

Polling Rate in HZ: 125 / 250 / 500 / 1000
Connection: Wired/Wireless
Cable length: 2 m / 6.5 ft
6 Programable Buttons Wireless / Wired Gaming mouse, Matte coating , Paracord Type C Cable 
RGB Lighting
66Hr Office Average Battery Life and 40Hr Gaming Mode
100% PTFE feet
Battery Removal Instructions

 
Shipping and Fulfillment:

Updates:
The third batch is in production and we expect to receive them around June 18th. We will process and begin shipping out orders the following week. 
 
We want to thank our early backers and supporters for their patience in fulfillment timelines. Although supply chains and workers are still not at full capacity due to the Coronavirus, we expect the second batch production and cover shells to be completed in about two weeks and fulfillment can resume again. We have fulfilled most of the first production batch. Those who ordered the extra colored shells will have their orders fulfilled as soon as we receive the shell shipment.

story:
Month Planner is a smart addition to your working area, motivational tool which helps you perfect your habits and skills. It can be used in common areas of both home and office where you can constantly track your progress on tasks you assign for. You can place it on the wall or on working desk where it's always visible. Concept is designed by Art Reactor Design Team with help of students who tested and supported the idea which promotes effective way to success.

We are facing more and more challenging world which expects us to perform better and better. People are being pushed to their limits and need help to understand that they can get even better. Month Planner is designed to provide simple and practical way to help you reach your full potential. Art Reactor aims to manufacture products and develop content that helps people around the globe to keep their minds active and healthy.

When we talk about changing personality, we exclude traits that define us. At an early age, every child absorbs different skills and habits. Learning process never ends. What we know and who we are is our only surviving tool.  Everybody wonders what the true formula for success is. By analyzing some of the most successful people we noticed patterns which repeat at every step. Organization, consistency and persistence! Three skills which, with training, are learnable and can become habit. The fact is, life isn't getting easier, and that’s why we have to get stronger. Without the right habits, it's like you're thrown into a war zone without rifle. It took us four months to design perfect tool which can help people to gain those right habits. We call it Month Planner. 



Including social science students in research was crucial step which we had to take to test Month Planner. We needed honest feedback of our product from students who used the product at home. First we gathered 21 volunteers who filled questioner about their first impression and what they expect. They all received free Month Planner prototype. They used Month Planner for one month. Information at the end was priceless. Final question they had to answer was „Would you like to continue using Month Planner in future? “. With the result of 75% we weren't entirely satisfied.

After analyzing questionnaires, we changed basic design and extended time period up to 60 days. We started our second campaign confidently. We produced 400 new Month Planners for students who liked the idea. After 60 days of waiting, counting positive reactions and low in our budget we found that 96% of students want to continue using Month Planner in future, mostly because they felt proactive shift in their personality which was challenging and motivational for them.



Forex is expanded rigid plastic sheet with particularly fine and homogenous cell structure and silky matt surfaces. We used 3 mm thick forex in production. Month Planner is ''puzzle'' made of 14 pieces. Everything except graphic and transparent foil is made out of forex. All main pieces are precisely cut with laser.

Month Planner production out of FOREX material. 



We've made solid progress in the last 16 months - our design, engineering, and tooling is complete. Now we need your help to bring this project to the rest of the world. $5,000 covers our initial manufacturing run, allowing us to bring Month Planner to life and to expand our idea of setting the world towards brighter perspective. By contributing to our campaign, you'll be casting your vote to evolve the workplace beyond the common desk and chair. 

When you donate, here's what's in it for you:


The Founder and CEO of ART REACTOR, Vanja Vrbanec, is an individual dedicated to helping people work hard and play hard throughout his career. Vanja is an Art Professor, Graphic designer and Ceramic designer who finds his inspiration in advanced students who have the ability for success but don't know how to reach their full potential. Vanjas passion for movement extends to volunteer work where participants can deal, help and reveal their true life interests through Art and Design.


When you select a Perk remember to add shipments: 5$ for EU, 10$ for everywhere else.


We've done 90% of the heavy lifting to get the Month Planner into production. As with any new venture, there may be some bumps along the way. Some of our initial risks include manufacturing delays (the tooling process itself) and the size of initial orders.

Lucky for us, we're pretty decisive folks who are no strangers to the ups and downs of launching new products. If we hit any of those bumps along the way, you'll be the first to know. We'll inform you with a current status, why it's happening and how we're going to fix it. If at any point you have questions about our risks or challenges, give us a shout - we're happy to talk it through with you.  Check out our updates tab and watch our first production run being poured at our foundry!



1)  Which types of persons use Month Planner?

The reason why we only tested students is because that period of life is the turning point from relaxed student years to adult period where real life begins. The exact time when someone has all necessary tools for success differs from individual to individual. Month Planner is for everyone (no matter how old you are) who wants to equip personality with crucial skills for reaching targeted tasks faster and with greater quality. It saves you a lot of your valuable time and shapes you up.


2)  How fast can I expect the results?

If you use Month Planner properly, results can be expected after one week. By properly we mean following one rule – be true to yourself.


3)  Where should I place my Month Planner?

It's your decision. 76% of tested students placed Month Planner on the wall next to their working area. It's important that you place it somewhere where you look at or pass by frequently.


4)  Which tasks should I pick?

Try to avoid tasks like ''Take out trash'' or ''Clean your room''. Concentrate on your work, tasks which can result in employment, tasks that aren't easy but possible, tasks which are essential for your big life goals. It would be ideal if you combined your own wishes with work because that's when your inner motivation becomes your strongest ally.


Some people are not able contribute, and we totally understand. You'll win a place in our hearts if you click one of our share buttons below, or simply tell your friends about our campaign to get people in motion. We're grateful for every effort on our behalf.

story: Kerala is home to 8 projects including arts, childcare, sports, healthcare and construction... Volunteers will be living in basis conditions for a minimum of 4, and working for a minimum of 8 hours a day with the most neediest in the community of Karela
